[\[22a.3\]]tshogs bsags pa'i sa pa ltar de de ltar rdzogs pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshogs bsags pa'i sa pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lam gang yin pa ni sa la 'jug pa dang nye zhing rdzogs pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen 
[\[22a.4\]]po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa chog mi shes pa las skye ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu dben pa las skye ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[22a.5\]]rigs kyi bu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lam thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'dre zhing mi gnas kyi/_bas mthar gnas 'cha' zhing gnas te/_de dag na gcig pu rgyang bsrings te bag yod pa dang /_rtun pa dang /_
[\[22a.6\]]rgyun du gnas so/_/de ltar rab tu dben par gnas pa de rnal 'byor gyi lam de nyid la gnas nas theg pa chen po'i chos rnams yid la byed pas bar chad med par theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu skyed do/_/ji tsam du nyin mo dang /_mtshan mo de dang /_de dag 
[\[22a.7\]]'das pa dang /_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de dang de dag 'das shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'gro'o/_/de de ltar rab tu dben pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lam la gnas nas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]bar du 'gyur te/_de gang du thabs kyi khyad par gzhan btsal bar bya ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu dben pa las skye ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[22b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa ston pa tshad mar bgyis pa las skye ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar rab tu dben pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de theg pa chen po'i chos 
[\[22b.3\]]rnams yid la byed pas gang theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing gsang ba blos mi chud pa de la ston pa nyid tshad mar byed do/_/ston pa nyid tshad mar byas nas chos de dag la mos so/_/de ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu rnam par 'byed pas bdag gang gi tshe ston pa la mos par ma gyur pa de'i tshe bdag ston pas bshad 
[\[22b.4\]]pa'i chos rnams la mos par mi 'gyur te/_ston pa'i che ba nyid la mos pa shin tu ma rung bar ma byas par rig nas ston pa la mos pa 'jug pa theg pa chen po'i chos gsang ba dag la mos pa 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji ltar khong du chud cing rtogs nas theg pa chen po'i chos zab 
[\[22b.5\]]cing gsang ba de dag la dad pa thob pa de ltar khong du ma chud cing ma rtogs kyang byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i stobs bskyed pas chos de dag la dad pa thob ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa ston pa tshad mar byas pa las skye 
[\[22b.6\]]ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis gsol pa/_de ltar skye ba sna tshogs 'di dag gis theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas theg pa chen po'i chos gang yid la bgyis te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom 
[\[22b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas dpag tu med pa bcu yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_chos dpag tu med pa dang /_zab pa dpag tu med pa dang /_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]brjod pa dpag tu med pa dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba dpag tu med pa dang /_sems can dpag tu med pa dang /_rjes su gzung ba dpag tu med pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa dang /_dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang /_zhing dpag tu med pa 
[\[23a.2\]]dang /_las dpag tu med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la chos dpag tu med pa ni gang mdo dang /_dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa la sogs pa bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi sde snod du gtogs pa dang /_de'i yan lag tu gtogs pa rnams kyi chos dpag tu med pa'o/_/de la zab pa 
[\[23a.3\]]dpag tu med pa ni gang theg pa chen po la gang zag la bdag med pa dang /_chos la bdag med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_don dam pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam grangs rnams kyis bstan pa tshad med pa dang /_
[\[23a.4\]]dgongs pa las byung ba dang /_zab pa bstan pa dpag tu med pa'o/_/de la brjod pa dpag tu med pa ni rigs kyi bu brjod pa gang dang gang gis sems can dang chos dang /_don rtogs par 'gyur ba tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can rnams la yang ji tsam du tshig brjod pa de dang /_
[\[23a.5\]]des don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung brjod pa rnams dpag tu med par 'byung ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la tshig rab tu dbye ba dpag tu med pa ni rigs kyi bu sems can rnams la 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshig rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po nye bar 
[\[23a.6\]]ston cing /_don re re la yang tshig rab tu dbye ba tshad med pa dag gis rnam grangs su phye ste rab tu ston pa'o/_/de la sems can dpag tu med pa ni gang skye ba'i 'khor ba thog ma dang /_tha ma med pa dang /_kun tu rgyug pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pas sems can 
[\[23a.7\]]dpag tu med do/_/de la rjes su gzung ba dpag tu med pa ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta ste/_gnod pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang /_ngan song las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang /_'jig tshogs las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang /_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]theg pas yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang /_rjes su gzung ba tshad med pas sems can tshad med pa dag la dus thams cad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de la thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa ni thabs la mkhas pa gang dang gang gis sems can tshad med pa dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste/_
[\[23b.2\]]yang na rigs pa yang dag par bstan pas sam/_yang na bag med pa yang dag par bskul bas sam/_yang na zhum pa gzengs bstod pas sam/_yang na yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par dga' bar bya bas sam/_yang na tshig drag po'i sbyor bas sam/_yang na tshig 'jam po'i sbyor 
[\[23b.3\]]bas sam/_yang na bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas kyis chos dang 'thun pa nyid kun tu bstan pas sam/_yang na rnam par dag par skye ba'i lus kun tu bstan pas sam/_yang na rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul kun tu bstan pas sam/_yang na kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[23b.4\]]gyis sam/_yang na rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul kun tu bstan pas sam/_de lta bu'i tshul gyi thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa dag gis sems can tshad med pa dag 'dul ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[23b.5\]]dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang /_chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa'o/_/de la sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni rnam pa bdun du khong du chud par bya ste/_mngon par shes pa 
[\[23b.6\]]chen po brnyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang /_mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_chos kyi sku rtag pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zad mi shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang 
[\[23b.7\]]shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brtsams pa rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang chos kyi longs 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]spyod chen po la longs spyod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod che ba dang /_'jig rten du byung yang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams tshad med pa yongs su smin par mdzad 
[\[24a.2\]]cing rnam par grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa don che ba'o/_/de la chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zhes bya ba ni gang chos kyang ma yin la chos med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /_'dod chags kyang ma yin la 'dod chags 
[\[24a.3\]]dang bral ba'ang ma yin pa dang /_'khor ba'ang ma yin la mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos de ni 'khor bar snang ba'i chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_de na yang kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing 
[\[24a.4\]]sems can gyi khams dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs te mi zad pa dang /_sems can thams cad la shin tu phan pa dang /_bde ba'i gnas la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir 'khor ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa gang la yang mi gnas pa'o/_/de la dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 
[\[24a.5\]]dpag tu med pa la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge 'dun dkon mchog ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi rab tu che ba'o/_/de bas na rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dang /_
[\[24a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mnyam par blta'o/_/de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di 'dra ba las brtsams te bdag dad pa skyes pa dang /_chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di 'dra ba las 
[\[24a.7\]]brtsams te bdag dad pa skyes pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di 'dra ba las brtsams te bdag dad pa skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bdag la ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di lta bu thob par bya ba'i skal ba yod do/_/bdag la ni chos dkon mchog 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]gi che ba nyid 'di lta bu thob par bya ba'i skal ba yod do/_/bdag gang sa chen po la zhugs pa bsam pa dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bdag la ni de dag dang bsam pa dang sbyor ba mtshungs pa'i 
[\[24b.2\]]skal ba yod do snyam mo/_/de la zhing dpag tu med pa ni rigs kyi bu zhing 'di gnyis te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la yongs su ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang yongs su dag pa dag kyang dpag tu med do/_/de la yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[24b.3\]]rnams la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gcig tu dge ba dang gcig tu bde ba dang gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_gcig tu dbang sgyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag rab tu myong ngo /_/rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi longs spyod chen po rab tu myong ngo /_/yongs su ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[24b.4\]]kyi zhing rnams su yang rnam pa thams cad du byang chub yang dag par ston cing yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams ni yongs su smin par mdzad/_yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar mdzad de/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi las dpag tu med par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[24b.5\]]skye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa rnam pa du zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[24b.6\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bzhi po 'di dag go/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas pa'i dad pa dang /_skye ba na dad pa dang /_dus gzhan na dad pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis dad pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i dad pa ni rigs kyi bu 
[\[24b.7\]]'di lta ste/_dper na ba lang gi rjes kyi chu dkrugs pa las ma dkrugs ma bskyod par bzhag na sngon bzhin du dang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phral gyi bya ba mang po la chags pas theg pa chen po la dad pa dkrugs pa las 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]gang gi tshe chags pa las rnam par bkrol nas chags pa de dag gis mi 'khrugs te/_theg pa chen po'i chos la rtse gcig tu gyur pa de'i tshe sngon bzhin du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de la skye ba na dad pa ni rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_/dper na chang la sogs pa 'gyur ba na dang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[25a.2\]]de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba de dang der skye ba na theg pa chen po la dad pa skyes nas thob pa skyed do/_/de la dus gzhan na dad pa ni rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ston gyi dus kyi tshe chu klung dang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[25a.3\]]dpa' theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa dang /_sems pa dang sgom pa dus gzhan na sbyor bas sbyor ba las byang bas grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la rang bzhin gyis dang ba ni rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na bai dUr+ya dang /_nor bu rin po che la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i rjes 
[\[25a.4\]]su 'jug pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par mi rtog pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa chen po la dad pa yang ngo bo nyid kyis rjes su 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgya che ba'i dad pa dang /_gsal ba'i dad pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[25a.5\]]zhi ba'i dad pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la rgya che ba'i dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i chos la gus par byas te spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi'o/_/de la gsal ba'i dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu theg pa chen po'i chos spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi'o/_/de la 
[\[25a.6\]]rab tu zhi ba'i dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral zhing chos nyid rab tu rtogs pa thob pa rnams kyi'o/_/de la rnam par dag pa'i dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams kyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[25a.7\]]'di lta ste/_'phen pa'i dad pa dang /_rtsom pa'i dad pa dang /_rjes su 'dzin cing gus par byed pa'i dad pa dang /_mos pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la 'phen pa'i dad pa ni sngon nas rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas shing yongs su bsgoms pa rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]pa gang yin pa'o/_/de la rtsom pa'i dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_sems bskyed pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa gang yin pa'o/_/de la rjes su 'dzin cing gus par byed pa'i dad pa ni rjes su 
[\[25b.2\]]'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can rjes su 'dzin cing las gus par byed pas theg pa chen po la dad pa gang yin pa'o/_/de la mos pa'i dad pa ni chos kyi dbyings zab mo bstan pa la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[25b.3\]]dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mthong ba dang /_thos pas dad pa dang /_bstan pa 'phel ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_re ba dang 'dod pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la mthong ba dang thos pas dad pa ni gang sangs 
[\[25b.4\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs sam 'od mthong zhing thos na theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la bstan pa 'phel ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang 
[\[25b.5\]]bdag nyid rtag par rgyun tu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba rjes su dran pas byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la re ba dang 'dod pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[25b.6\]]thams cad bsgrubs pas re zhing 'dod de/_byang chub sems dpa' re ba dang 'dod pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_brjod pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_gcod nus pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_bskrun pa rjes su dran pa'i dad 
[\[25b.7\]]pa dang /_sgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la brjod pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang theg pa chen po'i sgo thams cad la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mos pa'i rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la gcod nus pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]mang du thos pa thos pa 'dzin pa thos pa bsags pa rnams the tshom gcod nus pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la bskrun pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang pha rol gyi rgyud la theg pa chen po'i chos klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_don 'dzin pa dang /_'don pa la 
[\[26a.2\]]sogs pas bskrun te/_gzhan gyi rgyud la dam pa'i chos bskrun pa de rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la sgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i chos de nyid nan tan gyis bsgrub ste/_nan tan gyis sgrub pa de rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/
[\[26a.3\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rnal 'byor thob pa'i dad pa dang /_thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i lus kyi las sbyor ba'i dad pa dang /_thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i ngag gi las sbyor ba'i dad pa dang /_thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i yid kyi las sbyor ba'i dad pa'o/_/
[\[26a.4\]]de la rnal 'byor thob pa'i dad pa ni gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams de la dmigs nas dad pa'o/_/de la thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i lus kyi las sbyor ba'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas yongs su zin 
[\[26a.5\]]pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi las bag med par spyod pa bzham pa dang /_spyo bas 'dul ba dag 'dul bas de la dmigs nas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i ngag gi las sbyor ba'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas yongs su zin pa 
[\[26a.6\]]rnams byang chub sems dpa' ngag 'khrul par spyod pa bzham pa dang /_spyo bas 'dul ba dag 'dul bas de la dmigs nas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i yid kyi las sbyor ba'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas yongs su zin pa rnams byang 
[\[26a.7\]]chub sems dpa' yid 'khrul par spyod pa bzham pa dang /_spyo ba lus dang ngag las byung bas 'dul ba dag 'dul bas de la dmigs nas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mi lta ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_zil gyis mnan pa rjes su dran 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]pa'i dad pa dang /_kun tu spyod pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang 'brel pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la mi lta ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa na lus dang srog la mi lta bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa'i rjes su 'thun pa rjes su 
[\[26b.2\]]dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la zil gyis mnan pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs zil gyis mnan pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la kun tu spyod pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyor ba na pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yang dag pa'i nan tan rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la nye bar spyod pa dang 'brel ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[26b.4\]]'jug la/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams rjes su dran pa theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_zang zing med pa'i sems rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_yang dag par so sor shes par byed pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[26b.5\]]mi skyo ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_bde ba kha na ma tho ba med par sbyor ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la zang zing med pa'i sems rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang tshogs sdud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshogs sdud la/_zang zing med pa'i sems rjes su dran pa'i theg pa chen po 
[\[26b.6\]]la dad pa'o/_/yang dag par so sor shes par byed pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni 'di lta ste/_zang zing med pa'i sems rjes su dran zhing tshogs sdud la theg pa chen po la dad de/_'di ltar tshogs la yang dag par so sor shes par byed cing phyin ci ma log pa bstan pa'i phyir nan tan byed pa'o/_/yongs su mi skyo ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa 
[\[26b.7\]]ni 'di lta ste/_log par zhugs pa rnams kyis yongs su mi skyo la/_yongs su mi skyo ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/bde ba kha na ma tho ba med par sbyor ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni 'di lta ste/_bdag la gnod par sbyor ba dang /_'dod pa'i bde ba la sbyor ba spangs nas tshogs la sbyor te/_
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]sbyor ba de rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yon tan rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_dang ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_skye bo mang po la phan par bya ba rjes su dran 
[\[27a.2\]]pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la yon tan rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang sangs rgyas la 
[\[27a.3\]]mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la dang ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang sangs rgyas la mchod cing /_rim gro byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid rang gi sems dang 
[\[27a.4\]]ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems dang ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la skye bo mang po la phan par bya ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa de nyid kyis 
[\[27a.5\]]skye bo mang po la phan pa byed la/_de yang rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bla ma'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_bdag gi yang dag pa'i nan tan rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba 
[\[27a.6\]]rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_bla ma'i 'dod pa'i bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la bla ma'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 
[\[27a.7\]]rdzogs pa mthong ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la bdag gi yang dag pa'i nan tan rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro zhing chos mnyan pa'i phyir bsnyen bkur 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]byed la/_ji ltar rjes su bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing bdag gis yang dag pa'i nan tan rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la byas pa gzo ba rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid de las man ngag dang yon tan 
[\[27b.2\]]rjes su thob nas byas pa gzo ba de rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la bla ma'i 'dod pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid man ngag des skye bo mang po la phan par bya ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la 
[\[27b.3\]]dad pa'o/_/gzhan yang dad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ldan pa'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_'bral ba'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i 
[\[27b.4\]]bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa'o/_/de la ldan pa'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang byams pa bsgom pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la bde ba dang ldan pa'i bsam pas bde ba dang ldan par bsgrub pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad 
[\[27b.5\]]pa'o/_/de la 'bral ba'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang snying rje bsgom pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang 'bral ba'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa bsgrub 
[\[27b.6\]]pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dga' ba bsgom pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la bde ba dang mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/de la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa 
[\[27b.7\]]ni gang btang snyoms bsgom pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsam pa bsgrub pa rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpas theg pa chen po la dad pa'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba tshad med pa 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'di lta bu dag gis theg pa chen po la dad pa'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba tshad med pa shes par bya'o/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyar yang de'i mtha' bde bar shes par mi 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa 
[\[28a.2\]]chen po la rab tu dbye bar rig par bya'o/_/rab tu dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa'i phan yon du 'tshal bar bgyi ba gang lags/_bcom 
[\[28a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa'i phan yon ni tshad med de/_de'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni dge ba'i 
[\[28a.4\]]rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pas rnam par 'phel ba dang ldan pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_skal ba mnyam pa dang /_skal ba mi mnyam par sems skyed pa dag las byang chub kyi 
[\[28a.5\]]sems skyed pa srung ba'i phyir kun srung ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir don che ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni 
[\[28a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings zab mo bstan pa'i rnam pa thams cad la mos pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir zab pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir mthu che ba'o/_/rigs 
[\[28a.7\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir gzi brjid che ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir ring du 'gro ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bdud kyi las dang mu stegs can thams cad kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa mi sgul ba'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[28b.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni mang du thos pa la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa dang /_'thun pa'i phyir nus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i nan tan phun 
[\[28b.3\]]sum tshogs pa thams cad dang 'thun pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bdag dang gzhan dag rnal 'byor chen po 'thob pa dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las 'dul ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir rjes su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[28b.4\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su skong ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni 
[\[28b.5\]]sems can thams cad phan tshun lus dang ngag gi gnod pa med pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can log 
[\[28b.6\]]par zhugs pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang dka' ba spyod pa thams cad dang du blang ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bskal pa mtha' yas 
[\[28b.7\]]par chos dkar po rnam par spel bar rtsol ba la yongs su mi skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub pa'i ting 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i ye shes bla na med pa la gnas nas sangs 
[\[29a.2\]]rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i yang dag par bstan pa dang 
[\[29a.3\]]'thun pa'i phyir tshogs yongs su sdud pa dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bsod nams tshad med pa skyed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rmad du byung ba'i bsod nams yongs su gzung ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[29a.4\]]mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba chen po dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su gzung ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su gzung ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/
[\[29a.5\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can dpag tu med pa la ldan pa dang 'bral ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsam pa bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir snying brtse bas non pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen 
[\[29a.6\]]po la dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'i nyes byas kun tu spyod pa thams cad la 'dzem pa nye bar gnas pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir shin tu sbed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can log par zhugs pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug 
[\[29a.7\]]bsngal ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la sgyid lug pa med pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir brtan pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni nyin mtshan du dge ba'i phyogs chen po la mngon par brtson par byas pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]sbyor ba legs par goms par byas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni rig pa'i gnas lnga byang ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir legs par byang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni dus thams cad 
[\[29b.2\]]du bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir 'thun pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni gnod pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_dngangs pa dang /_the tshom dang /_rnyog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir rin po che lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[29b.3\]]rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni rgya che ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bas lus dang sems sim par byed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[29b.4\]]cad la khyab pa'i phyir nam mkha' lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes tshad med pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i gru lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen 
[\[29b.5\]]po la dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i gnas yin pas rtsi chen po lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir zam pa lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg 
[\[29b.6\]]pa chen po la dad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog skye ba'i rtsa ba byed pa'i phyir sa bon lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i 
[\[29b.7\]]mtshon cha thams cad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba'i phyir go cha lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rin po che phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sogs shing sdud de rnam par gnas par 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]byed pa'i phyir gter chen po lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni de las gzhan du dad pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang rnyed pa'i phyir rgyal po lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po 
[\[30a.2\]]la dad pa ni yun ring po nas rjes su 'brang ba'i ngan song dang gnod sems dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dug gi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir sman nad med byed lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[30a.3\]]ba gcod pa la dad pa'i mtshon cha'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_gdung bar byed pa dang /_mya ngan 
[\[30a.4\]]gyi me'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir chu lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni mi 'dod pa thams cad dang phrad par byed pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir lag cha bzang po lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[30a.5\]]theg pa chen po la dad pa ni rtag par rgyun du dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can tshad med pa la ye shes tshad med pas snang bar bya ba dang 'thun pa'i phyir nyi ma lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[30a.6\]]dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi char tshad med pa 'bebs pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir sprin chen po lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni gzhan mu stegs can dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad gzhom pa dang 'thun 
[\[30a.7\]]pa'i phyir lce 'bab pa lta bur blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir lo legs pa lta bur blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te/_'das pa'i dus na 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid du bud med grong pa'i tha chad phyag dar byed pa ngan 'gro ba zhig byung ste/_des khyim bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig gi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren ces thos nas de bkres 
[\[30b.2\]]pa dang /_skom pas nyen pas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang /_der 'khor gyi khyams na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam du gnas pa dang bshos 'drim pa mthong ngo /_/bud med des spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa de 
[\[30b.3\]]dang tshogs kyis bskor ba mdzes pa de yang mthong nas/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam dang /_zhabs 'bring ba mdzes pas mdzes so zhes dad pa'i sems gcig bskyed nas de 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/de rgyu de nyid 
[\[30b.4\]]kyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes pa nas rgyu de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi tshe rgyal 
[\[30b.5\]]po'i khab 'di nyid du zas 'dod ces bya ba'i bram ze zhig byung ngo /_/zas 'dod de sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la rang bzhin gyis ma dad na bsnyen bkur lta ga la zhig byed/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal 
[\[30b.6\]]po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs pa dang /_bram ze de yang don zhig gnyer zhing rgyal po'i khab nas byung ngo /_/de byung ba dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa de khas bon du mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des gzugs mdzes pa 
[\[30b.7\]]la dmigs te/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis sku legs par brgyan to zhes dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed nas/_de 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de rgyu des rab mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skyes pa nas rgyu de nyid kyis rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te/_'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe rgyal po'i khab 
[\[31a.2\]]'di nyid du gzhan mu stegs can lnga brgya zhig byung ste/_de dag skabs btsal ba'i bsam pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor brgya phrag du mas bskor te mdun gyis byas nas 
[\[31a.3\]]chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/de na mu stegs can lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis kye ma'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni snyan pa gsung ba'o zhes dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed nas de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/de dag rgyu des dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes pa nas rgyu 
[\[31a.4\]]de nyid kyis rim gyis nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_zag pa zad pa rjes su thob pa'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te/_gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer gang gis sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba nas 'byung bar 
[\[31a.5\]]'gyur ba'i 'od zer bkye bas des sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams la reg nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad de bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas/_de dag 'di snyam du gang gis/_bdag cag sems can dmyal ba'i gnod 
[\[31a.6\]]pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun bcad nas bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa 'di su'i mthu snyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kye ma'o gang gis bdag cag gi sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa'i 
[\[31a.7\]]sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun bcad nas bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de'i mthu 'di ni mthu che ba'o snyam ste/_dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed nas/_de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas te shi 'phos nas rgyu de nyid kyis mtshungs par de dag lhar skyes pa nas rim gyis rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas/_la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/la la ni theg pa chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis ngas mngon par shes te/_bgrang ba las 'das pa'i 
[\[31b.2\]]sems can dag gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa chen po la dad pa srab cing chung ba'i sems gcig gis kyang kha cig ni ngan song las log par gyur/_kha cig ni kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i lus las log par gyur to/_/log nas kyang 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs 
[\[31b.3\]]pa rjes su thob bo/_/theg pa chen po la dad pa'i sems srab cing chung ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyang rjes su thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa srab cing chung ba gcig gi phan yon yang de ltar 
[\[31b.4\]]tshad med na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa rgyun du 'byung zhing chu bo ltar 'bab pa'i phan yon lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang brjod par sla ba ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen 
[\[31b.5\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la theg pa chen po la dad pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang /_skye ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang /_rab tu dbye ba 
[\[31b.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang /_phan yon phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das rjes su dpag pa dang /_rjes su 'jug pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa tshad ma mchis pa dag kyang brjod par 
[\[31b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa chen po skyes so/_/'khor der 'dus pa las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma rnams kyang mos pa las mi g.yo ba'i 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]tshul gyis mos pa klung du byed pa'i bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang la la dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa sngon du btang ste/_sbyor bar bgyid pa ni 
[\[32a.2\]]ring po mi thogs par de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_snod spyad dang /_'tshog chas dang /_yo byad dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_mar me dang /_bud med dang /_
[\[32a.3\]]skyes pa dang /_kun spyod pa'i yo byad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i snod yongs su tshol bas byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]rgyan dang /_snod spyad dang /_'tshog chas dang /_yo byad gang yin/_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_mar me dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_kun spyad pa'i yo byad gang yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[32a.5\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi dga' ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas so/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi khu ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi btung ba'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni de 
[\[32a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bzhon pa'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi na bza'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyan 
[\[32a.7\]]no/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mang du thos pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snod spyad dang /_'tshog chas dang yo byad do/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni de bzhin 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi rdzogs par longs spyod pa 'bel ba'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam 
[\[32b.2\]]par dag pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mar me'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_kun spyod pa'i yo byad do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar 
[\[32b.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa sngon du btang ste sbyor bar byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yo byad bcu po 'di dag ring po mi thogs par kun rdzob dang /_don dam par yang thob par gyur na gang dag 'di la de bzhin nyid du sbyor bar byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_rigs kyi bu de 
[\[32b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yo byad bcu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ba'i steng du de dag gis gzhal med khang gang la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'i gzhal med khang de'ang thob par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'i gzhal med 
[\[32b.5\]]khang ci 'dra/_byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po shin tu 'byung ba/_gnas gzhan dag shin tu rnam par phye ba tshad med pa/_rnam 
[\[32b.6\]]par gzhag pa 'khor gyi khyams yongs su ma chad pa/_khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi mtshan nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid/_de bzhin 
[\[32b.7\]]gshegs pa'i gnas/_byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gnas pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa rnam par rgyu ba/_chos kyi ro'i 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad mdzad pas nye bar gnas pa nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/_bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag 
[\[33a.2\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bkod pa dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'gro ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po'i theg pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa chen po nas 'jug pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med 
[\[33a.3\]]pas brgyan pa/_pad ma chen po'i rgyal pos brtan pa'i gzhal med khang chen po na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs te/_rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa sngon du btang ste/_sbyor bar byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang de 
[\[33a.4\]]lta bu yang thob par gyur na/_gang dag de bzhin nyid du sbyor bar byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin te/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa sngon du btang 
[\[33a.5\]]nas sbyor bar byed pa de dag ring por mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yo byad 'di dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang de yang thob par 'gyur na/_gang dag 'di la de bzhin nyid du sbyor bar byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[33a.6\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la'ang rgya 
[\[33a.7\]]cher rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin sems pa dang /_bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor ba de dag bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang la la dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'dri ba dang /_'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin sems pa dang /_bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor ba de dag ni bsod nams gang la 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam pa thams 
[\[33b.2\]]cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams 'jig rten las 'das pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi dper yang mi bzod pa de lta bu'i bsod nams skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'jig rten pa'i bsod 
[\[33b.3\]]nams tshad med pa gang yin pa de yang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba'i bden par bsdus pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyid yongs su grub pa ma yin te/_de ni rgyu zad de 'bras bu byung bas mi rtag pa'o/_/kun dga' bo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[33b.4\]]rnams kyi bsod nams 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de yang rgya che ba ma yin zhing don chung la zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la rgya che ba ma yin pa ni theg pa dman pa la gnas shing dmigs te yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/_/don chung ba ni bdag nyid rjes su 'dzin par nye bar gnas 
[\[33b.5\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/zad par 'gyur ba ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams de ni yongs su grub pa/_rgyu zad pa ma yin pa/_rgya che ba/_
[\[33b.6\]]don che ba/_zad par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams de la ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis dper yang mi bzod do/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[33b.7\]]'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/theg pa chen po la dad pa 'jug pa zhes bya 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bar yang zung shig_/theg pa chen po la dad pa rnam par 'phel ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig theg pa chen po la dad pa nges par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 
[\[34a.2\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod 
[\[34a.3\]]do/_/'phags pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas zhus shing bris te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[34a.4\]{D145}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+nolka nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[34a.5\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/_ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen 
[\[34a.6\]]po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 
[\[34a.7\]]brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mngon bsgrags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /_byang chub sesam dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]yon tan bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i glo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon 
[\[34b.2\]]cha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros dang /_byang chub sesam dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang /_byang 
[\[34b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_
[\[34b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[34b.5\]]dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[34b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka' dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' 'byung dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[34b.7\]]dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/_yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/_khams gsum la ma chags pa/_g.yog 
[\[35a.2\]]'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' 
[\[35a.3\]]don yod pa la mos pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[35a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[35a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang ma spros pa dang blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa dang dngos po med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa ste de ltar rtogs par bya'o/_/
[\[35a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/
[\[35a.7\]]rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/_dngos po gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi rnam pa ni tshad med de de ni tshad dang ldan par bstan par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgyid dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[35b.2\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[35b.3\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[35b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ci skad smras pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[35b.5\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la 
[\[35b.6\]]thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang /_'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thams 
[\[35b.7\]]cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub 
[\[36a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_
[\[36a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang /_'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_gal te de 
[\[36a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di la dri bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[36a.5\]]khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun tu bsten pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur 
[\[36a.6\]]rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras te/_'on kyang 'jam dpal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis khyod byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dris shig_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[36a.7\]]'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/_theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po yin gyis bdag la ma gsung shig_/yang rigs kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 
[\[36b.2\]]sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i 
[\[36b.3\]]dus la dbab par shes na dris shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don gang yin/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang 
[\[36b.4\]]pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to/_/sangs 
[\[36b.5\]]rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni ma spros pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to/_/
[\[36b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don te/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/_'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes ji skad 
[\[36b.7\]]bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di ni bstan du med pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan du med na ci zhig bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bstan du med pa ni btags te bstan to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras btags pas ci zhig 'dogs par byed/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal btags pas ni dngos po yang mi 'dogs/_dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs 
[\[37a.2\]]so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na theg pa gsum po dag ji ltar bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chags ba med 
[\[37a.3\]]pa la chags par ma byed/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/_gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/_phung po lnga dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_byang chub spros pa dang 
[\[37a.4\]]bcas pa yin nam/_'on te spros pa med pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/_spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar byang chub dang /_spros pa dang bcas pa dang /_spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su 
[\[37a.5\]]med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs 
[\[37a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di lta bu ni rnam pa 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[37a.7\]]gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 
[\[37b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di 
[\[37b.3\]]ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no/_/'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no/_/de nas shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/_/
[\[37b.4\]]de la yi ge mi dmigs/_tshig 'bru mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru mi snang /_don kyang mi snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[37b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa gang lags/_rnam pa gang lags/_rtags gang lags/_mtshan ma gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/_bsnyad du med pa ste/_brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa 
[\[37b.6\]]gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/_de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/_de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[37b.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas 
[\[38a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma 
[\[38a.3\]]thob pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/_'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa la lan gdab pa'am/_spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya 
[\[38a.4\]]ba'i nus pa dang mthu ga la yod/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na bstan pa 'di gang la bstan 
[\[38a.5\]]pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/_smras 
[\[38a.6\]]pa de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/_smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na ci khyod slob ba'am/_smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/_smras pa de ni ma 
[\[38a.7\]]yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gal te btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/_slob pa yang ma yin/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs thu bo mchog yin gyis btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos pos ni ci yang 'thob par mi 
[\[38b.2\]]'gyur/_mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje ngan ngon gyis kyang ri brag chen po rnam par 'jig go/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang 
[\[38b.3\]]yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/_/rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_ba lang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu 
[\[38b.4\]]chung dus dul bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/_kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/_glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed ga la nus/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[38b.5\]]dper na mi dmus long gis shul du mchi ba'am/_grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thogs na khyim nas khyim du mchi ba'i rngo lta ga la thogs te/_de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du glang po che chen po lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[38b.6\]]chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/_da ci bgyir yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 
[\[38b.7\]]kyis sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lha 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so/_/
[\[39a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra 
[\[39a.3\]]rab kyi rdul snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar 'thun pa sha stag go/_/phyogs gcig ji lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 
[\[39a.4\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon 
[\[39a.5\]]lam dang /_sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas 'di lta ste chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba 
[\[39a.6\]]dang /_sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol ba dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang /_kun du sbyor bar bya ba dang /_skad thams cad brjod par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med 
[\[39a.7\]]par bya ba dang /_dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun par 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]kyis rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las brtsams te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 
[\[39b.2\]]blo gros la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa dang /_chod pa med pa dang /_brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /_tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang zil gyis mi non pa dang /_zhum pa med pa dang /_'phrogs pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /_brjod 
[\[39b.3\]]pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/_sangs rgyas 
[\[39b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/_de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas 
[\[39b.5\]]pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39b.6\]]rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gang dag 'das pa dang /_ma byon 
[\[39b.7\]]pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang yin/_gang las bsams te de skad smra/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag 
[\[40a.2\]]pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_de dag ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang /_las dang 
[\[40a.3\]]po pa dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa dang /_skye bar skyes pa dang /_sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang gzhon nur gyur pa dang rgyal tshab dang /_dbang bsgyur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[40a.4\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/_de dag ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[40a.5\]]de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba'am/_mdzes pa'am/_kha dog bzang po 
[\[40a.6\]]rgyas pa'am/_rgya che ba'am/_gzi brjid che ba'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'am/_kun rjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'am/_rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam/_sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher 
[\[40a.7\]]thos na 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod cing thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]lta steng gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang /_khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang /_mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang /_dbang 
[\[40b.2\]]po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /_lha'i mig gi 
[\[40b.3\]]shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa ste/_bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang 
[\[40b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang /_mchog tu bya ba dang zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang phrad pa dang /_
[\[40b.5\]]rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor du bya ba dang /_'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /_sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa 
[\[40b.6\]]de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 
[\[40b.7\]]gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/_rnam pa bcu gang 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phan par bya ba'i sems dang bde bar bya ba'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_mnyen pa'i sems dang /_sdug pa'i sems dang /_phan gdags pa'i sems dang /_kun du bsrung ba'i sems dang /_snyoms pa'i sems dang /_slob dpon gyi 
[\[41a.2\]]sems dang /_ston pa'i sems te/_sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung mnod pa dang /_kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mang du thos nas rab tu 
[\[41a.3\]]dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/dus shes par gyur 
[\[41a.4\]]nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/don shes par gyur nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/rmongs pa med par gyur nas 
[\[41a.5\]]chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thob pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa 
[\[41a.6\]]thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[41a.7\]]dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /_bdag med pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_g.yo ba med pa nyid dang /_dbugs 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'byin pa med pa nyid dang /_gnas med pa nyid dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang /_rtsol ba med pa nyid dang /_mngon bar 'du byed pa med pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur ba'i phyir sbyor bar mi byed/_mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor 
[\[41b.2\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sa'i khams brtag 
[\[41b.3\]]pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag 
[\[41b.4\]]thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag 
[\[41b.5\]]pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su spyod pa byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos nyid las phyir mi zlogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur
