[\[41b.6\]]ba yongs su grub pa dang /_chos nges par sems pa dang /_sems can la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_zhing la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_las la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_
[\[41b.7\]]mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/_yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[42a.2\]]cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs 
[\[42a.3\]]rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma byon 
[\[42a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam 
[\[42a.5\]]par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing /_gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar 
[\[42a.6\]]skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i las gang ci rtsom 
[\[42a.7\]]yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba dang /_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[42b.2\]]'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can mtha' yas pa dang /_sems can dpag tu med pa dang /_
[\[42b.3\]]sems can grangs med pa dang /_sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can mtshungs pa med pa dang /_sems can gzhal du med pa dang /_sems can stong pa nyid dang /_sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang /_sems can med pa nyid dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa nyid do/_/
[\[42b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[42b.5\]]dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thos na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 
[\[42b.6\]]bsam pa nges pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/_chos kyi bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[42b.7\]]kyi bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyod pa'i bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/_sems 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]can gyi khams rgya chung zhes 'chad pa'am/_sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe'am/_sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe'am/_sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe'am/_sems can gyi khams gdul sla zhe'am/_sems can 
[\[43a.2\]]gyi khams gdul dka' zhe'am/_chos kyi dbyings rgya chung zhe'am/_chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe'am/_'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce'am mi 'jig ce'am chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am chos kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/_
[\[43a.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mtshan 
[\[43a.4\]]ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa nyid dang /_med pa nyid dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /_sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang /_rmi lam lta bu nyid dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid 
[\[43a.5\]]du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing /_gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_
[\[43a.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 
[\[43a.7\]]dmigs pa bcu thos na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas yod do zhe'am med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chos yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhe 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]'am med do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe'am nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[43b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon to zhe'am byon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o zhe'am/_da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'am/_mi zad do zhes bya ba dang /_dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/_
[\[43b.3\]]mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par 
[\[43b.4\]]brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang /_tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/mang ba dang gcig pa nyid dang /_yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang /_don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang /_dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa 
[\[43b.5\]]dang /_dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan mas mtshan ma med pa sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par 
[\[43b.6\]]brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[43b.7\]]'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la gzhon nur gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/_sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par sgrub pa yin/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang 
[\[44a.2\]]zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam ba shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/_sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa 
[\[44a.3\]]yin/_dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur ba yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod 
[\[44a.4\]]par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs 
[\[44a.5\]]med par 'gro ba dang /_dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang /_yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang /_sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang /_sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shas cher mngon par sgrub 
[\[44a.6\]]pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing /_gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rgyal 
[\[44a.7\]]tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_nyon mongs 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_chos nyid rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_
[\[44b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[44b.3\]]dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 
[\[44b.4\]]kun du spyad pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang /_chos kyi rgyal 
[\[44b.5\]]po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bsgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub kyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir 
[\[44b.6\]]te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub 
[\[44b.7\]]sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon par sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis rlob pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]med pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyong ba byed pa mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[45a.2\]]la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/_sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/_sems can grangs med pa 
[\[45a.3\]]'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/_sems can grangs med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man chad gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[45a.4\]]dpa' de'i lus kyi las shes par mi nus/_ngag gi las shes par mi nus/_yid kyi las shes par mi nus/_rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/_rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/_'das pa'i dus la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus shing mngon par 'du byed pa shes 
[\[45a.5\]]par mi nus/_blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/_sems kyi yul shes par mi nus/_ye shes kyi spyod yul shes par mi nus te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 
[\[45a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod pa mdzad de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dus gsum shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[45a.7\]]mtha' dang dbung med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 
[\[45b.2\]]gzhag pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[45b.3\]]zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg go/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 
[\[45b.4\]]'ur 'ur ro/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon 
[\[45b.5\]]par bab po/_/lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i pad ma'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i rgyan phreng gi sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i rgyan 
[\[45b.6\]]gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon bar bab po/_/lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo /_/lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo /_/lha'i nga ro yang grag go/_/gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 
[\[45b.7\]]yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste lhag chad med do/_/tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/_phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag 
[\[46a.2\]]kyang ming chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas 'dir phyin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag thams cad du chos 
[\[46a.3\]]bstan pa 'di byung ste/_'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te/_lhag chad med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to/_/bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten 
[\[46a.4\]]gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyin par gyur to//_//
[\[46a.5\]]bam po gnyis pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /_chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rang byung 
[\[46a.6\]]shin tu rnam dag blo mnga' ba/_/mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa/_/bsnyen dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/do zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang /_/kun brjod bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang /_/
[\[46a.7\]]sdug bsngal bzod rlag 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/_/kun du bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]'jog byed/_/gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang /_/rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang /_/gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/_/dge dang mi dge'i 
[\[46b.2\]]las rnams gang yod pa/_/de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/ting 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang /_/de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa/_/de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang 
[\[46b.3\]]chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/_/ci 'dra ci 'dra de yi de dang der/_/rim pa de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang /_/lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[46b.4\]]ba tha dad rnam gsum nas/_/bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams/_/gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi/_/khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub 
[\[46b.5\]]don du brtan pa sems de 'jog_/chos 'dir kun du 'gro bar gang gyur cing /_/dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa/_/yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang /_/sems 
[\[46b.6\]]can ji ltar sa las 'byung 'gyur zhes/_/chags med mig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na/_/sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang /_/sngon gyi gnas rnams rtogs par bya 
[\[46b.7\]]ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan ba sems 'di 'jog_/ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa/_/kun du sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i/_/nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten gsum na tha 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]snyad gang btags dang /_/ngag lam sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa/_/brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste/_/stong pa mi g.yo rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/_/don dam 
[\[47a.2\]]bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang /_/rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog 
[\[47a.3\]]byed/_/'od zer rtse mo re las 'od zer rnams/_/de bzhin phyogs bcu kun du rab tu 'gyed/_/de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa/_/de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul 
[\[47a.4\]]te/_/sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun/_/gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas/_/chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa 
[\[47a.5\]]sems 'di 'jog_/rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa/_/skra rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed/_/ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag_/gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed 
[\[47a.6\]]cing /_/phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'jig rten 'di na 'das dang de bzhin du/_/ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pas 'jigs pa rnams/_/bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa 
[\[47a.7\]]sems 'di 'jog_/dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang /_/ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/_/skra yis 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/_/rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang 
[\[47b.2\]]chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 
[\[47b.3\]]'dra ba/_/skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing /_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed/_/sems can kun gyis rab tu rnam par shes/_/lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par 
[\[47b.4\]]bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams kun du brjod dang 'dra bar yang /_/skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed/_/rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'dir ni zhing rnams 
[\[47b.5\]]thams cad ma lus par/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhing rang byung gi/_/chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams/_/rnam pa kun du mngon par sprul byed cing /_/yid las byung 
[\[47b.6\]]bde dag rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/_/ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/tshig gcig 
[\[47b.7\]]brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med/_/tshig rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba/_/sems kyi skad cig 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/phyogs rnams kun du 'gro yang lus kyis sam/_/ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa med/_/dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 
[\[48a.2\]]'di 'jog_/byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin/_/gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su rgyu byed cing /_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten tha dad par/_/'jig rten bdag por rgyal 
[\[48a.3\]]ba'i sras 'gyur ba/_/gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrog par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/byang chub don du srid par spyad spyod tshe/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyor gang yin pa/_/de yi bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/
[\[48a.4\]]chos mchog chos rab phul du phyin pa dang /_/khyad par 'phags chos bla med gang yod pa/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/tshe nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan med pa/_/
[\[48a.5\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad gyur ci 'dra ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa 
[\[48a.6\]]yin/_/ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang /_/de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa dag_/de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang /_/dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/
[\[48a.7\]]'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya/_/shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang /_/ngan song sa rnams dag tu gnod gyur pa'i/_/gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]la bstan par bya/_/gang zhig byang chub don du sems 'jog pa/_/de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpar bstan/_/bslab pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas pa/_/ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin/_/nad bral rnams kyi bstan pa ji bzhin du/_/'jig rten kun la 
[\[48b.2\]]phan pa bya ba'i phyir/_/de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa/_/'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no/_/phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde/_/gnyen dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang /_/kun du bsrung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems/_/slob dpon sems 
[\[48b.3\]]dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems/_/de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyur pa de/_/lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya/_/mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug_/dben par gyur nas dge bshes sten du gzhug_/dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya/_/dus 
[\[48b.4\]]tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya/_/dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya/_/'jigs pa med nas don la brtson par bya/_/don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya/_/chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya/_/rmongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras/_/
[\[48b.5\]]legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya/_/'di ni dang po'i las can brjod pa ste/_/byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste/_/'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin 
[\[48b.6\]]pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan la rab tu sbyor/_/mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang /_/bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang /_/de bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang /_/mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang /_/'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par/_/
[\[48b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rtog par byed/_/sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang /_/brtag par bya phyir de ni gzengs yang bstod/_/'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas mu med ces/_/de ltar de ni dpyod du gzhug par bya/_/'di na sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang /_/phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa/_/de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug_/rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba/_/de ni sangs rgyas sras 
[\[49a.2\]]po sbyor byed la/_/phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa/_/bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed/_/blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos po rtogs/_/dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyes/_/de ni rang gi sa las yongs 
[\[49a.3\]]mi ldog_/sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye/_/rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan/_/sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod/_/las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang /_/rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das/_/rnam par dbye ba rgyal 
[\[49a.4\]]ba'i sras kyis shes/_/de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpar brjod/_/thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang /_/ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas/_/grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang /_/rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba/_/
[\[49a.5\]]sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni/_/dus gsum mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pa shes/_/nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag 'byed mi byed/_/de ni dus gsum tha dad med par 'jug_/gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste/_/
[\[49a.6\]]'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de/_/byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/_/sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/_/bsod nams las dag 
[\[49a.7\]]brtsams pas mthar phyin byed/_/de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang /_/'jig rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang /_/phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob byed dang /_/snying brtse ba dang skye dgu dgrol 'gyur byed/_/'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/'dren par byed 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]cing rab tu dang bar byed/_/sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che/_/'jig rten thams cad mtha' ma med pa dang /_/de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang /_/mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal 
[\[49b.2\]]yas dang /_/stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/_/sbyor ba kun tshogs phan dang snying brtse ldan/_/de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste/_/yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyis bstan/_/de ni sems can mtha' yas 
[\[49b.3\]]thams cad dang /_/chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa med/_/shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed/_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/spyod pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang /_/sems can chung 
[\[49b.4\]]ngam yang na che'o zhes/_/thos par gyur kyang bsam las nur ba med/_/sems can nyon mongs can nam rnam dag gam/_/gdul sla zhe'am gdul bar dka' zhe'am/_/chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe'am/_/'jig par 'gyur zhe'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe 
[\[49b.5\]]'am/_/chos dbyings yod ce'am med ces thos gyur kyang /_/dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/_/nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de/_/sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin tu nges/_/mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang /_/dngos 
[\[49b.6\]]med rang bzhin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing dben pa dang /_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mi g.yor 'dra ba yi/_/chos mchog zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan par byed/_/de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod/_/
[\[49b.7\]]'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das she'am/_/ma byon ce'am ma byon ma yin zhe'am/_/byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam/_/de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid med/_/gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]po dang /_/don dam tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa/_/thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du/_/mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed/_/mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang /_/mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang /_/rnam par 
[\[50a.2\]]phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams/_/thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed/_/gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang /_/'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byad 'gyur zhing /_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba 
[\[50a.3\]]ston/_/pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtog byed cing /_/de dag rnams kyi mos pa spyod par byed/_/sems can spyod dang rjes su 'thun chos dang /_/zhing rnams 'jig dang chags pa rnams kyang shes/_/ji ltar 'dod sbyin myur du mngon shes thob/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[50a.4\]]kun du yid ni 'jug par byed/_/bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang /_/de la de ni nur bar 'gyur ba med/_/yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang /_/de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam dpyod dang /_/ji ltar skad cig grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba/_/
[\[50a.5\]]zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya/_/de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed/_/lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston/_/de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'byam klas dang /_/skad cig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gang yin pa/_/sems can 
[\[50a.6\]]rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes/_/de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang /_/spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang /_/tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang /_/'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang /_/brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag_/ma lus rtogs par bya la 
[\[50a.7\]]mkhas pa yin/_/pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshang 'byin te/_/der yang ji ltar kun du spyad pa dang /_/gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang /_/pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang /_/dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang /_/byin gyi rlabs dang gzhan gnon ci 'dra dang /_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste/_/'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin/_/de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste/_/ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba med/_/tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na/_/tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs/_/dbang bskur 
[\[50b.2\]]gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste/_/thu bo khyad 'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can/_/skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung /_/'dir ni bsam pa bgrang bas rtogs ma yin/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste/_/'di na sems can la las zhing rnams kun/_/
[\[50b.3\]]phra rab rdul du rlags nas ma lus 'grang /_/grangs med 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed pa/_/de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes/_/'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang /_/gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang /_/rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos 
[\[50b.4\]]kyi/_/sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems de skye/_/thog mar byang chub sems zhes gang brjod pa/_/de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de/_/'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na/_/de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang 
[\[50b.5\]]pos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[50b.6\]]'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur ba yin na/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag ni nges par 
[\[50b.7\]]sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]bzang pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[51a.2\]]'di gang dag gis lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/_bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 
[\[51a.3\]]'tshal bas bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur par yang ma bas kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta 
[\[51a.4\]]bur gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas brtan de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[51a.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu song la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig_/chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der sgrogs shig_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[51a.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di'i skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig_/de bzhin 
[\[51a.7\]]gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig_/khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]de nas skad cig de nyid la brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51b.2\]]kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na yang bcom ldan 'das cang 
[\[51b.3\]]mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51b.4\]]kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_rigs kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro 
[\[51b.5\]]zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos bshad 
[\[51b.6\]]par gsol ba thob shig_/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug ste/_nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs 
[\[51b.7\]]pa na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dang dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[52a.2\]]bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gang yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/_kho bos ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nus so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_khyod snying las chung 
[\[52a.3\]]ngur 'dug shig dang khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis khyod kyis shod cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[52a.4\]]khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog 
[\[52a.5\]]tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/chos 'dod pa rnams dang /_/chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo mang po 
[\[52a.6\]]yang 'dus par gyur to/_/dge slong gi 'khor dang /_dge slong ma'i 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang /_de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang /_'thab bral gyi 'khor dang /_dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang /_'phrul dga'i 'khor 
[\[52a.7\]]dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang /_tshangs pa'i 'khor dang /_de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsum po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[52b.2\]]pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_de dag dang nyan thos 
[\[52b.3\]]chen po gzhan dag dang /_grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to/_/khams kyi rgyal po dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[52b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags/_de ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[52b.5\]]ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[52b.6\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la gsol ba thob shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig_/'jam 
[\[52b.7\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyan par 'gyur ba su yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ste/_kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]'ongs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos nyan pa 'di dag ni sgyu mas byung ba sha stag na kho bos su la chos bshad/_nyan pa ni su yin/_'chad pa ni su yin/_gnas 
[\[53a.2\]]brtan gyis smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig_/kho bos mnyan to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/smras pa/_sha 
[\[53a.3\]]ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni tshig med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te stong pa nyid tshig med pa yin na/_ci zhig bshad par bya/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan du 
[\[53a.4\]]med pa yin te/_de dag ni bstan du med cing mnyan du med do/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bu bstan pa de dag thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/_mtshan ma med pa bstan pa/_smon pa med pa bstan pa/_blang ba med pa bstan pa/_dor ba med pa bstan pa/_
[\[53a.5\]]spros pa med pa bstan pa ste/_ma spros pa bstan pa yin no/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga' nas mgrin gcig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[53a.6\]]dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas dkon mchog ta la la'i 
[\[53a.7\]]gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rab 'byor gzungs 'di ni skye ba med par yid la bya'o/_/dngos po med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_spros 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_dor ba med par yid la bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi drug cu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye 
[\[53b.2\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[53b.3\]]kyi snying rje chen po ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/_'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/_/gang sems can thams 
[\[53b.4\]]cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/_/gang sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/_/gang sems can thams cad 
[\[53b.5\]]kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/_/gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/_/gang sems can stobs dang ldan rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[53b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya'o/_/'dre ba med pa mang du bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun du 
[\[53b.7\]]bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_thugs brtse ba mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[54a.2\]]stsal to/_/khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spro ba su yod/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[54a.3\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis 
[\[54a.4\]]mngon 'phags rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can dang /_byang chub 
[\[54a.5\]]sems dpa' rnam par lta dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lta dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phung po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[54a.6\]]dpa' chos dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtog dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[54a.7\]]bdud rtsi blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mkhas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa 
[\[54b.2\]]myur dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyi gdugs snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[54b.3\]]mngon 'phags rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa dpa' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems 
[\[54b.4\]]dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te dkon mchog ta la la zhes 
[\[54b.5\]]bgyi ba'i gzungs yang dag par bshad par spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni bya dka' ba ste/_chos 'di 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54b.6\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyon cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i 
[\[54b.7\]]khri la bzhugs te sngags bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM ma~M/_b+ha ra te/_b+ha ra te/_b+ha ra b+ha ra na te swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la chos/_a la la 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]chos/_a la la chos zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos chos zhes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/_
[\[55a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to/_/chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha'i gzhi'i don to/_/chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang 
[\[55a.3\]]ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to/_/chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[55a.4\]]chos thams cad ces bya ba ni mig dang /_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas 
[\[55a.5\]]ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[55a.6\]]dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang /_dngos po med 
[\[55a.7\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/_rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung ba dang /_kun du gzung ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_rnam par dpyad pa dang /_gdags pa 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dang /_rab tu gzhag pa dang /_rnam par dgrol ba dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang /_rnam par brtag pa'i don to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[55b.2\]]pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[55b.3\]]ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sa'i khams yun 
[\[55b.4\]]ji srid cig nas zhugs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rig pa dang /_ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rig pa dang /_ma rig pa yun ci srid cig nas zhugs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sha 
[\[55b.5\]]ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas 
[\[55b.6\]]zhugs pa srid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa ga la yod/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_khyi dang byi la thams cad dam/_wa thams 
[\[55b.7\]]cad kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa gcig gi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta ci smos/_de nas 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba mdzad par de bzhin gshegs 
[\[56a.2\]]pa la gsol ba thob shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[56a.3\]]yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/_chos smra ba de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 
[\[56a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se 
[\[56a.5\]]gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur ba las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems 
[\[56a.6\]]skyed pa de dag ni so thags ngan par 'gyur/_lce dang sna med par 'gyur/_rka lag phyi phyogs su 'gyur/_lus nad bu can du 'gyur/_mig med par 'gyur/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/_brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/_'jam dpal 'di dag ni mi gti mug pa 
[\[56a.7\]]de dag gi skyon du gyur pa'o/_/'jam dpal mdor bshad na de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med par 'jug go/_/gal te mir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/_lce med par 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze can du 'gyur/_mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/_lus zhom par 'gyur/_lus gcer bur 'gyur/_lus skam por 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 
[\[56b.2\]]gzhan yang mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan 
[\[56b.3\]]du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig_/'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myos par 'gyur te skrag par 'gyur/_dngang bar 'gyur/_rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_sems can 'di dag 
[\[56b.4\]]gis 'di lta bu thos nas slan chad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba yod pa'i 
[\[56b.5\]]ming la 'di lta ste/_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_thig nag dang /_kun du 'bar ba dang /_rab tu 'bar ba dang /_reg dka' ba dang /_drag po dang /_mchu rnon dang /_lcags kyi thu lum dang /_lcags kyi be con dang /_mun khung dang /_mgo bstod dang /_spyi'u tshugs dang /_spri'u gdong dang /_
[\[56b.6\]]rtag tu rab 'bar dang /_rul pa dang /_rtag tu dri nga dang /_rab 'joms dang /_des 'joms dang /_shin tu gnod 'joms rnams te 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'di dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[56b.7\]]sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun du bzang po khyod kyis zhus pa de legs par zhus so/_/kun du bzang po rigs kyi 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[57a.2\]]kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med dpag tu med de/_de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/byang chub 
[\[57a.3\]]sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun du bzang po 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag 
[\[57a.4\]]spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste/_'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan dngags sbyar ba yin gyi/_'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/_/'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/_mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos 
[\[57a.5\]]so zhes 'dzer cing de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro/_/spangs nas kyang mthol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te/_de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal ba kun du 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor 
[\[57a.6\]]los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo gcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang /_bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro/_/gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe rabs 
[\[57a.7\]]thams cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang /_gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang /_ltag sgur dang /_mjing pa nub pa dang /_rkang gyol dang /_nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang /_rtag tu bkres shing skom pas nyen pa dang /_lus skams pa dang /_kha mnam pa dang /_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam thos na yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la khros 
[\[57b.2\]]pa'i sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par 'chags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang /_ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang /_ji ltar shes rab 'chal par gyur pa dang /_ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing 
[\[57b.3\]]mchis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/_de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dngangs nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[57b.4\]]bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu dngangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_khyed kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so/_/grogs po dag nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes 
[\[57b.5\]]pa yin na nga nyid kyang skrag na gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni zab pa ste/_de ni mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan dag gis lta 
[\[57b.6\]]ga la nus te ci smos/_rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/_rigs kyi bu dag dper na dkon mchog za ma tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[57b.7\]]la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni legs par gsungs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal pa ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang /_chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/_se gol gtogs pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa'am/_tha na dge 'dun 
[\[58a.2\]]la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal gcig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam/_'on te ring ba lags/_
[\[58a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga po dag ni bla'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa 
[\[58a.4\]]lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob bar mi 'gyur te/_de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[58a.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na du zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/_/las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma gyur cig/_//
[\[58a.6\]]bam po gsum pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam ma sems shig ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/_rang gi las kyi bgo 
[\[58a.7\]]skal la spyod pa/_rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/_sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/_bde bar 'gro ba dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]'jigs pa med par 'gro ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba dang /_'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/_'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 
[\[58b.2\]]'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_log par lta ba dag ste/_log par lta ba'i las dang /_chos yang dag par spangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/_de la de bzhin 
[\[58b.3\]]gshegs pas ni ma lan no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/_ngas sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i sems can gcig 
[\[58b.4\]]po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o snyam ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs bzang pa mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan 
[\[58b.5\]]pa zhig yod la/_de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/_mi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/_ngu zhing smre sngags 'don to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[58b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu gcig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi 
[\[58b.7\]]ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te/_bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te/_ma skyes ma 'gags shing 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams 
[\[59a.2\]]yongs su smin par mdzad cing 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te/_mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no/_/dper na nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing 
[\[59a.3\]]spros pa med do/_/'on kyang sems can rnams dang 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par mdzad de/_sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par 'jug go/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul 
[\[59a.4\]]pa mi mnga'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba mi mnga'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang /_gtso bo dang /_rab dang /_mchog dang /_phul dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na 
[\[59a.5\]]med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba'am/_khyim pa yang rung ste/_sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[59a.6\]]'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do/_/gang dag 
[\[59a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/_de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun du rab tu 'bar/_kun du 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur ba bye ba phrag lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor mi gti mug pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad 
[\[59b.2\]]dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge 
[\[59b.3\]]slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o/_/me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o/_/gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o/_/bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/bsti stang bgyi'o/_/bla mar bgyi'o/_/ri mor bgyi'o/_/
[\[59b.4\]]mchod par bgyi'o/_/rjed par bgyi'o/_/gsol bar bgyi'o/_/bsti stang bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges par byung ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta 
[\[59b.5\]]ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bur gyur pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os dang /_phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[59b.6\]]gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang /_
[\[59b.7\]]yongs su bskyang ba dang /_kun du bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di legs par smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la rigs kyi bu tshig 'di 
[\[60a.2\]]legs par smras pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/gzhan la phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshig ldan pa/_
[\[60a.3\]]shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog_/yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshigs legs smras/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[60a.4\]]chen po dag chos du dang ldan na dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob bo/_/chos gcig 
[\[60a.5\]]po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'o/_/kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phrag dog med pa dang /_rlom sems med pa ste/_kun du bzang po 'di dag ni 
[\[60a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis so/_/kun du bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la dbang po gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can 
[\[60a.7\]]thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang /_dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa bshad pa na lha dang /_mi'i skye dgu las sems can dpag 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]tu med pas gzungs thob par gyur to/_/dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa 
[\[60b.2\]]la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_
[\[60b.3\]]gzugs zab pa'i phyir zab bo/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir zab bo/_/stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo/_/nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad 
[\[60b.4\]]khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i 
[\[60b.5\]]dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe sems can mang po dag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ngas 
[\[60b.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin gyis brlabs so/_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/_lce na bar mi 'gyur/_sna na bar mi 
[\[60b.7\]]'gyur/_so na bar mi 'gyur/_lag pa dang rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur/_klad pa na bar mi 'gyur/_rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/_lus dman par mi 'gyur/_lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/_pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]pa thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe bdud bar 
[\[61a.2\]]chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus te/_kun dga' bo gang gi tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i 
[\[61a.3\]]gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig can gyi rang gi khyim kun du 'bar ba mthong ste/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo/_/kun dga' bo sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs 
[\[61a.4\]]de mchod rten du 'gyur/_phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad 
[\[61a.5\]]du mchis shing /_mchis nas kyang sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bkol te/_nga 
[\[61a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang /_gtso bo dang /_mchog dang /_dam pa yin mod kyi/_kun dga' bo ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyis byang chub mngon 
[\[61a.7\]]bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin po che dkon mchog ta la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong na su mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mi'i 'jig rten dang lha'i 'jig rten dang dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa brtsegs pa'i snying po 'od zer bzang po 
[\[61b.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las mngon du thos te kun dga' bo bya dka' ba chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma myong nas ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung bstan to/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis 
[\[61b.3\]]sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la phyis nga la phyag 'tshol cig_/de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/a la la chos/_a la la chos/_chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul ba a la 
[\[61b.4\]]la'o/_/sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na/_gang dag 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag ni de 
[\[61b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag la kye grogs po dag khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 
[\[61b.6\]]ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus 
[\[61b.7\]]long gis nyi ma'i snang ba mi mthong ba dang /_ji ltar tshong ba thabs mi shes pa dang /_ji ltar mi dbul po gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra ste/_de dag gi don du ngas dpe 'di byas na ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang sems can thams cad kyi don du nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs na rigs kyi bu khyod spro'am/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[62a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan las langs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du 
[\[62a.3\]]rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg go/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du 
[\[62a.4\]]rab tu 'khrugs so/_/'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag spro lags so/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[62a.5\]]pa bdag spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan ba lags kyi steng du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar 
[\[62a.6\]]mi bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/_byas pa 
[\[62a.7\]]mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi thu bo dang /_gtso bo dang mchog 
[\[62b\]]
