[\[83a.7\]]pa'i snying po dang /_rnam par snang byed snying po dang /_rin chen snying po dang /_zla ba'i snying po dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_snang ba'i snying po dang /_pad ma'i snying po dang /_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang /_ye shes dpal gyi 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]snying po dang /_blo gros chen po dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_rnam grags blo gros dang /_rlabs chen blo gros dang /_bla ma'i blo gros dang /_rin chen blo gros dang /_'phel ba'i blo gros dang /_mtha' yas blo gros dang /_rgya chen blo gros dang /_sangs rgyas blo gros 
[\[83b.2\]]dang /_blo gros mi zad pa dang /_blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_lhun po'i sgron ma dang /_sgron ma chen po dang /_chos ta la la'i sgron ma dang /_phyogs thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sgron ma dang /_kun tu sgron ma dang /_mun pa thams cad sel ba'i sgron ma dang /_
[\[83b.3\]]'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa'i sgron ma dang /_shin tu snang ba'i sgron ma dang /_zla ba'i sgron ma dang /_nyi ma'i sgron ma dang /_ngan song sel ba dang /_bdud pham byed dang /_bdud chen pham byed dang /_mngon par 'byung dka' dang /_thub dka' dang /_gting 
[\[83b.4\]]dpag dka' ba dang /_blo rtogs dka' ba dang /_ngan 'gro skems dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems 
[\[83b.5\]]dpa' sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag gnyis dang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/_thogs pa med pa'i mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dam 
[\[83b.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba/_lus dang sems can rnam par grol ba/_chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[83b.7\]]su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo khyad par thob par byed pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos yang dag par ston pa/_phyir mi zlogs pa'i chos ston pa/_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]tshul la zhugs pa/_stong pa nyid rjod pa/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad sma 'bebs pa/_bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul thams cad thob pa/_rjes su chags 
[\[84a.2\]]pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa/_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas su chud pa/_sems can thams cad la/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[84a.3\]]thams cad kyis bstod bsngags snyan par brjod brjod cing bkur ba/_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'dzin pa/_chos rin po che'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/_yon tan gyi 
[\[84a.4\]]bsngags pa thams cad mthar phyin pa dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi dbang por gyur pa/_sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i spyod yul la nges par byung ba/_sngon theg pa chen po la spyad pa legs par spyad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye 
[\[84a.5\]]shes kyi tshul gyis dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa la brtson pa/_phyir mi zlogs pa'i go cha bgos pa/_snying rje chen po mngon du gyur pa/_rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[84a.6\]]pa/_nem nur dang the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa sha stag go/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma du ma dang yang thabs cig go/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[84a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha'am/_lha'i dbang po'am/_klu'am/_klu'i dbang po'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/_dri za'am/_dri za'i dbang po'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_nam mkha' 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]lding gi dbang po'am/_mi'am ci'am/_mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/_mi'am mi'i dbang po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba rgya che ba rgya che ba/_g.yog 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa gang dag gnas pa de dag thams 
[\[84b.2\]]cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_sku'i 'od kyis 'khor thams cad zil 
[\[84b.3\]]gyis mnan nas lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags shing /_ri nag po gzhan zil gyis mnan nas lam me lhan ne lhang nge ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lha dang mir 
[\[84b.4\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba yar gyi ngo'i zla ba nya la bab ste/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te mog mog por byas nas lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[84b.5\]]du bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/_mog mog por mdzad nas lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_dag cing dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' sprin med pa la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gyi dra ba rab 
[\[84b.6\]]tu 'phro bar 'dug pa ni srin bu me khyer thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_mog mog por byas nas shin tu lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od zil 
[\[84b.7\]]gyis mnan te/_mog mog por mdzad nas lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_mtshan mo ri chen po'i spo la me chen po 'bar ba ni lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa la yang lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing dri ma med pa 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba ni lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar mdzad pa yang lam me 
[\[85a.2\]]lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni gling bzhi'i sems can thams cad zil gyis mnan cing lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste 
[\[85a.3\]]dper na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che thogs shing lha'i 'dun sa chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na gnas pa ni lha thams cad zil gyis mnan cing lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lha dang bcas 
[\[85a.4\]]pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i 'khor chen po 'dus par yang rig cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsnyen par dka' ba de yang mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 
[\[85a.5\]]'das gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang shin tu lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'khor chen po 'di yang 'dus par gyur na 'di go ci'i snga ltas zhig tu 'gyur/_bdag gis de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar bya'o snyam nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan 
[\[85a.6\]]las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/stobs bcu mnga' bas lhar 
[\[85a.7\]]bcas 'jig rten 'di/_/zil gyis mnan nas khyod ni lhan ner bzhugs/_/srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra ma mchis na/_/lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur/_/dper na lha gnas gyur pa lhun po ni/_/ri bo kun gyi nang nas mngon 'phags te/_/ri bo gzhan 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dag zil gyis mnan nas su/_/phyogs rnams kun nas lhan ner rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin thub pa yon tan mnga' ba po/_/ye shes ri bo'i dbang po 'jig rten las/_/mngon par 'phags shing 'khor kun zil mnan te/_/rtag tu lhan ner bzhugs shing rnam par mdzes/_/
[\[85b.2\]]dper na mkha' la gnas pa'i dgung zla ni/_/mar gyi ngo la mdzes pa ma lags kyi/_/dpal ldan dgung zla nya ba rgyas pa ni/_/skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zil gyis gnon/_/de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba thub pa khyod/_/rang gi slob ma skar tshogs zhabs 'bring 
[\[85b.3\]]mnga'/_/'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan mdzad cing /_/ye shes 'od rnams kyis kyang sim par mdzad/_/drang srong dper na gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/'jig rten thams cad zil mnan rab tu lhan/_/mi yi nyi ma khyod kyang de bzhin te/_/blo gros 
[\[85b.4\]]'od kyis 'jig rten kun zil gnon/_/dper na ri mchog mchis pa'i zhugs kyi tshogs/_/gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs bcu rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin ye shes ri bzhugs thub pa yang /_/phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes pa lags/_/dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal 
[\[85b.5\]]pos [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phran/_/zil gyis mnan cing der gnas mngon par mdzes/_/mu stegs can gzhan kun gyi nang gnas shing /_/thub pa khyod kyang de bzhin rnam par mdzes/_/dper na 'di na mi bdag 'khor los sgyur/_/'gro ba zil gyis mnan cing rnam par mdzes/_/
[\[85b.6\]]mgon po chos mchog 'khor los sgyur ba yang /_/'gro ba'i nang na de bzhin rnam par mdzes/_/dper na sum cu gsum dbang brgya byin ni/_/lha rnams zil gyis mnan nas mngon par mdzes/_/mtshungs pa ma mchis de bzhin tshogs pa rnams/_/thams cad 
[\[85b.7\]]zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas rgya chen po la mos 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyang rgya chen po la 'jug pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyang byang chub la 
[\[86a.2\]]dmigs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_dman pa la sbyor ba'i sems can rnams kyang brtsam pa chen po rtsom par 'gyur ba dang /_lam las nyams pa'i sems can rnams kyang byang chub kyi lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa'i sems can 
[\[86a.3\]]rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa'i dgongs pa'i tshul la 'jug par 'gyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de 'khor 'dir bstan du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[86a.4\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ldem po dag dgongs te bstan pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mos 
[\[86a.5\]]par dka' ba/_shes par dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_rnam par shes par dka' ba/_'jug par dka' ba/_yongs su rtogs par dka' ba yin pas cho ga nyams pa'am/_lta ba nyams pa'am/_tshul khrims nyams pas/_yongs su shes pa'am/_rnam par 
[\[86a.6\]]shes par mi nus so/_/dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis mos par mi nus so/_/bsam pa nyams pa rnams kyis yid ches par mi nus so/_/sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa rnams kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa rnams 
[\[86a.7\]]kyis rtogs par mi nus so/_/chos de lta bu ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis ma brlabs par mnyan par yang mi nus na/_mos par lta ga la nus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par de ni gnas med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/yid 'ong snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan khyod kyis/_/nga la gang dris don de ngas bstan nyon/_/sems can dman pa mun pa bsgribs pa yis/_/chos tshul dam pa khong du chud mi nus/_/gang dag sngon sangs 
[\[86b.2\]]rgyas la spyod spyad cing /_/'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/_/de dag chos tshul dam pa 'di thos na/_/mi rtog shin tu gya nom 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang dag sdig grogs sbrul gyis sems zin cing /_/dge ba'i bshes kyi dug sman rnam spangs pa/_/de dag 
[\[86b.3\]]dam chos dkon mchog 'di thos na/_/kye ma bag med g.yang sa che las ltung /_/gang dag sems chung dman zhing zhum gyur dang /_/gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa che med pa/_/yid ches med pa mos pa nyams pas na/_/thos kyang de dag dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos 
[\[86b.4\]]mchog 'di la dad par ma gyur pa/_/de dag yun ring sdug bsngal ltung 'gyur te/_/kye ma sdug bsngal rnams la gnod 'gyur zhes/_/de la snying rje mngon byas de ma bstan/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[86b.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa 'di ni dag pa lags te/_spyad pa rnams legs par spyad pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams legs par bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis legs par yongs su bzung ba/_dad pa'i mig legs 
[\[86b.6\]]par yongs su dag pa/_mos pa'i spyod yul la nges par byung ba bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzang po rtogs par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/_'khor 'dus pa 'di ni de lta bu lags pas de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[86b.7\]]rnam par 'tshal bar 'gyur na sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/_/drang srong chen po gang dag chos 'di 'tshal 'gyur ba'i/_/sems can 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]dpal yon ldan pa 'di na mang du mchis/_/gang dag sngon sangs rgyas la spyad pa legs spyad pa/_/de dag rnams la thub dbang de ring chos bstan gsol/_/de dag gus dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar mchis nas/_/mi yi lha yi zhal du lta zhing mchis lags na/_/drang 
[\[87a.2\]]srong chen po de slad thugs rje bskyed mdzad cing /_/dam chos char pa dgyes pa bzhin du dbab tu gsol/_/chos rgyal khyod la bdag ni gsol ba 'debs lags na/_/chos kyi dam pa gya nom rab tu bstan du gsol/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog bsdu slad du/_/
[\[87a.3\]]mgon po dam chos phyag mdzod dbye ba mdzad du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[87a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/'di ltar 'jam dpal khyod ni chos 'di dag la mngon sum du gnas pa/_chos thams cad la the tsom med cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pas nges par 'byung 
[\[87a.5\]]ba ste/_'jam dpal khyod ni skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/'jam dpal khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba bya bar 'dod pa'o/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi 
[\[87a.6\]]thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[87a.7\]]de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la mos shing dman pa la 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]mos pa med pa yin/_rang bzhin gyis snying rje'i spyod yul dang ldan zhing dkar po'i rang bzhin can yin/_bcos ma ma yin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i spyod yul dang ldan zhing yi dam la brtan pa yin/_tshogs shin tu bsags shing spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba 
[\[87b.2\]]legs par bsnyen bkur zhing dkar po'i chos legs par yongs su bsdus pa yin/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan zhing sdig pa'i las thams cad bor ba yin/_sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 
[\[87b.3\]]brten pa yin/_ji ltar smras pa de bzhin du byed cing slu ba med pa yin/_bged pa'i ngang tshul can yin zhing ro bro ba rnams la ma zhen ma chags pa mang ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs shing bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs dang bral ba yin/_sems 
[\[87b.4\]]can thams cad la yang dang yang snying rje chen po yang dag par 'jug pa yin/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing ma chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi chos bcu gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med 
[\[87b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ste/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad bde bar bya ba'i phyir phan pa'i sems so/_/sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir snying rje'i sems so/_/sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems so/_/
[\[87b.6\]]ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu sim par byed pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems so/_/theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir dag pa'i sems so/_/nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa sel ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems so/_/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'i sems 
[\[87b.7\]]so/_/rdzas med pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i sems so/_/dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'i sems so/_/mi sgul ba'i phyir brtan pa'i sems so/_/chos thams cad nges par rtog pa'i phyir mi zlog pa'i sems so/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i phyir sems 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rgyal sras gang dag spyod pa legs spyod cing /_/dkar po'i chos kyis bsam pa yongs dag la/_/dgra la'ang byams shing snying rjes 
[\[88a.2\]]sems brlan pa/_/de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/_/gang dag sdig grogs dgra bo rnam spangs shing /_/byang chub ston pa'i dge bshes bsten gyur te/_/byang chub theg par smon lam sbyong byed pa/_/de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/_/gang dag sngon mthar spyad 
[\[88a.3\]]pa spyod pa na/_/nams kyang skyo ba'i sems ni mi skye la/_/rdo rje lta bur mi zlogs sems ldan pa/_/de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/_/gang dag skye bo kun la byams sems ldan/_/sems can thams cad bde la sbyor 'dod cing /_/sdig pa thams cad spang ba'i 
[\[88a.4\]]bsam pa can/_/de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/_/theg pa gzhan gyi yon tan mi 'dod cing /_/byang chub rgya chen yon tan mchog sems shing /_/rnam dag nyon mongs med pa'i sems ldan pa/_/de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/_/srid pa zhi ba gang 
[\[88a.5\]]la yang dag tu/_/skad cig tsam yang yod med rtog med cing /_/me long gdong ltar 'gro ba kun lta ba/_/'di ni yang dag tu na byang chub sems/_/nyon mongs skyon gyi rdul rnams rnam spangs shing /_/dri med nam mkha' lta bur rnam mdzes la/_/tshig lam nges tshig thams 
[\[88a.6\]]cad mthong dga' ba/_/'di ni bzang po'i byang chub sems zhes bya/_/gzungs dang so so rig dang spyod mchog gi/_/rtsa ba 'di yin mtshan gyi 'byung gnas te/_/dpe byad bzang po 'bar ba lus kyi rgyu/_/sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rigs su gnas/_/gleng gzhi'i le'u ste 
[\[88a.7\]]dang po'o//_//'jam dpal yon tan gyi chos de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis yang dag par mthong ba des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]kyi lam ston par yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_longs spyod chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i lam yin par yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_'dod pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur bar yang dag par 
[\[88b.2\]]mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_ser sna tshar gcod par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_gtong ba'i rgyun 'phel bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba 
[\[88b.3\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer gyi sgo gcod par byed par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_skye bo mang po dang thun mong gi longs spyod rnams las snying po len par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[88b.4\]]la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_yo byad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la goms par byas par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[88b.5\]]sbyar bar bya ba dang /_dngos po thams cad la 'dzin pa'i sems bdag la med par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i 
[\[88b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa la 'thun par zhugs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis po de dag yang dag par mthong 
[\[88b.7\]]ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ste/_sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]to/_/sbyin pa rgya chen mtshungs med byin pas de dag byang chub 'grub 'gyur zhes/_/rkang lag mgo dang dri med mig dang rkang dang de bzhin rus pa dang /_/phyi dang nang gi dngos po thams cad ser sna med pa'i blos kyang gtong /_/phyir zhing phan yon mthong ba rgya chen sems 
[\[89a.2\]]ldan gang du'ang lta ba med/_/bdag ni longs spyod bzang po rdzogs 'gyur rigs kyi mchog tu skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dri med lam 'phel yon tan ser sna yongs su spangs par 'gyur/_/dbang dang pha rol phyin la sogs pa rdzogs 'gyur sbyin 'di rgyal bas bsngags/_/
[\[89a.3\]]mkhas pa de ltar du mar rtog cing don kun gtong la dga' bar byed/_/rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi chos bcu gnyis po 'di dag mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gis 
[\[89a.4\]]byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su zin par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam du zhugs par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag gis 
[\[89a.5\]]nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams lhod par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag 
[\[89a.6\]]gis ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par sbyangs par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag gis lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par 
[\[89a.7\]]bya ba dang /_mkhas pa'i skye bo rnams kyis smad pa med par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag bag yod pa'i chos la brten par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gis sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las sdom pa thob par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_
[\[89b.2\]]bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims 
[\[89b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis po de dag yang dag par mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ste/_tshul khrims de yang thams cad mkhyen 
[\[89b.4\]]pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bdag gi nyon mongs 'ching ba lhod 'gyur zhing /_/bdag ni ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad 'gyur ro zhes/_/mkhas pas phan yon yongs su bsam byas 
[\[89b.5\]]la/_/tshul khrims g.yag rnga bzhin du bsrung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas rjes bstan rjes su bdag 'brang zhing /_/bde bar gshegs pas rtag tu bsngags 'gyur la/_/bdag gis byin brlabs don med mi 'gyur ba/_/tshul khrims gnas las 'gyur zhes tshul khrims 
[\[89b.6\]]bsrung /_/lus dang ngag la kha na ma tho med/_/sems la skyon med chos la spyod par 'gyur/_/lus kyis bsrungs la ngag gis bsrungs gyur cing /_/sems kyis sdig pa rnam par sems mi 'gyur/_/bag yod bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa ste/_/dge ba'i 
[\[89b.7\]]las kyi rtsa bar gang gyur pa/_/de la rtag tu bag yod bdag gnas bya/_/bag med thams cad rtag par yongs su spang /_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i mchog gnas na/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams bdag gis thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims rab tu 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]sbyang bar bya/_/de ni tshul khrims mchog ces 'phags pas gsungs/_/yon tan de dag thob par gang 'dod cing /_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog 'dod pa/_/des na tshul khrims g.yag rnga bzhin bsrungs na/_/yon tan thams cad mkhas 
[\[90a.2\]]pas myur du 'thob/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad skad cig pa'o zhes bzod pa 
[\[90a.3\]]bsgom par bya ba dang /_bdag mi dmigs par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_bdag dang gzhan yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_'khrug pa gtan med par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_bag la nyal dang kun nas 
[\[90a.4\]]dkris pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spang ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par 
[\[90a.5\]]bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_bdud kyi yul thams cad las 
[\[90a.6\]]yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa yang dag par mthong bas bzod pa bsgom par bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis bzod pa 
[\[90a.7\]]bsgom par bya ste/_bzod pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/kye ma chos rnams skad cig ya ma brla/_/de la nams kyang sems can rnyed mi 'gyur/_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]yon tan chos rnams rab tu rtogs gyur na/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par 'gyur/_/mtha' gnyis rnam par spang ba byas pas na/_/bdag dang gzhan la rtag tu gnod med par/_/bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa myur bsgom zhes/_/thugs rje chen po'i 
[\[90b.2\]]dbang po de skad gsung /_/rtag tu rnam rtog med par bya ba la/_/de ni brtan pa'i yid kyis bzod pa sten/_/zad pa shes pa bdag gis thob bya zhes/_/nyon mongs zhi bar bya phyir bzod pa sten/_/mtshan gzugs dpe byad bzang po dag bya dang /_/tshangs pa'i gnas su 
[\[90b.3\]]'gro bar su 'dod pa/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa de yis bzod stobs sten/_/bzod la mos na thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/_/bdud kyi stobs ni stobs med bya ba la/_/bzod pa 'dra ba stobs zla gang yang med/_/de ni yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas te/_/de phyir bzod 
[\[90b.4\]]pa'i yon tan de bsten bya/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas rtul ba bcu gnyis kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam 
[\[90b.5\]]par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes 
[\[90b.6\]]par bya ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod pa'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_sems 
[\[90b.7\]]can thams cad kyi mi shes pa bsal ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rtul bas brtson 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sems can gyi don du spyod pa spyad pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i rtul 
[\[91a.2\]]bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu rtul ba bcu gnyis 
[\[91a.3\]]po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ste/_brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/drang srong 
[\[91a.4\]]sras po gang dag byang chub mchog 'dod pa/_/khyu mchog de dag rnams kyi brtson 'grus ma zhum mchog_/de dag sangs rgyas zhing ni brgyar yang 'gro bar byed/_/de dag yun ring spyad pa spyod kyang skyo ba med/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya phyir brtson 'grus can/_/
[\[91a.5\]]de dag bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sdug bsngal bzod/_/skye bo sdug bsngal dpag med zhi bde sbyin 'dod pa/_/le lo med pa de dag brtson 'grus mi nyams 'dod/_/zhing kun rnam par sbyong bar bdag ni smon lam 'debs/_/chos rnams 'di dag thams cad rnam pa kun 
[\[91a.6\]]rtogs bya/_/zhing brgya kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/_/theg pa mchog la bdag gis sems can bye ba gdul/_/shin tu rgya chen zhing rnams sprul pa byas nas su/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/_/rgyal ba'i sras po brtson 'grus pha 
[\[91a.7\]]rol dong ba dag_/sems can don du rnam par 'phrul pa 'di na ston/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pa zhi bar bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_yul rnams la mi rgyug pa'i phyir sems gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis 
[\[91b.2\]]gnon pa'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam pa dang /_de la ma chags pa'i phyir khyad par gyi rnam pa dang /_bsam gtan zlog pa'i phyir 'dod rgyal gyi rnam pa dang /_dngos po'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_tshad yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[91b.3\]]smod pa'i phyir tshad med pa'i rnam pa dang /_shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_cang shes pa'i phyir sems dul ba'i rnam pa dang /_dbang po nges par bsdams pa'i phyir nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang /_byang chub kyi bsam pa ma bor ba'i phyir thabs mkhas 
[\[91b.4\]]pa'i rnam pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan sgom gyi/_nga rgyal dang lta ba dang sred pa shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa ni ma yin te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu rnam 
[\[91b.5\]]pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya ste/_bsam gtan de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang 
[\[91b.6\]]chub sems dpa' gzi ldan pa/_/de nyid de dag bsam gtan ni/_/nyon mongs thams cad zhi phyir dang /_/shin tu 'khrug med don phyir yin/_/zhi ba'i zhi gnas nges par sems/_/yul la rtag par dga' ba med/_/sems 'khrul gyur pa gnas rnams 
[\[91b.7\]]su/_/rtag par yang dag rab tu sbyor/_/mi gnas de dag bsam gtan byed/_/'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa/_/gang la'ang de dag mi gnas te/_/de dag mi gnas bsam gtan byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can/_/bsam gtan 'jig 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]rten 'das par brjod/_/de bas ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis/_/nyan thos rnams dang 'jig rten 'phags/_/de dag bsam gtan las su rung /_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin dbang yang sgyur/_/'dod pa'i khams su skye mi 'dod/_/de dag bsam gtan zlog par 
[\[92a.2\]]byed/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag gi/_/bsam gtan rnams ni rnam pas 'phags/_/de dag der chags med pa zhes/_/de phyir rgyal bas bka' stsal to/_/sems can med chos dri med de/_/de dag bsam gtan tshad med do/_/phyogs gcig bsam gtan 
[\[92a.3\]]byed pa dag_/zil gyis mnan cing bsam gtan byed/_/shes rab thabs dang ldan pa po/_/ma smad bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/de dag lta ba'i rnam pa spangs/_/shin tu dge ba'i spyod yul can/_/dngos la mi gnas shes rab ldan/_/dngos po med la'ang mi 
[\[92a.4\]]gnas te/_/dngos dang dngos med 'du shes spangs/_/de dag bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/gzi ldan de dag 'dra ba yi/_/rnam pas mnyam med bsam gtan byed/_/de la dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas/_/blo ni shin tu rmongs par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu 
[\[92a.5\]]gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gti mug gi mun pa mun nag med pa'i phyir snang ba'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i thibs po snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[92a.6\]]mi shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam pa dang /_ma rig pa drungs nas 'byin pa'i phyir thang gshol gyi rnam pa dang /_sred pa'i rgya mo rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i phyir lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i ri rdul du rlog pa'i phyir rdo rje'i 
[\[92a.7\]]rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab skems pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang /_skye ba'i shing sreg pa'i phyir me'i rnam pa dang /_rmongs pa med par byed pa'i phyir nor bu lta bu'i rnam pa dang /_rdzas med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]phyir mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'i rnam pa ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[92b.2\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/shes rab 'phags pa 'di ni snang lta bur/_/rtag tu skye dgu rnams kyi mun pa sel/_/de ni sgron ma lta bur snang phyir byung /_/nyon mongs tshogs la 'di ni snang bar byed/_/sred dang rmongs pa'i rtsa rnams bsal 
[\[92b.3\]]ba'i phyir/_/dge ba'i yid ni thong gshol 'dra ba yin/_/nyon mongs ri rnams rdul du rlog pa ste/_/lha min ldang la dbang po'i rdo rje bzhin/_/rang gi snang bas shes rab mun bral bas/_/dam pa rnams kyis mar me 'dra zhes bstan/_/de ni nyon mongs 'dam rdzab ngan 
[\[92b.4\]]skems phyir/_/dpyid nyi 'dra zhes dam pa rnams kyis brjod/_/de ni nyon mongs chu bor nub pa la/_/gru bzhin 'jig rten yang dag sgrol ba byed/_/de ni gti mug shing chen gcod pas na/_/dag cing mi rtog ral gri rno dang mtshungs/_/rmongs pa med 'gyur nor bu rin 
[\[92b.5\]]chen 'dra/_/dngos med chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed/_/stong pa rang dbang byed cing rtog med pas/_/de ni srid dang zhi la mi gnas so/_/nem nur the tsom la sogs 'jig byed de/_/dris pa lan gdab pa la'ang de mkhas so/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa'ang de nyid sel byed de/_/
[\[92b.6\]]mya ngan 'das lam mtshon la des sgron yin/_/de la mig ces thub pa zla ba gsung /_/mngon sum byed cing rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/de grogs byang chub sems dpa' dri med rnams/_/sgrol ma'i yid ltar byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u 
[\[92b.7\]]ste gnyis pa'o//_//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs ni yul bcu gnyis la blta bar bya ste/_bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la ni byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yul la gnas pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'khor ba'i yul la yang gnas par snang ba dang /_dben pa'i yul la gnas pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis 'du 'dzi'i yul la gnas par yang snang ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi yul la gnas pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[93a.2\]]nang na gnas par yang snang ba dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i yul la gnas pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas par yang snang ba dang /_skye ba med pa'i yul la gnas pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis skye ba dang /_shi 
[\[93a.3\]]'pho'i yul la gnas par yang snang ba dang /_bdud bzhi'i yul la yang dag par 'das pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis bdud 'dul ba yang ston pa dang /_'phags pa'i skye bo'i yul la gnas pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin pa'i yul la gnas par yang 
[\[93a.4\]]snang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi yul la gnas par yang snang ba dang /_ye shes kyi yul rnyed pa'ang yin la thabs kyis mi shes pa'i mtha'i yul la gnas par yang snang ba dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i 
[\[93a.5\]]yul mngon sum du gyur pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul du yang mi ltung ba dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos khong du chud pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan cing spud pa'i lus kyis sems can 
[\[93a.6\]]thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i yul la gnas par yang snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par zhugs pa'ang yin la/_thabs kyis bdud kyi yul thams cad la gnas par yang snang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs ni 
[\[93a.7\]]yul bcu gnyis po de dag la blta bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag rnams kyi/_/thabs kyi yul ni 'di yin te/_/yul rnams gang la gnas gyur kyang /_/yul rnams kun 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]la'ang snang ba yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshor bkrus kyang /_/thabs kyis 'khor ba'i chun snang /_/thabs kyi bsam pa thob pas na/_/gnyi ga'i skyon gyis gos pa med/_/'gro phan thams cad lus yid kyis/_/dben pa dam pa thob gyur nas/_/me tog nags kyi bung ba 
[\[93b.2\]]bzhin/_/'du 'dzi dag dang 'dres pa med/_/gdu bu 'khrol ba'i sgra chen 'byung ba yi/_/btsun mo'i 'khor na de dag sgeg par snang /_/sems can dmyal la sogs pa'i gnod pa yis/_/sems can sdug bsngal sems shing rtag mi g.yo/_/de dag rtag tu zhi zhing mnyam 
[\[93b.3\]]gzhag kyang /_/rnam par g.yengs pa'i yul du'ang snang ba yin/_/rnam par g.yengs pa'i gzhi ni bsal ba ste/_/de dag thabs mkhas tshul ni de yin no/_/de dag mi rtog mngon par 'du byed med/_/rnam par rtog pa'i me yang yod min kyang /_/thabs kyis spros pa dang 
[\[93b.4\]]ni 'du byed dang /_/rtog dang ldan pa de dag snang ba yin/_/chos rnams 'chi 'pho skye ba med ldan zhing /_/yang dag nyid du skye med ldan mthong yang /_/mkhas pa rnams ni thabs kyi ye shes kyis/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi 'pho ston par byed/_/bdud kyi yul las yongs 'das 
[\[93b.5\]]shing /_/brtan rnams sangs rgyas yul gnas kyang /_/brtan pa rnams kyi thabs kyis su/_/bdud kyi yul la rgyu bar snang /_/'phags pa'i tshogs kyi spyir gnas kyang /_/thabs kyis byis pa nyid du ston/_/ye shes stobs can rnam 'phrul kyang /_/sems can dag 
[\[93b.6\]]pa snying rjes zin/_/chos rnams stong pa nyid kyi mchog_/chos nyid de dag rtogs yin zhing /_/shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i/_/thabs la'ang de dag spyod par byed/_/chos kun rang bzhin med pa dang /_/stong zhi mtshan nyid med rtogs kyang /_/thabs kyis mtshan gyis 
[\[93b.7\]]brgyan pa yi/_/lus kyis sems can don kyang spyod/_/shes rab nyams shing brtse med pa/_/snying rje med blo 'tsho ba min/_/shes rab 'phags dang snying rje ni/_/dag pas de phyir thabs su 'dod/_/byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi/_/mthu ldan thabs ni 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]'di yin te/_/'phags pa de dag der gnas shing /_/rnam par 'phrul pa brgya dag ston/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs su blta bar bya ste/_gang 'di ltar yon tan gyi snying po rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis mngon par 
[\[94a.2\]]'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang bskal pa'i snyigs ma ston pa dang /_dus kyi snyigs ma ston pa dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma ston pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma ston pa 
[\[94a.3\]]dang /_tshe'i snyigs ma ston pa dang /_theg pa tha dad pa ston pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang /_sems can dmu rgod ston pa dang /_chos bstan pa la bye brag ston pa dang /_gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khrug pa yod par ston pa dang /_bdud 
[\[94a.4\]]rnams dang /_bdud kyi las rnams kyang ston la/_nyes pa de dag kyang yod pa ma yin pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs su blta bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[94a.5\]]yon tan gyi snying po gang dang ldan na gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur 'gyur ba'i yon tan gyi snying po bcu gnyis po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[94a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di la gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni yon tan gyi snying pos bsgrubs pa'i phyir bskal pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni chos spyad pa'i dus 
[\[94a.7\]]las mi 'da' ba'i phyir dus kyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni chos shes par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can gyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni legs par yongs su dag pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i zhing gi snying 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sems can dmu rgod med pa'i phyir sems can cang shes kyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni theg pa gcig gis nges par 'byung ba'i phyir theg pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rdzas kyi 
[\[94b.2\]]lhag ma yod pa'i phyir sa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni gzhan mu stegs can thams cad kyi bstan pa mi spyod pa'i phyir bstan pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni g.yo med pa'i phyir yon tan gyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[94b.3\]]kyi zhing de ni sems can rang bzhin gyis dkar ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sbyin pa'i gnas dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sngon gyi de 
[\[94b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud cing rjes su bzhud pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po dang ldan pa yin te/_'jam dpal gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni yon tan gyi snying po de dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[94b.5\]]thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//'jam dpal de ltar rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar nga la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par bkod pa med par khyod kyis rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du shes tha 
[\[94b.6\]]dad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kha cig la ni theg pa chen po ston/_kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston/_kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ston na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems yongs su ma dag par 
[\[94b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/sems ma snyoms pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro/_/mngon par zhen pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po phyogs gcig par yang 'gyur ro/_/'du shes tha dad pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro/_/ngas chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byas par yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]'jam dpal ngas sems can rnams la chos gang dang gang bstan pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub la gzhol ba theg pa chen po la 'bab pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa/_yul gcig tu yang 
[\[95a.2\]]dag par phyin par byed pa ste/_de bas na nga la theg pa tha dad par rnam par dgod pa med do/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[95a.3\]]kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni theg pa chen po'o zhes theg pa gsum las brtsams te/_sems can rnams la chos bstan pa mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal theg pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas sa rnam par dgod pa 
[\[95a.4\]]mdzad pa yin gyi/_theg pa rnam par bkod pa ma yin no/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa yin/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa yin/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas tshogs chung ba dang /_
[\[95a.5\]]tshogs tshad med pa rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa yin te/_chos kyi dbyings la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir 'di la theg pa tha dad par 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/'jam dpal de ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jug pa'i sgo bstan pa ste/_bzo slob pa ni rim gyis slob pa la 'jug pa ltar 
[\[95a.6\]]blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon 'phong dpyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa ni slob ma rnams la thabs sna tshogs dang /_rtsol ba sna tshogs kyis 'phong dpyad ston te/_'phong shes par bya ba ni gcig tu zad do/_/'jam dpal de 
[\[95a.7\]]bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'phong gi slob dpon mkhas pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gcig po de nyid rnam pa gsum du ston pa mdzad do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na me lce chung ngu de nyid mched na sreg pa'i bskal pa'i bar du 'tshig pa'i mthu 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]yod par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du ye shes snang ba gcig po de yang rim gyis rnam par 'phel na/_nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po'i bar du sbyin par byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal 
[\[95b.2\]]po ri rab ni rnam par rtog pa med de/_de'i drung du sems can gang dag kha cig phyin pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_gser gyi mdog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi ri rab chen po bla na med pa yang rnam par 
[\[95b.3\]]mi rtog ste/_der sems can gang dag kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid la rnam par lta ba de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mdog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che chen po an 
[\[95b.4\]]da rnyil ni phyogs gang na 'dug pa der rin po che chen po de'i yul du ji tsam du gyur pa tshun chad na kha dog tha dad pa gzugs kha dog sna tshogs snang ba gang dag ji snyed cig yod pa de dag nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid kyis 'di lta ste/_sngo ba'i mdog tu kha dog gcig 
[\[95b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i nor bu rin po che an da rnyil chen po'i chos snang ba dang 'od kyis sems can gang la bab pa de thams cad 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mdog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[95b.6\]]'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen por ni sgo tha dad pa nas chu mang po 'bab ste/_der babs nas thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig par rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de la rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin 
[\[95b.7\]]gshegs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/sgo tha dad pa nas chu mang po 'bab ces bya ba de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/der babs nas de thams cad ro gcig tu 'gyur zhes bya ba de ni rnam par mi rtog 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa'i phyir theg pa gcig gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_'jam dpal rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de ni yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i sar rnam par bkod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jug pa'i tshul du gsungs pa/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[96a.2\]]chos rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa la rim gyis 'jug par bstan pa ste/_tshogs chung ngu dang tshogs chen po'i gang zag rnams rnam par dgod pa thabs mkhas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag 
[\[96a.3\]]par rig pa sna tshogs dang kun rdzob la 'jug pa bstan pa yin par de ltar rig par bya ste/_don dam par ni theg pa gcig ste gnyis su med do/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu ba dag snang ba 'di yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[96a.4\]]pa'i thabs yin par blta bar bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mnga' dbang yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas ni gnyen po thams cad shin tu bsal ba'i phyir phyir rgol ba thams cad kyi thams cad med de/_
[\[96a.5\]]'jam dpal 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig pa'i tshul can dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/_bag la nyal dang bcas pa/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa la yang phyir rgol ba thams 
[\[96a.6\]]cad kyis thams cad med cing bsdo ba'i dmag tshogs med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir te/_'jam dpal 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen 
[\[96a.7\]]po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pa/_snying rje chen po rgyun mi 'chad pa brnyes pa/_zag pa med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rgyu ba/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa/_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can/_chos kyi 'khor 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i chos kyi rgyal srid la 'tshe ba yod pa'am/_bsdo ba'i dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de de ni gnas med do/_/'jam dpal yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu ba gang dag 
[\[96b.2\]]snang ba 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin par blta bar bya ste/_rigs kyi bu de dag kun kyang mu stegs gcig la gnas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge'i mdun du ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[96b.3\]]phra mo thams cad gnas par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mnan par bya ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu seng ge chen po stobs bcu mnga' ba mi 'jigs pa 
[\[96b.4\]]bzhi brnyes pa'i mdun du gnas par bya ba'am/_brtsad par bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par mi nus te de ni gnas med do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar cing 'od zer mang po bkye ba'i tshe srin bu me khyer 
[\[96b.5\]]thams cad kyang 'od med par 'gyur zhing /_me dang nor bu dang skar ma thams cad kyi 'od zer rnams kyang mi snang ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po shar cing ye shes kyi 'od zer mang po bkye ba'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can 
[\[96b.6\]]spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu thams cad zil gyis non cing mi snang ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na lcags kyi rgyal po khab long sa'i phyogs gang du byung ba der khab long gi mi 'dre ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir lcags thams cad mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[96b.7\]]du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sangs rgyas byung bar gyur pa de ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu thams cad rgyu ba med par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sangs rgyas byung ba'i mi 'dre ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]dper na rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu gang du byung ba der ni mching bu rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che chen po gang du byung ba der ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu thams cad 
[\[97a.2\]]mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na rin po che'i 'byung khung gang nas 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser byung ba de nas lcags 'gyes kyi phung po mi 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der 
[\[97a.3\]]gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang du byung ba der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu thams cad mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal yang sangs 
[\[97a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu gang dag snang ba 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang thabs la mkhas pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mu stegs can gzhan gyi 
[\[97a.5\]]sgo 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgo la gnas pa dag ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba dag go/_/thabs la mkhas pas rnam par rtse ba dag go/_/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yid la bya ba ma btang ba dag go/_/
[\[97a.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnams la dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa dag go/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag go/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa brgyad 
[\[97a.7\]]stong gis theg pa gcig ces thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/dge slong lnga brgyas theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgyas mi skye ba'i 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po'i char mngon par bab bo/_/
[\[97b.2\]]lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du bab par gyur to/_/lha'i bu 'bum dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong du ma byung bar gyur te/_lha'i gos dag kyang g.yab mo'i thabs su g.yob bo/_/lha'i rnga dag 
[\[97b.3\]]kyang brdungs par gyur to/_/ched du brjod pa 'di skad kyang ched du brjod de/_kye ma sngon ma thos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring por 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur cig ces brjod do/_/dge slong ma brgyad 
[\[97b.4\]]brgyas kyang rang rang gi bla gos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/nga yi thabs yul bsam gyis mi khyab 'di/_/'jam dpal khyod 
[\[97b.5\]]kyis de ltar shes par gyis/_/bcud kyi dus la byang chub sangs rgyas kyang /_/'di 'dra'i dus ni nga ni ston pa mdzad/_/nga la dus kyi nyes pa mi mnga' ste/_/chos kyi dus ni rtag tu nye bar gnas/_/nga las sems can chos thos 'jug par byed/_/sems can skyon ni nam 
[\[97b.6\]]yang yod ma yin/_/yon tan rdzas kyi khyad kyis bskal pa'i bcud/_/dri med yongs su dag pa zhing gi bcud/_/dus kyi bcud la byang chub ngas brnyes te/_/de bas nga la rnyog pa yong med do/_/ngas ni bskal pa bye ba ji snyed kyis/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mtshungs med bsgrub 
[\[97b.7\]]byas pa/_/byang chub brnyes nas de srid nga yi tshe/_/bar ma dor ni mya ngan 'da' ba med/_/'on kyang mya ngan 'da' ba ngas bstan te/_/rtag pa'i 'du shes can rnams mi rtag bstan/_/lhag ma lus pa ltar yang ngas bstan te/_/nga yi tshe ni phyi ma'i mthar brtags so/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]nga yi mya ngan 'da' gcig theg pa gcig_/nga yi theg pa tha dad med pa ste/_/yang dag tu na theg pa gcig tu bstan/_/de ni thabs kyi yul du shes par gyis/_/rgyud zhan bsam pa chung ba'i skye bo dag_/'phral du thos pas 'jigs par 'gyur srid ces/_/de dag 
[\[98a.2\]]rnams la theg pa gsum bstan gyi/_/theg pa gcig ste theg pa gnyis su med/_/ngas bstan 'dis ni chos la mos pa dang /_/bstan pa'i lam la de bzhin 'jug 'gyur zhes/_/theg pa gcig po rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/theg pa tha dad nam yang yod pa min/_/dper 
[\[98a.3\]]na 'phong shes pha rol phyin gyur pa/_/shes pa de nyid rnam pa gsum du ston/_/de bzhin ston pa chos la mkhas pa'i mchog_/theg pa gcig po rnam pa gsum du ston/_/'dren pa sems can kun la mnyam pa'i sems/_/nga la tha dad 'du shes nam yang med/_/theg pa dman 
[\[98a.4\]]pa gzhan la ngas bstan na/_/de ni nga la ser sna'i skyon du 'gyur/_/dper na rin chen dam pa an da rnyil/_/gang dang gang gi gnas su gzhag gyur pa/_/phyogs de thams cad mdog gcig sgyur byed de/_/kha dog sngon por gyur yang rtog pa med/_/'jig rten 'dren pa ye shes rin 
[\[98a.5\]]chen yang /_/de bzhin 'od 'gyed zhing kun rgyas mdzad cing /_/srog chags thams cad kha dog gcig bsgyur te/_/byang chub mchog bsgyur rnam rtog sems mi mnga'/_/dper na me stag chung ngu 'phel gyur na/_/me lce chen po 'bar zhing mched pa ltar/_/nyan thos ye shes me yi me 
[\[98a.6\]]stag kyang /_/de nyid sangs rgyas yon tan me lce skyed/_/dper na gang dag ri rgyal lhun po'i drung /_/phyin pa de dag de mthus mdog gcig 'gyur/_/de bzhin stobs bcu dag na gang 'ongs pa/_/mkhas pa de dag byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/_/dper na sbrang ma dag gi mchu yis 
[\[98a.7\]]ni/_/bzang dang mi bzang sna tshogs gang blangs pa/_/de dag thams cad gcig tu bsogs byas shing /_/sbrang rtsi nyid du sgyur bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin mkhas pa 'jig rten grags pa yang /_/theg pa gsum po nye bar bstan mdzad cing /_/dkar po thams cad yongs su 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]bsdud mdzad de/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i byang chub mtshan du sgyur/_/rgyal po 'khor los sgyur la 'tshe med de/_/de la bsdo ba'i dmag tshogs yod ma yin/_/chos kyi rgyal srid chen po ngas bzung na/_/de la mu stegs can gyi yul med do/_/dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar 
[\[98b.2\]]gyur na/_/srin bu me khyer kun 'od zil gyis gnon/_/de bzhin ye shes dkyil 'khor shar gyur na/_/mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'od med 'gyur/_/yul ni gang na khab long gnas gyur pa/_/de na lcags kyi rnam pa gzhan med de/_/zhing mchog gang na de bzhin 
[\[98b.3\]]gshegs bzhugs pa/_/der ni mu stegs can rnams 'byung ba med/_/gser gyi rgyal po yul gang byung gyur pa/_/de nas 'gyes pa'i phung po'i lcags mi 'byung /_/gang du 'dren pas byang chub brnyes gyur pa/_/zhing der mu stegs can gyi tshogs mi 'byung /_/yid bzhin nor bu mching 
[\[98b.4\]]bu phrad 'gyur ba/_/bden pa'i tshul du nam yang 'byung ba med/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rin chen mu stegs can/_/zhing gcig tu ni nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mu stegs can sgo 'di kun bsam gtan dang /_/mngon shes dbang sgyur mkhas yin shes par gyis/_/shes rab 
[\[98b.5\]]thabs kyi spyod pas blo ldan rnams/_/rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston par byed/_/thabs kyi yul de thos par gyur pa'i tshe/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams thams cad dkar gyur te/_/dga' skyes nyams bde mtshungs pa med thob nas/_/rnam par 'dren la me tog mang pos gtor/_/
[\[98b.6\]]sa chen 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/lha yi rnga yang bar snang mkha' las rdung /_/lha mang bye ba mkha' las thal sbyor cing /_/'dren pa de la legs so legs zhes gsol/_/theg pa gcig tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de'i tshe lho phyogs kyi 
[\[98b.7\]]rgyud chen po nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra zhes bya ba gcer bu pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu ba spyod cing rim gyis grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du phyin to/_/de de ltar skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang 'grogs shing ca co dang ga zha 'bum dag byed pa phyi bzhin 'brang 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]zhing gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas gcer bu pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu grong khyer 'phags rgyal du phyin nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba zhig yod do zhes rgyal po gtum po rab snang 
[\[99a.2\]]gis thos te/_thos nas kyang rgyal po gtum po rab snang gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la sems dang bar gyur to/_/de sems dang bar gyur nas blon po chen po dang /_zhabs 'bring ba dang /_chab sgo ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_grong khyer ba dang /_yul gyi mi dang /_yul 'khor 
[\[99a.3\]]ba dang /_/mdun na 'don dang /_rgyal bu rnams dang lhan cig tu yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te/_glang po che pa dang /_rta pa dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung dag rjes su 'brang zhing rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang 
[\[99a.4\]]chas te/_bum pa gang ba 'bum dag gis ni mdun du drangs/_rol mo sil snyan 'bum dag ni brdungs shing dkrol/_dung 'bum dag ni bus/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_'phan [{]rings [,]ring [}]'bum dag ni bsgreng /_me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu 
[\[99a.5\]]da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_mya ngan 'tshang dang /_ba ku la dang /_ti la ka dang /_a ti mug ta ka dag gis ni lam chal par bkang ste/_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra bsu ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/de nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang mngon du 'ong ba mthong nas/_/
[\[99a.6\]]lam nas bzur te shing drung zhig tu stan bting nas 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra shing drung du 'dug par shes nas glang po che las babs te rkang pas song nas legs par brjod de/_bdag gi khri rin po che'i rtsa ba can la 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[99a.7\]]gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam byas pa/_rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so/_/'di ltar khyod phun sum tshogs pa rgya chen pos ngang des pa ma nyams par dge sbyong dang bram ze'i gan du byon pa legs so/_/rgyal po 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]chen po khyod kyi rgyal srid la 'tshe ba ma mchis sam/_gnod par bgyid pa ma mchis sam/_ma nyams ma dmas sam/_khyod kyi khams na ma rung ba dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_rol mo mkhan dang /_rkun po dang /_yang rgod dang /_la gcan pa dang /_ra ma pa dang /_byi ba pa dag gis 
[\[99b.2\]]rgyal srid la gnod par ma gyur tam/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi khams na dge slong dang bram ze dag gnas dang /_kha zas dang /_gos dang /_chos sgrub pa'i yo byad kyis nyon mi mongs shing bde bar gnas sam/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi khams na rngon pa dang /_nya pa dang /_khyi ra ba 
[\[99b.3\]]dang /_phag 'tshong dang /_shan pa dang /_sbrul 'dzin pa dang /_bya pa dag gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams gtses par ma gyur tam/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyang da tsam mi rigs par rgyal srid la mnga' mi mdzad dam/_rkang gnyis pa dang /_
[\[99b.4\]]rkang bzhi pa dang /_rkang med pa dang /_rkang [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]srog chags rnams la gtse ba'i blo ma skyes lags grang /_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la ni srog phangs kyis/_rgyal po chen po de'i slad du khyod kyis srog gcod pa spang zhing chad pa 
[\[99b.5\]]spang ba dang /_tho btsam pa ma mchis par mdzad cing /_ma byin par len pa spang zhing bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog mkhyen pa dang /_gzhan gyi longs spyod la gnod pa ma mchis par mdzod cig_/'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang zhing bdag gi btsun mo la dgyes 
[\[99b.6\]]pa dang /_gzhan gyi mchis brang la bzhed pa ma mchis par mdzod cig_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spang zhing mang bar gsung ba dang chos dang ldan par brjod par mdzod cig_/phra ma'i tshig spang zhing dbyen gyi tshig ma mchis pa dang 'dum par bgyi bar mdzod cig_/ngag rtsub po 
[\[99b.7\]]spang zhing snyan pa dang /_'jam pa'i tshig tu brjod par mdzod cig_/tshig kyal pa spang zhing ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bgyi ba dang des par brjod par mdzod cig_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gzhan gyi longs spyod rnams dang gzhan gyi nor rnams la brnab sems su mi bgyi 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ste/_de'i gong du rjes su dgyes pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzod cig_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gnod sems ma mchis shing byams pa dang ldan pa dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par mdzod cig_/log par lta ba spang zhing rang gi las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[100a.2\]]gzigs pa dang /_'phags pa rnams kyi yang dag par lta ba'i rjes snyegs par mdzod cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po srog gcod pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid 
[\[100a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_tshe thung ba dang nad mang ba'o/_/ma byin par len pas ni sems can dmyal par khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[100a.4\]]rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_longs spyod chung ba nyid dang /_longs spyod thun mong can nyid do/_/'dod pa la log par g.yem pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i 
[\[100a.5\]]skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_g.yog 'khor mi srun pa dang /_'gran zla dang bcas pa'i chung ma can du 'gyur ro/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra 
[\[100a.6\]]bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_skur pa mang ba nyid dang gzhan gyis 
[\[100a.7\]]slu ba nyid do/_/phra ma'i tshig gis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_g.yog 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]'khor mi 'dum pa nyid dang /_g.yog 'khor ngan pa nyid do/_/ngag rtsub pos ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa 
[\[100b.2\]]gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos pa nyid dang /_thab mo'i tshig nyid do/_/tshig 'khyal pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[100b.3\]]gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_tshig mi btsun pa nyid dang /_ma nges pa'i spobs pa nyid do/_/brnab sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 
[\[100b.4\]]'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_chog mi shes pa nyid dang /_'dod pa che ba nyid do/_/gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 
[\[100b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_mi phan pa tshol ba nyid dang /_gzhan la gnod pa byed pa nyid do/_/log par lta bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur 
[\[100b.6\]]ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub ste/_lta ba ngan par ltung bar 'gyur ba dang /_g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur ba'o/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[100b.7\]]po de ltar na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po che zhing tshad ma mchis par yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de'i slad du bag mchis pa dang /_mi rtag par so sor brtag pa mang bar mdzod cig_/rgyal po chen po 'tsho ba'i 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]yun ni thung ngo /_/tshe'i tshad ni ring por mi thub bo/_/pha rol tu ni bzhud 'tshal lo/_/tshe'i 'du byed ni ri'i 'bab chu ltar mi brtan zhing g.yo ste/_skad cig kyang mi gnas kyis de'i slad du rgyal po chen po las kyi rnam par smin pa'i drungs mi 'byung zhing 'jig rten 
[\[101a.2\]]pha rol gyis 'jigs pa gzigs par mdzod cig_/de nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sa yi bdag po rtag tu bag yod mdzod/_/bag med sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sar 'or/_/bag med 
[\[101a.3\]]spyod pa sems can dmyal bar mchi/_/bag mchis gang lags de ni mtho ris mchi/_/rgyal po khyod ni srog gcod ma mdzad cig_/skye bo kun la srog ni rab tu phangs/_/de bas yun ring tshe srung su 'dod pas/_/yid kyi dgu la'ang srog gcod mi bsam mo/_/'jig rten 
[\[101a.4\]]skyong ba rku ba rtag tu spongs/_/des ni longs spyod 'byor pa brtan pa 'thob/_/srog ched nyon mongs thun khol bsags bsags pa/_/gzhan nor blangs pas dbul po nyid du 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi chung ma rtag tu spong mdzad cing /_/sa yi bdag po btsun mos 'tshal bar mdzod/_/
[\[101a.5\]]des na rang gi btsun mo sdug par 'gyur/_/btsun mo dgra zla ma mchis 'thob par mchi/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni nam yang brjod ma mdzad/_/rgyal po dbang po dam bcas mang bar mdzod/_/bden par smra ba dbang po'i gnas su mchi/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du gang smra gshin rje'i 'jig rten 
[\[101a.6\]]mchi/_/phra ma'i skyon ldan tshig ni yongs spangs nas/_/skye bo bye ba 'dum par sdums bgyid na/_/mi phyed g.yog 'khor 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris rab tu mchi/_/sa yi bdag po ngag rtsub spang bar mdzod/_/gzhan gyi rnar snyan bde 
[\[101a.7\]]ba bka' stsol cig_/de rgyus 'jig rten pha rol lha dag gi/_/sna tshogs yid 'ong mtho ris tshig gsan 'gyur/_/kyal pa'i tshig rnams rnam par spang mdzad de/_/shin tu des shing brtan pa'i tshig kyang gsungs/_/pha rol lha yi dbang phyug 'jig rten du/_/sems 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]can rnams la btsun pa'i tshig ldan 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong gyur na/_/skye dgu'i bdag po phan 'tshal chags mi bgyi/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod dag la chags bgyis na/_/longs spyod thun mong can du des 'gyur ro/_/sa yi bdag po gnod sems ma mdzad 
[\[101b.2\]]cig_/sems can rnams la byams pa rtag tu mdzod/_/gnod sems ldan pa'i mi rnams shi 'phos nas/_/dge ba bgyis kyang mnar med dmyal bar mchi/_/mi yi bdag po log par lta spong mdzod/_/yang dag gzigs pas bdag nyid brtan par mdzod/_/dge 
[\[101b.3\]]chos 'di dag yang dag blang bgyis na/_/lha yi gzhal med khang du dgyes par 'gyur/_/dge slong bram ze tshul khrims ldan pa dang /_/yab dang yum la mchod pa gus bgyis na/_/ngan song sa chen khyod kyis spangs 'gyur zhing /_/mtho ris dgyes pa brnyes pas dgyes 
[\[101b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/de nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la bag yod pa dang ldan pa'i gtam de lta bu dag byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i 
[\[101b.5\]]bu bden smra'i tshig de la mngon par dga' ste/_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas gnod pa chung ba dang /_nyam nga ba nyung ba'i gtam dris te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze gal te bdag gis dris la 
[\[101b.6\]]dris pa lan gdab par khyod kyis skabs dbye na phyogs 'ga' zhig dri'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po ci dang ci bzhed pa smrar gsol/_smras pa de dang de nyid kyi lan gsol 
[\[101b.7\]]pas/_bdag gis khyod kyi thugs rangs par bgyi'o/_/skabs phye bas de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze skye dgu skye dgu zhes bya na/_de ltar skye dgu zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_smras 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar skye dgu zhes bgyi ba ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_lnga po dag gang zhe na/_gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i 
[\[102a.2\]]phung po'o/_/rgyal po chen po yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag nyid nye bar bzung ste/_sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten gdags pa lags so/_/de la sems can gyi 'jig rten gdags pa ni skye gnas bzhis zin pa ste/_mngal nas skye ba dang /_sgo nga las skye ba dang /_
[\[102a.3\]]drod gsher las skye ba dang /_brdzus te skye ba'o/_/snod kyi 'jig rten gdags pa ni sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyis zin pa'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze skye dgu skyong ba gang yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rang gi las kyi dbang dang bdag po'o/_/smras 
[\[102a.4\]]pa/_bram ze rnam pa gang gis ji ltar rang gi las kyi dbang skye dgu skyong bar byed/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sems can gang dag rang gi las kyi dbang gis rnam pa de lta bu'i gnas su skyes shing bdag gir bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /_yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa 
[\[102a.5\]]dang ma rmos ma btab pa'i yo byad rnams la spyod cing nad dang dgra dang /_sdug bsngal chen po rnam par spangs pas gcig la gcig mi 'khu zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byor pa dang /_mod pa'i yul du bde ba la reg par gnas shing dus la bab ste/_lus zhig nas bde 
[\[102a.6\]]'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag mchis te/_'di lta ste dper na/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi sems can lta bu dag lags so/_/sems can gang dag rang gi las kyi dbang gis rnam pa de lta bu'i dus su skye zhing 'od rang las 'byung ba/_nam mkha' 
[\[102a.7\]]la mchi ba/_dga' ba'i kha zas dang ldan pa/_mngal nas ma skyes pa/_tshe ring ba yun ring por 'tsho ba dag mchis te/_'di lta ste dper na/_bskal pa dang po pa'i sems can lta bu dag lags so/_/sems can gang dag rang gi las kyi dbang gis sngon gyi bsod 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]nams kyi rgyu'i stobs bskyed pa dang ldan zhing tshe 'di la phar shes pa/_mar shes pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_don bgyid pa dgos pa bgyid pa/_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa/_kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba/_sbyin pa dag sbyin pa/_
[\[102b.2\]]bsod nams dag bgyid pa/_nye bar gnas pas nye bar gnas pa/_tshul khrims yang dag par bzung zhing gnas pa dag mchis te/_'di lta ste/_dper na dus bzang po'i sems can lta bu dag lags te/_de dag la rgyal por gdags pa ma mchis so/_/rgyal po 
[\[102b.3\]]chen po de ltar na bdag gi las kyi dbang ni skye dgu skyong zhes bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze ji ltar na skye dgu'i bdag pos skyong zhes bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po rnams ni skye dgu rnams kyi dbang po zhes bgyi ste/_de dag kyang chos dang ldan zhing tshul 
[\[102b.4\]]khrims dang /_tshul dang /_yang dag par spyod pa skye dgu rnams dga' bar sbyor bas mdzes pas na de'i slad du rgyal po zhes bgyi'o/_/de dag kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po rnams dang /_khams kyi rgyal po 
[\[102b.5\]]rnams dang /_rgyal phran rnams lags so/_/de la 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bgyi ba ni 'di na la la rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa lags 
[\[102b.6\]]so/_/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag lags te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che lags so/_/des 
[\[102b.7\]]sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba ma mchis shing 'tshe ba ma mchis la/_chad pa ma mchis shing mtshon gyis bda' ba ma mchis pa 'di nyid chos dang 'thun par snyoms pas legs par phab ste/_gnas lags so smras pa/_rnam pa gang gis ji ltar mtha' 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bzhir rgyal bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_gling bzhi la dbang gis dbang sgyur ba'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na rnam par rgyal ba yin/_smras pa/_bka' las 'gal bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na chos dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_
[\[103a.2\]]bdag nyid dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal po yin/_smras pa/_gzhan dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas su stsal ba'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir 'khor lo rin 
[\[103a.3\]]po che dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_tshegs chung ngus rnam par rgyal zhing bde ba 'thob pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir glang po rin po che dang rta rin po che dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_bzhon pa'i mchog ngo mtshar gyi bde ba 'thob pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir 
[\[103a.4\]]bud med rin po che dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_dga' ba'i mchog gis rtse ba dang dga' ba'i bde ba 'thob pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir nor bu rin po che dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_snang ba dam pa'i yo byad kyi bde ba 'thob pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir khyim 
[\[103a.5\]]bdag rin po che dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_longs spyod kyi dbang phyug mchog gi bde ba 'thob pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir blon po rin po che dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_shul du zhugs na nyon mi mongs shing skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba 'thob pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[103a.6\]]smras pa/_ji ltar na sa 'di ma lus pa dag la gnas par 'gyur/_smras pa/_mtha' dag la gnas pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na gnod par sdo ba med pa yin/_smras pa/_phyir rgol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na 'tshe ba med 
[\[103a.7\]]pa yin/_smras pa/_nan gyis bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na chad pa med pa yin/_smras pa/_chad pa dang mtshon chas gnod par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na chos dang 'thun pa 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]yin/_smras pa/_mi rigs pa'i chags pa dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par spangs pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na snyoms pa yin/_smras pa/_phyogs su ma lhung bar yongs su skyong ba'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur/_
[\[103b.2\]]smras pa/_gzhan dag rang rang gi ris nas ma skyes pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang gi tshe gling las rnam par rgyal bar bgyid pa de'i tshe de na rgyal phran ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag lhags nas 'khor 
[\[103b.3\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/lha'i rnam par rgyal ba 'di dag ni 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo mang po dang mis gtams pa lags te/_de dag lhas bskyang ba mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag kyang lha'i zhabs 'bring 'tshal 
[\[103b.4\]]lo zhes mchi'o/_/de dag la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di skad bsgo ste/_de'i phyir yul gyi bdag po dag rang rang gi rnam par rgyal ba legs par skyong shig_/de yang chos dang 'thun pas bskyang gi chos dang mi 'thun pas ma yin no/_/snyoms pas bskyang 
[\[103b.5\]]gi mi snyoms pas ma yin no/_/khyed kyis chos dang mi 'thun par spyad pa'am mi rigs par spyad pas yul 'khor na 'khod par dga' bar ma byed cig_/de ltar na khyod kyang nga'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no/_/zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni skye dgu de ltar 
[\[103b.6\]]skyong ste/_rgyal po chen po dang khams kyi rgyal po dang rgyal phran de dag ni de'i rjes su 'brang ba lags te/_rgyal po chen po de ltar na bdag pos skye dgu skyong ba lags pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ci la gnas shing skye dgu skyong bar byed/_
[\[103b.7\]]smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan ni bstan bcos la gnas shing skye dgu skyong lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos skye dgu skyong ba de'i tshe na chos ma lags pa'i 'dod pa la dga' ba la chags pa 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]'am/_mi rigs pa'i 'dod chen gyis zil gyis non pa'am/_log pa'i chos kyis 'khor ba de lta bu'i sems can ma mchis te/_de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de rang gi chos kyi dbang gis rgyal po'i bgyi ba de dang de dag la mi zlogs pa'i rtogs pa 
[\[104a.2\]]dang ldan pas de'i don thams cad tshegs chung ngus 'grub cing kun kyang 'thun par gnas pas de'i slad du de la bstan bcos mi 'tshal lo/_/gang gi tshe sems can rnams chos ma lags pa'i 'dod pa la chags shing mi rigs pa'i 'dod chen gyis zil gyis non pa dang log 
[\[104a.3\]]pa'i chos kyis 'khor bar gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po rnams kyi rang rang gi spobs pa la 'bri bar 'gyur te/_de la chos kyis skye dgu yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du drang srong chen po rnams bstan bcos dag bgyid do/_/smras pa/_bram ze chos ma yin pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa gang
