[\[104a.4\]]yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par dga' ba lags so/_/smras pa/_mi rigs pa'i 'dod chen gang yin/_smras pa/_gang rang gi lag mthus bsgrubs pa dus la gtogs pa/_chos dang ldan par chos kyis thob pa'i longs spyod 
[\[104a.5\]]rnams kyis chog ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/smras pa/_log pa'i chos kyis 'khor zhes bya ba gang yin/_smras pa/_don gyi bstan bcos su ming btags pa/_gnod par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa/_dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa/_rtsod pa'i dus na skyes bu dam pa 
[\[104a.6\]]ma lags pas bgyis pa la mos pas yongs su bsgos pa'i lta bas yon tan du lta ba lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze bstan bcos gang la chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos brten cing skye dgu skyong bar byed pa'i bstan bcos gang yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni bstan 
[\[104a.7\]]bcos gang las mi rigs pa'i chags pa dang /_mi rigs pa'i zhe sdang dang /_mi rigs pa'i gti mug gi gnyen po rang bzhin nam/_rab tu dbye ba'am/_phan yon gyi sgo nas bstan pa ste/_de la gnyen po'i rang bzhin ni 'di lags te/_'di lta ste/_de'i gnyen por 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'gyur ba ma chags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_gti mug ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags so/_/de la gnyen po kun nas slong ba ni 'di lags te/_'di lta ste/_bag mchis pa dang snying rje lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de 
[\[104b.2\]]la chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang bdag nyid kyang mi rtag par rtogs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag ste/_nyes dmigs su lta zhing nges par 'byung ba 'tshal bas longs spyod rnams la spyod cing rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi dbang bgyid pa 'di ni de'i bag mchis pa lags 
[\[104b.3\]]so/_/gang la gnas te ma thob pa'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu la nye bar mi 'tsho ba dang thob pa la'ang dus ma yin par nye bar mi 'tsho ba dang /_dus la bab kyang dbul po rnams la gnod pa bgyis shing nye bar mi 'tsho ba dang /_mu ge'i gnod pa zhig byung na skye dgu rnams kyi 
[\[104b.4\]]skyabs bgyid pa dang /_chom rkun gyi gnod pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa dang /_gcig la gcig gnod par gyur pa zhig byung na yang dag par phan 'dogs par bgyid pa dang /_dbul po rnams la nor sbyin pa dang /_mi srun pa rnams la yang dag 
[\[104b.5\]]par chad pas bcad pa 'di ni de'i snying rje zhes bgyi ste/_rgyal po chen po chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po skye dgu yang dag par skyong bar bgyid ces bgyi ba lags te/_bag mchis pa dang snying rje gnyis lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rnam pa 
[\[104b.6\]]gang gis na ji ltar chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po snying rje can mi srun pa chad pas gcod pa yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa snying rje can ni gnas lnga la dran pa nye bar gzhag cing mi srun pa chad pas gcod pa lags so/_/de yang yang dag pas lags 
[\[104b.7\]]kyi log pas ma lags so/_/dus su lags kyi dus ma lags pas ma lags so/_/don dang ldan par lags kyi don dang mi ldan par ma lags so/_/'jam par lags kyi brlang bar ma lags so/_/byams pas lags kyi zhe sdang gis ma lags so/_/smras pa/_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]rnam pa gang gis ji ltar na yang dag pas yin gyi log pas ma yin zhes bya/_smras pa/_gal te g.yon la mi gnas pa ma lags kyi yang dag par g.yon la gnas par gyur pa'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na dus su yin gyi dus ma yin par ma yin zhes bya/_smras pa/_
[\[105a.2\]]gal te rgyal pos mi srun pa chad pas bcad pa'i mthu mchis na lags kyi mthu ma mchis na ma lags pa'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na don dang ldan par yin gyi don dang mi ldan par ma yin zhes bya/_smras pa/_gal te khas blangs pa la gnas par bgyis pa lags kyi gnas par 
[\[105a.3\]]ma bgyis pa ma lags so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na 'jam par yin gyi brlang bar ma yin zhes bya/_smras pa/_gal te skyon brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par rtogs pa zhig na yang bcing ba dang gsad pa la sogs pas gnod par mi bgyi bar yang dag par skyon brjod pa lags kyi 
[\[105a.4\]]skyon ma brjod par ma lags so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na byams pas yin gyi zhe sdang gis ma yin zhes bya/_smras pa/_gal te skyon brjod pa tsam gyis mi 'grub par rtogs pa zhig na 'gum pa dang dbang po nyams par bgyid pa dang /_yan lag gtub pa ma gtogs par 
[\[105a.5\]]byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag ste bcing ba dang go rar stsal ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_gnod par bgyi ba dang /_spyo ba dang /_brgyad bkag pa dang /_gnas nas bkar ba dang /_longs spyod 'phrog pa la sogs pa brlang ba'i rnam pa 
[\[105a.6\]]rnams kyis brlang bar bgyi ba ste/_de las 'das par brlang bar bgyi ba ma lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze ji ltar na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po brlang ba'i rnam pa de dag gis sems can mi srun pa dag la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag cing brlang bar 
[\[105a.7\]]spyod pa yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i slad du don 'di rab tu bsgrub pa'i slad du dpe gsan du gsol/_rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na phas bu mi srun pa zhig bcos 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]par 'tshal na byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/_dgum pa dang dbang po nyams par bgyi ba dang /_yan lag gtub pa ma gtogs par gnod pa'i rnam pa gzhan gyis brlang bar bgyid de/_'on kyang de la gtang ba'i sems sam/_gnod par bgyi ba'i 
[\[105b.2\]]sems mi 'byung ste/_gzhan du na nyes pa bzlog pa nyid kyi ched du bgyis te/_nyes pa ma byung ba rnams mi 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste brlang bar bgyid do/_/de bzhin du rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yang skye dgu rnams la bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/_sems can mi srun pa 
[\[105b.3\]]rnams 'chos na srog bcad pa dang /_dbang po nyams par bgyi ba dang /_yan lag gtub pa ma gtogs par byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyis te bcing ba dang /_go rar stsal ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_spyo ba dang /_brgyad bkag pa dang /_
[\[105b.4\]]gnas nas bkar ba dang /_longs spyod 'phrog pa la sogs pa brlang ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis brlang bar bgyid kyang /_de sems can de dag la gtang ba'i sems sam gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi 'byung ste/_gzhan du na nyes pa bzlog pa nyid kyi ched du bgyis te/_de ma 
[\[105b.5\]]lags pa gzhan rjes su bslab pa dang /_nyes pa ma byung ba rnams mi 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste/_brlang bar bgyid do/_/smras pa/_bram ze mi srun pa de dag ji lta bu yin par shes par bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mdor na mi srun pa ni rnam pa lngar mkhyen par bgyi ste/_rgyal po 
[\[105b.6\]]la gnod pa bgyid pa dang /_gcig la gcig gnod par bgyid pa dang /_bka' mi nyan pa dang /_log pas 'tsho ba dang /_log par zhugs pa lags so/_/de la rgyal po la gnod pa bgyid pa ni 'gums pa dang /_'gums su stsol ba dang /_dug stsol ba dang /_phyag mdzod 
[\[105b.7\]]rku ba dang /_don ma rung bar bgyid pa dang /_btsun mo 'drid pa dang /_bka' ltar mi bgyid pa dang /_gsang mi thub pa dang /_khams kyi dkrugs ma bgyid pa dang /_kha rgod mchi ba dang /_kha phyar gtong ba dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni rgyal po chen po rgyal po la gnod 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]pa bgyid pa lags par mkhyen par bgyi'o/_/de la gcig la gcig gnod par bgyid pa ni sems can 'di dag gcig la gcig srog la rgal ba'am/_longs spyod 'phrog pa'am/_mchis brang la byi ba bgyid pa'am/_sgyu'i dbang gis pha rol slu ba'am/_mdza' 
[\[106a.2\]]ba 'byed pa'am/_ngag mi snyan pas 'thab pa'am/_las dang /_srang dang tshad sgyu mas gzhan 'drid pa'am/_gcig la gcig mi snyan par brjod pa'am/_rgyal po chen po de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni gcig la gcig gnod pa bgyid pa lags par mkhyen par bgyi'o/_/de la bka' 
[\[106a.3\]]mi nyan pa ni rgyal po chen po la rten pa'i khams kyi rgyal phran dang /_rgyal po'i bka' ltar mi bgyid pa ste/_rgyal po chen po de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni bka' mi nyan pa lags par mkhyen par bgyi'o/_/de la log pas 'tsho ba ni sems can gang dag sdom pa ma mchis pa ste de dag kyang 
[\[106a.4\]]shan pa dang bya pa dang phag 'tshong dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa dag lags par mkhyen par bgyi'o/_/de la log par zhugs pa ni sems can gang dag longs spyod las phyir log ste mtshan ma can du gyur pa rnams tshul khrims nyams pa dang lta ba nyams pa dang cho ga nyams pa dang 'tsho ba 
[\[106a.5\]]nyams par gyur cing rang rang gi chos yongs su bzung ba rnams la mi gnas pa lags te de dag ni rgyal po chen po log par zhugs pa lags par mkhyen par bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze rnam pa gang gis ji ltar na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa'i mi srun pa rnams 
[\[106a.6\]]chad pas bcad par bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni skyon brjod pas dgag pa'am/_longs spyod dbrog pas dgag pa'am/_bcing ba dang bskrad pa dang smad pas dgag par bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_gcig la gcig gnod par byed pa la ji ltar nan tan du bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po 
[\[106a.7\]]chen po bsdigs pa dang gnod par bgyi ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_go rar stsal ba dang /_spyo ba dang /_chad pas bcad pas bzlog par bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bka' mi nyan pa rnams la ji ltar nan tan du bya/_smras pa/_zil gyis mnan te dbang du bsgyur ba la rang rang gi ris 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]nas bskyod par mi bgyi bas bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar de dag rang rang gi ris nas bskyod par ma bgyis na rgyal po'i bka' drin gzo zhing 'jigs pas bka' nyan par 'gyur te/_gzhan bka' mi nyan pa'i skabs kyang yongs su chad par 
[\[106b.2\]]'gyur zhing phyag mi 'tshal ba rnams kyang phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang snyan par grags pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing gzhi de las bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel ba'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_log par 'tsho ba rnams la ji 
[\[106b.3\]]ltar nan tan du bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bsdigs shing da phan chad gal te de ltar byed na chad pa 'di dang 'dis bcad do zhes 'jigs pa bstan pas dgag par bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_log par zhugs pa rnams la ji ltar nan tan du bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po yang dag 
[\[106b.4\]]pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs la gzud pas bzlog par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po gal te gang zag tshul khrims nyams pa'am/_lta ba nyams pa'am/_cho ga nyams pa'am/_'tsho ba nyams pa zhig dge 'dun 'thun pas sbyangs te brtags nas bskrad par bgyis pa'am/_rang 
[\[106b.5\]]gis khas blangs pa las dge 'dun gyis bskrad par mi nus na/_de la chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos yang dag pa la yang dag par rtogs par bgyis te/_btsun pa'i phyogs kyi grogs bgyi'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gnyis mi 'thun pa'i rtsod par gyur te/_tshul khrims nyams 
[\[106b.6\]]pa'am/_cho ga nyams pa'am/_lta ba nyams pa'am/_'tsho ba nyams pa las brtsams nas yus rtod cing rtsad pa zhig tu gyur na/_de la chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos bdag nyid chos kyi don la mkhas sam/_mi mkhas kyang rung ste/_ris de na ya rabs su btu ba'i dge sbyong 
[\[106b.7\]]ngam/_bram ze chos kyi don la mkhas pa mchis pa de dag bsdus te rtsod pa de sbyang bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar sbyangs nas de la gang rigs par smra ba de'i phyogs kyi grogs bgyi zhing bskrad pa'am log pa la brtson pa bzlog pa'i slad du bstang bar bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]rgyal po nyid mi srun pa zhig tu gyur na de la sus chad pas bcad par nan tan du bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po de nyid kyis so/_/gal te rgyal po bag ma mchis par gyur tam/_snying rje ma mchis par gyur na de'i slad du des shes rab kyi stobs la brten 
[\[107a.2\]]te mi snyan par 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang /_chos gnyis po 'di dag gis bag ma mchis pa dang snying rje ma mchis pa las bdag nyid bzlog par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos ni rang gi ris na ya rabs su btu ba'i dge 
[\[107a.3\]]sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa/_gsal ba rig pa dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mchi zhing dus dus su dge ba ni gang mi dge ba ni gang ci byas na legs par 'gyur/_ci byas na sdig par mi 'gyur zhes dri bar bgyi zhing de dag chos ston par 'gyur ba'i skabs dbye bar bgyi'o/_/de dag gis 
[\[107a.4\]]kyang de la rgyal po'i tshul rnying dag bstan par bgyi ste/_skabs phye na tshig gi tshul 'jam pos skyon brjod par bgyi ste/_de ltar na des 'di lta ste nang gi stobs sam/_phyi rol gyi stobs la brten cing bdag nyid mi srun pa las legs par chad pas bcad par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_
[\[107a.5\]]bram ze snod kyi 'jig rten gyis yongs su zin pa'i skye dgu chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos ji ltar bsrung bar bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mi sreg_/mi gzhig pa la sogs pas bgyis te/_'di ltar rgyal po khro ba'i gnas la khros kyang grong bsreg pa'am/_grong khyer bsreg pa'am/_
[\[107a.6\]]rdzing dral ba'am/_gnas gzhig pa'am/_bza' shing bcad pa'am/_lo gzhom pa'am/_gang ci yang rung ste legs par bshams pa/_legs par bsgrubs pa/_legs par bres pa'i sa'i phyogs nyams dga' ba de dang de dag gzhig par bgyi bar mi rigs so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[107a.7\]]du zhe na 'di ltar dngos po de dag ni de ma lags pa'i sems can gzhan dag dang thun mong gi nye bar 'tsho ba lags te/_de dag gis nongs par ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar dngos po de dag la khyim dang gtsug lag khang dang /_mchod rten dang bza' shing ra ba la 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]sogs pa so so'i lha gnas pa de dag kyang de ltar bshig na mi dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar dngos po de dag la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sna tshogs dag kyang gnas te/_de dag gis kyang nongs pa ma bgyis na gnod pa mi bgyid pa kun kyang 
[\[107b.2\]]chud gzan par 'gyur ro/_/de lta lags pas na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos snod kyi 'jig rten gyis yongs su zin pa'i skye dgu rnams phung par mi bgyi'o/_/de ltar phung par ma bgyis na yongs su bskyangs pa lags te/_de yongs su bskyangs pas sems can rnams la yang 
[\[107b.3\]]sman par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal po'i khams na lha gang dag gnas pa de dag chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos ji ltar bskyang bar bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po yang dag pa'i gtor ma bshams te bstsal bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos skye 
[\[107b.4\]]dgu thams cad bskyangs par 'gyur ro/_/mi srun pa thams cad kyang chad pas gcad par 'gyur ro/_/kha na ma tho ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gzhi de las tshe slad ma pa'i bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i khams 
[\[107b.5\]]na pha dang ma rgas pa la ma gus shing phar mi shes pa dang /_mar mi shes pa dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'am zho shas 'tsho ba dag la legs par bgo bsha' mi byed cing /_las chen po dang las ngan pas shin tu snyon smongs par byed pa de dag mi srun 
[\[107b.6\]]pa'i phyogs gang gi nang du bgrang bar bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po log par 'tsho ba'i phyogs mi srun pa'i nang du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phan 'dogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos bgo bsha' bgyi bar 'os pa dag la/_bgo bsha' mi 
[\[107b.7\]]bgyid cing gcig tu spyod pa 'di ni log pas 'tsho ba chen po lags pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze slong ba'i dge slong dang bram ze 'ong zhing 'du ba dag gi mdun nas mi rigs shing brlang ba'i tshig gis mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_gshe ba dang brgyad bkag pa dang ched du bos shing 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]zan gcod pa'am/_chos dang 'gal ba'i kha zas stobs pa'am/_dbyug pa'am rdos 'tshog pa'am/_lag pas brdeg pa'am/_mtshon gyis 'debs pa de dag mi srun pa'i phyogs gang gi nang du bgrang bar bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po log par zhugs pa'i mi srun pa'i 
[\[108a.2\]]phyogs su'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rim gro bgyi ba'i 'os rnams la rim gro mi bgyid pa ni log par zhugs pa chen po lags pa'i slad du ste/_rgyal po chen po log par zhugs pa de lta bus ni lha rnams kyang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs te/_des mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga bar 
[\[108a.3\]]'gyur zhing mi ma lags pa rnams kyang yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad gtong bar 'gyur te/_des sems can rnams yams kyi nad can/_gnod pa can/_nad 'go ba can du 'gyur zhing tshe yang yongs su 'bri/_longs spyod kyang yongs su 'bri/_nad med pa yang yongs su 
[\[108a.4\]]'bri bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal po nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pas ci'i phyir dbang po dang yan lag gtub cing nyams par bya ba dang /_sems can bsad par mi bya ba yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa yang g.yon la 
[\[108a.5\]]gnas pa srog gcad pa'am/_dbang po dang yan lag dang nying lag dang dbral bar mi sems te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des rang gi las kyi dbang gis 'chi na yang khong khro ba'i sems bskyed de dus bgyis na ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba'i 
[\[108a.6\]]sha khon du 'gyur ba mthong bas de'i slad du sems can dgum par ma brjod de/_dbang po dang /_yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang phyir glan du mi rung bas de'i slad du de dag gtub cing nyams par bgyi ba rung bar ma brjod lags so/_/rgyal po chen po bcing ba dang /_go rar stsal ba la 
[\[108a.7\]]sogs pa ni bcos su rung bas na de'i slad du rung bar brjod do/_/rgyal po ni skye dgu thams cad yongs su skyong ba lags na/_de ltar bgyis na de nyid ma bskyangs par 'gyur bas/_de'i slad du/_rgyal pos skye dgu yongs su bskyang ba yang rdzogs par ma bgyis par 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]po 'di lta ste/_dgum pa dang /_dbang po dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gtub cing nyams par bgyi ba ni skye dgu ma 'os par skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas lags te/_de ni chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos bgyi ba ma lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal po'i khams na longs spyod kyi 'bras bu 
[\[108b.2\]]'du ba yod pa de dag rgyal po rang gi yin zhes bya'am/_gzhan gyi yin zhes bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni rang gi yang ma lags/_gzhan gyi yang ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzhan dag ni rang gi lag mthus bsgrubs pas na rang gi ma lags so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[108b.3\]]yongs su bsrungs shing de dag gis kyang de mnga' bar btags pas gzhan gyi ma lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze gal te skye dgu la longs spyod yod bzhin du longs spyod kyi rgyu dpya dbul ba'i rigs pa rgyal po la dbul du mi btub na/_des de dag gi ma byin par len par 'gyur zhes bya'am 
[\[108b.4\]]mi bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni mi 'gyur te/_gal te longs spyod mchis bzhin ma ster na ser sna las byung ba'i kha na ma tho ba dang bsod nams ma lags pa ni cher 'phel lo/_/smras pa/_bram ze gal te longs spyod yod bzhin du longs spyod kyi rgyu dpya dbul ba'i rigs pa 'bul 
[\[108b.5\]]du mi btub pa la rgyal pos nan gyis mnan te dbul du bcug na des de'i ma byin par len pa zhes bya'am mi bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni gla rngan bsgrub pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis ma byin par len pa zhes mi bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze gal te rgyal pos dbul po zhig nan gyis mnan 
[\[108b.6\]]te/_longs spyod kyi rgyu dpya dbul ba'i rigs pa dbul du bcug na de kha na ma tho ba zhes bya'am mi bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de la lar ni kha na ma tho bar 'gyur/_de la lar ni kha na ma tho bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de la gal te mi des longs spyod de dag smad 'tshong 
[\[108b.7\]]la zhugs pa'am/_brgyan po la zhugs pa'am/_chud gsan pa'am/_log par spyad pa spyod pa zhig tu gyur la/_de la rgyal pos de lta bu'i sems kyis slad kyis shas slar stsal ba'i shags mchis par bgyis la nan gyis 'bul du stsal bas/_gal te phyin chad tshul 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]ma lags pas longs spyod chud mi gson na rgyal pos gnyis ka'i don bgyis par 'gyur te/_bdag gi dkor 'phel ba'i don dang /_gzhan rgud par 'gyur ba las gzung ba'i don bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi de'i longs spyod de dag zhugs kyis dral tam/_chab kyis 
[\[109a.2\]]'tshal tam/_bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dag gis phrogs sam/_rkun pos brkus sam/_sbas pa las rul tam/_lo tog ser bas khyer ram/_bye ba dang /_ne tso dang /_byi bas 'tshal tam/_char ma bab ste ma 'khrungs sam/_de dag la sogs pa'i rnam pas de'i longs spyod dag chab 
[\[109a.3\]]'tshal bar gyur na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos longs spyod kyi rgyu dpya 'bul ba'i rigs pa yangs par gzhag pa'i rigs te/_de ltar ma bgyis na/_de ma bskyangs pa'i slad du kha na ma tho bar 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na skyes bu la la zhig gis 
[\[109a.4\]]slong ba'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gcig zas la bos pa las/_de nas de'i dus la bab pa dang /_zas sbyar sbyar ba de chab 'tshal bar gyur te/_mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung ngam/_zhugs kyis dral tam/_gseg ma dang /_rdul dang /_char pas chab 'tshal bar gyur tam/_rkun pos 
[\[109a.5\]]'tshal ba zhig tu gyur te/_des de'i slad du de'i dus su mchis pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag zas ma stsal na/_de ni de ltar bzar mi rung ba'am/_bzar ma mchis par gyur te/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la dbul bar dga' yang cha ma lags par 'gyur bas/_de ltar ma stsal ba'i 
[\[109a.6\]]slad du kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po de yang /_tshul 'di 'dra bar gzigs par bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bram ze de ltar bag yod cing snying rje dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po de lta bu yan lag du zhig gis rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po'i 
[\[109a.7\]]chos dang ldan par 'gyur/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rnam pa bcus te/_gnam gyis bskos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor srun pa dang /_shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang /_brtson pa dang /_chos la gus pa dang mkhas pa dang /_des pa dang /_'jig rten gyi kun spyod 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]rab tu rig par spyod pa dang /_mi bde ba bzod pa dang /_chos la phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa'o/_/de la gnam gyis bskos pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po ni blon po dang /_bkrabs pa dang /_mda' ra ba'i mchog dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams la dben cing gnod pa chung 
[\[109b.2\]]ba dang /_nad ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can no/_/'khor srun pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ni rgyal po'i bgyi ba la tshegs chung ngur rtag tu bde bar gnas la/_rgyal po'i tshul las mi nyams pa'o/_/shes rab phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po ni chos kyis skye dgu bskyangs pa la thabs 
[\[109b.3\]]mkhas shing bgyi ba rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/_/brtson pa'i rgyal po ni dgra ma mchis pas dga' bar gnas shing mdzod 'phel bar bgyid pa'o/_/chos la gus pa'i rgyal po ni bsod nams kyi bgyi ba yang mi gtod la mi srun pa rnams tshar gcod pa'o/_/
[\[109b.4\]]mkhas pa'i rgyal po ni bsam pa myur du rdzogs shing mtha' mi ring bas bgyi ba dag las mi nyams pa'o/_/des pa'i rgyal po ni skye bo thams cad 'khor zhing grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi thams cad kyis yid brtan du rung ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi kun spyod rab tu rig par 
[\[109b.5\]]spyod pa'i rgyal po ni srun pa dang mi srun pa'i bye brag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs la longs spyod 'du ba'i sgo yang chad par mi bgyid pa'o/_/mi bde ba bzod pa'i rgyal po ni rgyal po'i bgyi ba yang rdzogs par sgrub la sdug bsngal gyis kyang mi 'jigs pa'o/_/chos la 
[\[109b.6\]]phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa ni khyad par du 'gro ba'i lam yang sgrub la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag dang yang ma bral ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po yan lag bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ni rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa lags so/_/smras pa/_
[\[109b.7\]]bram ze rgyal po'i chos de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos thab mo'i g.yul zhig nye bar gnas na ji ltar nan tan du bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po dus gsum du thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam pa gsum gyis nan tan du bgyi'o/_/de la dus gsum ni thog ma'i 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dus dang /_bar gyi dus dang /_tha ma'i dus so/_/de la thog ma'i dus kyi thabs mkhas pa ni gal te rgyal po'am/_blon po mdza' bar bgyi bas 'grub par gda' na yang mdza' bar bgyi bas nye bar bzung ste thab mo de zhi bar bgyi'o/_/gal te 
[\[110a.2\]]phan gdags pa zhig gis 'grub par gda' na yang phan gdags pas nye bar bzung ste thab mo de zhi bar bgyi'o/_/gal te phyogs mang po yongs su bzung ba dang de bas lhag pa'i dgrar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa bstan pas 'grub par gda' na yang /_de gnyis 
[\[110a.3\]]bstan pas nye bar bzung ste/_thab mo de zhi bar bgyi ste/_de ltar dus dang po la thabs mkhas pa sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/gal te de dag mdza' bar bgyi ba dang /_phan gdags pa dang /_'jigs pa bstan pa gang gis kyang bsgo ste ma btub na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal 
[\[110a.4\]]pos sems gsum nye bar gzhag ste thab mo bgyi'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_bdag chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yin na/_bdag gis skye dgu rnams phung bar byas par mi 'gyur grang /_phung bar 'gyur ba las ma bzlog pa lta 'ang med dam zhes dang por skye dgu 
[\[110a.5\]]yongs su bskyang ba la sems nye bar gzhag par bgyi'o/_/gnyis pa ni phas kyi dgra las rgyal bar bgyi ba'i sems so/_/gsum pa ni srog gzung ba'i sems te/_sems gsum po 'di dag nye bar gzhag la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa la bka' 
[\[110a.6\]]stsal bar bgyi ste/_de ltar dus bar ma la thabs mkhas pa sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/dus tha ma la ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa de dag dpa' ba tha ma dang /_dpa' ba 'bring dang /_dpa' ba rab kyi tshul du g.yul bsham par bgyi'o/_/de la dpa' ba 
[\[110a.7\]]tha ma rnams ni thog mar bsham mo/_/dpa' ba 'bring rnams ni de'i rgyab tu bsham mo/_/rta pa'i tshogs ni de gnyis ka'i rgyab rgyab nas dgye'o/_/rgyal po bdag ni de dag bag dro zhing bde bar rgal ba dang /_rkang thang pa rnams yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dpa' 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]ba'i rab rnams dang /_de'i phyi bzhin bsdad par bgyi'o/_/de ltar bgyis na de dag chu gang dang /_'jigs pa dang /_spyan mnyes par bgyi ba dang /_rgyab rnams rnam par dag pa dang /_byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba'i slad du rngo ci thogs kyis rgol zhing slar mi ldog 
[\[110b.2\]]ste/_da ltar tha ma'i dus la thabs mkhas pa sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar thabs mkhas shing g.yul legs par shom pa'i rgyal pos ni pha rol gyi dpung bkum mam/_rma phyung yang des rgyal po la kha na ma tho ba chung zhing bsod nams ma lags pa chung 
[\[110b.3\]]ba dang /_'bras bu myong ba yang nges pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des snying rje ba dang /_yongs su mi gtang ba'i sems kyis las de mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i slad du'o/_/gang des skye dgu yongs su bskyang ba dang /_bu 
[\[110b.4\]]dang chung ma dang /_rigs kyi don du bdag dang longs spyod yongs su btang ste las de bgyis pas/_gzhi de las bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa yang rab tu 'phel lo/_/rgyal po chen po thab mo'i g.yul zhig nye bar gnas na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos 
[\[110b.5\]]de ltar nan tan du bgyi'o/_/bram ze de ltar skye dgu yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos 'du shes kyis gnas pa rnam pa du zhig gis gnas par bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po brgyad kyis te/_skye dgu'i ris su gtogs pa'i sems can 
[\[110b.6\]]rnams la bu'i 'du shes dang /_mi srun pa'i rnams la nad pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_dgra rnams la de'i rgyus nyes pa'i 'du shes dang /_mdza' bshes 
[\[110b.7\]]rnams la rjes su bsrung ba'i 'du shes dang /_longs spyod rnams la sman gyi 'du shes dang /_bdag la bdag med pa'i 'du shes so/_/de la skye dgu'i ris su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la bu'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni rgyal po de phas bu bcos pa 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]ltar mi srun pa tshar gcad pa la 'jug kyang snying rje'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'o/_/mi srun pa rnams la nad pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni sman pa ltar gnod pa la mi khro zhing skyon rab tu bsal ba'i slad du sbyor ba'o/_/sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i 
[\[111a.2\]]'du shes kyis gnas pa ni gnod pa thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid pa dang /_phan pa bsgrub pa'i slad du 'jug pa'o/_/bde ba rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa de ni gzhan gyi nor dang /_gzhan gyi yo byad la brnab sems dang phrag dog gi 
[\[111a.3\]]sems mi skyed pa'o/_/dgra rnams la de'i rgyus nyes pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni de'i rgyu yongs su spong zhing skye bo gzhan lta ci smos kyi/_dgra rnams dang yang mdza' bar bgyid pa'o/_/mdza' bshes rnams la rjes su bsrung ba'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni mdza' 
[\[111a.4\]]ba brtan pa dang /_thams cad dang mdza' ba'o/_/longs spyod rnams la sman gyi 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pas yongs su mi spyod cing longs spyod rnams la ma chags par yongs su spyod pa'o/_/bdag la bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni 
[\[111a.5\]]chos don du gnyer zhing dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi drung du mchis te rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan du bgyi ba la 'jug pa ste/_rgyal po chen po 'du shes kyis gnas pa brgyad po de dag gis gnas pa chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ni skyes phul ba tsam gyis kyang phyag mdzod mngon 
[\[111a.6\]]par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_chos dang mi ldan pas ni sgyu'i sbyor ba dang /_g.yo'i rnam pa thams cad kyis bsgrubs kyang de ltar 'phel bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/'du shes kyis gnas pa brgyad po de dag gis gnas na tshes grangs dang /_skar ma dang /_bkra shis kyi las 
[\[111a.7\]]brtsams pa thams cad 'thun par 'gyur te/_des na de la mi'am/_mi ma lags pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed par 'gyur lags so/_/'du shes kyis gnas pa brgyad po de dag gis gnas na char yang dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur te/_des de'i 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]khams su lo legs par 'gyur te/_mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/lo tog chab 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen ser ba dang /_bye ba dang /_ne tso dang /_byi ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba lags so/_/gcan gzan mi srun pa rnams 
[\[111b.2\]]kyang nyung du 'gyur/_tshegs chung ngus kyang de la gnod par sems pa'i dgra rnams rang rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i nyes pas phung zhing bas pa dang /_ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po chen po chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po de ltar skye 
[\[111b.3\]]dgu skyong ba ni 'jig rten na des pa rnams la nongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur lags te/_lus zhig nas gum pa'i 'og tu yang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos la gus shing bag 
[\[111b.4\]]mchis dang /_/skye dgu phan spyod yul 'khor ldan/_/gzhan gyi spyod pa rab rtogs shing /_/gtsang la ma chags rgyal po rgyal/_/dpa' brtan brtson 'grus ldan gyur cing /_/'jig rten bstan bcos bzo rtsal mkhas/_/brtson zhing mthar phyin sgrub 
[\[111b.5\]]pa yi/_/rgyal po bde bar skye dgu skyong /_/phan zhing brtson la nges smra ste/_/snying rje ldan zhing gzhan phan brtson/_/skyon nam yon tan ldan rtogs na/_/skye dgu phan pa'i rgyal po dga'/_/'bangs kyi tshogs rnams kun dga' zhing /_/sbyin bgyid don 
[\[111b.6\]]spyod gzhan la snyoms/_/dpung dang bzhon pa legs skyong ba'i/_/rgyal po rgyal srid yun ring skyong /_/srog gcod spangs dang ma byin len/_/gzhan gyi mchis brang log smra dang /_/phra ma dang ni ngag rtsub dang /_/kyal pa'i skyon dang chang spangs 
[\[111b.7\]]te/_/'tsho dag mi yi rgyal srid rnams/_/spangs nas lha yi rgyal srid la/_/rgyal po gnas 'gyur de slad du/_/rgyal po tshul khrims bzang por mdzod/_/rgyal po'i tshul gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras dris pa'i lan btab pas mgu nas/_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze tshur shog_/nga'i pho brang du 'dong /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bram ze 'khor dang 
[\[112a.2\]]bcas par ngas zan la 'bod do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po legs so/_/legs so/_/dus la bab par gsungs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[112a.3\]]bdag cag ni shul na dub cing bkres pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra 'khor dang bcas te/_mdun du bkye nas pho brang bkod pa chen por phyin to/_/
[\[112a.4\]]der phyin pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra rgyal po'i stan la bzhag go/_/gcer bu pa'i lhag ma gzhan yang rkyen rkyen gyi stan la bkod de rim gro byas/_bla mar byas nas gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par rang gis lag dar te/_gcer bu pa'i bu bden 
[\[112a.5\]]smra 'khor dang bcas pa la kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bdar te tshim par byas so/_/de ltar bdar bas tshim par byas te/_zan zos par shes nas brgya phrag stong ri ba'i gos phrugs su bshams te bskon no/_/gos bskon nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[112a.6\]]gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra zas kyi bya ba byas nas sle'u gyu ste/_lag pa bsnyal te rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po sbyin pa 'di mdzad pas khyod kyis thog ma nyid du ser sna bcom ste gtong ba'i phyag mngon par brkyang bas med par lta ba 
[\[112a.7\]]ni bsal/_yang dag par lta ba ni mngon par phyung /_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes ni bsnyags/_skyes bu ngan pa rnams ni yongs su spangs/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bcad/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bskyed/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni phyung /_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]nyon mongs pa ni bsrabs/_dge ba'i phyogs ni spel/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams ni tshim par bgyis/_bdag la sman pa dang /_gzhan la sman pa ni mdzad par gyur to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/_kha dog 
[\[112b.2\]]phun sum tshogs pas ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur/_dri phun sum tshogs pas ni grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_ro phun sum tshogs pas ni yo byad dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/_reg phun sum tshogs pas ni rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags par 'gyur/_rim 
[\[112b.3\]]gror bgyis te stsal bas ni gnyen la sogs pas rim gror bgyi bar 'gyur/_lag dar te stsal bas ni rim gro pa 'thob par 'gyur/_dus su stsal bas ni don rnams dus su 'grub par 'gyur/_'thun pa yid du 'ong ba stsal bas ni yid du 'ong ba'i longs spyod rnams la 
[\[112b.4\]]sems 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan la mi gnod par stsal bas ni longs spyod brtan pa dag 'thob par 'gyur/_mi bde ba bzod pas stsal bas ni 'khor snying nye bar 'gyur/_kha zas stsal bas ni nyam stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_gos stsal bas ni mdog 
[\[112b.5\]]dang ldan par 'gyur/_mar me stsal bas ni mig dang ldan par 'gyur/_sil snyan stsal bas ni ma nyams pa'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_bzhon pa stsal bas ni bde bar 'gyur/_sman stsal bas ni nad nyung bar 'gyur/_gnas stsal bas ni thams cad stsal 
[\[112b.6\]]bar 'gyur/_chos stsal bas ni bdud rtsi stsal bar 'gyur/_srog gcod pa spangs pas ni tshe ring bar 'gyur/_ma byin par len pa spangs pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pas ni 'gran zla ma mchis pa'i chung ma dang 
[\[112b.7\]]ldan par 'gyur/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pas ni skur pa nyung bar 'gyur/_phra ma spangs pas ni 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_ngag rtsub po spangs pas ni yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur/_tshig kyal pa spangs pas ni tshig btsun par 'gyur/_
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]brnab sems spangs pas ni mi bzad pa'i 'dod chags ma mchis par 'gyur/_gnod sems spangs pas ni mi bzad pa'i zhe sdang ma mchis par 'gyur/_log par lta ba spangs pas ni mi bzad pa'i gti mug ma mchis par 'gyur/_nga 
[\[113a.2\]]rgyal spangs pas ni rigs mthon por skye bar 'gyur/_khong khro ba spangs pas ni mdzes par 'gyur/_phrag dog spangs pas ni gzi byin che bar 'gyur/_ser sna spangs pas ni phyug par 'gyur/_yan lag ma tshang ba med par stsal bas ni yan lag 
[\[113a.3\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i skyes bur 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/_de ltar zas stsal bas ni srog stsal bar 'gyur/_kha dog dang /_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_spobs pa stsal bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sbyin pa bgyid pa ni skye bo mang po la bsnyen pa lags so/_/dam 
[\[113a.4\]]pa rnams kyis bsnyen pa lags so/_/de'i grags pa yang thams cad du grags par 'gyur/_'khor du mchi na'ang 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur/_tha mar yang phyir skye ba ma mchis 
[\[113a.5\]]pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang zhig yang dag sdom rnams la/_/gus par dus su zas stsol ba/_/sems dad de ni phyi tshe la/_/gnas bdun yang dag 'thob par 'gyur/_/stobs dang tshe dang kha dog dang /_/bde ba dang ni 
[\[113a.6\]]spobs pa dang /_/rtag tu bde 'gror skye bar 'gyur/_/tha mar yang srid ma mchis 'thob/_/gang gi slad du sbyin stsal ba/_/de yi don du de 'gyur te/_/bde ba'i slad du sbyin stsal na/_/de ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur/_/bsod nams rnam smin bde ba la/_/ji ltar 
[\[113a.7\]]bsams pa de bzhin 'grub/_/mi dang lhar ni skye ba 'am/_/gzugs dang gzugs med rnams su skye/_/gal te sbyin dang gang ldan zhig_/shes rab kyis ni rtsol bgyid pa/_/sdug bsngal tha mar dbyung ba la/_/de yi ye shes chen po skye/_/bdud kyi ris kyi lha 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]rnams dang /_/sdig pa spyod pa can rnams kyis/_/bsod nams legs par bgyis pa la/_/bar chad bgyi bar yong mi nus/_/bde 'gro dang ni nor rnyed dang /_/yang srid ma mchis gsum pa ste/_/gsum po de dag don gnyer zhing /_/de slad sbyin 
[\[113b.2\]]pa stsal bar bgyi/_/bden smra 'gron du bos pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'di snyam bsams te 'di ltar gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra'i chos bstan pa de kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'thun pa sha stag na 
[\[113b.3\]]bdag gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa yod dam med brtag par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de snyam bsams te stan shin tu dma' ba zhig bting nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra'i mdun du 'dug ste/_'di skad 
[\[113b.4\]]ces smras so/_/bram ze gal te dris nas dris pa lan gdab pa'i phyir skabs phye na ngas dri ba gcig cig khyod la dri'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po ci 
[\[113b.5\]]dang ci bzhed pa deng smrar gsol/_smras pa de dang de'i lan gsol bas bdag gis khyod kyi thugs rangs par bgyi'o/_/skabs phye bas de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 
[\[113b.6\]]'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[113b.7\]]po bram ze dbyar byed 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa lags te/_skar ma'i rigs la mkhas pa/_mchod sbyin gyi rgyud la mkhas pa/_sbyin sreg dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_bsreg pa'i cho ga la shin tu bslabs pa/_zla ba dang nyi ma spyang kis 'dzin 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pa dang /_skar ma ltung ba dang /_lce 'bab pa dang /_sa g.yo ba'i rgyus tshar phyin pa/_lo legs pa dang /_mu ge dang /_'jig rten 'jig pa dang /_lo khyud khor gyi rgyus rnams rtogs par khong du chud pa lags na/_de ni skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/
[\[114a.2\]]smras pa/_bram ze bram ze dbyar byed kyi skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bram ze dbyar byed ni byi ba la dga' ba ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni gzhan gyi mchis brang dang bsten par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po gzhan gyi mchis brang 
[\[114a.3\]]bsten pas ni tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la sdug bsngal ches mang po 'thob par 'gyur te/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang smad par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_byi ba bgyid pa'i ngang tshul can/_/ma bsdams mi srun yul la brkam/_/
[\[114a.4\]]bdag gi chung mas mi chog ste/_/'jig rten dag na smad 'os lags/_/'di dang pha rol sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/bsad bcing chad pa drag po myong /_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye/_/bde ba chung zhing sems la gnod/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi 
[\[114a.5\]]ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal 
[\[114a.6\]]po chen po bram ze b+ha ra dwa dza 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa ste/_tshul dang 'dul ba la mkhas pa lags na/_de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze bram ze b+ha ra dwa dza'i skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bram ze b+ha ra dwa dza 
[\[114a.7\]]'di ni rmugs pa dang yur ba mang ba dang /_ha cang gnyid che ba lags te/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni rmugs pa dang yur ba dang gnyid che bar mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po rmugs pa dang gnyid 'di ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]rnams 'grib par bgyid pa'i chos te/_ye shes dang spong ba'i bar chad du yang 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang zhig rmugs yur gnyid che ba/_/skye bo de ni le los non/_/ma thob pa dag des mi 'thob/_/thob par gyur pa'ang 'grib par 
[\[114b.2\]]'gyur/_/de ltar khyad par thob 'tshal bas/_/snyom las dang ni le lo dang /_/rmugs pa dang ni yur dang gnyid/_/bag med lhan cig spang bar bgyi/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la 
[\[114b.3\]]brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu nag po 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la 
[\[114b.4\]]brtags shing yid gzhungs pa ste/_mos pa chen po dang ldan pa lags na/_de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu gzhon nu nag po'i skyon ni gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu nag po'i skyon ni shin tu ser sna can lags te/_rgyal 
[\[114b.5\]]po chen po mkhas pas ni ser sna can du mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa thob la ser sna la gnas pa ni des longs spyod rnams las snying po ma blangs te/_de lag pa stong par 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas gshin rje'i yul du 
[\[114b.6\]]mchis te/_der bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_gang zhig longs spyod phun ldan la/_/ser snas zil non mi de ni/_/lag stong gshin rje'i yul du mchi/_/bkres pas nyen pa myong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[114b.7\]]der ni bkres skom gdungs pa dang /_/mya ngan grang sogs sdug bsngal myong /_/de bas mkhas pas rang gi blos/_/'jungs pa'i dri mas gos mi bgyi/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu rgyal sde 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas 
[\[115a.2\]]la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa ste/_mos pa che zhing 'jigs pa ma mchis la/_gtong ba dang ldan zhing snying stobs phun sum tshogs pa lags na/_de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu gzhon nu rgyal sde'i skyon ni gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[115a.3\]]po rgyal bu gzhon nu rgyal sde ni srog gcod pa ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni srog gcod par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po skyes bu gang zag srog gcod pa ni tshe thung bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[115a.4\]]'jig rten du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_srog gcod bgyid pa'i gang zag ni/_/tshe thung nad kyang rab tu mang /_/gang na mi bde che ba yi/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/_/de bas sdug bsngal mi 'tshal zhing /_/tshe 'dir bde 'tshal 
[\[115a.5\]]mkhas pa yis/_/gzhan gyi srog gcad mi bgyi ste/_/srog chags rnams ni bdag bzhin bsrung /_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang skyon dang 
[\[115a.6\]]bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa lags na/_de yang skyon dang bcas pa 
[\[115a.7\]]lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyi skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu 'jigs med ni ha cang snying rje can lags te/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni ha cang snying rje can du mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po gang rgyal po 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dbang phyug chen po dang ldan la/_ha cang snying rje ches na de'i rgyal srid la chad pa ma mchis pas ma rungs pa mang pos 'khrug par 'gyur zhing chom rkun gyi gnod pa mang po yang mi zlogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_rgyal po ha cang snying rje na/_/ma rungs 
[\[115b.2\]]pa dang bkrabs pa dang /_/rkun pos rgyal srid 'khrug cing skyo/_/rgyal pos rtag tu shes gus brtson/_/de bas sa yi bdag po yis/_/skyon de mthong nas spang bgyi ste/_/ha cang snying rjer mi bgyi'o/_/nyam thag srog chags snying rje'ang bgyid/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems 
[\[115b.3\]]can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de la skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras 
[\[115b.4\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu stobs lha 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa lags na/_de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu gzhon nu stobs lha'i skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon 
[\[115b.5\]]nu stobs lha ni shin tu chang la chags pa ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni shin tu chang la chags par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po chang gi btung ba ni dran pa yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ste/_yan lag dam pa'i bgegs su 'gyur zhing 'jig 
[\[115b.6\]]rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i don chen po rnams 'grib par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_chang dga' dgos pa thams cad la/_/rtag tu bag med spyod par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis smad 'gyur zhing /_'di dag gzhan du rnams 
[\[115b.7\]]par rmongs/_/de bas skyes bu mkhas pa yis/_/chang la dga' ba spang bar bgyi/_/de ni yon tan 'grib par bgyid/_/gzhan du'ang smyon par bgyid pa lags/_smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu nor lha 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la 
[\[116a.2\]]brtags shing yid gzhungs pa ste/_mos pa che zhing 'jigs pa ma mchis la/_gtong ba dang ldan zhing snying stobs phun sum tshogs pa lags na de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu gzhon nu nor lha'i skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu 
[\[116a.3\]]nor lha ni shin tu mtha' ring ba ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni shin tu mtha' ring bar mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po ha cang mtha' [{]rings te [,]ring ste [}]lus na don nyams par 'gyur te/_skyon rnams kyang brtan par gyur pas zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[116a.4\]]po de lta lags pas mkhas pas shin tu mtha' ring bar mi bgyi'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_shin tu mtha' ring shed bu yi/_/don rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/ma thob pa ni 'thob mi 'gyur/_/thob pa rnams kyang nyams par 'gyur/_/de bas mtha' ring spang 
[\[116a.5\]]bgyis la/_/mkhas pas shin tu bsgrim par bgyi/_/dus kyi 'bras bu bkong bar 'gyur/_/des na de ni 'grib pa 'thob/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang 
[\[116a.6\]]skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu sde chen 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa mos pa che ba lags na/_de yang skyon dang 
[\[116a.7\]]bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu gzhon nu sde chen gyi skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu sde chen ni ha cang brkam chags can te/_mi rigs pa'i 'dod chen gyi zil gyis non cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni ha 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]cang 'dod chen che bar mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'dod chen che ba ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sems can rnams kyis yid brtan du mi rung ba lags la/_lus zhig nas kyang ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_gang 
[\[116b.2\]]zhig sogs la brtson gyur cing /_/longs spyod thob kyang dgar mi tshor/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod 'phrog bgyid cing /_/mi rigs 'dod ldan sems can gang /_/de ni gum nas ngan song mchi/_/tshe 'dir srog chags yid mi mchi/_/de bas skyes bu mkhas pa yis/_
[\[116b.3\]]mi rigs 'dod chen yongs su spang /_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_/de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_
[\[116b.4\]]rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu lha chen po 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa lags na/_/de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze rgyal bu 
[\[116b.5\]]gzhon nu lha chen po'i skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu lha chen po ni rgod cing ca co can ma zhi ba ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni rgod par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po rgod pa ni zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gi bgegs 
[\[116b.6\]]su 'gyur ba'i chos lags pa dang /_ngan song du mchi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i slad du'o/_/de bas na mkhas pas rgod par mi bgyi'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_rgod pa'i dri mar bcas pa'i sems/_/mkhas pas bsngags pa ma lags te/_/sdug bsngal mthar phyin 
[\[116b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin/_/bsgrims kyang mi 'thob ga la thar/_/yon tan grags pa 'jig bgyid pa'i/_/rgod pa de slad spang bar bgyi/_/skyes bu don chen 'tshal ba la/_/'di dang gzhan du'ang de gnod 'gyur/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[117a.2\]]po yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa lags na de yang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[117a.3\]]yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ni shin tu mang du za ba ste/_rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni shin tu mang du za bar mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po shin tu mang du za ba ni le lo can du 'gyur/_lus lci bar 'gyur de'i kha zas bde bar 'ju bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[117a.4\]]tshe 'di dang pha rol gyi don rnams kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_skyes bu gang zhig mang za ba/_/de ni lus lci le lo can/_/'di dang pha rol tshe yi don/_/nges par rab tu 'grib par 'gyur/_/de ni sad na'ang sdug bsngal te/_
[\[117a.5\]]nyal na'ang sdug bsngal gzhan gnod bgyid/_/de bas phan dang ran par bza'/_/zas kyi dus ni nges par bgyi/_/smras pa/_bram ze sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/_de 
[\[117a.6\]]yang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyang mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs la mos pa che zhing 'jigs pa ma mchis la gtong 
[\[117a.7\]]ba dang ldan zhing thugs stobs phun sum tshogs pa lags na/_khyod kyang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_bram ze nga'i skyon gang yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod ni shin tu gtum mo/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni shin tu khro'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni shin 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]tu brlang ngo /_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni shin tu rtsub bo/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni shin tu gzu lums che'o/_/rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni shin tu gtum par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po shin tu gtum pa gang lags 
[\[117b.2\]]pa de la ni skye bo mang po mi dga' bar 'gyur ba lags te/_bdag gi pha ma la yang mi sdug pa lags na grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi gzhan la lta ci smos pa'i slad du ste/_/rgyal po chen po de lta lags pas mkhas pas shin tu gtum par mi bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po mkhas 
[\[117b.3\]]pas ni phyi rjes ring du blta bar bgyi'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_rgyal po gang zhig gtum gyur la/_/khro dbang dgos pa khyad gsod pa/_/de ni rang gi pha ma yang /_/shin tu skyo bar bgyid pa lags/_/skye bo gzhan lta ci smos te/_/skad cig tsam yang ga 
[\[117b.4\]]la dga'/_/de bas mkhas pas nan tan du/_/khro ba yongs su spang bar bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis mngon sum du bdag la mi snyan par rjod pa de lta bu thos nas khros 'khrugs te/_yi ma rangs shing tshig pa za bar gyur nas/_gcer bu pa'i 
[\[117b.5\]]bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bden smra khyod kyis 'khor 'di lta bu'i mdun du nga la de skad kyi mi snyan pa bya'am/_de bas na khyod ni gsad par 'os pa'o zhes byas nas/_des khros pa'i sems kyis dge sbyong 'di ni rgyal po la ngan du smra ba yin gyis sod cig ces tshig 
[\[117b.6\]]phyung bar gyur to/_/de nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra 'jigs shing skrag ste/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar gzu lums ma mdzad par rgyal po chen po bdag la mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/_gsol ba 'di yang 
[\[117b.7\]]gsan du gsol/_smras pa/_bden smra mi 'jigs pa sbyin gyis ci gsol smros shig_/smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag kyang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/_/smras pa/_khyod kyi skyon gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod de ltar gtum pa/_de ltar khro ba/_de 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ltar zhe sdang ba/_de ltar gzu lums can gyi spyan sngar bdag 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba ni bdag kyang ha cang ngor ro bar smra ba lags te/_bdag ni de kho na smra bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni dus thams cad du yang dag pa ji 
[\[118a.2\]]lta ba bzhin du smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po mkhas pas ni dus dang dus ma lags pa dang /_yul dang yul ma lags pa 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po yang dag par smra ba ni 'jig rten yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar 'gyur te/_des 
[\[118a.3\]]pa rnams kyis mi bsngags shing glen pa'i skye bo rnams zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_gang zhig yang dag smra bgyid cing /_/smra dus dus min ma 'tshal ba/_/de ni mkhas pas smad 'gyur na/_/'jig rten gzhan lta ci zhig smos/_/
[\[118a.4\]]de bas bden pa'i tshig lags kyang /_/blo ldan kun tu smra mi bgyi/_/bdag kyang 'dir ni 'di lta bur/_/bden smras rang la gnod par gyur/_/yon tan dang skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gcer bu pa'i bu 
[\[118a.5\]]bden smra'i legs par bshad pas mgu ste/_rjes su yi rangs nas yang dri ba gzhan dag dris so/_/bram ze yang sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mkhas shing mdzangs la brtags shing yid gzhungs la/_tshul dang 'dul ba'i cho ga la 
[\[118a.6\]]mkhas pa yang yin la/_de la skyon yang med pa de lta bu yod dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mchis so/_/smras pa/_bram ze de gang /_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po dge sbyong gau ta ma ni shAkya'i rgyal po chen po shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba de ni/_bdag cag gi rig byed las 'byung ba 
[\[118a.7\]]bzhin du skyon ma mchis pa ste/_de ni rigs kyi che ba nyid kyis skyon gdags par mi nus te/_'di ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su byung ba'o/_/de ni rgyud las smos nas skyon gdags su mi nus te/_'di ltar bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba'o/_/de ni lus kyi 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]che ba nyid kyis kyang skyon gdags su mi nus te/_'di ltar mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o/_/de ni chos dang bcas par skyon gdags su mi nus te/_'di ltar tshul khrims dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs 
[\[118b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pas de'i slad du de ni skyon ma mchis pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma de khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu ma byung na ni de rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/_mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi 
[\[118b.3\]]rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal te/_/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun 
[\[118b.4\]]pa blon po rin po che lags so/_/de la sras kyang stong tham pa mnga' bar 'gyur du gdon ma 'tshal te/_dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa sha stag 'byung bar 
[\[118b.5\]]'gyur du gor ma bkum mo/_/de ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gcig pu spyod pa'i dbang sgyur bar 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur du gdon ma 'tshal te/_des sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba ma mchis shing 'tshe ba ma mchis pa 'di nyid 
[\[118b.6\]]chad pa ma mchis shing mtshon gyis bda' ba ma mchis la/_chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur du gdon ma 'tshal ba zhig na/_de khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu byung nas brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po brtsams te/_rgya shug 
[\[118b.7\]]gi 'bras bu'am/_til gyi 'brum bu'am/_'bras kyi 'bru 'gas lo drug 'das par bgyis te/_byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas/_bdud kyi sde dpung dang bcas pa rab tu pham par bgyis te/_sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bgyi 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ba dang /_thob par bgyi ba dang /_mthong bar bgyi ba dang /_khong du chud par bgyi ba dang /_mngon du bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de dang mnyam pa'i sems can yang 'jig 
[\[119a.2\]]rten na ma mchis na/_de'i gong du phyin pa lta ga la mchis te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing zla gang yang ma mchis pa ste/_de'i slad du de ni skyon ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni rigs dang /_rgyud kyis 
[\[119a.3\]]'dra ba ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs kyi che ba nyid kyis 'dra ba ma mchis pa dang /_ye shes kyi che ba nyid kyis mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du de skyon ma mchis pa lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_rigs dang rgyud dang gzugs dang ldan/_/
[\[119a.4\]]mtshan rnams kyis ni 'bar ba'i sku/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang /_/thub pa'i zla ba mngon par brgyan/_/mu stegs tshogs rnams zil mnan te/_/lo drug yun ring dka' thub spyad/_/bdud kyang btul ba mdzad nas su/_/bde gshegs thams cad 
[\[119a.5\]]mkhyen nyid brnyes/_/sems can med cing srog med chos/_/'phags pa'i bden bzhi phun tshogs pa/_/drang srong lhung bar des bshad pas/_/de slad de la skyon ma mchis/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[119a.6\]]kye bram ze chen po dge sbyong gau ta ma de mtshan gang dag dang ldan na mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i sku dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po seng ge de'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gang yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras 
[\[119a.7\]]rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i slad du gsan du gsol/_/brjod par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni sor mo ring ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge 
[\[119b.2\]]sbyong gau ta ma de ni bdun mtho ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i lta bu dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong 
[\[119b.3\]]gau ta ma de ni brla zlum pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni spu re re nas skye ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge 
[\[119b.4\]]sbyong gau ta ma de ni dbu skra mthon mthing dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni dbu skra g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni sku'i spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni pags pa 'jam pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni 
[\[119b.5\]]pags pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni sku che zhing drang ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba 
[\[119b.6\]]dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni tshems bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni tshems thags bzang ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni tshems mnyam pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau 
[\[119b.7\]]ta ma de ni ro bro ba mchog dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni spyan mthon mthing 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]dang ldan pa'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gau ta ma'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag ste/_de dag dang ldan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma de mtshan gyis legs 
[\[120a.2\]]par brgyan pa'i sku dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ste/_de'i slad du de skyon ma mchis pa lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_spyi bo gtsug tor mdzes pas rnam par brgyan/_/dbu skra mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil ba mnga'/_/rdzi ma ba'i 'dra ud pal mchog gi spyan/_/
[\[120a.3\]]de bas 'di na rgyal ba skyon ma mchis/_/tshangs pa ka la ping ka mchog gi dbyangs/_/pad ma'i 'dab ltar dri med yangs pa'i ljags/_/de yi ljags kyang zhal kun khebs pa ste/_/de bas de 'dra'i sems can 'ga' ma mchis/_/ro mchog gcig kyang thams cad 
[\[120a.4\]]ro ldan par/_/mtshan rab de yis rab tu myur 'gyur te/_/rgyal ba'i ljags ni de dang ldan pas na/_/de bas 'di na rgyal ba skyon ma mchis/_/tshems kyi yon tan mnyam med mnyam pa yin/_/de yi tshems ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang /_/des ni 'jig rten lhar bcas 
[\[120a.5\]]thams cad kyang /_/bde gshegs de la dga' 'gyur ngo mtshar 'thob/_/seng ge'i za 'gram sgros ni bim pa'i mchog_/mtshungs med thal gong shin tu rgyas dang ldan/_/dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing mdzes par ldan/_/dpal ldan shing ltar chu zheng gab pa'i sku/_/
[\[120a.6\]]dpe legs sku ni yangs shing rkyen du 'bab/_/yid can kun la sdug pa'i sku yang mnga'/_/thub pa dpa' bo mtho ba bdun dang ldan/_/pags pa'i mdog ni gser mchog btso ma 'dra/_/shin tu 'jam sku spu ni gyen du 'khyil/_/sdug cing mi srab mthon mthing dri 
[\[120a.7\]]med dbu/_/dbu 'jam g.yas su 'khyil dang ldan pa ste/_/de bas bde gshegs mnyam pa 'ga' ma mchis/_/bde bar gshegs ni ma btud bzhugs dang ldan/_/mdoms sba mi gda' glang po'i rgyal po bzhin/_/brla zlum byin pa e na ya yi 'dra/_/bde 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]gshegs de la yid can su mi sten/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel/_/sen mo zangs mdog sor mo legs par zlum/_/dung ltar mtho ba'i zhabs ldan mnyam pa'i zhabs/_/rting pa yangs shing mnyam pa drang srong mchog_/phyag dang zhabs la 'khor lo 
[\[120b.2\]]'jam pa mnga'/_/drang srong chen po sor mo ring dang ldan/_/thub pa'i dbang po zhabs mthil shin tu gnas/_/des ni sa la mi g.yo'i skur bzhud de/_/'di ni drang srong chen po'i mtshan gyi tshogs/_/de yis brgyan sku shin tu mdzes par gda'/_/mnyam med 'khor 
[\[120b.3\]]gyi nang na bzhugs pa'i tshe/_/skar tshogs mang dbus zla ba gnas pa bzhin/_/skyes bu chen po'i sku mchog gzugs de yang /_/'gro ba kun tu de bzhin shin tu gda'/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan dri med chos/_/gang lags de kun thub pa nyid gsung 
[\[120b.4\]]grang /_/smras pa/_bram ze ci'i phyir na dge sbyong gau ta ma de bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhes bya/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de'i slad du/_don 'di nyid rab tu bsgrub pa'i slad du dpe gsol bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[120b.5\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can skye gnas bzhis yongs su zin pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/_mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_mi'i lus thob pa de dag re re zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur la/_
[\[120b.6\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa brgya gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub ste/_de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re yongs su grub 
[\[120b.7\]]bo/_/spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa brgya gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la dpe byad bzang po gcig mngon par 'grub ste/_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re yongs su 'grub bo/_/dpe byad bzang 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]po thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa brgya gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig mngon par 'grub ste/_de bzhin du mtshan sum cu re re nas yongs su 'grub bo/_/
[\[121a.2\]]mtshan sum cur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa brgya gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo/_/dbu gtsug tor du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de las bye 
[\[121a.3\]]ba phrag 'bum du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos dge sbyong gau ta ma'i chos kyi dung mngon par 'grub ste/_chos kyi dung de dang ldan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma de bzhed na/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa'i sems can gang dag 
[\[121a.4\]]gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis gal te rnam pa sna tshogs su smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma la dus gcig tu dri ba dris te/_gcig gis gang dris pa de gnyis pa mi 'dri bar so so nas dris kyang de dag thams cad dge sbyong gau ta ma de sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i 
[\[121a.5\]]shes rab kyis bzung zhing gsung gcig gis sems can de dag gis ji skad du dris pa'i dri ba de dag gi lan glon zhing sems can de dag gis kyang rang rang gi skad du 'tshal bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po de'i slad du dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan 
[\[121a.6\]]pa dang /_tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi gsung dang ldan pa zhes bgyi'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pas na/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten nang na bsod nams gter/_/mthong dang thos dang bzhad pa mdzad pas kyang /_/sems can 
[\[121a.7\]]kun la phan pa mdzad pa lags/_/'di ltar sems can kun gyis nges pa'i tshig_/mang po dag gis dus gcig zhu zhus na/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la thugs chud nas/_/gsung dbyangs gcig gis so sor lan yang 'debs/_/de lta bas na 'dren pa 'jig 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]rten na/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs gsung sgrog mkhyen par mdzod/_/de ni lha mi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa'i/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la tshigs su bcad de dris pa/_gang 
[\[121b.2\]]rnams khyod kyis sngar bshad de/_/dpe byad bzang po yod smras pa/_/thub pa'i dpe byad bzang po gang /_/bram ze chen pos brjod par gyis/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_
[\[121b.3\]]gang dag gis na thub pa de yi sku/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan brjod pa/_/bde gshegs dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams/_/bshad par 'tshal gyis rgyal po gsan du gsol/_/sen mo mtho zhing sen mo zangs mdog 'dra/_/sen mo snum zhing phyag gi sor 
[\[121b.4\]]mo mnyam/_/sor mo zlum zhing sor mo rgyas pa ste/_/sor mo rnams ni byin gyis phra ba lags/_/rtsa rnams mi mngon sgros ni bim pa 'dra/_/zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing long bu mi mngon lags/_/phyag gi ri mo byin gyis phra ba ste/_/ri mo rnams ni zab cing shin tu 
[\[121b.5\]]gsal/_/ljags ni zangs mdog shin tu mnyen zhing 'jam/_/tshigs rnams mi mngon phyag ni shin tu ring /_/glang pos sgra bsgrags lta bu'i gsung dang ldan/_/'brug sgra 'dra bar snyan pa'i 'jam dbyangs can/_/sku ni snyoms shing gsal la shin tu mkhregs/_/shin 
[\[121b.6\]]tu legs sku phyag gi ri mo snum/_/sku yi dngos po shin tu gtsang dang ldan/_/rgyal ba'i zla ba sku yis shin tu btsun/_/sku ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/_/yan lag rab 'byes nag nog ma mchis sku/_/sku yi ro stod rgyas yangs shin tu mkhregs/_/dpe byad 
[\[121b.7\]]bzang po rnams ni yongs su rdzogs/_/sku ni rim gyis rgyas shing shin tu mdzes/_/spyod pa gtsang ldan shin tu 'jam pa'i sku/_/lte ba'i khung bu nag nog ma mchis la/_/yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu zab dang ldan/_/'od ni nag nog ma mchis yongs su dag_/sku ni 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]kun nas bzang zhing shin tu mkhregs/_/de ni kun nas bzang dang shin tu ldan/_/mgon po'i sku ni blta bas chog mi myong /_/bal glang 'dra bar brjid pa'i 'gros su gshegs/_/khyu mchog 'gros dang seng ge ngang pa'i 'gros/_/gsung ni ha cang 
[\[122a.2\]]mtho ba ma lags la/_/bzang ba'i sku mnga' 'jam zhing snum pa'i sku/_/phyag ni shin tu zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes/_/g.yas nas gshegs shing gshegs thabs mdzes la bzang /_/shin tu phyang nger gnas pa'i phyal dang ldan/_/'dod dang 'jigs med 
[\[122a.3\]]nag nog med pa'i sku/_/smin ma gnag cing shin tu gzangs ring mdzes/_/phyal ni ma zhom spyan gyi dkyus kyang ring /_/zhal ni rab legs gtsang ma'i spyan dang ldan/_/dri med spyan mnga' spyan ni shin tu yangs/_/tshems kyi mche ba byin gyis gyen du 'phags/_/smin 
[\[122a.4\]]tshugs 'ja' khugs 'dra zhing shangs dbyibs mtho/_/ud pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang ldan/_/smin ma stug cing tshems kyi mche ba zlum/_/smin ma mnyam zhing 'dab chags 'brel dang ldan/_/snyan gnyis mnyam zhing tshems kyi mche ba rno/_/zhal gyi mkhur tsos 
[\[122a.5\]]skyon dang bral ba mnga'/_/rgyal ba'i spyod pa skyon bag yod ma mchis/_/dpral ba'i dbyes la gnyer ma mi mnga' zhing /_/mgur ni dung 'dra mkhregs pa'i sku mnga' la/_/tshigs rnams sred med bu yi stobs dang ldan/_/yan lag dam pa dbu ni gdugs dbyibs 
[\[122a.6\]]'dra/_/dbu yi stod rnams lcang lo 'khyil dang ldan/_/dbu gnag stug cing spos zhim dri dang ldan/_/rgyal ba'i dbu skra bshor ba ma lags te/_/dbu skra mi 'dzings shin tu mdzes pa'i sku/_/dbu skra stug cing legs par rim gyis gnas/_/dbu dang ba spu 'jam 
[\[122a.7\]]zhing phra la gnag_/dbu skra bung ba'i lto ltar gnag dang ldan/_/mnyam zhing khod snyoms dbu mchog chu rlabs 'dra/_/seng ge khri dang nya dang rgyal mtshan dang /_/rdo rje lcags kyu bum pa g.yung drung 'khyil/_/dpal gyi be'u dang dung dang pad ma dang /_/bkra shis ldan 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]rnams phyag zhabs mthil la mnga'/_/rgyal po chen po bzang mdzes 'di dag ni/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po'i mchog_/dpe legs smos pa 'di dag thams cad ni/_/mu stegs can mi gzhan la yong ma mchis/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ni re 
[\[122b.2\]]zhig dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i gzugs kyi che ba nyid de/_de ni sems can thams cad la ma mchis pas de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/_/rgyal po chen po dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa ste/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba 
[\[122b.3\]]ma mchis pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o/_/de'i byams pa de yang ma chags la sgrib pa ma mchis shing rtag tu 'byung ba ste/_lhun gyis grub par rgyas par 'geng ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/_
[\[122b.4\]]rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/_nor bu rin po che chu 'dang ni rang bzhin gyis dag cing chab kyi rnyog ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du dge sbyong gau ta ma de yang nang yongs su dag cing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dang bar 
[\[122b.5\]]mdzad pa ste/_de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_/dus rnams kun dang zhing kun dang /_/'jig rten byams pas khyab par mdzad/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa yang /_/khyab mdzad kun mkhyen byams dang ldan/_/zla med 
[\[122b.6\]]thub pa'i byams pa yis/_/ma khyab phyogs 'ga' ma mchis te/_/khams dang bsam pa rnams kyang khyab/_/de bas kun mkhyen skyon ma mchis/_/dper na nor bu chu 'dang ba/_/shin tu rnam dag chab 'dang bgyid/_/de bzhin drang srong thugs dag pa/_/skye bo'i 
[\[122b.7\]]rnyog pa dang bar mdzad/_/rgyal po chen po dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags te/_rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gti mug gi mun par zhugs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa gzigs 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_ma rig pa chen po'i sgo nga'i sbubs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_'khor ba chen por 
[\[123a.2\]]lhung ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu g.yen spyo zhing ma zhi ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i chu bo 
[\[123a.3\]]chen pos khyer ba'i sems can rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_g.yang sa chen po nas lhung zhing sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong 
[\[123a.4\]]gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_nyon mongs pa chen po'i bcing bas bcings pa rtag tu dkri bas 
[\[123a.5\]]dkris pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_yun ring por yul gyis dgang dka' zhing ngoms mi shes pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_
[\[123a.6\]]sred pas 'khol cing rtag tu gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_rga shis yongs su mnar cing shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[123a.7\]]ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_nad sna tshogs mang pos yongs su mnar cing rtag tu nad par gyur pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_me gsum rab tu 'bar zhing rtag tu sreg pa'i sems can dag 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_dman zhing yongs su ma dag la 'khor ba rnam par 'phel ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu skrag cing 
[\[123b.2\]]rtag tu yid skrag pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_ro bro ba chung ba la chags shing nyes dmigs ma mthong ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 
[\[123b.3\]]'jug pa dang /_dregs pa sna tshogs mang pos myos shing yun ring por gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_dgon pa chen po'i lam du zhugs shing gsod pa rtag tu phyi bzhin 
[\[123b.4\]]'brang ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu gnod par gyur cing dus thams cad du 'jug pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_
[\[123b.5\]]ma rig pas long bar gyur cing rtag tu rab rib kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur cing dru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur la rtsa mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bur gyur pa'i 
[\[123b.6\]]sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_gnod pa dang ldan zhing gnod pa ma mchis pa dang bral ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_mi khom 
[\[123b.7\]]pa dang ldan par gyur cing dal ba dang bral ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_the tsom can du gyur cing log par lta bar zhugs pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_shing bal gyi 'da' ba ltar gyur cing lta ba sna tshogs la rten pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_'du shes dang sems phyin ci log tu gyur cing mi 
[\[124a.2\]]rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa la dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs 
[\[124a.3\]]rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_khur gyis gzir cing yun ring po nas dub ste/_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_mthu chung ba la rten cing snying po ma mchis pa snying por 'du shes 
[\[124a.4\]]pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu nye bar nyon mongs pa dang ldan par gyur cing dri mas gos pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_
[\[124a.5\]]srid pa'i 'dod chags kyis brlags shing yid zhum pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i zil gyis non cing rtag tu rnyed pa tshol ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams 
[\[124a.6\]]la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnam pa mang pos gzir ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen 
[\[124a.7\]]po skye ba ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dang ldan pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/_de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/_gti mug mun pa mun nag gis rtag tu/_/sems ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]skye dgu dang /_/'khor ba'i btson rar chud pa rnams gzigs na/_/drang srong dam pa de ni thugs rje skyed/_/rtag tu g.yen spyor gyur dang rtag tu yang /_/chu bo bzhi po dag gis khyer gyur cing /_/'khor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/gzigs na 
[\[124b.2\]]stobs bcu mnga' ba thugs rje skye/_/g.yang sa chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am/_/lam ngan zhugs pa'i sems can rnams gzigs na/_/thub pa thugs rjes zhi ba'i gnas dang ni/_/'phags pa'i rgyal po'i lam la 'god pa mdzad/_/bcings par gyur dang sred 
[\[124b.3\]]pas 'khol ba dang /_/rtag tu yul la chags dang rga ba dang /_/'chi ba'i gting lhung sems can rnams gzigs na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/_/sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos mnar ba dang /_/me gsum 'bar ba'i skye dgu 'di dag dang /_/ngan song sas 
[\[124b.4\]]'jigs pa rnams gzigs gyur na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/_/ro la brkam pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_/bag med rtag tu yul la chags pa dang /_/srid pa'i dgon par nyon mongs sems can rnams/_/gzigs par gyur na rnam par grol bar 
[\[124b.5\]]mdzad/_/ma rig ldongs shing rab rib khebs pa dang /_/bal ba dza dang mun dza 'drar gyur dang /_/zhe 'gras gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/_/'khor bar bcings pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_/mi khom skyes pa'i skye dgu 
[\[124b.6\]]'di dag dang /_/log par lta bar lhung ba rnams gzigs na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/_/sdug bsngal bde dang mi sdug sdug shes dang /_/mi rtag rtag dang bdag ma mchis pa la/_/bdag tu 'du shes 'khrul ba rnams gzigs na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs 
[\[124b.7\]]rje rab tu skye/_/khur gyis non cing gzir bar gyur rnams dang /_/de bzhin mthu chung rten pa'i byis pa dang /_/rtag tu nyon mongs nyon mongs rnams gzigs na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/_/'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa'i yid ldan dang /_/sred pa che zhing rtag tu yul 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]brkam dang /_/srid pa'i 'dod chags rgya mtshor lhung ba rnams/_/gzigs nas rgyal ba'i thugs rje chen po skye/_/nad dang mya ngan rnam pa mang dag gis/_/shin tu gtses pa'i skye dgu nyon mongs rnams/_/gzigs nas sdug bsngal ma lus bsal slad
