[\[145a.4\]]bstod pa/_bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa mkhyen/_/mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi chos gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/_/sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi spyod pa thams cad mkhyen/_/des 
[\[145a.5\]]na srid pa gsum po dag na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os/_/de nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs 
[\[145a.6\]]pa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_gang gi slad du sgra dang yi ge ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba 
[\[145a.7\]]ma mchis pas/_/khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya ma brla dang sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na/_/chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par 
[\[145b.2\]]rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/_/chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang /_/thugs rje brnyes 
[\[145b.3\]]nas byams pa'i dgongs pas sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa/_/gru tshul chos la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal ba mtshungs par mkhyen/_/chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[145b.4\]]la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs pa dang /_'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs par 
[\[145b.5\]]rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog mi 
[\[145b.6\]]g.yos pa/_/mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shing srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rim gyis byams dang ldan pa'i thugs rje yis ni bden pa'i lam gyi rnam pa rab tu gnas mdzad pa/_/rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyi khyams na gnas pa'i bde 
[\[145b.7\]]gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/_/snying rje'i chu bo ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba/_/zhi gnas 'dab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas/_/slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par bsnyen gyur pa/_/bde gshegs pad ma la ni spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnga' 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pas/_/brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis stobs kyis yang dag 'phags/_/yul gyi rlung rnams langs pa chen pos mi g.yos pa/_/sangs rgyas ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnga' bdag thugs rjes 
[\[146a.2\]]dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa/_/blo gter blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa/_/sems can brgya dag gis ni mang pos mchod gyur pa/_/bde gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs pa/_/shes 
[\[146a.3\]]rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing /_/skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad ma kha 'byed pa/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnga' bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang /_/'dren pa khyod dang mnyam pa dmigs par ma gyur te/_/khyod 
[\[146a.4\]]ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags/_/bdag cag khyod la bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags/_/lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa/_/lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon bstod pa/_/bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon bstod pa/_/
[\[146a.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa bstod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[146a.6\]]yul rnam par sprul pa tshad med pa lha 'bum gyis mngon par bstod nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir them skas nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs pa shes pa de 
[\[146a.7\]]bzhin du/_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gshegs par shes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su gzung ba rin po che bkod par gdan seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom 
[\[146b.2\]]ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ste/_byung 
[\[146b.3\]]nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs rnams dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang 
[\[146b.4\]]bar byas ma thag tu/_de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun chad 
[\[146b.5\]]do/_/sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cing /_zhe sdang gis ma yin/_gti mug gis ma yin te/_nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_pha ma lta bu'i 
[\[146b.6\]]'du shes su gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te/_/gang gis brtson 
[\[146b.7\]]'grus chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs/_/gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan rab brjod pa/_/shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes/_/gang chos rgya chen bla med mnyan slad de yi zhabs la phyag 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]'tshal te/_/mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan/_/blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa/_/thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can bde bar bzhed pas 'od 'di phyung /_/mnga' 
[\[147a.2\]]bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas pham mdzad nas/_/pad+ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes/_/gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa/_/de yi chos kyi 'khor 
[\[147a.3\]]lo gzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol/_/rab tu bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bskor gyur pa/_/'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni de ring skor bar mdzad/_/srog chags rnams kyis bsten par rnyed 
[\[147a.4\]]dka' legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang dag dad pa dang ba che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis go bar byas/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 
[\[147a.5\]]bskul/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/_sems can thams cad bde bar byas/_nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/_mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/_bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag 
[\[147a.6\]]tu med pa dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam dag rin chen 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod 
[\[147a.7\]]pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang ldan pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[147b.2\]]spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod 
[\[147b.3\]]do/_/bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol phyin/_/khyod kyi yon tan bsngags phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod/_/khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tan gter/_/der ni chos don gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchi/_/chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji 
[\[147b.4\]]bzhin du/_/bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang /_/shin tu bslab pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal/_/sems can rnam par dgrol slad tha dad bstan pa mdzad/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis 
[\[147b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/_shar phyogs logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten 
[\[147b.6\]]gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur 
[\[147b.7\]]nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan khri bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas/_/'od kyi glog phyung 
[\[148a.2\]]stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing /_/dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel pa 'phel bar mdzad/_/bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nas/_/ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad 
[\[148a.3\]]de/_/lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang skams par mdzad/_/thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho phyogs 
[\[148a.4\]]logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi 
[\[148a.5\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor 
[\[148a.6\]]gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi phreng ba'i dra bas bcom 
[\[148a.7\]]ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/khyod kyi sku yi 'phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhing /_/smon lam dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mang ldan/_/dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des/_/
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal/_/khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste/_/'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshim bgyid/_/sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang /_/sems can bsam pa rnams 
[\[148b.2\]]la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas nub phyogs logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod 
[\[148b.3\]]do/_/de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa na byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[148b.4\]]gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[148b.5\]]sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu'i do shal dang rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su 
[\[148b.6\]]bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/'dzam bu'i chu gser btso ma lta bur ser ba'i sku/_/kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes/_/mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag nges rtog pa/_/de dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba 
[\[148b.7\]]thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun tsam du/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni/_/de yi rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi/_/rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas byang phyogs logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas shar dang lho'i 
[\[149a.2\]]mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su 
[\[149a.3\]]bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[149a.4\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[149a.5\]]spu yis mtha' dbung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin kyang /_/sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas/_/mig med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'/_/sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal/_/zhing gcig phyogs la zhing mang rab 
[\[149a.6\]]'byam ston mdzad de/_/kun tu bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis/_/bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la/_/dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa 
[\[149a.7\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos sems 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar 
[\[149b.2\]]te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[149b.3\]]phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing na bza'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/sems can 
[\[149b.4\]]dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du/_/tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung /_/tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin tu thugs rje zhing /_/bdag la bstod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad/_/lhun po ji bzhin khyod brtan bla ma rgya chen sten/_/chu 
[\[149b.5\]]gter zab mo bzhin du shin tu gting dpag dka'/_/srid pa thog mar bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste/_/sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis 
[\[149b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs 
[\[149b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[150a.2\]]khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/srid pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/_/byed pa sgyu ma lta 
[\[150a.3\]]bu dngos po med par ston/_/sgyu ma lta bu sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang /_/'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis khams ma mchis/_/dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/_/gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags/_/'dus byas 
[\[150a.4\]]dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsung /_/chos rnam snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/_nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs 
[\[150a.5\]]logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil dri ma med pa rnam par sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag dri ma med 
[\[150a.6\]]par rab tu gnas pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med ces bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_skad 
[\[150a.7\]]cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhi la mos/_/khyod 
[\[150b.2\]]kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen/_/khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal/_/mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyi bsam pa cho ga mkhyen/_/sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod/_/gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag 
[\[150b.3\]]khyod kyis mkhyen/_/sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes mun/_/'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 
[\[150b.4\]]bstod nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ut+pa la dmar po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam 
[\[150b.5\]]par snang byed du snang ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad 
[\[150b.6\]]cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom 
[\[150b.7\]]ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gi phreng gi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa/_/de snyed bde 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te/_/bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag_/de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad/_/blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs/_/gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod 
[\[151a.2\]]nams mtha' yas te/_/bskal pa mang po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang /_/skra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod 
[\[151a.3\]]nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gnas te/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/_byang chub 
[\[151a.4\]]sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud 
[\[151a.5\]]tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod 
[\[151a.6\]]pa'i las byed cing rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/bde gshegs sku yi 'phrin las mtha' dang dbung ma mchis/_/
[\[151a.7\]]bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min/_/dper na nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin/_/mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dbung med pa ji bzhin du/_/byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]ngan 'das/_/sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar/_/de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng 
[\[151b.2\]]gi bar snang la dong ste/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/_/de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 
[\[151b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas/_gsung bsal 
[\[151b.4\]]ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_mi 
[\[151b.5\]]dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos nas lus dang /_sems tshim par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[151b.6\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/_/gsung bsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chen dang /_
[\[151b.7\]]'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan rab tu brtan pa dag la 'khod 
[\[152a.2\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/_des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba 
[\[152a.3\]]byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan 
[\[152a.4\]]thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams rin 
[\[152a.5\]]po che bkod pa'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu tsam du mtho ba/_rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/_kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa/_ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/_me tog sil ma 
[\[152a.6\]]sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/_bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/_'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/_bsam pa tshim par 
[\[152a.7\]]byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]las langs te/_gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid/_/lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs 
[\[152b.2\]]kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes/_/sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/_/chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin ya ma brla/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing /_/rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par/_/mkhyen nas mgon 
[\[152b.3\]]po 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa ston/_/bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can min/_/rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro/_/bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra/_/rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma 
[\[152b.4\]]mchis/_/gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba/_/de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so/_/rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba/_/de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston/_/sa steng rdul tsam mngon 
[\[152b.5\]]par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang /_/sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bstan/_/gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/_/khyod kyi seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi phreng ba bsgreng /_/de 
[\[152b.6\]]ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis/_/khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang /_/sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu bsrungs pa'i gsung /_/'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa 
[\[152b.7\]]bsod nams gzi brjid mang /_/bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs/_/rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol/_/khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du/_/rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]lhags/_/gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol/_/seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i 
[\[153a.2\]]bsam pa mkhyen nas gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems 
[\[153a.3\]]dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang /_ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/_so so yang 
[\[153a.4\]]dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la dbab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/_mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/_theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang 
[\[153a.5\]]dag par 'du ba/_chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa/_ston pa snying po dang ldan pa/_chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms 
[\[153a.6\]]par byed pa/_tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/_nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/_chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_thub pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/_sangs 
[\[153a.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/_chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/_rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/_bsod nams 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_mos 
[\[153b.2\]]pa dang /_shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/_nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems rab tu dben par shes pa/_theg pa chen pos 
[\[153b.3\]]'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /_
[\[153b.4\]]bsnyad pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_rnam par shes par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /_'khor 
[\[153b.5\]]gyi the tshom thams cad gcad pa dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la 
[\[153b.6\]]bzhugs so//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[153b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]me tog gi lda ldi dag dang /_me tog gi skon bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te/_me tog gi lda ldi dang /_me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[154a.2\]]mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i drir byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub 
[\[154a.3\]]sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems 
[\[154a.4\]]pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' 
[\[154a.5\]]yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang mos par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i 
[\[154a.6\]]rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i 
[\[154a.7\]]rgyal pos brjed pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang ba zhes bya bas zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang /_phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub 
[\[154b.2\]]sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[154b.3\]]snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas te myur ba myur bar [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang 
[\[154b.4\]]bar gyur te/_'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang 
[\[154b.5\]]bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/_byang chub sems 
[\[154b.6\]]dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[154b.7\]]thad du mchis te/_bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag legs so legs so/_/gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob shig dang /_de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[155a.2\]]na mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_
[\[155a.3\]]dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang /_nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to/_/grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag 
[\[155a.4\]]thams cad sel to/_/grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid 
[\[155a.5\]]du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub 
[\[155a.6\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed par the tshom ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 
[\[155a.7\]]'di ni che ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/_phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te dri ma ma mchis par rig pa dang /_rnam 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]par grol bas snang bar gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/_chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa/_thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/_bdud kyi las 
[\[155b.2\]]dang rtsod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/_phas kyi rgol ba dang /_ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/_tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[155b.3\]]pha rol tu son pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gzungs dang /_ye shes rab tu thob pa/_byin gyi rlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbang pos mchog 
[\[155b.4\]]dang /_mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/_'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad la mkhas pa/_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[155b.5\]]bya ka la ping ka dang /_khrung khrung gi sgra dang /_tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can/_shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/_brtan 
[\[155b.6\]]zhing shin tu gnas la mi g.yo zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng bar bgyid pa/_rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu/_smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 
[\[155b.7\]]ba zab mo blta dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/_chad pa dang /_rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag bcad pa/_tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]pa/_ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/_seng ge'i 
[\[156a.2\]]sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_snrel zhi'i rgyud dang /_spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/_gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa/_thams cad la 
[\[156a.3\]]sems dpa' ba/_bdud bzhi dang /_nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'dul ba/_mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa/_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa/_shin tu 
[\[156a.4\]]yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa/_ri lta bur gyur pa/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[156a.5\]]las log pa/_dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/_chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/_shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/_pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa/_'od 
[\[156a.6\]]kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/_dkon mchog gsum gyi 
[\[156a.7\]]gdung mi gcod pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/_bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa/_bsod nams 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 
[\[156b.2\]]'di snyam du/_bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed pa snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni 
[\[156b.3\]]phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba/_sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/_spyod pa 
[\[156b.4\]]la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/_nges 
[\[156b.5\]]pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/_ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/_log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams lam la 'dzud pa/_theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo 
[\[156b.6\]]mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig 
[\[156b.7\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]mi thogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba skyed pa'i sems can shes rab 
[\[157a.2\]]'chal pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[157a.3\]]na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bor nas nor bu mching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba 
[\[157a.4\]]snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams 
[\[157a.5\]]cad ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cus bla na 
[\[157a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/_e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus 
[\[157a.7\]]pa 'di dag ni chos don du gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba/_sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/_mi 'jigs pas spobs pa 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyung ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal 
[\[157b.2\]]po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tu/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang 
[\[157b.3\]]chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang /_seng ge'i khri dang /_lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lam me/_lhang nge /_lhan ne'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 
[\[157b.4\]]kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 
[\[157b.5\]]'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni bai dUr+ya/_g.yogs ma ni gser/_snying po ni rin po che ne tsho 'am ci/_rtsibs ni an da rnyil las byas pa/_mu tig gi do shal rab 
[\[157b.6\]]tu spyangs pa/_dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/_rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[157b.7\]]pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/_sil snyan dang /_sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]mngon par bstod do/_/kun du snang ba kun nas 'od zer can/_/don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan/_/rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan/_/skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer phyung /_/zhal 
[\[158a.2\]]yang rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa/_/'dren pa de ni bdag gi lus la yang /_/lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhi/_/mi yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na/_/gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang /_/blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs/_/rnam 
[\[158a.3\]]pa stong du khyad par 'phags par gyur/_/bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag_/bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang /_/spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen 
[\[158a.4\]]par dka' ba la/_/nyam chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus/_/sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun phan slad du/_/sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang /_/'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gi 'byung ba dang /_/snang 
[\[158a.5\]]dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang /_/dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal/_/theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing /_/mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhags dang /_/gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag_/de dag phan slad sangs rgyas la yang 
[\[158a.6\]]zhu/_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu tshar gcad cing /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu gzung /_/bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod/_/lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags/_/skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas/_/
[\[158a.7\]]bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chud/_/bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas/_/mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen 'jug dang /_/ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang /_/chos kyi dbang phyug 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]rgyal po rab bslabs pa/_/'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[158b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 
[\[158b.3\]]thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 
[\[158b.4\]]spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tshom ma mchis pa dang /_chos kyi sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[158b.5\]]'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b.6\]]dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang /_legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang /_las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tshom dang 
[\[158b.7\]]bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du chos thams 
[\[159a.2\]]cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas blo shin tu rnam par nges pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 
[\[159a.3\]]sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so/_/legs so/_/khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas/_khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bus de bzhin 
[\[159a.4\]]gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so/_/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon 
[\[159a.5\]]tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom 
[\[159a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang /_shes 
[\[159a.7\]]rab kyi rgyan dang /_gzungs kyi rgyan te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ni gcig ste/_gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[159b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang /_bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/_gnyis po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[159b.3\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus rnam par dag pa dang /_ngag rnam par dag pa dang /_yid rnam par dag pa ste/_gsum po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[159b.4\]]rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang /_gang smon pa de yang dag par 'grub pa dang /_gang 'dod pa de 'thob pa dang /_gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/_bzhi po 
[\[159b.5\]]'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/_shes rab sgyu med pa yin/_rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin/_
[\[159b.6\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa sgyu med pa yin te lnga po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[159b.7\]]yid la chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang /_gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul khrims dang /_gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te drug po 'di dag 
[\[160a.2\]]go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang /_brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[160a.3\]]bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang /_shes rab rnam par dag pa dang /_thabs rnam par dag pa dang /_bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/_bdun po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad 
[\[160a.4\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[160a.5\]]'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/_
[\[160a.6\]]dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jigs pa med pa yin/_skrag pa med pa yin/_bsam pa nges pa yin/_nye bar zhi ba yin/_bsil ba yin/_bcings pa lhod pa yin/_sems las su rung ba yin/_sems cang shes pa yin/_dul ba'i sa rjes su 
[\[160a.7\]]'thob pa yin te/_dgu po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir lus kyi rgyan dang /_ji skad smras pa de 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi rgyan dang /_bsam pa yongs su spyod pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyan dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i 
[\[160b.2\]]phyir skye ba'i rgyan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang /_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[160b.3\]]rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/_rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[160b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gcig ste/_gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la byams pa ste 'di ni gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 
[\[160b.5\]]'dzin gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drang ba dang /_mnyen pa ste gnyis po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgyu med 
[\[160b.6\]]pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_bcos ma med pa ste gsum po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[160b.7\]]gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste bzhi po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]'di lta ste/_sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/_lnga po de dag gang zhe na/_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom ste/_sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[161a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa 
[\[161a.3\]]dang /_lha rjes su dran pa ste drug po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa ste/_dran pa 
[\[161a.4\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 
[\[161a.5\]]'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_bdun po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[161a.6\]]yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa ste/_'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang 
[\[161a.7\]]dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]te/_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs 
[\[161b.2\]]par byas te gnas so/_/de rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas 
[\[161b.3\]]so/_/de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i 
[\[161b.4\]]bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs 
[\[161b.5\]]su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/_nam 
[\[161b.6\]]mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas 
[\[161b.7\]]skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci'ang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i 
[\[162a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/_sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par gnas/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go/_/
[\[162a.3\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang /_zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /_nang du 
[\[162a.4\]]yang dag 'jog sbed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang /_sems dben pa dang /_lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang /_sems la dbang sgyur ba dang /_'phags pa'i rigs rab tu thob pa ste/_rigs 
[\[162a.5\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/_gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[162a.6\]]chos thams cad la the tshom med pa ste/_'di ni gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'gyod pa dang bral ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/_gnyis po 'di 
[\[162a.7\]]dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gti mug spong ba dang /_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang /_mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/_gsum po 'di dag 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang /_'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal 
[\[162b.2\]]dang /_lam bsgom pa'i byin gyi rlabs te/_bzhi po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_shes 
[\[162b.3\]]rab mchog gis bsam gtan pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[162b.4\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/_lnga po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i 
[\[162b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/_/'khor gsum yongs 
[\[162b.6\]]su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_brag ca lta bu'i shes pas ngag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/_/'khor gsum 
[\[162b.7\]]yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes par smras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba spong ba yongs su dag pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_bsngags pa dang /_rjes su chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku la 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas brtan pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan 
[\[163a.2\]]ma thams cad las sgrol bas blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par zhen pa med pas lhag mthong 
[\[163a.3\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[163a.4\]]'dzin pas gzungs yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan gyi phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/_drug po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran 
[\[163a.5\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang sems dben pa dang /_dbang po rnams la dbang po yongs su 
[\[163a.6\]]shes pa dang /_stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes pa ste bdun po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[163a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang /_rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang /_chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang /_grong stong dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang /_bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang /_yang 
[\[163b.2\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/_brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang 
[\[163b.3\]]phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang /_bar gyi mtha' dag pas da ltar byung ba shes pa dang /_rgyu chud mi za bas nges pa rnams shes pa dang /_rkyen phye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang /_yongs su smin par byed pas log pa nyid du ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang /_
[\[163b.4\]]chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/_dgu po 
[\[163b.5\]]'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang /_
[\[163b.6\]]rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang /_'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang /_'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang /_rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag ca lta bur shes pa 
[\[163b.7\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /_'dus byas dag 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig ste 
[\[164a.2\]]gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/_'di ni gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_kun tu 'dzin pa dang /_'dzin pa ste/_gnyis 
[\[164a.3\]]po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don la mkhas pa dang /_tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/_gsum po 'di dag go/_/
[\[164a.4\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chags pa med pa'i tshig dang /_rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa med pa'i tshig ste/_bzhi po 
[\[164a.5\]]'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang /_yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang /_mdo sde 
[\[164a.6\]]thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang /_gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa ste/_lnga po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[164a.7\]]gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /_bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshig rab tu thob pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang /_g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]tshig dang /_snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /_snod la mkhas pas phyad par chos ston pa dang /_'jig rten shes pas dus su chos ston pa ste drug po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi 
[\[164b.2\]]rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang /_shugs can gyi spobs pa dang /_myur ba'i spobs pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_'khrul pa med 
[\[164b.3\]]pa'i spobs pa dang /_shin tu nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/_bdun po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha'i skad shes pa dang /_klu'i skad shes pa 
[\[164b.4\]]dang /_gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang /_dri za'i skad shes pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang /_mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad 
[\[164b.5\]]shes pa ste/_brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor gyi nang du spa gong ba med pa dang /_smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang /_chos bshad pa'i 
[\[164b.6\]]nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang /_'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la snrel zhir bstan pa shes pa dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su 'thun pa bstan pa shes pa dang /_khengs pa dag la lag na 
[\[164b.7\]]rdo rje ston pa dang /_mngon par chags pa rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang /_yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/_dgu po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]dag ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang /_blos chos skye ba'i sgo dang /_shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la lhag ma ma lus pa dang /_yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang /_don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa 
[\[165a.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med bar brjod pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang /_dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags 
[\[165a.3\]]pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs 
[\[165a.4\]]su bcad ba 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa/_/blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste/_tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog_/shin tu rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs/_/de ni lus can kun gyi yid 
[\[165a.5\]]'od dga'/_/lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing /_de yi rnam par lhung ba kun chad pa/_/'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no/_/lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye/_/de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub/_/nan tan snying por byed 
[\[165a.6\]]dang yang dag ldan/_/'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no/_/de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te/_/shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong /_de yi mya ngan las 'das pa sgyu ma min/_/'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan/_/tshul khrims 
[\[165a.7\]]skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag_/tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med/_/de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin/_/'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/_/tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur/_/bzod pa dag cing de bzhin 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]brtson 'grus dag_/bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag_/thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin/_/g.yo ba med cing brtan la shin tu gnas/_/sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med/_/lhod pa spangs shing dgang sla gso yang sla/_/
[\[165b.2\]]'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/_/brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste/_/de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur/_/de la yid la gcags par 'gyur med de/_/'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/_/'jigs pa 
[\[165b.3\]]med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste/_/bsam pa des shing zhi la yid rab zhi/_/'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhod par gyur/_/'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/_/grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin/_/de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid/_/'dir ni 
[\[165b.4\]]rang lus mtshan gyis brgyan byed pa/_/'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/_/de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste/_/de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan/_/'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/_/khyad 
[\[165b.5\]]par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan/_/theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed/_/gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas/_/rang gi skye ba legs par brgyan par byed/_/byang chub spyod pa rtag tu brgyan byed cing /_/byang chub snying po dam pa brgyan 
[\[165b.6\]]par byed/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag brgyan byed cing /_/nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan/_/de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed/_/mkhas pa rtag tu drang dang mnyen pa yin/_/g.yo ni med cing sgyu med bcos pa med/_/gti mug 
[\[165b.7\]]'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin/_/de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel/_/bag yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug bsgom/_/byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste/_/mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed/_/rnal 'byor pa ni zhi gnas nges 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]sems sbyor/_/de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gson/_/dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog_/'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sgyur ba yin/_/chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur/_/de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med/_/de 
[\[166a.2\]]la ma rig gti mug mun pa med/_/bden pa snang ba yongs su shes pa shes/_/tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste/_/shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag_/gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa 
[\[166a.3\]]dag_/dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags/_/'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag_/dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med/_/'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/_/shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te/_/rmi lam sgyu ma tshol 
[\[166a.4\]]ba med pa'i phyir/_/bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams/_/'khor gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong /_/shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te/_/gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag ca 'dra ba'i phyir/_/lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems/_/
[\[166a.5\]]'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong /_/shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur te/_/mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang /_/dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa/_/'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong /_/shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan 
[\[166a.6\]]gyur te/_/skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang /_/de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa/_/'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong /_/shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te/_/de la ma chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang /_/mkhas dang mngon par shes
