[\[166a.7\]]pa skyed pa dang /_/'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong /_/shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de/_/shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon/_/'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing /_/sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong /_/dran 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug_/yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben/_/sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes/_/bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non/_/chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes 
[\[166b.2\]]su rtogs/_/de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro ba med/_/'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/_/de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes/_/de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te/_/chos kyi phung po ci bzhin phung po shes/_/khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs 
[\[166b.3\]]shing 'dra bar shes/_/des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes/_/rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de/_/don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes/_/tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes/_/dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 
[\[166b.4\]]'jug_/rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes/_/dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes/_/'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/_/rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes/_/yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no/_/
[\[166b.5\]]rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/_/'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do/_/'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ca ji bzhin no/_/chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes/_/de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de 
[\[166b.6\]]rab shes/_/yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g.yo chos/_/'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med/_/shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs par/_/brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed/_/de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med/_/chos rnams 
[\[166b.7\]]kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed/_/don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas/_/nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud/_/chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang /_/rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]med tshig_/thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang /_/
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed/_/nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes/_/gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton/_/de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin/_/de yi tshig ni bden 
[\[167a.2\]]pa'i rjes su 'thun/_/gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin/_/de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod/_/phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug_/de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste/_/shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags/_/rgyun chad med dang 'khrul 
[\[167a.3\]]med nges pa'i tshig_/legs par brgyus pa'i phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin/_/lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes/_/gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang /_/mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes/_/'khor lhags 
[\[167a.4\]]shes nas spa gong med pa ste/_/smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur pa'ang med/_/'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod/_/'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snrel zhi yi/_/gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes 
[\[167a.5\]]su 'thun/_/nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston/_/yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste/_/theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang rjod/_/dogs pa kun gyi the tshom gcod pa ste/_/blo yi chos rnams mngon sum 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi shes rab 
[\[167a.6\]]nam yang gzhan mi ltos/_/yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad mi shes/_/don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te/_/'di ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod/_/de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin/_/kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas 
[\[167a.7\]]shes/_/rnam par byang ba'i phan yon thug pa med/_/de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes/_/sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob/_/de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste/_/de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang /_/bskal par rgyun 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]chad med par rab brjod kyang /_/yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so//_//bam po gsum pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu snang ba 
[\[167b.2\]]gang dag gis snang bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa'i 
[\[167b.3\]]snang ba dang /_blo gros kyi snang ba dang /_rtogs pa'i snang ba dang /_chos kyi snang ba dang /_shes pa'i snang ba dang /_bden pa'i snang ba dang /_mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang /_sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang 
[\[167b.4\]]ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[167b.5\]]chud mi gzon pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa sogs pa dang /_thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang /_don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang /_yul drug gis mi 'phrogs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs 
[\[167b.6\]]par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /_de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang /_dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/_
[\[167b.7\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don gyi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]pa dang /_ye shes kyi blo gros yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi blo gros yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /_rig pa'i blo gros yin gyi 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros 
[\[168a.2\]]yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang /_rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can la rnam par 'tshe 
[\[168a.3\]]ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams 
[\[168a.4\]]cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong 
[\[168a.5\]]du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs 
[\[168a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_
[\[168a.7\]]'di lta ste/_sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_'dod pa dang /_srid pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_glo bur 
[\[168b.2\]]gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang /_chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/_
[\[168b.3\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /_rgyun 
[\[168b.4\]]du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i shes 
[\[168b.5\]]pa'i snang ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di 
[\[168b.6\]]dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu dang po 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu 
[\[168b.7\]]gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gis rang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /_bden pa bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[169a.2\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[169a.3\]]lha'i mig gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir gsal ba'i snang ba dang /_lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i snang ba dang /_sngon gyi gnas bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang /_sems can 
[\[169a.4\]]thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba dang /_zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i snang 
[\[169a.5\]]ba dang /_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 
[\[169a.6\]]'di dag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang /_sgrub pas shes rab kyi snang ba dang /_sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang /_sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i 
[\[169a.7\]]snang ba dang /_sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang /_sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang /_sgrub pas sems can gyi bsam pa'i snang ba dang /_sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par sems rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang /_sgrub pas shin tu mthar thug pa'i snang ba snang ba 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pa ni/_/sngon chad las dge bsags pa chud mi gzon/_/
[\[169b.2\]]phra bar sngo ba phun sum tshogs pa de/_/phyi phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed/_/thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed pa med/_/rnam par nges pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur/_/nye bar zhi bas yul rnams las ni sbas/_/dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams dang bral/_/dran 
[\[169b.3\]]pa rgya bo che ni shin tu bsags/_/bya ba bya ba dag ni rnam par 'byed/_/dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas ni/_/rgyal ba rang byung dag gi byin gyis rlob/_/dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa/_/de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus/_/shes rab ldan pa mun 
[\[169b.4\]]pa rnam bral te/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed/_/blo gros bzang ldan snang ba thob gyur nas/_/dogs pa dang ni the tsom rnams kyang gcod/_/dran dang ldan pa rang 'byung ye shes kyis/_/byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed/_/de ni don gyi blo gros 
[\[169b.5\]]can yin gyi/_/tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug sgra la'ang min/_/sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can/_/rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod ma yin/_/chos kyi blo gros ldan par gyur pa de/_/nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral/_/shes rab dang 
[\[169b.6\]]ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa/_/de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed/_/de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan/_/nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ma yin/_/rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi/_/de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma yin/_/sangs 
[\[169b.7\]]rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi/_/bdud kyi blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin/_/blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol gyi/_/sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min/_/chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni/_/the tshom med cing rtogs par khong du chud/_/
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]de ni dgongs te gsung la mkhas 'gyur zhing /_/sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan/_/so so yang dag rig la rtogs ldan zhing /_/de yi shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med/_/rkyen byung byed pa po dang rnam bral bar/_/rten pa'i chos rnams 
[\[170a.2\]]dag ni rab tu shes/_/de ni snrel zhi'i rgyu la mkhas gyur cing /_/spyi'u tshugs tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams ji snyed pa/_/thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud/_/'jig rten pa yi chos kyi snang ba yis/_/lha mi rnams 
[\[170a.3\]]kyi las kyi bya ba shes/_/'jig rten las ni 'das pa'i ye shes kyis/_/shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin/_/kha na ma thor bcas dang ma tho med/_/ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jug_/lam ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir/_/rtag tu 'bras 
[\[170a.4\]]bu yod par chos ston to/_/zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi/_/chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug_/de ni zag pa thams cad spong byed cing /_/lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed/_/'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la/_/de yi shes pa rtag 
[\[170a.5\]]tu rab tu 'jug_/de ni de yis dri bral rab rib med/_/skyon med thob nas spyad pa rnams kyang spyod/_/rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs la/_/de yi shes pa sgrib pa med pa 'jug_/rang bzhin gyis ni sems 'od gsal ba dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[170a.6\]]pa yi tshul yang shes/_/ji ltar mya ngan 'das par gyur pa ni/_/skye ba med cing 'byung ba med par shes/_/'di 'dra 'di ni theg pa chen po la/_/chos kyi snang ba mtha' yas gyur pa yin/_/de ni brgyad pa yi ni shes pa dang /_/rgyun du zhugs la shes pa 
[\[170a.7\]]'jug pa dang /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba yi shes pa dang /_/phyir mi 'ong la shes pa 'jug pa dang /_/de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang /_/'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag_/kun la de yi shes dang sgrub pa rnams/_/lhag ma lus pa 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]med par rab tu 'jug_/gang gis 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_/'khrugs med don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de la rab bsgoms smra ba dpa' bo rnams/_/bden pa'i snang ba dag dang ldan pa yin/_/bden pa dag ni bsgom pa byas pas na/_/skyon 
[\[170b.2\]]med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po 'thob/_/gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin bzhi pa dang /_/rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/bsgom pa gang gis su ni smra ba'i stag_/de dag bzod pa dag ni 'thob 'gyur dang /_/gang gis rgyal ba byang chub 'tshang 
[\[170b.3\]]rgya ba/_/bden pa de dag la ni snang bar 'gyur/_/lha yi mig gis su ni de yis kyang /_/gzugs kyi rnam pa dag ni thams cad mthong /_/lha yi rna ba nges par rtogs pa yis/_/phyogs bcu dag gi sgra rnams rtogs par 'gyur/_/sngon gyi gnas shes pa yi 
[\[170b.4\]]snang ba yis/_/bskal pa khrag khrig dag ni rjes su dran/_/'od gsal ba yi shes pa'i snang ba yis/_/gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la mkhas/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni shes pa'i snang ba yis/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing ni khrag khrig rnams su 'gro/_/zag 
[\[170b.5\]]pa med pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin/_/bsod nams kyi ni snang ba mtha' yas pa'i/_/mngon shes thog ma 'gro ba nye bar 'gro/_/de yi shes pa chags pa med pa yis/_/'gro ba'i dogs pa dag ni gcod par byed/_/
[\[170b.6\]]nan tan snying por byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs dang chos shes snang /_/bden pa yi ni snang ba mtha' yas te/_/mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa yin/_/sgrub pas ye shes dang ni shes rab dang /_/rgya chen blo dang spobs pa mtha' yas 
[\[170b.7\]]dang /_/yang dag lta ba dang ni lhag mthong dang /_/shin tu 'khrugs pa med pa mthar thug gyur/_/snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa brgyad/_/'di dag mthu chen gang la yod pa ni/_/re zhig byang chub thob par ma gyur kyang /_/de ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu drug gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/
[\[171a.2\]]bcu drug gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa/_lta ba sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste/_lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems 
[\[171a.3\]]can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur nas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/_bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/_mi sdug pa la 
[\[171a.4\]]sdug par 'du shes pa dag ste/_phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa/_dngos 
[\[171a.5\]]po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa dag ste/_ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sgrib pa lngas bsgribs te 'dod pa'i 
[\[171a.6\]]zug rngus zug pa/_khong khro ba mang ba/_rmugs pa dang gnyid la chags pa/_dam pa ma yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/_zab mo'i chos la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/_sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can 
[\[171a.7\]]rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di ni skye mched drug gis chags pas chags te/_mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa yin/_rna bas sgra thos/_snas dri snams/_
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]lces ro myangs/_lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg_/yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dag yin te/_skye mched drug gis chags pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams 
[\[171b.2\]]la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]snyam pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[171b.3\]]dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas/_chung ngu dag pas bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/_mtshungs pa dag pas ni bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa dang /_ches che ba dag pas kyang bdag cag ches 
[\[171b.4\]]che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/_gzugs la bdag tu khas len pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/_ma thob par bdag la thob pa snyam du shes pa/_bdag cag ni 'phags pa'o snyam du bdag la sems pa/_log pa'i lta ba 
[\[171b.5\]]la yang dag pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/_nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa/_'phags 
[\[171b.6\]]pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/_lam ngan pa spang zhing 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sred pa'i khol po chung ma dang /_
[\[171b.7\]]bu pho dang /_bu mo la yongs su zhen pas sbags pa/_rang dbang med pas bdag la mi dpogs pa dag ste/_rang dbang yod cing bdag la dpogs par bya ba dang /_gar dga' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni phan tshun mi 'phrod pa/_khro ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gnod sems mang ba dag ste/_khro ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gnod sems spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag 
[\[172a.2\]]la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/_sdig pa'i las byed pa dag ste/_dge ba'i 
[\[172a.3\]]bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni brkam pa/_chags pas 
[\[172a.4\]]zil gyis non pa/_chog mi shes shing 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi gnas pa dang bral ba dag ste/_chags pa spangs pa dang /_'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje 
[\[172a.5\]]chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med par lta zhing rtag pa dang chad pa la gnas pa dag ste/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo dang /_las dang /_bya ba la gzud pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du 
[\[172a.6\]]sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag la mngon par zhen pa dag ste/_
[\[172a.7\]]'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba la 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]mngon par dga' ba/_phung po lnga'i gshed mas yongs su zin pa dag ste/_khams gsum thams cad las dbyung ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 
[\[172b.2\]]bdud kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/_g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems la gnas pa dag ste/_bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad las rnam par dgrol ba dang /_g.yo dang rlom sems spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems 
[\[172b.3\]]can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo bcad cing /_ngan 'gro'i sgo phye ba dag ste/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba dang /_ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par 
[\[172b.4\]]bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ma 
[\[172b.5\]]'dres pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_de dag la brtson na byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can dag gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang /_bdag shes rab kyis 
[\[172b.6\]]sad pa mthong nas shes rab kyis sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i las ma 'dres pa dang po'o/_/sems can dag chung ngu la mos pa dang /_bdag rgya chen po la mos par mthong nas theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par 
[\[172b.7\]]'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang /_bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams chos 'dod pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang /_bdag 'tsho ba yongs su dag par mthong 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]nas sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongs su dag par sbyor ba dang /_sems can dag lta bar gyur par bying ba dang /_bdag yang dag pa'i lta bar zhugs par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems 
[\[173a.2\]]can dag ma rig par gyur cing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bsags par mthong zhing bdag rig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par rig nas sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu 
[\[173a.3\]]'god pa dang /_sems can dag log pa'i chos la gnas pa dang /_bdag yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sems can dag ser sna can du gyur te kun tu 'dzin pa'i 
[\[173a.4\]]sems dang ldan pa dang /_bdag bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar mthong nas sems can rnams bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la sbyor ba dang /_sems can dag ngang tshul ngan pa can du gyur te/_sdom pa la mi gnas pa dang /_bdag tshul 
[\[173a.5\]]khrims yongs su dag par gnas nas/_sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag gnod sems mang zhing khro ba shas che ba dang /_bdag bzod pa'i stobs dang /_byams pa la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams 
[\[173a.6\]]bzod pa'i stobs dang /_byams pa la gnas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can dag le lo can du gyur te/_brtson 'grus chung ba dang /_bdag le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor 
[\[173a.7\]]ba dang /_sems can dag sems g.yengs shing dran pa nyams pa dang /_bdag mnyam par bzhag ste/_bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas sems can rnams sems mi g.yeng ba dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin la rab tu 'god pa dang /_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]sems can dag shes rab 'chal par gyur te/_dman zhing gti mug dang ldan pa dang /_bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing gti mug dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams shes rab chen po dang /_gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_
[\[173b.2\]]sems can dag rigs pa ma yin par lhung zhing ya nga ba'i byed pa brtsams pa dang /_bdag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yang dag pa'i las brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams thabs mkhas pa dang /_yang dag pa'i las rtsom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[173b.3\]]'jug pa dang /_sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul par gyur pa dang /_bdag nyon mongs pa thams cad las log par mthong nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[173b.4\]]spong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings shing dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa dang /_bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang ldan zhing dmigs pas bcings pa las yongs su grol bar 
[\[173b.5\]]mthong nas sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang dmigs pa dang bral ba la sbyor ba dang /_sems can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te byang ba ma yin pa dang /_bdag dul zhing sbas te byang bar mthong nas sems can rnams dul ba dang /_sbas 
[\[173b.6\]]pa dang /_byang ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi shes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang /_bdag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung bar gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams byas pa gzo ba 
[\[173b.7\]]dang /_byas pa shes pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag chu bor lhung zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang /_bdag chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'das par mthong nas sems can rnams chu bo 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba la sbyor ba dang /_sems can dag bka' blo mi bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /_bdag bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin par mthong nas sems can rnams bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin 
[\[174a.2\]]pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can dag phongs pa mang zhing dam pa ma yin pa la yongs su zhen pa dang /_bdag ma phongs pa mang zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la 
[\[174a.3\]]gnas par sbyor ba dang /_sems can dag dbul zhing 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba dang /_bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag rtag 
[\[174a.4\]]tu na zhing khams rnam pa bzhi po'i sbrul gdug pas zin pa dang /_bdag nad med cing bde la 'gyur ba med par mthong nas sems can rnams nad thams cad spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can dag mi shes pa'i mun pas kun tu gtibs 
[\[174a.5\]]shing ye shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang /_bdag ye shes kyi snang ba thob par mthong nas sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag khams gsum la chags pas chags shing rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor 
[\[174a.6\]]lo'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong zhing bdag khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas par shes nas sems can rnams khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam du zhugs shing 
[\[174a.7\]]g.yas phyogs kyi lam dang bral ba dang /_bdag g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams g.yas phyogs kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag lus dang srog la chags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang /_bdag lus dang 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]srog la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par mthong nas sems can rnams lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_nyes pa mthong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang bral ba dang /_bdag dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 
[\[174b.2\]]rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dzud pa dang /_sems can rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang /_bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams 
[\[174b.3\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang ring du gnas shing /_rjes su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang /_bdag rjes su dran pa drug ma btang ba mthong nas sems can rnams rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa la rab tu 'god 
[\[174b.4\]]pa dang /_sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /_bdag las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang 
[\[174b.5\]]ldan zhing dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang /_bdag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing /_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[174b.6\]]pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i las sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul yin te/_de dag la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[174b.7\]]bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni tshad med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par byang chub sems dpas rnam par byang ba'i sgo yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba yang de snyed do/_/rigs kyi bu gal te gang dag gang 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi las gang yin pa de sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub 
[\[175a.2\]]sems dpa'i las kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[175a.3\]]sangs rgyas dag ni rang gi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang /_nyan 
[\[175a.4\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa bas 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las nyid mchog ces brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi las ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las 
[\[175a.5\]]ni nyi tshe ba dang ldan pa yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i las ni phyin ci log med cing tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non to/_/
[\[175a.6\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[175a.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i las legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[175b.2\]]pa'i thugs rje chen po ni ci tsam/_rnam pa ni gang lags/_rtags ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_gnas ni gang lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'phrin las ni ji ltar mdzad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las ni ci tsam/_
[\[175b.3\]]rnam pa ni gang lags/_rtags ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_gnas ni gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rnams mngon sum du gyur pas mngon sum du bdag 
[\[175b.4\]]cag la legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig 
[\[175b.5\]]dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las la 'jug pa tsam cung zad cig khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni skye ba yang med/_'jug pa 
[\[175b.6\]]yang med do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni bskal pa grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pas yang dag par bskyed pa ste/_'jug pa yang med/_ldog pa yang 
[\[175b.7\]]med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni ma btang ba/_sems can thams cad la gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po de ni ci tsam du las yongs su thob par bya bar sla ba ma yin pa de tsam du tshad med/_de tsam du 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de tsam du mi zad cing /_de tsam du ring du song ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/byang chub ci 'dra ba thugs rje chen 
[\[176a.2\]]po yang de 'dra'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/_de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang /_gnas med par byang chub thob bo/_/de la rtsa ba ni gang /_gnas ni gang zhe na/_'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni 
[\[176a.3\]]gnas so/_/de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par yongs su shes te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang gnas med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag 
[\[176a.4\]]gis ni rtsa ba med pa dang /_gnas med pa'i chos 'di dag khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o/_/de la zhi ba ni gang /_nye 
[\[176a.5\]]bar zhi ba ni gang zhe na/_nang ni zhi ba'o/_/phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/_de ni de'i rang bzhin no/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/_de ni de'i rang bzhin no/_/mig stong par 
[\[176a.6\]]yongs su shes nas gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/_de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/rna ba stong par yongs su shes nas sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/_de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/sna stong par yongs su shes nas dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/_de'i phyir 
[\[176a.7\]]nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/lce stong par yongs su shes nas ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/_de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/lus stong par yongs su shes nas reg bya rnams la mi rgyug ste/_de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/yid stong par yongs su shes nas chos 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rnams la mi rgyug ste/_de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag gis ni zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba khong du ma chud pas de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu sems rang 
[\[176b.2\]]bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/_/ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/_rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_nam mkha'i rang bzhin/_nam mkha' dang mnyam par 
[\[176b.3\]]gzhol ba/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/_rang bzhin de ni shin tu 'od gsal ba nyid do/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs te/_rang bzhin 'od gsal 
[\[176b.4\]]ba de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'o/_/de la blang ba med pa ni gang /_dor ba med pa ni gang zhe na/_blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[176b.5\]]chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o/_/dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dor ba'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med par chu bor 'jug pa na/_ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol med pa dang /_pha rol med pa ma yin par yang dag 
[\[176b.6\]]par rjes su mthong ba de ltar rgal to/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad pha rol med pa dang /_pha rol dang bral bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis ni blang ba 
[\[176b.7\]]med pa dang /_dor ba med pa 'di khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa'o/_/de la mtshan ma med 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]pa ni gang /_dmigs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med 
[\[177a.2\]]pa'o/_/sgra mnyan du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/dri bsnam du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/ro myang du med pa ni 
[\[177a.3\]]dmigs pa med pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/reg bya reg par byar med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni 
[\[177a.4\]]dmigs pa med pa'o/_/de ltar na mtshan ma med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/_gang khams gsum pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/de 
[\[177a.5\]]ltar na gang spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/_'phags pa'i spyod yul 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/
[\[177a.6\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o/_/de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/_gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa 
[\[177a.7\]]la rnam par shes pa mi rgyug pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa'o/_/de sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas 'das pa la rtog par mi byed/_ma 'ongs pa la mi sems/_da ltar byung ba spros par mi byed do/_/de ltar 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus med cing 
[\[177b.2\]]'dus ma byas pa'o/_/de la lus med pa ni gang mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba 
[\[177b.3\]]med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_gnas med pa ste/_de ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral ba'i 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o/_/'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin 
[\[177b.4\]]pa de ni med pa'o/_/med pa gang yin pa de la ni gnyis med do/_/lus med pa dang 'dus ma byas 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/
[\[177b.5\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni dbyer med pa dang gnas so/_/de la gnas ni gang /_dbyer med pa ni gang zhe na/_de bzhin nyid ni gnas so/_/gnas med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so/_/tha dad pa ma yin pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/yang 
[\[177b.6\]]dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so/_/g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/stong pa nyid ni gnas so/_/dmigs su med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so/_/rnam par rtog pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa ni gnas so/_/smon lam 
[\[177b.7\]]'debs pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/sems can med pa nyid ni gnas so/_/sems can ngo bo nyid med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/nam mkha' ni gnas so/_/dmigs su med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/skye ba med pa ni gnas so/_/'gog pa med pa ni dbyer 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]med pa'o/_/'dus ma byas ni gnas so/_/rgyu ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/byang chub ni gnas so/_/nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so/_/mngon par grub pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/_/de ltar dbyer med pa 
[\[178a.2\]]dang /_gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/_sems kyis kyang 
[\[178a.3\]]ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus ni bems po'o/_/sems ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/gang lus dang sems 'di lta bur khong du chud pa de ni tha snyad btags nas byang chub ces bya'i/_byang chub ni lus sam/_sems sam/_chos sam/_chos ma yin pa'am/_yang 
[\[178a.4\]]dag pa'am/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/_bden pa'am/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/byang chub ni gang gis tshig tu tha snyad gdags par 'gyur ba'i dbyibs 
[\[178a.5\]]ci yang med de/_ji ltar nam mkha' dbyibs med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang dbyibs med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su btsal na chos thams cad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/_chos la 
[\[178a.6\]]tshig med do/_/tshig la yang chos med do/_/chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 
[\[178a.7\]]gzung du med pa dang /_gzhi med pa'o/_/de la gzung du med pa ni gang /_gzhi med pa ni gang zhe na/_mig yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/_/gzugs dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/_/rna ba yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/_/sgra 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/_/sna yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/_/dri dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/_/lce yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/_/ro dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/_/lus yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med 
[\[178b.2\]]pa'o/_/reg bya dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/_/yid yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/_/chos dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub gzung du med pa dang /_gzhi med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[178b.3\]]rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mig gzung du med/_gzugs gzhi ma yin/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/_/rna ba gzung du med/_sgra gzhi ma yin/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/_/sna gzung du med/_dri gzhi ma yin/_
[\[178b.4\]]rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/_/lce gzung du med/_ro gzhi ma yin/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/_/lus gzung du med/_reg bya gzhi ma yin/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/_/yid gzung du med/_chos gzhi ma yin/_rnam par shes pa 
[\[178b.5\]]gnas pa med do/_/de rnam par shes pa gnas pa med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas rnams rab tu shes so/_/sems can dag gi sems kyi gnas rnams gang zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni bzhi po 'di dag go/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[178b.6\]]ste/_gzugs sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dag sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/_sems kyi gnas de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnas med par mkhyen to/_/gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems 
[\[178b.7\]]can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ngo /_/stong pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du chos de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin no/_/de ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[179a.2\]]stong pa nyid dang byang chub ces bya ba tshul gcig par shes pa ste/_de la gnyis gang gis stong pa nyid dang /_byang chub gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa/_gnyis su dbyer med pa/_mtshan nyid 
[\[179a.3\]]med pa/_ming med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_rab tu rgyu ba med pa/_kun tu 'byung ba med pa'o/_/gang stong pa zhes bya ba de ni mngon par zhen pa med cing 'dzin pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'di la don dam par gang stong pa zhes bya ba'i chos gang 
[\[179a.4\]]yang dmigs su med kyang stong pa zhes kyang brjod do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la nam mkha' zhes rjod kyang nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du stong pa la stong pa zhes rjod kyang stong pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_ming med pa la ming du tha 
[\[179a.5\]]snyad 'dogs pa de ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'o/_/ming de yang yul na gnas pa ma yin/_phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar ming yul na gnas pa ma yin/_phyogs na gnas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du ming gang gis chos gang brjod pa'i chos de yang 
[\[179a.6\]]yul na gnas pa ma yin/_phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag thams cad mkhyen te/_gzod ma nas ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral 
[\[179a.7\]]ba dang /_yi ge med pa dang /_sgra med par shes so/_/ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du rnam par grol te/_bcings pa yang med/_grol ba yang med do/_/mnyam pa nyid 'di yang byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/_nam mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang ma yin/_mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no/_/byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/_mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no/_/
[\[179b.2\]]chos gang la yang dag par yongs su grub pa med pa de mnyam pa'am mi mnyam par brjod pa ma yin no/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa'ang ma yin/_mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_ji ltar chos [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam 
[\[179b.3\]]yang mnyam par yang mi byed/_mi mnyam par yang mi byed pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/chos 'di dag ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen to/_/yang dag pa'i ye shes kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ni rtsa ba 
[\[179b.4\]]med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa ste/_de dag ni ma byung ba las 'byung ba/_byung nas kyang 'bral ba'o/_/de dag ni bdag po med par 'byung ba/_bdag po med par 'bral ba'o/_/de ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la brten nas 'jug kyang 'di la 'jug pa gang yang 
[\[179b.5\]]med de/_lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to zhes kyang brjod do/_/lam chad pa de yang sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/
[\[179b.6\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so/_/de la ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas gang zhe na/_byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/_de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/byang chub ji lta bar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[179b.7\]]par shes pa yang de bzhin te/_de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/byang chub ji lta bar/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/_de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/byang chub ji lta bar mig gi khams 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/_de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/byang chub ji lta bar rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_
[\[180a.2\]]dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos 
[\[180a.3\]]kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/_de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/chos su btags pa ni 'di dag tu zad de/_'di ltar phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched du btags pa'o/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon 
[\[180a.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/phyin ci ma log par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de dag ni sngon gyi ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin te/_sngon gyi mthar yang ma skyes/_phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/_bar du yang dben pa dag go/_/de ltar na 
[\[180a.5\]]'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no/_/gcig ji lta bar thams cad kyang de bzhin/_thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang de bzhin te/_ji lta ba bzhin la ni gcig pa'am mang bar mi dmigs so/_/ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas 'di 'ang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong 
[\[180a.6\]]du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni rnam pa la 'jug pas rnam pa med pa la zhugs pa'o/_/de la rnam pa ni gang /_rnam pa med pa ni gang zhe na/_rnam 
[\[180a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rtsom pa'o/_/rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/_/rnam pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas so/_/rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]rnam pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams la sems pa dang /_'jal ba dang /_bgrang ba dang /_so sor rtog pa'o/_/rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni 'jal ba las shin tu 'das pa'o/_/'jal ba las shin tu 'das pa gang zhe na/_gang la rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o/_/
[\[180b.2\]]rnam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o/_/rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas la mngon sum du byed pa'o/_/rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du 
[\[180b.3\]]sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa dang /_nye bar len pa med pa'o/_/de la zag pa med pa ni gang /_nye bar len pa med pa ni gang zhe na/_zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa bzhi dang 
[\[180b.4\]]bral ba'i phyir te/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang /_srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang /_lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir te/_
[\[180b.5\]]'di ltar 'dod pa'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang /_lta ba'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang /_bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/de la nye bar len pa bzhi po 'di 
[\[180b.6\]]dag thams cad kyang ma rig pas mun par byas shing sred pas bsnyen te/_bdag go snyam du mngon par zhen pas nye bar len pa dag go/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su shes nas/_bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par 
[\[180b.7\]]dag par rtogs so/_/bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/gnyis su med pa'i don gang yin pa de skye ba med do/_/skye ba dang 'gag pa med pas sems dang /_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]yid dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams mi 'jug go/_/gang la sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa de la yongs su rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med do/_/der tshul bzhin 
[\[181a.2\]]yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo /_/gang ma rig pa kun nas mi ldang ba de srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ngo /_/gang srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de mi skye ba'o/_/gang mi skye ba de nges par gyur pa'o/_/gang 
[\[181a.3\]]nges par gyur pa de nges pa'i don to/_/nges pa'i don gang yin pa de don dam pa'o/_/don dam pa gang yin pa de gang zag med pa'i don to/_/gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i don to/_/brjod du med pa'i don gang yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[181a.4\]]ba'i don to/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don gang yin pa de chos kyi don to/_/chos kyi don gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid kyi don to/_/de bzhin nyid kyi don gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to/_/des na sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong 
[\[181a.5\]]ngo /_/sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ste/_ji ltar de bzhin nyid kyis yongs su btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo /_/de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan ma dang dmigs pa'o/_/des gang gi tshe sems 
[\[181a.6\]]med pa dang dmigs pa med par mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa mthong ngo /_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/zag pa med pa dang /_nye bar len pa med pa 'di yang sems can rnams kyis 
[\[181a.7\]]khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/de la dag pa ni gang /_dri ma med pa ni gang /_
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]nyon mongs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o/_/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/'byung ba med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/
[\[181b.2\]]rang bzhin ni dag pa'o/_/yongs su dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o/_/ma spros pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings ni dri 
[\[181b.3\]]ma med pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/skabs 'byed pa ni dag pa'o/_/nam mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o/_/nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/nang yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/_/phyi rol du mi rgyu ba ni dri ma med pa'o/_/nang dang phyi mi dmigs 
[\[181b.4\]]pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/_/khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dri ma med pa'o/_/skye mched 'dor ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/'das pa la zad par shes pa ni dag pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa la mi skye bar shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/da ltar byung 
[\[181b.5\]]ba la chos kyi dbyings gnas par shes pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/de ltar na dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste/_zhi ba'i gnas kyi gnas gcig tu yang dag par 'du'o/_/zhi ba gang yin pa de rab tu zhi ba'o/_/rab tu zhi ba gang yin pa 
[\[181b.6\]]de nye bar zhi ba'o/_/nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de nye bar zhi bar byed pas mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de nye bar zhi ba'o/_/nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de blo gros zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/_/byang 
[\[181b.7\]]chub ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/chos rnams ji lta bar sems can rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/sems can rnams ji lta bar zhing rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/zhing rnams ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no/_/des na chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/_mthar phyin cing mur thug pa'i phyir gnyen po med pa'o/_/gnyen po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas dag pa/_gzod ma nas dri ma med pa/_gzod ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i 
[\[182a.2\]]tshul dang 'thun par chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_ma dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa ma yin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs nas sems can thams cad la rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i thugs rje chen 
[\[182a.3\]]po 'jug go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa la gzhes te/_gsol ba ma btab par chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ro/_/de nas tshangs pa gtsug phud can tshangs pa brgya stong phrag brgyad kyis yongs su bskor te/_mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu tshangs 
[\[182a.4\]]pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas chos bshad du 
[\[182a.5\]]gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab bo/_/de'i tshe tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsol pa/_khyod kyi chos ni zhi zhing rab zhi la/_/dag cing rnam dag dri med 'od gsal te/_/brjod med sgra med yi ge med 
[\[182a.6\]]'phags par/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni thugs su chud/_/yun ring gnyid log gti mug rgyags pas bsgribs/_/nor ba'i sems can sad par mdzad don du/_/de slad khyod kyis bskal pa bye bar ni/_/brtul zhugs dka' thub shin tu dka' ba spyad/_/gang dag sngon 
[\[182a.7\]]gyi rgyal ba'i rgyus lhags pa/_/de dag chos mchog 'di ni rtogs 'gyur te/_/'di na sems can dge bsam mang mchis kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos rab 'khor lo bskor/_/khyod kyis bdud 'khor shin tu tshar bcad de/_/khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i sgo ni rab tu phye/_/
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]ded dpon chen po lam log 'khyams pa yi/_/sems can dag ni 'phags pa'i lam du khrid/_/khyod kyi sangs rgyas thugs rje bla na med/_/'gro la phan par bsam gyis mi khyab 'jug_/ston pa khyod la bdag ni gsol 'debs kyis/_/chos mchog 'khor lo 
[\[182b.2\]]rab tu bskor du gsol/_/ji ltar rgyal ba 'khor ba 'jig gis bskor/_/ji ltar gser thub rgyal bas bskor ba dang /_/bde gshegs 'od srung gis kyang bskor ba ltar/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/ji ltar sprin gyi chu yis tshim bgyis te/_/
[\[182b.3\]]de yis lo thog sman rnams bskyed pa ltar/_/thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten khyab mdzad de/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis chos char phob/_/rnam par 'dren mchog gang zhig skyes ma thag_/'gro ba thar bar mdzad slad sgra phyung ba/_/deng dus deng lags lha mi skom 
[\[182b.4\]]pa rnams/_/chos chen chu yis skom pa bsal du gsol/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas nyid kyis thugs rje chen po ma btang bas grong khyer bA rA Na sI drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su dge 
[\[182b.5\]]sbyong dang /_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor te/_der mi rtag pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas so/_/kauN+Di 
[\[182b.6\]]n+yas kyang thog mar chos kun du shes so/_/de nas de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/brjod du med cing zab pa ste/_/yi ge med cing nges pa'i don/_/kauN+Di n+yas ni 'di shes pas/_/nga yi 'bad pa don med min/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 
[\[182b.7\]]bas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag btul bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos rnam par rol par rig nas/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po rnam pa bcu drug po 'di ni lhun gyis grub par rtag tu 'jug pa ste yang gtang bar bya ba ma yin no/_/thugs rje chen po de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can re re'i ched du yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 
[\[183a.2\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su gnas par spro ste/_gal te sems can de dag 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'dul bar 'gyur ba lta na de bzhin gshegs pa yang yongs su mi skyo zhing /_thugs rje chen po de yang yongs su mi mnyam mo/_/de ltar sems can 
[\[183a.3\]]rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jug go/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying rje ni pags pa'i rnam pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje ni sha'i rnam pa lta bu'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[183a.4\]]'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni rus pa dang rkang gi rnam pa lta bu'o/_/nyan thos rnams kyi snying rje ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje ni byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[183a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni byang chub tu lung ston par byed pa'o/_/nyan thos rnams kyi snying rje ni byams pa la ltos pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje ni sems can yongs su smin pa la ltos pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs 
[\[183a.6\]]rje chen po ni shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba la ltos pa'o/_/nyan thos rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni rtsom pas yongs su skyo ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje ni rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen 
[\[183a.7\]]po ni rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni mchog yin te/_gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i ched du bskal pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]ngam/_bskal pa brgya phrag stong du gnas kyang de srid shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa 
[\[183b.2\]]bas kyang ches grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dri mchog gi bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dri ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan khyim zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[183b.3\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bcu drug thub 
[\[183b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de'i nyan thos kyi 'dus pa ni nyan thos brgyad cu rtsa bzhi phrag bcu drug go/_/bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i khung bu gcig nas dri'i ngad byung ba gang yin pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dri zhim 
[\[183b.5\]]po'i drir byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na dri nga ba 'byung ba med do/_/yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_ri dang /_gzugs snang ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri des yongs su bsgos par gyur te/_des na 'jig rten gyi khams de dri ldan zhes 
[\[183b.6\]]bya'o/_/sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri des lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med par gyur to/_/sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba 
[\[183b.7\]]de dag kyang /_dri de bsnams pas bsam gtan bzhi dag bskyed par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu cig char byung bar gyur te/_thams cad kyang 'di ltar tsan dan khyim zhes bya bar ming 'thun par gyur to/_/des na bskal pa de dri mchog 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]ces bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe sems can sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba gang zhig ngas gdul bar bya zhes sems can gyi khams la rnam par 
[\[184a.2\]]gzigs na/_des lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i nang na sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa/_sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba gcig cig der bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 
[\[184a.3\]]gnas nas/_de nas shi 'phos te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye zhing /_gal te 'dod pa rnams la ma rtses par theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa thos pa lta na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[184a.4\]]byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pa de thabs mkhas pas thugs rje chen po mngon du mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus 
[\[184a.5\]]la bab kyis deng yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rje chen po la lta bas yongs su skyo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to/_/de yongs su mya 
[\[184a.6\]]ngan las 'das nas sku gdung ni rgyas par gyur te/_de'i dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag brgyad du gnas par gyur to/_/de'i dam pa'i chos gnas pa yang skye bo mang pos thob par gyur te/_de'i dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa gang yang med par gyur to/_/bcom 
[\[184a.7\]]ldan 'das de ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sku mi snang bar gnas par gyur to/_/de ltar bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das nas sems can de 'du shes med 'du shes med min 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/_mi'i 'jig rten du tshong dpon zhig gi rigs su skyes par gyur to/_/khye'u de gang gi tshe lo brgyad lon par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pa de bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'das nas ting 
[\[184b.2\]]nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_khye'u de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs kyis bzhugs nas khye'u de ma gtogs par gzhan gang gis kyang de ma mthong ste/_des ci nas kyang khye'u de sems thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[184b.3\]]de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar theg pa chen po 'di las brtsams te khye'u de la chos bstan to/_/'dod pa'i nyes pa'i gtam yang yang dag par bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das des de lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum 
[\[184b.4\]]tshogs par rig nas lha'i bu dag khye'u 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan 
[\[184b.5\]]to/_/de'i lung bstan pa de ni khye'u de ma gtogs par mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma thos so/_/lha'i bu snod du gyur pa stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis de'i lung bstan pa de thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur te/_'di skad du/_gang 
[\[184b.6\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rin chen mchog de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub brnyes par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog shig ces smon lam yang btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das des de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir de 
[\[184b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog de khyod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das tsan dan khyim de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan nas de'i 'og tu shin tu 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/de'i sku gdung ni lha rnams kyis mchod par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gang na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa med pa de lta bu'i 
[\[185a.2\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa de ltar gang dag sangs rgyas rnams la yon 'bul ba de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de/_
[\[185a.3\]]rgyu chud mi za ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i sum cha snyed kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i 
[\[185a.4\]]klung gi bye ma'i phyed snyed kyis ni rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i snyed kyis ni snying rje chen po rnam pa bcu drug thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob 
[\[185a.5\]]par gyur to/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_lha dang mi'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[185a.6\]]mchod do//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i las ni sum 
[\[185a.7\]]cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag go/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes bla na med pas gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu de la gnas ni gang /_gnas ma yin pa ni gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa 
[\[185b.2\]]dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod pa ste/_gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa 
[\[185b.3\]]dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang ser snas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba dang /_gnod sems 
[\[185b.4\]]kyis mdzes par 'gyur ba dang /_le los mngon par rtogs pa 'thob pa dang /_/sems rnam par g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa dang /_gang 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go 
[\[185b.5\]]skabs med de de ni gnas ma yin no/_/'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod pa ste/_gang sbyin pas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa dang /_tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba dang /_bzod pas mdzes par 'gyur ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyis mngon par rtogs pa 
[\[185b.6\]]'thob pa dang /_bsam gtan gyis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa dang /_gang shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par 'joms pa 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang mtshams med pa 
[\[185b.7\]]byed pa sems gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i sems gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang dmigs pa can gyis rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'thob 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/gang stong pa nyid la mos pas bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang 'gyod pa la rab tu gnas pas sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ba 'di ni 
[\[186a.2\]]gnas med do/_/gang kun nas ldang ba med pa'i sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang bud med kyi lus de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/_brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[186a.3\]]sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/_gang bud med kyi lus brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/_brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di ni gnas 
[\[186a.4\]]yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi mnyam pas rgyal srid byed pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang mnyam pas byed pa 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi 
[\[186a.5\]]log par ltung bar 'gro ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/bde 'gror 'gro ba ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang srog gcod pa'i skye dgu gang zag srog gcod pa'i rgyus tshe ring bar 'gyur ba nas/_log par lta ba dag log par lta ba can 
[\[186a.6\]]log pa'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'phags pa'i lam 'thob par 'gyur ba'i bar 'di ni gnas med do/_/'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/_gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i rgyus tshe ring bar 'gyur ba nas/_yang dag par lta ba 'phags pa'i lam 'thob par 
[\[186a.7\]]'gyur ba'i bar 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang brgyad pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang 'bras bu thob nas ldang ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang rgyun du 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]zhugs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par 'grub pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang re ltar thogs kyang srid pa bdun du 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba srid pa gnyis pa mngon par 'grub pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang 
[\[186b.2\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par byed pa 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ong ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[186b.3\]]'da' ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang dgra bcom pa nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang dgra bcom pa nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas 
[\[186b.4\]]ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang 'phags pa'i gang zag ston pa gzhan gyi lung nod pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang lha gzhan med pa 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[186b.5\]]phyir ldog par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas par ldang 
[\[186b.6\]]ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ldang ba 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba snang ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa bag 
[\[186b.7\]]chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom pa 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa 'di ni 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin zhing go 
[\[187a.2\]]skabs med de/_gang sangs rgyas kyi mthu ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyi rgyu ba shes pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang mi shes pa 'di ni gnas yin no/_/gnas ma yin te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa dmigs 
[\[187a.3\]]pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa 'di ni gnas yin no/_/'di ni gnas ma yin te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la log pa'i tshig 'byung ba 'di ni gnas ma yin no/_/gang bden pa'i tshig 'byung ba 'di ni gnas yin no/_/rigs 
[\[187a.4\]]kyi bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa dmigs pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa 'di ni gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar gang de bzhin 
[\[187a.5\]]gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin par mkhyen pa'i stobs de yi ge rnams kyis tshad bstan du med de yang dag pa'o/_/de kho na'o/_/gzhan ma yin pa nyid do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/sa kun 'grum par 'gyur yang srid/_/nam mkha' g.yo bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/
[\[187a.6\]]sangs rgyas gnas min bshad pa ni/_/gnas su 'gyur ba mi srid do/_/skyes bus kha dog lnga can du/_/nam mkha' gzugs su byed kyang srid/_/sangs rgyas gnas min bshad pa ni/_/gnas su 'gyur ba mi srid do/_/tha ma dang ni 'bring dang mchog_/gang dag sangs 
[\[187a.7\]]rgyas gnas bshad pa/_/de kun de bzhin bshad pa ste/_/gzhan du 'gyur ba yod ma yin/_/tha ma dang ni 'bring dang mchog_/gang dag gnas min bshad pa yang /_/de kun de bzhin bshad pa ste/_/gzhan du 'gyur ba yod ma yin/_/gnas dang gnas min rab shes 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]pa/_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/des ni phyad par yang dag dang /_/chos kyang srog chags rnams la bshad/_/dge sbyong dang ni bram ze gzhan/_/gang du thams cad rgyug byed cing /_/gnas dang gnas min mi shes pa/_/sangs rgyas la ni de med do/_/
[\[187b.2\]]gnas gang dang ni ldan pas na/_/sems can thar byed dpung 'gyur ba/_/yon tan kun ldan sangs rgyas kyis/_/de ni yang dag rab tu bshad/_/sems can gang dag snod min gang /_/de la sangs rgyas btang snyoms mdzad/_/gang gi dus na 'grol 'gyur ba/_/de 
[\[187b.3\]]yi dus la rab tu gzhes/_/gang gis sems can thar byed pa/_/kha na ma tho med pa'i las/_/sangs rgyas blo mchog ldan pa yi/_/'phrin las dang po 'di yin no/_/gnas dang gnas min bshad pa ni/_/dpag tu med cing grangs med de/_/drang srong chen po'i
