[\[228b.5\]]gsum las 'phags 'gyur zhing /_/ri rab bzhin du yul rnams kyis ni mi bskyod 'gyur/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni srid kun rnam par spangs pa'i spyad spyod de/_/mu stegs can gyi tshogs kun 'joms pa sgrog pa na/_/seng ge bzhin 
[\[228b.6\]]du 'khor du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/sa ltar dge ba rnams ni rnam par skyed par 'gyur/_/chu ltar dri ma rnams ni rab tu ded par 'gyur/_/me ltar rlom sems med cing rnam rtog med par 'gyur/_/rlung ltar yul rnams la ni chags pa med par 'gyur/_/gang gis 
[\[228b.7\]]gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni smra tshe shes dang dbang po 'khrug pa med/_/de ni sman pa bzhin du 'gro ba thar byed 'gyur/_/phan par 'dod pas chos kyi bkru sman sbyin par byed/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rnams de la lta bas mi ngoms te/_/zla ba bzhin du dge ba dag ni rnam sbyong 'gyur/_/sems snyoms gzi brjid chen po 'od zer mnyam par gtong /_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni 'gro ba'i srid pa ma lus skems par byed/_/nyi ma 
[\[229a.2\]]bzhin du 'od byed mun pa sel bar 'gyur/_/gnyid log sems can srid pa gsum las sad par byed/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni kun la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam yang 'dzin pa med/_/de ni rgyal po bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug che/_/rnam thos bu bzhin 
[\[229a.3\]]nor ldan chos rnams ston par byed/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po dran ldan klu dang 'drar 'gyur te/_/sprin gyi bya ba byed cing mkha' las glog phyung nas/_/zhi bar bya phyir de ni chos kyi char pa 'bebs/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams 
[\[229a.4\]]rab tu thob gyur pa/_/'khor rnams thams cad khyu mchog gyur pa'i gdong du blta/_/brgya byin bzhin du dman pa ma yin gzugs mchog ldan/_/blo chen 'gro ba rnams la chos dang don rnams sems/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni tshangs pa'i 
[\[229a.5\]]gnas pa yongs dag bsam gtan byed/_/tshangs pa bzhin du mnyam bzhag snying rje ldan par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di kun zil gyis mnan nas bsam gtan byed/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang la mchod pa byed/_/de 
[\[229a.6\]]ni rtag tu mngon shes lnga las nyams mi 'gyur/_/zhing brgya bsam gyis mi khyab dag tu mkha' nas 'gro/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas yon tan 'thob/_/phyogs na rgyal ba rnams ni de yi bsngags brjod de/_/bu 
[\[229a.7\]]gcig pa zhig yon tan ldan pa bzhin du bstod/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de yi spobs pa phreng ba legs brgyus ji bzhin te/_/mdo sde zab mo sna tshogs mang po 'chad pa na/_/spobs pa rgya che yangs shing zad pa med par 'gyur/_/gang gis 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de la rgyags pa med cing g.yo med nga rgyal med/_/dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing blo ldan rtogs dang ldan/_/ye shes mtha' yas spyod yul nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de yi 
[\[229b.2\]]'dus byas nyes pa thams cad rab tu chad/_/shes rab ye shes thabs dang zung du 'brel bar 'gyur/_/byams dang snying rje dag kyang zung du 'brel bar 'gyur/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni smra tshe 'khrul pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]mi dmigs te/_/bdag 
[\[229b.3\]]nyid che de sems can rnams kyi sgra skad shes/_/spyod dang dbang po dang ni mos pa thams cad shes/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/des ni chos la lhag mthong dge dang dran pa dang /_/rdzu 'phrul dang ni spang dang dbang po stobs lnga dang /_/byang chub yan 
[\[229b.4\]]lag de bzhin lam mchog zhi gnas 'thob/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi spyod yul rang gis rtogs/_/pha rol phyin pa dag ni kun gyi pha rol son/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po kun la mkhas shing blo gros ldan/_/gang 
[\[229b.5\]]gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de la nam yang 'khrul pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]mi dmigs te/_/nges pa de ni zhi zhing nyer zhi myos pa med/_/de ni spyod la rab tu gnas gyur shin tu dul/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni bde gshegs 
[\[229b.6\]]spyan sngar pad ma'i steng na 'dug_/de yi lus ni chos kyi rgyus byung rdul dang bral/_/de yi lus la mngal gyi dri mas gos mi 'gyur/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs chos smra ste/_/de ni lus dang ngag yid las 
[\[229b.7\]]rnams gang byed pa/_/thams cad shes pas byas te skye bo phan par byed/_/gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/_/de ni smra tshe bsngags pa zad par mi 'gyur te/_/sems can thams cad 'dren pa shes rab cher gyur kyang /_/de yi bsngags pa bskal pa 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]mang por bsam mi khyab//_//bam po bdun pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la legs so bya ba gnang ste/_gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod 
[\[230a.2\]]kyis gzungs rnam par nges par bstan pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang /_ji ltar yang khyod chos 'di dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_ji ltar yang khyod sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i tshig zab mo rnams yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can 
[\[230a.3\]]du gyur pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgyas pa tshad med pa/_
[\[230a.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par snang byed kyi bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams dri ma 
[\[230a.5\]]med pa de yang bai dUr+ya ltar dag par gyur te/_me long lta bur shin tu byi dor byas pa/_lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams der rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rin po che'i yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bur ldan pa dag byung bar gyur 
[\[230a.6\]]to/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur pa sna tshogs pa/_blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to/_/lha dang mi de dag kyang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa la yongs su longs spyod par gyur to/_/zas dang skom yang bsams pa tsam gyis 
[\[230a.7\]]'byor te/_'di lta ste/_dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dag yongs su spyod pa ltar lha dang mi de dag gi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa yang de 'dra bar gyur to/_/lha dang mi de dag kyang 'dod chags chung ba/_zhe sdang chung ba/_gti mug chung ba/_rnam 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]pa bzang ba/_shin tu rnam par rig par byed par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni nyi ma dang zla bar btags pa rnams med par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de ni lus kyi 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[230b.2\]]gsal bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na pad ma kha zum pas mtshan mo zhes bya ba dang pad ma kha bye bas nyin mor bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyin mtshan du gdags pa med do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 
[\[230b.3\]]'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag drug cur gyur to/_/khyim pa tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/_/de ni theg pa chen po ma gtogs par 
[\[230b.4\]]theg pa rnam par dgod pa gzhan med par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni phyir mi ldog pa dag pa'i gtam yang dag par ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du gyur to/_/mi rnams kyang bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[230b.5\]]zhing de na gang dag sa la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/_gang dag nam mkha' la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni lha zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par lha dang mi rnams kyi kha dog dang /_
[\[230b.6\]]yongs su spyod pa tha dad du bya ba med par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med do/_/lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa dang /_chos nyan 
[\[230b.7\]]pa la 'dun par gyur pa ma gtogs par lha gzhan med/_ston pa gzhan med/_gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal/_las gzhan mi byed/_gzhan yid la mi byed par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med du gdags pa med do/_/sems can de dag bslab pa gsum po dag 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]la slob pa ma gtogs par ltung bar gdags pa med do/_/bslab pa las 'da' bar gdags pa med do/_/bslab pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab 
[\[231a.2\]]kyi bslab pa'o/_/de la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/_gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi gtong ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/_gang ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas 
[\[231a.3\]]nas lhag pa'i shes rab thob pa'o/_/de la lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu gnas nas/_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lung phog pa med par bslab pa 'di lta bu dag la 
[\[231a.4\]]slob pa dag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i chos bstan pa yang de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/_'dug par gyur pa de stan 
[\[231a.5\]]las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag_/gzungs gang la rab tu gnas nas/_sangs 
[\[231a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun du 'dzin pa dang /_chos bstan pa na zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par bgyid pa'i gzungs de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[231a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu rin 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]chen sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs de la rab tu gnas nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun du 'dzin to/_/legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de 
[\[231b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag de bzhin du sgrub cing /_gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 
[\[231b.3\]]la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]'jug pa tsam zhig legs par bshad du gsol/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang bas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nyon mongs rnams kyi rdul dang bral gyur te/_dri ma med cing dri ma 
[\[231b.4\]]kun du spangs/_/sems ni rtag tu dag cing dri med pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/lus kyis ngag rnams dag cing yid kyis ni/_/zla ba lta bur dri bral dri med 'od/_/byams pa'i sems dang yid kyang snyoms gyur pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i 
[\[231b.5\]]gzungs yin no/_/gnyis su lta ba dag las rnam grol zhing /_/rtog dang rnam par rtog dang kun du bral/_/'du shes rnams ni yongs su shes gyur pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/dran dang blo gros rtog la 'jug pa 'grub/_/shes rab che 
[\[231b.6\]]ldan yon tan rnams dang ldan/_/nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing dag_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_/dri gsum rnam spangs srid pa gsum las grol/_/gnyis la yid gnyis za ba mthar 
[\[231b.7\]]'byin pa/_/rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni dag pa yin/_/'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug bcom/_/dus ngan rnyog spangs yon tan kun dang ldan/_/nyon mongs mun pa rab rib sel byed pa/_/rin chen sgron ma gzungs kyi mchog yin no/_/'jig rten 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]dag na sgra skad tha ma dang /_/'bring dang mchog ni ji snyed yod pa dag_/sgra rnams kun la shin tu zhugs gyur pa/_/rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni rdul dang bral/_/zab mo'i chos rnams dang ni ldan gyur cing /_/tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mtha' 
[\[232a.2\]]yas mang /_/bdag dang sems can dag tu lhung ba med/_/gnyis med ldan pa 'di ni gzungs yin no/_/so so yang dag rig pa thob gyur cing /_/rkang pa snying po bzhi la rab gnas te/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang yang dag rab ldan pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i 
[\[232a.3\]]gzungs yin no/_/dam pa'i don gyi chos kyi tshul gyur cing /_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang bsdu dang ldan/_/mngon par shes pa lnga la 'gro byed pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/_/yang dag spong ba 
[\[232a.4\]]rnams dang rtag tu 'thun/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi la spyod byed pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/dbang po lnga po dag dang ldan gyur cing /_/stobs lnga dag la gnas pa mi g.yo'i shugs/_/byang chub yan lag rnams dang rab ldan pa/_/'di ni rin 
[\[232a.5\]]chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyis 'gro byed cing /_/zhi gnas mchog dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel/_/rig dang rnam par grol bas 'gro byed pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/sa rnams gnon pa dag ni rab ldan 
[\[232a.6\]]zhing /_/mtshams sbyor grol ba'i lam dang rjes su 'thun/_/nyes pa rnams ni kun du spangs gyur pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/'jig rten thams cad na ni snang byed cing /_/nyi dang zla yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ltar/_/rnam par dag cing 
[\[232a.7\]]mig ni 'byed byed pa/_/'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/_/'dir ni lha mig dag ste rab rib med/_/shes rab mchog gi mig kyang rnam dag pa/_/'dir ni chos kyi mig kyang dag gyur te/_/rgyal ba dam pa'i spyan ni rnam par dag_/'dir ni nyon mongs 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bdud kyang dag par gyur/_/phung po lnga yi nyes pa 'dir yongs dag_/'dir ni 'chi bdag bdud kyang dag gyur cing /_/'dir ni sde dang bcas pa'i bdud kyang bcom/_/'dir ni gzungs la rab tu gnas nas su/_/bye ba khrag khrig dag gi zhing du 'gro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[232b.2\]]khrag khrig dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing /_/bla na med pa'i chos kyang nyan par byed/_/rgya chen chos ni thos par gyur nas kyang /_/gzungs kyi dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin par byed/_/don dang tshig 'bru dag kyang gzungs ldan par/_/sems can thams cad la ni ston par byed/_/
[\[232b.3\]]rgyu dang rkyen gyis rnam par phye bas na/_/sems ni skad cig 'jig par shes gyur te/_/chos rnams rab tu dbye ba shes thob pa/_/gzungs 'di la ni gnas par gyur pa yin/_/spobs pa thob cing gsum rig chags pa med/_/mig gsum rnam par dag pa'ang rab tu 
[\[232b.4\]]thob/_/rnam par thar pa gsum gyi don kyang thob/_/'dir ni gzungs rnams thob par gyur dang ldan/_/gang dag gzungs rnams mang po gzhal yas shing /_/tshad med pa dag nges par bstan pa yang /_/gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na/_/de dag thams 
[\[232b.5\]]cad rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/bsam gtan gang dang rnam thar gang dag dang /_/snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin gang dag mtha' yas dang /_/mngon par shes pas rnam par rol dang gzungs/_/mtha' yas de dag la ni rab tu 'jug_/ji ltar rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa la/_/
[\[232b.6\]]mtha' yas sgo nas klung mtsho mtshe'u 'jug pa/_/de ltar gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yang /_/mtha' yas chos rnams kyi ni sgo mor 'jug_/zad pa med pa'i sgra la 'jug pa yang /_/zad pa med pa'i shes pas khong du chud/_/gzungs 'di smra bar byed pa de 
[\[232b.7\]]yi ni/_/bsod nams thams cad zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa ni/_/rin chen dam pa dri med lag tu 'gyur/_/gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang ni rigs dang yang /_/rus dang skye ba dag ni rnam par dag_/zab mo'i tshul 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dag la ni 'jug pa dang /_/mi skye ba la bzod dang ma skyes dang /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i shes pa'i sa dag kyang /_/gzungs 'di yin par nges par bstan pa yin/_/byang chub bla med mchog 'di tshol byed pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po gang 
[\[233a.2\]]dag gis/_/gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur na ni/_/byang chub bla na med pa rnyed mi dka'/_/gang dag phyogs bcu rnams na bde bar gshegs/_/'gro la phan dang bde phyir chos ston pa/_/gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na/_/de dag spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur 
[\[233a.3\]]ro/_/gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa dag_/dga' dang mos dang bsam pa shes nas ni/_/de dag 'bras bu yod pa ston pas na/_/sems can khrag khrig dag ni tshim par byed/_/gzungs 'di la ni gnas pa'i dpa' bo dag_/'khor lo dam pa rab tu skor byed 
[\[233a.4\]]cing /_/sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams las 'grol/_/theg pa dam pa la yang 'jog par byed/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni/_/bsngags dang yon tan legs pa brjod byas kyang /_/drang srong chen pos de yi yon tan gyi/_/mtha' ma brjod du 
[\[233a.5\]]nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des gzungs bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de las byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzungs thob par gyur to/_/
[\[233a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal gyis ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 'di thob par gyur to/_/gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid 
[\[233a.7\]]gnyis su gyur tam/_the tshom za ba lta na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur te/_gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis de tshun chad bgrang ba las 'das pa'i 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dag la gzungs rnam par nges pa 'di yongs su dris so/_/yongs su dri ba byas so/_/des na khyod da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su 'dri ba de ltar 'jigs pa med cing gzungs kyi rnam par nges pa 'di'ang ston to/_/khyod kun du lta ba'i 
[\[233b.2\]]blos chos 'di mngon sum du gyur pas rnam grangs 'dis na ngas khyod byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dug par 
[\[233b.3\]]gyur pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 'di rab tu thob cing /_thob nas kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid pa dang /_'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pas sems 
[\[233b.4\]]can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rtsa ba la gnas par gyur pa dang /_shes 
[\[233b.5\]]rab kyi las byed par gyur pa de'i tshe gzungs 'di rab tu 'thob bo/_/chud za bar mi byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces 
[\[233b.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rtsa ba ni gang lags/_shes rab kyi las ni gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon 
[\[233b.7\]]la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/ji ltar thos pa'i chos gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]so/_/dpyod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/gang dpyad pa gzhan dag la nye bar ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so/_/tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/sems can rnams tshul bzhin la rab tu dgod pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so/_/
[\[234a.2\]]yang dag par sbyor ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sems la nges par sems pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/sems la nges par sems pa yang dag par ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/rab tu dben par gnas pa ni shes 
[\[234a.3\]]rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/lus dang sems dben par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/gcig pur dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/gcig pur bgrod pa'i lam sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/rig 
[\[234a.4\]]pa dang rnam par grol ba 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/rig pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/dran pa med cing yid la 
[\[234a.5\]]byed pa med pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/yang dag par spong ba sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis spangs par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 
[\[234a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/dad pas mos te yid ches pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sems mi 'jum pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni shes rab 
[\[234a.7\]]kyi las so/_/dran pa dang shes bzhin ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/dran par bya ba rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/ting nge 'dzin rim gyis rjes su rtogs par byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par gnas pa 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]las so/_/shes rab kyi dbang po la sten pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/stobs lnga'i gnas shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/bdud dang nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba ni shes rab kyi las so/_/
[\[234b.2\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/lam gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos thams cad gzings lta bur shes nas chos 
[\[234b.3\]]dang chos ma yin pa la mi gnas pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde kun chub par 
[\[234b.4\]]byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/don la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/rnam par shes pa la so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/ye shes 
[\[234b.5\]]la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/gang zag gi sgra la mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos nyid la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/'du byed thams cad mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/gdod ma nas ma skyes par rab tu 
[\[234b.6\]]shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/
[\[234b.7\]]sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/don 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/don so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/yang dag pa'i chos nyid thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos thams cad yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/
[\[235a.2\]]nges pa'i tshig thams cad la skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab 
[\[235a.3\]]kyi las so/_/sems can la dmigs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/bdag la byed pa dang /_gzhan la byed pa la snying rje ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/mtha' gnyi 
[\[235a.4\]]ga bsal ba'i snying rje chen po ni shes rab kyi las so/_/chos la sems pa la mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral ba'i btang snyoms 
[\[235a.5\]]ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/gnyis dang bral ba ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos kyi sku rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/chos rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos 
[\[235a.6\]]nyid shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/'dus ma byas su so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni shes rab kyi 
[\[235a.7\]]las so/_/tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/tshul khrims mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/lha rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ni shes rab kyi las so/_/thos pa la rtog 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/'jig rten thams cad la rtog pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/ma byas pa'i las byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/nga rgyal med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/ye shes chen 
[\[235b.2\]]po thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/bdag gi don ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/gnyi ga'i don ni shes rab kyi las so/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kun du 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/
[\[235b.3\]]chos bstan pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams phyir 
[\[235b.4\]]mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu dgod pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so/_/srid par 'gro bar skye ba thams cad kyis skrag pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/bsams bzhin du skye ba ni shes rab kyi las so/_/sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/bsgom 
[\[235b.5\]]pa las byung ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/zad pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/mi skye bar shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/phyir mi ldog 
[\[235b.6\]]pa'i sa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/dbang bskur ba'i sa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/gang ci shes par bya ba dang /_thos par bya ba dang /_rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[235b.7\]]'tshang rgya bar bya ba/_de thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi las so/_/shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa 'di 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bshad pa na/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med/_dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang 
[\[236a.2\]]chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis pa 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur pa dang /_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 
[\[236a.3\]]'khor gyi khyams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang /_las bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/_'das pa'i de bzhin 
[\[236a.4\]]gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bshad pa na/_rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis nam mkha' yongs su 'dzin pa 'di nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs su dris shing yongs su dri ba byas te/_sa chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di yin no/_/rkyen 
[\[236a.5\]]ni 'di yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa la spobs pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la shes rab brtsegs zhes bgyi/_bcom 
[\[236a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 
[\[236a.7\]]'jig rten du byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po de'i sems can rnams ni bde bas tshim pas gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rtsa gnyis su gyur to/_/de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni nyan thos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas des/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spobs pa rgya chen po nye bar bzung ste/_dri 
[\[236b.2\]]ba bye ba phrag brgya ched du mdzad nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi nang nas su dus ji srid cig na/_dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po 'di dri ba re re la bstan pa bye ba phrag brgya brgyas lan 'debs par spro/_de'i nang nas 
[\[236b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis gsol pa/_mtshan mo 'di bas te lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_dgung bdun na'o/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_dgung zla phyed na'o/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dris pa 
[\[236b.4\]]'di dag bdag cag gis dgung zla gcig na lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[236b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag stan las mi ldang zhing /_spyod lam 'khrug pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du bgyis te dri ba 'di bas par lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/skyes bu dam pa des seng ge'i sgra bsgrags ma thag tu/_de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[236b.6\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/snang ba des bskul nas sa bla ba'i lha nas bzung ste/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams 'dus so/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[236b.7\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po yang 'dir 'dus par gyur to/_/de ltar skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gnas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blos 'khor 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/_rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_ye shes kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_gzungs kyi stobs dang /_spobs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[237a.2\]]dang stobs kyis dri ba ched du mdzad pa bye ba phrag brgya po de kun du bzung nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i mdun du dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po re re la bstan pa bye ba phrag brgyas lan btab ste/_phyad pa dang /_rgyun chad pa med pa dang /_
[\[237a.3\]]rjes su ldan pa dang /_rjes su 'brel ba dang /_tshig dang yig 'brur ldan pa dang /_shin tu nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis de'i lan btab pa dang /_'khor de las srog chags stong phrag drug cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub 
[\[237a.4\]]sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas des de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[237a.5\]]dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to/_/sa bla pa'i lha nas bzung ste/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis/_kye ma gang shes rab dang /_spobs pa dang /_bstan pa 'di 'dra ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs su 'gyur ro zhes sgra phyung ste sgra 
[\[237a.6\]]bsgrags so/_/de ltar na de shes rab brtsegs shes rab brtsegs zhes ming du btags so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis su gyur tam/_the tshom za ba lta na 
[\[237a.7\]]khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/ma mos gyur nas ma thos chos rnams rtag nyan pa/_/shes rab rtsa ba sems can dag pas thob nas ni/_/'dzin cing byams pas 'gro ba dag la ston byed pa/_/shes rab las te byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu byed/_/dpyod pa'i dran 
[\[237b.2\]]pa chen po 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/dpyad nas 'gro la rtag tu ston pa shes rab las/_/gal te tshul bzhin rab sreg 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/de la sbyar nas ston pa shes rab las zhes bya/_/yang dag sbyor la gal te sbyor ba shes rab rtsa/_/sgrub cing ston par byed pa de 
[\[237b.3\]]ni shes rab las/_/sems la nges par sems rnyed 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/nges par sems pa spyod pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/gcig pu dben par spyod pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/lus dang sems la nga'i med 'di ni shes rab las/_/gang tshe 'du 'dzi'i 'jigs 
[\[237b.4\]]gyur de ni shes rab rtsa/_/gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam la rig byed shes rab las/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong dga' ba 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/rig dang rnam par grol la reg 'di shes rab las/_/rnam thar gsum la mngon par brtson pa shes rab rtsa/_/rig gsum mngon 
[\[237b.5\]]du byed pa shes rab las zhes bya/_/gal te dran pa nyer gzhag sgom pa shes rab rtsa/_/dran med yid la byed med de ni shes rab las/_/sdig pa spangs te dge ba spyod pa shes rab rtsa/_/chos 'di rang bzhin spangs pa de ni shes rab las/_/gal te rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi 
[\[237b.6\]]sgom shes rab rtsa/_/lhun grub rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/dad pas mos nas yid ches pa ni shes rab rtsa/_/chags pa thams cad gang bral de ni shes rab las/_/zhum med rtag tu brtson pa de ni shes rab rtsa/_/lus dang yid sems rab sbyangs de ni shes rab las/_/
[\[237b.7\]]dran dang shes bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/gnas rnams kun la mi gnas 'di ni shes rab las/_/rang gis ting 'dzin rtogs pa de ni shes rab rtsa/_/rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag la spyod 'di shes rab las/_/gal te shes rab dbang por rab gnas shes rab rtsa/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad shes pa shes rab las/_/stobs lnga po dag rjes su sgom pa shes rab rtsa/_/bcom nas ye shes thob pa de ni shes rab las/_/byang chub yan lag rjes 'thun bzod pa shes rab rtsa/_/chos kun rjes su gang rtogs de ni shes rab las/_/
[\[238a.2\]]lam gyi yan lag skye gnas sgrub pa shes rab rtsa/_/chos dang chos min spong ba 'di ni shes rab las/_/sdug bsngal rang bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/gal te 'gog pa mngon sum byed 'di shes rab las/_/drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde tshig 'dzin shes rab rtsa/_/nges pa'i 
[\[238a.3\]]don la rton pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/thams cad thos pas mi ngoms 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/don la rab tu rton pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/rnam par shes la tshul bzhin tshol ba shes rab rtsa/_/ye shes la ni rab tu rton 'di shes rab las/_/gang zag gang la'ang ma 
[\[238a.4\]]zhen 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/gal te chos nyid rton pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/'du byed mi rtag yongs su tshol ba shes rab rtsa/_/gal te gzod nas ma skyes shes pa shes rab las/_/'du byed sdug bsngal mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa/_/chos rnams 'dus ma byas su mos pa shes 
[\[238a.5\]]rab las/_/chos rnams bdag med the tshom med pa shes rab rtsa/_/sems can 'di dag gdod nas dag de shes rab las/_/mya ngan 'das la zhi bar mos pa shes rab rtsa/_/'gro ba shin tu mya ngan 'das 'di shes rab las/_/don gyi rjes su rtogs pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/don rtogs so so 
[\[238a.6\]]yang dag rig pa shes rab las/_/gal te chos nyid mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa/_/chos la so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las/_/sgra rnams kun la skrag pa med 'di shes rab rtsa/_/nges tshig so so yang dag rig 'di shes rab las/_/skrag med blo yis spobs pa de ni shes rab rtsa/_/
[\[238a.7\]]spobs pa so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las/_/gal te sems can gnas pa'i byams de shes rab rtsa/_/dmigs pa med pa'i byams thob de ni shes rab las/_/bdag dang gzhan la snying rje 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/gang gis gnyi gar mi rtog de ni shes rab las/_/mchog tu 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]dga' la dga' ba thob 'di shes rab rtsa/_/dga' med gdung ba med pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/byams dang gnod par mi byed de ni shes rab rtsa/_/gnyis las sems grol thob pa de ni shes rab las/_/blo gros ldan pa sangs rgyas dran 'di shes rab rtsa/_/gang tshe chos sku rjes su 
[\[238b.2\]]rtogs pa shes rab las/_/chos kyang rtag tu dran pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/chos rnams 'dod chags bral bar rtogs pa shes rab las/_/yon tan las ni dge 'dun dran de shes rab rtsa/_/de yang 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa shes rab las/_/blo ldan gtong ba dran pa de ni shes rab rtsa/_/
[\[238b.3\]]gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las/_/tshul khrims shin tu dag pa dran 'di shes rab rtsa/_/tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas ni shes rab las/_/che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/dag nas dag pa dran pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/gang phyir bsgrims 
[\[238b.4\]]te thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa/_/gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las/_/legs par byed pa'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las/_/nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa/_/ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid thob 
[\[238b.5\]]'di shes rab las/_/bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed 'di ni shes rab las/_/gal te chos kyi phung po 'dzin byed shes rab rtsa/_/sems can spyod pa rjes su rtogs byed shes rab las/_/gzhan gyi blo la yang dag thob byed shes 
[\[238b.6\]]rab rtsa/_/sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las/_/blo gros ldan pa sbyin dang snyan par smra ba dang /_/don byed sems can yongs su smin byed shes rab rtsa/_/gal te don 'thun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god/_/'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes 
[\[238b.7\]]rab las/_/srid pa kun du 'bar shes skrag pa shes rab rtsa/_/mi skye bzod pa thob pa de ni shes rab las/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di shes rab rtsa ba ste/_/dbang bskur de yi sa thob de ni shes rab las/_/gal te byang chub shing drung 'dug pa shes rab rtsa/_/kun 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]mkhyen ye shes reg pa 'di ni shes rab las/_/byang chub sems 'di shes rab rtsa ba zhes kyang bya/_/sems ni gnas su gang byed de ni shes rab las/_/gang dag byang chub sems la rtag gnas mi g.yo ba/_/de dag shes rab kyis ni rtag tu las bya byed/_/rtsa 
[\[239a.2\]]ba 'di 'dra byang chub spyod pa mchog gi sems/_/sangs rgyas stobs dang de bzhin so so yang dag rig_/de yi bsngags pa bskal pa bye ba mang brjod kyang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' mar thug par 'gyur ba med/_/gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs de bzhin da ltar 
[\[239a.3\]]byung /_/gang dag ma 'ongs pa dang phyogs bcu'i thub dbang po/_/tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur tshad med byed 'dod gang /_/de ni ma myos byang chub sems la dga' ba yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[239a.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_kye ma ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di shin tu rnam par nges shing /_yi ge rnams kyis bstan pa mtha' yas pa/_don gyis 'jug pa mtha' yas pa/_mi brtson pa rnams kyis 
[\[239a.5\]]'jug par dka' ba/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pas zab pa/_gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar dka' ba/_skye mched drug la brten pa rnams kyis mthong bar dka' ba/_theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis yid ches par dka' ba/_nyan 
[\[239a.6\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lags pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul/_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya/_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid pas phye ba ma mchis pa/_nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi slad du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa/_shin tu 'das pas kun 
[\[239a.7\]]gzhi ma mchis pa/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa/_rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba/_nges par 'byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thabs/_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]rnams kyis rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba/_mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dgrol bar bgyi ba/_tshul gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bgyi ba/_sna tshogs ma mchis par spyod pa rnams la khyad par ma mchis pa/_nam mkha' 
[\[239b.2\]]dang mnyam pa nyid pas mnyam pa/_gnyen po ma mchis pas mnyam pa ma mchis pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_'gog pas rab tu phye bas gnyis dang bral ba/_yi ge rnams kyis dpyad du ma mchis pa/_don 
[\[239b.3\]]gyi yang dag par bzhag pa/_sgras rnam par rig par bgyi ba/_don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa/_kun rdzob tu mchis pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi mthu dang ldan pa/_theg pa gsum la rnam par rtog pa/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag rab tu ston pa/_
[\[239b.4\]]khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa/_rig pa gsum po dag khong du chud par bgyid pa/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa/_chos thams cad kyi gnas/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las byung ba/_sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/_sangs rgyas 
[\[239b.5\]]thams cad kyis gsal bar mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa tshad ma mchis pa 'di la mos par bgyid pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[239b.6\]]byang chub tu yang sems skyed par bgyid pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di mnyan par bgyid pa dang /_mos par bgyid pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag 
[\[239b.7\]]la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das bsod nams mang du skyed pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_de dag bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu bkang ste/_de 
[\[240a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas gang gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam/_mos sam/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_ston tam/_
[\[240a.3\]]gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston tam/_bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis zhing gang ngas mthong 
[\[240a.4\]]ba/_/rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs byin yang /_/'di lta bu yi chos 'di ma thos na/_/de ni bsod nams chung zhes nga smra'o/_/gang gis dam pa'i don ldan phra zab pa/_/mdo sde bzang po 'di ni thos gyur na/_/kun du 'dzin cing bzung nas klog byed pa/_/'di ni 
[\[240a.5\]]de bas bsod nams mchog tu 'phags/_/'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyis nyer gnas shing /_/chos kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min/_/de bas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[240a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyin dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang 
[\[240a.7\]]chub 'di yongs su bsrung bar su spro/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus de na yang rgyas par bgyid par spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'on gyis kyang ci nas de'i dus na skye bo mang po gnas par 'gyur ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi rna bar grags par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[240b.2\]]pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsung /_/bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas/_/byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag la/_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[240b.3\]]ni byin gyis brlabs/_/snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/_/byams pa chen por rab tu gnas/_/kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir/_/mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs/_/ye shes tshogs kyis byung gyur pa/_/tshogs rnams kun 
[\[240b.4\]]dang ldan pa yis/_/mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms la/_smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing /_/lta ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa/_/mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang /_/de bzhin lha ma yin 
[\[240b.5\]]rnams dang /_/lha dang dri za klu dag kyang /_/ngas ni byin gyis brlab pa byas/_/sa dang de bzhin bar snang la/_/lha rnams mang po gang 'khor ba/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/_/tshul 'di rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur/_/'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/tshangs 
[\[240b.6\]]pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing /_/bden pa bzhi yis brgyan gyur pa/_/mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/nam mkha' gzugs can byed kyang srid/_/gzugs ni gzugs med byed srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs ni/_/rnam par dkrugs par mi nus 
[\[240b.7\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams/_/mdo 'di kun du bsrung slad du/_/rtsa lag dang ni bcas rnams kyis/_/bsrung ba bzang po 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]bgyi bar 'tshal/_/mkhas pa byang chub blo gros kyis/_/gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dag_/de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas/_/rtag par kun du bsrung ba bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[241a.2\]]gnyis gsol to/_/bdag ni bcom ldan mdzad pa gzo/_/'dren pa chos kyi dbang bdag lags/_/mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di las/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/_/mdzad pa gzo ba bsrung bgyid cing /_/'di 'dra'i 
[\[241a.3\]]mdo dang de bzhin du/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa bsrung bar 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/bsam gtan gang dang tshad med dang /_/theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang /_/de dag don ldan zab mo 
[\[241a.4\]]yi/_/mdo sde 'di las nges par 'byung /_/bdag ni tshangs pa'i bde bor te/_/gang na tshul 'di 'chad par ni/_/mnyan pa'i slad dang de bzhin du/_/bsrung ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rab dga' ldan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[241a.5\]]gnyis gsol to/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas gsungs pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/_/skye ba gcig gis rab gnas nas/_/dga' ldan rnams su gnas par 'gyur/_/mgon po bdag ni lha yul ba'i/_/phun sum tshogs pa bor nas su/_/tshul 'di rab tu 
[\[241a.6\]]ston bgyid cing /_/'dzam bu gling du gnas par spro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/gang zhig gdon dang ldan pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/_/de dag bdud las 'di spangs pas/_/bdud 
[\[241a.7\]]kyi dbang du mi mchi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni/_/mdo 'di kun du bsrung slad du/_/ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur bar/_/brtson bgyid cing 'dun bar bgyid/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]rnam par 'dren pa gang zhig ni/_/nyon mongs thams cad tshar gcod pa/_/'di 'dzin bgyid pa de dag la/_/bdag ni sgrib par mi bgyid do/_/mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der/_/bdud kyi go skabs ma mchis so/_/mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa/_/de la bsrung ba bgyid par 'tshal/_/
[\[241b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni/_/mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod/_/mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di/_/
[\[241b.3\]]lha ni bye ba rnams la bshad/_/gang dag gus par nyan pa dag_/byang chub yang dag 'dzin du stsal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te/_/dam chos yongs su bsrung slad 
[\[241b.4\]]du/_/bdag kyang stong bgyid de dag ni/_/gsol ba ma btab bshes gnyen lags/_/bdag ni dga' ldan mchis nas su/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byin rlabs kyis/_/'di lta bu yi mdo sde 'di/_/shin tu rgyas par bgyid par 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[241b.5\]]pa 'od srung chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/_/ston pa las ni bdag gis su/_/mdo sde stong phrag mang thos kyang /_/bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu/_/sngon chad nam yang ma thos so/_/mngon sum du ni mdo sde 'di/_/blangs shing kun du bzung lags te/_/byang 
[\[241b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i ched du ni/_/shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang 
[\[241b.7\]]ste/_skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa dag khyod la bsgo'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa bzod pa ma thob pa de dag 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun du bzung ste/_bzung nas kyang kun chub par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' 
[\[242a.2\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[242a.3\]]'das pa'i 'og tu gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongs su zhus pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[242a.4\]]dpa' grangs med pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar gyur to/_/me tog sil mas kyang gtor bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang 
[\[242a.5\]]chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis rnam par bkra bar byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[242a.6\]]bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do/_/gang gi slad du bdag cag gis rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas bdag cag 'dir mchis pa don ma mchis pa ma lags so/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe yongs su bskyang du gsol/_
[\[242a.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun du tshe yongs su skyong bar gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]thams cad la yang phan pa byed par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don bzang ba dang /_tshig 'bru bzang ba dang /_
[\[242b.2\]]legs par brgyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa dang /_bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa dang /_chos thams cad la mkhas par 'dzin pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bgyid pa dang /_theg pa thams 
[\[242b.3\]]cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba dang /_thams cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba las gti mug ma mchis par ston pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_
[\[242b.4\]]'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[242b.5\]]snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /_byang chub 
[\[242b.6\]]sems dpa'i tshogs dang /_nyan thos kyi tshogs de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying 
[\[242b.7\]]rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]{D148}]@##/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ga ga na gany+dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[243a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/_bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyis tshogs bsags pa/_spyod pa chen po'i rgyu 'thun 
[\[243a.3\]]pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs/_mi chags pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes 
[\[243a.4\]]la 'jug pa/_dga' ba rgya chen po rab tu skyed pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa la 'jug pa/_kun nas ma smad pa/_ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa/_de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon du bstod pa/_yon tan gyi tshogs 
[\[243a.5\]]thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/_slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/_chos thams cad la ni mnga' brnyes/_sems 
[\[243a.6\]]can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni shin tu mkhyen/_dbang po dam pa'i pha rol du ni byon/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad do/_/
[\[243a.7\]]dge slong sa ya phrag drug gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa la brtson pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/_dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/_spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/_sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin 
[\[243b.2\]]tu zhugs pa sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa tshad med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen 
[\[243b.3\]]po dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/_chos nyan pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba/_rtag tu 
[\[243b.4\]]rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/_thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa/_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_
[\[243b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lha zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad snying po zhes bya ba dang /_byang 
[\[243b.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[243b.7\]]sems dpa' mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med/_dpag gis mi lang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la rab tu ston te 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_thams cad dang ldan 
[\[244a.2\]]pa'i 'khor de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na bdag 'dug pa snyam du sems so/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi bkod pa nyid sems can rnams kyi mig sngar snang bar gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[244a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za'i 'khor de dag thams cad ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba lhag ma gzhan thams 
[\[244a.4\]]cad med par gyur te/_thams cad kyang nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_bskal pas shin tu bsregs te nam mkha' bzhin du gyur pa na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba gang yang mig sngar snang 
[\[244a.5\]]bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_de'i tshe na gang gzugs su snang ba rnams sems can dag gi mig sngar mi snang bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[244a.6\]]dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de na snang ngo /_/nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa 'dug pa de dag ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa'i steng dang /_gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang 
[\[244a.7\]]mi snang ba snyam du rab tu shes te/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_khor yug gi ri dang /_khor yug gi ri chen po dag sems can gang gi mig sngar yang mi snang bar gyur to/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]'khor rnams kyang mi snang ste/_gzhan du na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nyid du shes shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ni 'phang du dpag tshad khrir 'phags par rab tu snang ngo /_/gang la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i 
[\[244b.2\]]khri de'i 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams 
[\[244b.3\]]cad kyang mog mog por byas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba mthong nas phan tshun du smra ba khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni bdag cag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug par 
[\[244b.4\]]gyur kyang bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par dbye ba bstan par sla ba ma yin te/_de tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi yon tan bkod pa ni tshad med do zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khang pa brtsegs pa de nas langs nas nam 
[\[244b.5\]]mkha' la 'dug ste/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la mchis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ma lags pa 
[\[244b.6\]]gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkhar gyur cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin can du gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_
[\[244b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshe'i tshad bas par gyur kyang khang 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gis bsngags pa'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'khor 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' la song zhing khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang ba bzhin du bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[245a.2\]]khams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de yang 'di 'dra'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de gang gi phyogs na mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ni 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab 
[\[245a.3\]]kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu bkod pa 
[\[245a.4\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/_byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan mi 'byung ngo /_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang /_nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na/_seng 
[\[245a.5\]]ge'i khri dang bcas te/_ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po der/_nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan te/_de 
[\[245a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa de yang nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa de ni bskal 
[\[245a.7\]]par yang brjod mi nus so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i seng ge'i khri 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i seng ge'i 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]khri yang 'di 'dra ste/_de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa/_nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam 
[\[245b.2\]]mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po med pas chos thams cad yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba dang /_rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /_snang bar gyur pa med pas chos thams cad 
[\[245b.3\]]rnam par rig pa med pa dang /_rgyu dang dmigs pa med pas chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa med pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang /_gnyis su med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang /_so so tha dad pa med pas chos 
[\[245b.4\]]thams cad gnyis su med pa dang /_tshul gcig la zhugs pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang /_ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /_dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_thams 
[\[245b.5\]]cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang /_thams cad du mi snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i sgo dang /_yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa dang /_nang dang phyi'i rnam par dag pas chos thams cad 
[\[245b.6\]]yul med pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang /_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa med pas chos thams 
[\[245b.7\]]cad nye bar zhi ba dang /_gzod ma nas ma byung bas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /_nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ba dang /_bdag po med pas chos thams cad nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang rang 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag po med pa dang /_gzod ma nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang /_ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang /_sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[246a.2\]]rang bzhin pas chos thams cad ldog pa med pa dang /_dngos po med pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /_sems dang lus dben pas chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /_
[\[246a.3\]]mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid med pas/_chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /_gnas dmigs su med pas chos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang /_dmigs pa 
[\[246a.4\]]med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas chos thams cad gnas med pa dang /_kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang /_kun gzhi dang bral bas chos thams cad kun gzhi med pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de 
[\[246a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te/_de thos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod 
[\[246a.6\]]pa chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su 'thob bo/_/yang shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing /_bskal pa grangs med par gtong ba'i rjes su song ba/_tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing blo shin tu byang ba/_
[\[246a.7\]]bzod pas brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa/_bsam gtan gyis brgyan cing bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa/_shes rab kyis brgyan cing bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/_byams pa chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/_
[\[246b.2\]]snying rje chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa/_dga' ba chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/_btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams 
[\[246b.3\]]cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go/_/yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya ba 
[\[246b.4\]]'dug ste/_bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis shin tu brjid pa/_ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/_mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan pa/_spobs pas ngag brgyan pa/_gzungs kyis sems brgyan pa/_thos 
[\[246b.5\]]pas dran pa brgyan pa/_nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/_rtogs pas don rtogs pa brgyan pa/_bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/_khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa brgyan pa/_sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tshom med par gyur pa/_
[\[246b.6\]]btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mthon dman med pa/_mngon par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/_bsod nams kyis brgyan cing lag na rin po che gtang bas mngon par grub pa/_ye shes kyis brgyan cing 
[\[246b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/_blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa/_mig gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa/_rna bas brgyan cing sgra dang don thams cad rtogs pa'i snying 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]po dang ldan pa/_so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa/_stobs kyis brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su thob pa/_mi 'jigs pas 
[\[247a.2\]]brgyan cing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/_yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa/_chos kyis brgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/_so sor rig pa'i rjes su song ba/_snang bas brgyan cing 
[\[247a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lag mthil du thob pa/_'od kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa/_kun nas ston pas brgyan cing phyad par lung ston pa/_gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pas brgyan cing de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/_rdzu 
[\[247a.4\]]'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par grol ba thams cad ston pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pas brgyan cing gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/_tshogs thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing 
[\[247a.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/_shA ri'i bu gang bkod pa 'di lta bu kun du snang ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de 
[\[247a.6\]]nga la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su bzung ba dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang /_bde 
[\[247a.7\]]ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa dang /_theg pa chen po 'di'ang rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i gan du 'ong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/_lhan cig tu mngon du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa sangs rgyas 
[\[247b.2\]]kyi rnam par rol pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_sems kyi skad cig gcig byung ba tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/_bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[247b.3\]]kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa/_'di lta ste/_zla ba dang /_zla ba chen po dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_nyi 
[\[247b.4\]]ma rab tu 'bar ba dang /_me shel dang /_mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes chen po dang /_mdog mdzes par 'dug pa dang /_s+tha la dang /_s+tha la chen po dang /_s+tha la rab mdzes dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_kun du dri ma med pa dang /_rnam dag 'od dang /_gser du 
[\[247b.5\]]snang dang /_nam mkha' snang ba dang /_reg gyur dang /_dri chen dkar dang /_'dab brgya pa dang /_ze ba stong ldan dang /_mya ngan sel ba dang /_dga' byed dang /_lhas stod dang /_klu'i me tog dang /_dga' ba bde ba kun skyed pa dang /_bsam gtan yan lag dang /_
[\[247b.6\]]dris dga' ba dang /_lus sems tshim byed dang /_stong gsum dri dang /_nad kun zhi byed dang /_nad kun sel dang /_bdag gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan cing /_dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/_phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpas rig pa/_de lta 
[\[247b.7\]]bu'i me tog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du khebs par byas pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/_sngon 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ma thos ma mthong ba'i me tog de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog blta na sdug pa 'di dag ga las mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa byang chub 
[\[248a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de/_bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/_de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/_'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab po/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 
[\[248a.3\]]mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[248a.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 
[\[248a.5\]]mkha' mdzod la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal ba/_'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing /_chos chen po dang ldan pas slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mchid 
[\[248a.6\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod cig ces de skad kyang gsung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs byin gyis brlabs nas 
[\[248a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_chos dang don dang yon tan ye shes 'phags pas na/_/yongs dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med/_/gnas med nam mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yo 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]rab tu brnyes/_/rab zab kun nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab phye sku mnyam yang /_/gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas/_/bsod 
[\[248b.2\]]nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston/_/khyod ni mi gsung rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med/_/tshig gi rang bzhin brag ca'i mtshan nyid gzung du med/_/sgra med rtag med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang /_/byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i 
[\[248b.3\]]tshig kyang gsung /_/sems can kun gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig_/khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen/_/sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ji 'dra rab mkhyen kyang /_/sems dang yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas/_/'gro 
[\[248b.4\]]ba rnams la khyed kyi spyod pa kun bstan te/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur ba yong ma mchis/_/gang gi gzugs dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar/_/mtshan dang spyod lam dag kyang de yi tshul du ston/_/bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa 
[\[248b.5\]]med/_/khyod ni chos la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med/_/sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dul mkhyen nas/_/khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston/_/rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kun gyis bltas pa na/_/gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dad 
[\[248b.6\]]bskal pa mi mnyam nas/_/khyod kyi sku ni mi 'gyur rtog med mtshan med de/_/'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdzad/_/chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste/_/byed med ngo bo nyid med kun du rtog la skyes/_/bde gshegs 
[\[248b.7\]]de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su/_/byang chub mi 'gyur zhi ba bla na med pa brnyes/_/mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med/_/stong zhing gsog la rang bzhin gsob ste ya ma brla/_/khyod kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]su/_/'gro ba rnams la rgyu dang las dang byed pa ston/_/chos 'di sems can med cing srog dang gang zag med/_/nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas na ming yang rnam par dag_/sems can gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med 
[\[249a.2\]]pa/_/mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sad mdzad/_/brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis byang chub 'di tshol phyir/_/khyod kyis bskal pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgyar spyad/_/sgrub pa med pa'i nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub ste/_/gang phyir spyod 
[\[249a.3\]]pa'i don de rjes su thob par 'gyur/_/chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas/_/rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen/_/mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid rtag bzhugs rnam mi rtog_/de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing 
[\[249a.4\]]mi 'gyur ba/_/phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/_/'jig rten gsum po chu zla 'dra ste 'pho ba med/_/sems can rnams ni rmi lam lta bur dngos med de/_/mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsung /_/byang chub mchog 
[\[249a.5\]]rab brda yi rang bzhin khyod kyis brnyes/_/de ni thob dang ma thob pa zhes brjod du med/_/ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang /_/tshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan bral rab tu bskor/_/rgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas rab sgrol 
[\[249a.6\]]ba/_/grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu grol/_/theg chen bla med 'di la 'gro ba dbugs 'byin cing /_/nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god/_/gang na'ang sems can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis/_/sems can gdod 
[\[249a.7\]]nas rnam dag sems can nyid mi sgrub/_/sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas/_/'di yi mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad/_/nam mkha' la ni gzugs rnams nam yang mi snang bzhin/_/de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs ni 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gzugs nyid mtshungs/_/chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min mtshan nyid de/_/gang gis de ltar don rnams yang dag dben rtogs pa/_/ci tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gis dper bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong 
[\[249b.2\]]chags te/_/rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra/_/gnyis med bsngags brjod de ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa/_/sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar 
[\[249b.3\]]'dren pa kun gyi mi yi seng ge bsngags/_/de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags/_/sems can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam/_/thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyi/_/chos kun 'dod chags bral ba 
[\[249b.4\]]mtshan gyi tshul shes pa/_/des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu/_nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po 
[\[249b.5\]]de'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[249b.6\]]dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun du brjod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmi lam na'ang mngon par zhen pas dmigs par lta ba mi 'byung ngo /_/gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang /_
