[\[249b.7\]]gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa bzhin du/_de dag kyang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba 
[\[250a.2\]]dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tshom du gyur pa de nges par bstan pa/_
[\[250a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab tu gnas pas de dag gi the tshom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pa de legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin 
[\[250a.4\]]gshegs pas bdag la skabs phye na chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig bdag zhu'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das ni mi chags pa'i ye shes can te sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa ye shes la 
[\[250a.5\]]mkhas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes pa ste mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/_bcom ldan 'das ni don mkhyen pa ste tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa ste tshod las mi 'da' zhing phyad par lung ston pa/_bcom 
[\[250a.6\]]ldan 'das ni tshod mkhyen pa ste sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos ston pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rol pa ste mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo 
[\[250a.7\]]dang ldan pa ste sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun du ston pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/_bcom ldan 'das ni zil gyis ma non pa ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]dpa' bo gcig po/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste slob dpon med par chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste 'dren pa med pa dang lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni sman 
[\[250b.2\]]pa'i rgyal po ste thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_kun du bsgribs pa dang /_shin tu bsgribs pa dang /_kun nas ldang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/_bcom 
[\[250b.3\]]ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'jigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[250b.4\]]med pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa la mkhas pa/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste dus gsum la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes can bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang gsung 
[\[250b.5\]]dang thugs yongs su dag pa ste 'khrul pa dang ca co mi mnga' ba/_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste zhe 'gras pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la sems 
[\[250b.6\]]snyoms pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po la gnas pa ste legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi bskyod pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyam 
[\[250b.7\]]par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa ste mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni bye brag med pa ste nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ba/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa med pa ste shes rab kyis ngoms pa/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang bral ba/_bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar de 
[\[251a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang chos dang ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces spras su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/_nga rgyal ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la 
[\[251a.3\]]sbyor ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrub pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[251a.4\]]stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang dris pa de dang de nyid lung bstan pas ngas 
[\[251a.5\]]khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci zhig gi phyir 
[\[251a.6\]]rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs su bcad pa slar smras pa/_gang rnams sems dang sems 
[\[251a.7\]]la sems yid mtshungs/_/shin tu bsams sems ye shes mnyam la gnas/_/sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul/_/de dag don du rgyal la bdag zhu'o/_/snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med/_/yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pa/_/des byas rnam par 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]thar pa la gzhag pa/_/de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu/_/bdag la bdag med shin tu rnam dag yid/_/sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'/_/sems can bdag med gnyis las thar byed pa/_/rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'di'o/_/cho ga spyod 
[\[251b.2\]]yul brtul zhugs yongs su dag_/bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra/_/lhun po lta bur brtan cing mi g.yo ba/_/de dag ched du don yod mdzad la zhu/_/mi zlogs brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang /_/dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra yi nga rgyal bcom/_/nyon mongs rab tu 
[\[251b.3\]]nyon mongs dri sbyong ba/_/mthong dga' de dag don du 'di zhu'o/_/thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga'/_/bsam gtan rnam thar shes rab mchog tu gyur/_/mngon shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od/_/rab dga' dri med don du bdag zhu'o/_/stong pa mtshan ma 
[\[251b.4\]]med cing mi smon gnas/_/bsams bzhin shi 'pho dang ni skye ba ston/_/skyes pa med cing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med/_/de dag don du mi yi spyod pa zhu/_/nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis/_/rtogs par dka' zhing zab mo mthong dka' ba/_/skye bo kun gyi yid rnams kun skul 
[\[251b.5\]]ba'i/_/chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs la zhu/_/legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'/_/chos la chos med 'dzin pa gnyis las grol/_/rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la dga'/_/sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i don du zhu/_/gang dag 
[\[251b.6\]]sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas bstod pa kun med blo/_/grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos/_/yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 
[\[251b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/_tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 
[\[252a.2\]]dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam 
[\[252a.3\]]pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod de sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang chog shes pa rnams lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[252a.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du 
[\[252a.5\]]tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags/_mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/_rten cing 
[\[252a.6\]]'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa mkhas pa rnams lags/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing 
[\[252a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lags/_bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/_sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags/_gzungs 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags/_spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams lags/_skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang /_'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/_bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag 
[\[252b.2\]]par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa rnams lags/_bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags/_sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa 
[\[252b.3\]]rnams lags/_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams lags/_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang nam mkha' la rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lags/_cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul 
[\[252b.4\]]shes pa dang mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa rnams lags/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa rnams lags/_myur du theg pa chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[252b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/_/'di lta ste khyod ni sems can thams 
[\[252b.6\]]cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa/_bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_rtag tu chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa/_ye shes kyi 
[\[252b.7\]]mtshon cha can nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dag par bsgrub pa ste/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/_/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yon tan 'di 
[\[253a.2\]]rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang 
[\[253a.3\]]ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa rnam par 
[\[253a.4\]]dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /_bsngo ba rnam par dag pas byang chub rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo 
[\[253a.5\]]nas sbyin pa de sbyin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_mtshan ma rnam par dag par 
[\[253a.6\]]sbyin pa de sbyin/_tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin te/_de rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin no/_/
[\[253a.7\]]ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing bsgribs pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad la mi gnas 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin 
[\[253b.2\]]du 'dus byas thams cad med par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams 
[\[253b.3\]]pas khyab par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab 
[\[253b.4\]]tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la nga'i ba med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad yid la byed pa 
[\[253b.5\]]thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de sbyin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub ste/_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang 'bral ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam 
[\[253b.6\]]par dag par byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa de sbyin te/_rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/_
[\[253b.7\]]rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam pa med pa ste/_rnam pa rnam par dag 
[\[254a.2\]]pa/_sems can gyi rnam pa ste/_sems can rnam par dag pa/_chos kyi rnam pa ste/_chos rnam par dag pa/_ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/_ye shes rnam par dag pa/_shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/_shes rab rnam par dag pa/_sems kyi rnam pa ste/_sems rnam par dag pa/_
[\[254a.3\]]'jig rten gyi rnam pa ste/_'jig rten rnam par dag pa/_gzugs med pa gzugs su ston pa dang mi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/_mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/_mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/_mthar 
[\[254a.4\]]phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/_mi zad pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mkhyen pa'i lung bstan pa thob pa/_mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa' nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing dbang bskur ba 
[\[254a.5\]]thob pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par spyod pa/_legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[254a.6\]]gi spyod yul te/_skyes bu dam pa de dang de dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[254a.7\]]gsungs so/_/dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin/_/byang chub phyir te rnam smin yong mi 'dod/_/dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de/_/rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin/_/mkhas pas chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas su/_/lus dang srog la'ang 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]chags par mi 'gyur zhing /_/de dag la ni nams kyang 'dzin pa med/_/de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges/_/thams cad gtong yang mi dga' bar mi 'gyur/_/de la zhum pa med de gong ba med/_/de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms/_/de bas 
[\[254b.2\]]dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa med/_/bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag_/byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin/_/de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par/_/spros pa med par sbyin pa rab tu sbyin/_/sems mnyam yid kyang mnyam pas sbyin pa gtong /_/
[\[254b.3\]]rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med par sbyin/_/bsam pa yongs dag dri ma med pa yis/_/thams cad gtong yang rnam par smin mi 'dod/_/lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra/_/longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin snying po med/_/'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas/_/
[\[254b.4\]]'jig rten chos kyis ma gos sbyin pa sbyin/_/nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong /_/rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste/_/bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed/_/de ltar brtags nas thams cad gtong ba yin/_/stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba 
[\[254b.5\]]yin zhes gsungs/_/de la rab tu gnas na tshul khrims ldan/_/tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan rnyed/_/bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed/_/sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim/_/nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir mi skye/_/
[\[254b.6\]]sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par gsungs/_/phan dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu/_/sbyin gtong nyon mongs spang zhing dge ba'i phyir/_/des na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi 'gyur/_/pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste/_/bdag blo rnam dag byang chub phyir gtong 
[\[254b.7\]]ngo /_/ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong /_/de ltar des ni byang chub yon tan mthong /_/ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong /_/de lta de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid dang /_brag ca lta bu'i 
[\[255a.2\]]sgra mnyam pa nyid dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[255a.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang /_tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa dang /_dam bcas pa rnam par 
[\[255a.4\]]dag pa'i phyir bslab pa thams cad mi 'dor ba dang /_smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad du mi 'jug pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir mi lhod pa dang /_mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /_nyon mongs pa yongs su 
[\[255a.5\]]dag pa'i phyir kun nas gdung ba med pa dang byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni nam mkha' 
[\[255a.6\]]dag pa ste tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o/_/nam mkha' dri ma med pa ste tshul khrims de yang dri ma med pa'o/_/nam mkha' zhi ba ste tshul khrims de yang zhi ba'o/_/nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste tshul khrims de yang mi mtho ba'o/_/nam mkha' mi dma' ba ste tshul khrims de yang 
[\[255a.7\]]mi dma' ba'o/_/nam mkha' gzung du med pa ste tshul khrims de yang gzung du med pa'o/_/nam mkha' gnas med pa ste tshul khrims de yang gnas med pa'o/_/nam mkha' med pa ma yin te tshul khrims de yang med pa ma yin pa'o/_/nam mkha' rtag pa ste tshul khrims de 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]yang rtag pa'o/_/nam mkha' mi zad pa ste tshul khrims de yang mi zad pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa ste tshul khrims de yang mtshan ma med pa'o/_/nam mkha' rgyu ba med pa ste tshul khrims de yang rgyu ba med pa'o/_/nam mkha' spros pa med pa ste tshul khrims de 
[\[255b.2\]]yang spros pa med pa'o/_/nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste tshul khrims de yang zag pa med pa'o/_/nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste tshul khrims de yang 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste tshul khrims de yang mi 'gyur ba'o/_/nam mkha' rnam par mi 
[\[255b.3\]]rtog pa ste tshul khrims de yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste tshul khrims de yang thams cad du song ba'o/_/nam mkha' mi chod mi phyed pa ste tshul khrims de yang mi chod mi phyed pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste tshul khrims de 
[\[255b.4\]]yang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o/_/nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste tshul khrims de yang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims nam mkha' dang 
[\[255b.5\]]mtshungs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sems kyi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med/_/lus dang sems kyang rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams/_/mkhas pa rtag tu nang zhi tshul khrims dregs 
[\[255b.6\]]mi snyems/_/blo 'chad sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la rton/_/las gang ma byas ma bsams de bzhin ma brtags te/_/de ni dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas/_/gzugs med mi bden mi g.yo dben pa nam mkha' bzhin/_/tshul khrims lta 
[\[255b.7\]]ba'i gnas med mkhas pa kun gyis bsngags/_/tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar ston pa/_/gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul khrims bsnyen/_/de bas tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa ba'i 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gzhi/_/gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa/_/yo byad bsnyungs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems sbyangs pa/_/tshul khrims de yi gnas des sems rkang thar pa'i rten/_/de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thar gnas 
[\[256a.2\]]pa/_/g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod/_/nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin spyod/_/byang chub phyir nges mi gtong byang chub kun mi rtog_/gang mkhas chog shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin//_//'phags 
[\[256a.3\]]pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba/_bam po gnyis pa/_rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/_bzhi 
[\[256a.4\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang /_lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spyos kyang slar mi spyo ba dang /_bsam pa nam mkha' dang 
[\[256a.5\]]mtshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/_
[\[256a.6\]]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang 
[\[256a.7\]]nam mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nam mkha' ni ma snad ma nyams pa ste lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nam mkha' ni bag la nyal thams cad 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]spangs pa ste bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nam mkha' ni yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nam mkha' ni ma skyes ma byung ba ste ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa can gyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[256b.2\]]nam mkha' ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa thams cad la khyab pa ste byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[256b.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni 'di brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang /_smon pa med pa la bzod kyang byang chub tu smon pa 
[\[256b.4\]]med pa ma yin pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang /_skye ba med pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa dang /_'byung ba med pa la bzod kyang skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang /_sems 
[\[256b.5\]]can med pa la bzod kyang dngos po rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o/_/bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[256b.6\]]'di dag bdag la gshe yang bzod do snyam pa de ni nga yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/_'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/_/'di dag gshe ba bdag gis bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni ngar 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/_de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/_/
[\[256b.7\]]'di dag ni yi ge bsnor ba'o snyam pa de ni sgra dang skad kyi bzod pa ste/_de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/_/'di yang stong pa bdag kyang stong pa'o snyam pa de ni yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/_de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/_/bdag 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]gis bzod pa bya'o snyam pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/_de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na shing sA la chen po'i tshal yod par la la zhig 'ongs te/_shing sA la bcad na de la shing sA la bcad pa'i lhag 
[\[257a.2\]]ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad do/_/bdag ni ma bcad do snyam du mi sems te/_de dag la rjes su chags pa yang med/_khong khro ba yang med de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du/_gang bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs 
[\[257a.3\]]pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad gtsang /_/yid ni yul la ma chags shin tu bsgoms/_/phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa/_/nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam 
[\[257a.4\]]sems mchog bzod pa'o/_/lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi shing rtsig pa 'dra/_/sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra/_/chos 'di lta ba'i gnas med nam mkha' bzhin/_/lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med/_/bkur sti byed la dga' dang zhe sdang med/_/mtho dang dma' 
[\[257a.5\]]bar rnam par rtog pa med/_/theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de/_/sems can dag par bstan 'dir bzod smra yin/_/srog med gang zag bdag med sems can med/_/chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing /_/rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed/_/de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog 
[\[257a.6\]]yang dag nyid/_/kha ngan zer ba'i tshig thos mi gshe zhing /_/byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin/_/bdag rnam bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de/_/bstan 'dir sems can gtsang ma bzod smra yin/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 
[\[257a.7\]]nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/_/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom yang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]par rab tu shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi 
[\[257b.2\]]dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs 
[\[257b.3\]]pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus gang gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur rig pas mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon 
[\[257b.4\]]par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlar rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams 
[\[257b.5\]]cad rab tu sdud par byed kyang de gcig nas gcig tu sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags te yang dag 
[\[257b.6\]]par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzin par byed pa de yang sgra brag ca 
[\[257b.7\]]dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /_brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so/_/de la sbyor ba'i 
[\[258a.2\]]brtson 'grus ni lus dang ngag dang sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o/_/yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni len pa med pa/_'dor ba med pa gnas med pa ste/_nam byang chub sems dpa' lus dang ngag dang sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas par shin tu brtags nas mi dmigs 
[\[258a.3\]]shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[258a.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang chos thams cad la mi gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams 
[\[258a.5\]]cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo tog skye yang rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang 'jig tshogs la 
[\[258a.6\]]lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus de yang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par 
[\[258a.7\]]sbyor zhing gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun du ston to/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun du sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_gang la rtsom pa de yang rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[258b.2\]]dag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas/_/lus dang srog la'ang phangs par mi byed cing /_/bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/sems can phan pa'i don byed phan sems pa/_/sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ci srid pa/_/byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor/_/de dag skyo bar 
[\[258b.3\]]'gyur ba'ang yong med de/_/phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed/_/sems can bsam mi khyab pa dgrol bar brtson/_/sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa mchod par brtson/_/zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab blta bar brtson/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams 'dul bar brtson/_/
[\[258b.4\]]sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtang bar brtson/_/tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab bsrung bar brtson/_/bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson/_/brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson/_/bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab sems par brtson/_/shes 
[\[258b.5\]]rab bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson/_/byams pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson/_/don dang yon tan sgrub pa rab tu brtson/_/srog dang lus kyang mi phangs brtson par byed/_/nyon mongs 'thab pa kun las rnam par grol/_/stong pa rnam thar bdag med mngon 
[\[258b.6\]]par brtson/_/bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyid brtson/_/lta las rnam grol byang chub phyir yang brtson/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson/_/sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob/_/g.yo ba med pa'i chos rnams ston par brtson/_/'gro ba kun du spyod 
[\[258b.7\]]cing rnam par grol/_/bshad cing klog pa la ni rtag tu brtson/_/chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das/_/sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la brtson/_/'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams smra/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med/_/sems can spyod pa 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]rnams la'ang mtha' med de/_/mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus sbyor/_/sems can spyod mtha' med la rab tu 'jug_/chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gag med de/_/mkhas pa de dag sems kyang mi zhum zhing /_/phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen 
[\[259a.2\]]rab bskyed de/_/'di 'dra'i chos la sems can bsgom du btsud/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin 
[\[259a.3\]]te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste sems nang du yang dag 'jog la nang du sems gnas par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_sems phyi rol nas kyang zlog la phyi rol du sems rgyu ba yang mi dmigs pa dang /_bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams 
[\[259a.4\]]cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sems mnyam pa nyid de yang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/
[\[259a.5\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_
[\[259a.6\]]bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod 
[\[259a.7\]]pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i sems ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/_de la nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/_gang chos rnams la mi mtho mi dma' ba/_mi stod mi smod pa/_'gyur ba med pa/_rnam par mi rtog 
[\[259b.2\]]pa/[ {]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med pa/_'bri ba med pa/_'dzin pa med pa/_gtong ba med pa/_mun pa med pa/_snang ba med pa/_rtog pa med pa/_rnam par rtog pa med pa/_'du shes med pa/_yid la byed pa med pa/_gcig pa'ang ma yin/_gnyis pa'ang ma yin/_gnyis ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa/_
[\[259b.3\]]g.yo ba med pa/_rlom sems med pa/_spros pa med pa/[ {]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med pa/_bri ba med pa/_sgom pa med pa/_'jigs pa med pa ste/_gang mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa/_gang sems mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o/_/sems nges par rtog pa 
[\[259b.4\]]ni gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/_mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/_/sems nges par rtog pa ni sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/_rna ba dang sgra dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam 
[\[259b.5\]]gtan byed do/_/sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/_sna dang dri dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/_/sems nges par rtog pa ni ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/_lce dang ro dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam 
[\[259b.6\]]par dag par bsam gtan byed do/_/sems nges par rtog pa ni reg pa rnams la mi rgyug ste/_lus dang reg pa dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/_/sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/_yid dang chos dang 
[\[259b.7\]]rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_bskal pas sreg pa na nam mkha' mi 'tshig cing /_chus 'jig pa na nam mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tshig cing bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang ma chags pa yin no/_/mnyam par bzhag pa yang yin la sems 
[\[260a.2\]]rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do/_/mnyam par bzhag kyang dga' ba med la langs nas kyang khong khro ba med pa yin no/_/'phags pa'i skye bo rnams la zhi ba nye bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 
[\[260a.3\]]'grus rab tu 'bar bar yang byed do/_/mnyam par bzhag cing mnyam pa yang yin la mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa yang rab tu ston to/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa yang mi mthong la/_mi mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do/_/de ni 
[\[260a.4\]]mi 'gal zhing 'gal ba med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang 
[\[260a.5\]]chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/_mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bsam gtan rnams kyis dbang po yongs su dag_/dran pa rtse gcig yid ni 
[\[260a.6\]]mnyam par bzhag_/gnas rnams thams cad la yang mi gnas shing /_/'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag_/nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi/_/phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing /_/nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te/_/mkhas pa de dag rtag 
[\[260a.7\]]tu mnyam par bzhag_/mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid/_/shin tu dben pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing /_/mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chags so/_/'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'chi 'pho skye ba 'chi ba nyer ston kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin las de dag mi nyams te/_/de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o/_/gzugs med ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la/_/sems can rnams ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed de/_/de dag 
[\[260b.2\]]bdag dang sems can mi gnas so/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te/_/sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs shing smig rgyu 'dra/_/rmi lam chu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du/_/chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag_/'gro ba kun gyi sems kyi spyod yul du/_/'gro ba rnams 
[\[260b.3\]]la sems dang blo 'jug cing /_/sems rgyud la ni sgrib pa med pa ste/_/rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes/_/bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis/_/zhing rnams mang po bye bar der 'gro zhing /_/mi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i yid/_/rgyal ba bsam 
[\[260b.4\]]mi khyab la mchod par byed/_/dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i yid/_/zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing mi rtog pa/_/de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid/_/rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag_/mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yong med la/_/mnyam pa nyid ces bya bar 
[\[260b.5\]]mtshan med de/_/mnyam nyid de la gang dag rab gnas pa/_/de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[260b.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /_ye shes rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[260b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /_don rnam par dag pas yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang rtag par lta bar mi sbyor ba dang /_mi dge 
[\[261a.2\]]ba'i chos thams cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi ltung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par snang yang nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang /_
[\[261a.3\]]chos kyi sdom bzhi'ang ston la mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las byed cing rnam par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba dang /_spros pa med pa'i chos 
[\[261a.4\]]shes pa la gnas pa yin yang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi snang ba la rab tu rnyed pa yin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/_rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag 
[\[261a.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o/_/yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba med pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go/_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go/_/gnas med pa'i phyir 'di 
[\[261a.6\]]ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshig go/_/yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go/_/'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go/_/ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go/_/bcings pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni yid rno 
[\[261a.7\]]ba'i tshig go/_/'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni ngoms pa'i tshig go/_/shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go/_/brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di ni don gyi tshig go/_/khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs pa'i tshig go/_/mi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]snying po'i tshig go/_/mi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go/_/rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go/_/byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol ba'i tshig go/_/rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshig go/_/snang ba mi 
[\[261b.2\]]dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni mun pa med pa'i tshig go/_/sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i tshig go/_/shin tu zad cing byang ba'i phyir 'di ni zad pa'i tshig go/_/'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni mi zad pa'i tshig go/_/sbyor ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go/_/
[\[261b.3\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go/_/sgrib pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go/_/gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go/_/ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshig go/_/rnam par shes pa dang ye shes 
[\[261b.4\]]gnyis su med pa'i phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go/_/gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i tshig go/_/mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni lus med pa'i tshig go/_/kun du rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go/_/sred pa'i bag la nyal 
[\[261b.5\]]yang dag pa bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa'i tshig go/_/rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir 'di ni 'gog pa'i tshig go/_/gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni bsgom pa'i tshig go/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di ni sangs 
[\[261b.6\]]rgyas pa'i tshig go/_/rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/_gang de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i phyir 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o/_/gang nges par bstan pa thams cad la nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan 
[\[261b.7\]]pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/_rjes su 'gro bas chos chung ngu la yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]shes rab lta dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod/_/rab tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing /_/rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston/_/mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su gcod par byed/_/bdag dang sems can la yang mi gnas shing /_/gang zag 
[\[262a.2\]]srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med/_/dngos dang dngos med gnyis las thar byed de/_/shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan/_/shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs med/_/shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol/_/shes rab ye shes byed cing rnam par spyod/_/
[\[262a.3\]]shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston/_/shes rab kyis ni bsgribs pa'i rtsa ba spyod/_/phung po khams ni yongs su shes pa'i mtshan/_/mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa/_/shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes/_/yongs su dag spyod 
[\[262a.4\]]shes rab ces bya ste/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mi gos spyod/_/spyad pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod/_/shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzes/_/mig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing /_/dbang po lnga ni yongs su snang bar byed/_/'gro ba lnga rnams rab tu gcod 
[\[262a.5\]]par byed/_/phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to/_/pha rol tshu rol rtag tu mi gnas shing /_/chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas/_/bar snang dang ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su mthun zhing 'phags/_/rnyed dang ma rnyed gnyi ga'i mtha' 
[\[262a.6\]]las grol/_/dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa/_/gang rnams 'phags pa thams cad song ba yi/_/'chi ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston/_/sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs/_/lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu 'chad/_/bden pa shes 
[\[262a.7\]]par shes rab 'di 'jug ste/_/des ni sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad/_/zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin/_/chos rnams thams cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben/_/sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshungs/_/shes rab blos dpyod pas ni 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]'di shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/_de dag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon de yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/_/rigs 
[\[262b.2\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa de yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags shing bsags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed cing de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 
[\[262b.3\]]tshad med par rab tu gnas so/_/de la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bdag gis bsod nams tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin 
[\[262b.4\]]te/_de la byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan dang dpe 
[\[262b.5\]]byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[262b.6\]]sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_spyod pa dang ye shes dang spyod lam tshad med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[262b.7\]]zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang dpyod pa tshad med pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas mdzod spu yongs su spyad pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bla ma la rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang nga rgyal bcom pa tshad 
[\[263a.2\]]med pas dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sgyu dang g.yo med par 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang 'thun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po de 
[\[263a.3\]]dag ni gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de nam mkha' tshad med pas de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med par kun du gnas 
[\[263a.4\]]te/_de bas na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/_gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing /_sems can thams cad kyi sems 
[\[263a.5\]]'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i 
[\[263a.6\]]sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/des bdag 'dod chags 
[\[263a.7\]]med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/_/des bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/_/des bdag nyid gti mug med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/_/des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin 
[\[263b.2\]]las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/_/des 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/_/'dod chags dang /_
[\[263b.3\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[263b.4\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis su med pa'i mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes te/_chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/_chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang gi dbyings/_chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de gti mug gi dbyings/_chos kyi 
[\[263b.5\]]dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so/_/de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du'o zhes bya ste/_chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang 'gro ba'ang med/_mi 'gro ba'ang med do/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/_gang bdag 
[\[263b.6\]]gi dbyings shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so/_/de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/_
[\[263b.7\]]gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o/_/gang rab tu snang ba de bla gab med pa'o/_/gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do/_/gang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/_mi gnas pa ni nam mkha'o/_/gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/_gang tshul khrims 
[\[264a.2\]]las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang mi nyams pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ba'o/_/shes rab las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos thams cad rgyu ba 
[\[264a.3\]]med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sems gnyis pa la yang mi gnas pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la yang mi chags pa'o/_/stobs las sangs 
[\[264a.4\]]rgyas rjes su dran zhing dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi g.yo ba'o/_/mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu yang mi gnas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings 
[\[264a.5\]]mnyam pa nyid du yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[264a.6\]]dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[264a.7\]]mthong la/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o/_/gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad med de/_lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'o/_/
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]gang de lta bu rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do/_/'greng ba dang /_
[\[264b.2\]]'chag pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_smra ba dang /_mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do/_/de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed do/_/de dran pa yid la mi byed 
[\[264b.3\]]pas gzugs dang /_mtshan dang chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste gang la mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad kun du spyod pa med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems 
[\[264b.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/_chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa'o/_/de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/_/chos zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o/_/de la gang chos gang la 
[\[264b.5\]]sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/_/chos zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba ste/_gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/_/chos zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ste/_gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par 
[\[264b.6\]]shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/_/chos zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_gang 'dus byas su rab tu gzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/_/yang chos rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par 
[\[264b.7\]]mthong ba ste/_yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so/_/gang gis de ltar mngon 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]par rtogs pa de ni chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/_'di ni slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa ni 
[\[265a.2\]]'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/_de la chos gang yang kun du spyod pa med do/_/chos gang yang kun du spyod pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang 
[\[265a.3\]]zhe na/_dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so/_/gang na lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las kun du spyod pa med pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do/_/
[\[265a.4\]]'dus ma byas ni gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'o/_/tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba 
[\[265a.5\]]rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/_gtong pa zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des chos gang yang btang ba med do/_/'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/_'di la gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni gtong 
[\[265a.6\]]ba'i mchog go/_/gang mi 'dzin pa de ni mi gtong ngo /_/gang mi gtong ba de ni mi snyems so/_/gang mi snyems pa de ni dmigs par mi byed do/_/dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do/_/rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o/_/gang la sems kyis 
[\[265a.7\]]rnam par rig pa med pa de ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/_/gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/_gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu 'ang bsngo ste/_de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rjes su dran pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/_gang 'di gnyis 
[\[265b.2\]]su med pa de yid la byed pa ci yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran 
[\[265b.3\]]pa gang zhe na/_tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_zag pa med pa/_smon lam med pa/_lhun gyis grub pa/_brtul zhugs grub pa/_brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas te/_
[\[265b.4\]]sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/_spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/_gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/_/mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/_gzugs snang ba ma yin no/_/nyon mongs pa zhi ba 
[\[265b.5\]]ste/_so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes 
[\[265b.6\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/_lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas 
[\[265b.7\]]na 'khod pa rnams so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no/_/yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te bcu gang zhe na/_pha 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams 
[\[266a.2\]]cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don dang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_shes pa thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang /_dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 
[\[266a.3\]]'jug pa shes pa dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang /_spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun du gzigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying 
[\[266a.4\]]po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo lta bu'i chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no/_/de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/_bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/_yid la 
[\[266a.5\]]byed pas ma 'khrugs/_spros pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/_de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid 
[\[266a.6\]]thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod pa yin zhe na/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/_tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/_dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams 
[\[266a.7\]]sbyor ba med pa ste/_skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing /_sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_thabs dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni shin tu byin gyis brlabs/_shes rab dang /_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/_mngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni bsgom pa yongs su dag_/sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni gnas te/_nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu skyed pa'am/_'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 
[\[266b.2\]]'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang mi 'chad do/_/de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su 
[\[266b.3\]]tshad zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/_ye shes kyi sgo gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i 
[\[266b.4\]]mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa gang yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/_'di ni sngon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go/_/gang yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis 
[\[266b.5\]]mkhyen te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig_/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis mi rig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/_
[\[266b.6\]]spyod pa de'i gang ngo bo nyid dam/_gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/_rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/_rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/_byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/_tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/_zhe 
[\[266b.7\]]sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/_gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/_skal ba mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/_lha'i mtshan nyid dam/_mi'i mtshan nyid dam/_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/_bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/_nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/_
[\[267a.2\]]spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la 
[\[267a.3\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug 
[\[267a.4\]]pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzud pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do/_/ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi 
[\[267a.5\]]zad cing mtha' med pa'o/_/chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas/_gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang 'chad pa dang /_'chad par 'gyur ba de thams 
[\[267a.6\]]cad ni de bzhin no/_/ma nor ba de bzhin no/_/gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/_de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/_don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[267a.7\]]de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/_de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/_de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni stong gsum 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du yang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so/_/yang don gcig tu bstan te ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu 
[\[267b.2\]]ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do/_/de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing don thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/_sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/_
[\[267b.3\]]bdud thams cad pham par byed/_mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/_nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrogs pa de ltar 'dzin to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos 
[\[267b.4\]]dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no/_/yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o/_/yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[267b.5\]]rgyas she na/_yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /_yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang /_shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang /_mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[267b.6\]]gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang /_rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sems chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul 
[\[267b.7\]]gyis 'dod chags med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la brten nas de 'dra bar chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_gang chos de'i 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi nus so/_/de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/_yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams 
[\[268a.2\]]dang /_gang zag gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/_de la sems 
[\[268a.3\]]can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/_byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/_sems can du lta bar ma yin/_srog tu lta bar ma yin/_gang zag tu lta bar 
[\[268a.4\]]yang mi 'gyur ro/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log ste/_rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_srid pa dang /_sred pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo/_/de la byang chub 
[\[268a.5\]]sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/_dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to/_/sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[268a.6\]]thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud ce na/_tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug 
[\[268a.7\]]pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon par 'grub bo/_/sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshul 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/_lha dang mir skyes nas byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/_tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[268b.2\]]do/_/bzod pa dang des pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems brgyan pas byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/_phan par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas 
[\[268b.3\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/_byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus brtsams nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par grub 
[\[268b.4\]]pa'i brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun skong ste/_
[\[268b.5\]]zhi gnas kyi tshogs de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing dmigs pa med pa'i thos pa de yang 
[\[268b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bsags pa de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/_rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin 
[\[268b.7\]]yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/_ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag med do/_/ji ltar na bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams cad stong ngo /_/ji ltar bdag ming 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad do/_/de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro/_/gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[269a.2\]]thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/_de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/_'di 
[\[269a.3\]]la rigs kyi bu'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu 
[\[269a.4\]]rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de/_ye shes dang ldan/_shes rab dang ldan/_blo dang ldan/_bzod pa dang ldan/_tshul khrims dang ldan te/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing lus dben sems dben te/_'di 
[\[269a.5\]]'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar 'gro zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/_yul med pa'i yul can/_cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/_rab tu dkar ba'i blo nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa snang ba thob pa/_ye shes 
[\[269a.6\]]rab rib med pa/_bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/_ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/_zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa/_lhag mthong gi tshogs bsags pa/_sbyin pas brtan pa/_tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/_bzod pa'i go gyon pa/_brtson 'grus kyi ya lad 
[\[269a.7\]]bgos pa/_bsam gtan la gnas pa/_shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_byams pas rjes su 'thun pa/_snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/_thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa bskyed do/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin du 'phags shing de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/_gzugs thams cad mthong /_sgra thams cad thos/_sems thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[269b.2\]]thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa/_zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing /_yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/_des chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na 
[\[269b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba 
[\[269b.4\]]yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs 
[\[269b.5\]]kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don 
[\[269b.6\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dang /_rkyen gang yin pa de la 
[\[269b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/_/de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 
[\[270a.2\]]'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_
[\[270a.3\]]'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de ni rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o/_/sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dang rkyen gang yin pa de la 
[\[270a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/_de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin zhe na/_sems 
[\[270a.5\]]can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/_/rang gi ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams sbyor ba shes so/_/gzhan yang zab mo zhes
