[\[270a.6\]]bya ba ni 'jig tshogs dang /_bdag rnam par dag pa dang /_chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig tshogs ni kun du btsal kyang mi dmigs so/_/gang mi dmigs pa de ni zab mo'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes 
[\[270a.7\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag pa ste/_ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rnam par dag go/_/de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/_de la chos gang yang ma skyes/_ma skyed/_ma 'gags/_mi 'gag 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa ste/_de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/mun pa med pa/_snang ba med pa/_kun gzhi med pa/_rab rib med pa/_don dam pa zab mo gang la mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/_de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no/_/gang 
[\[270b.2\]]yul ma yin zhing yul byed pa de ni don dam pa ste/_de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o/_/de la sems dang yid 'dzin pa med de rtogs par dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing sems can gzhan la 
[\[270b.3\]]yang rab tu ston te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no//_//'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/_bam po gsum pa/_rigs 
[\[270b.4\]]kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/_mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang rten pa de ni ci yang ma yin pa/_gang 
[\[270b.5\]]rten pa de ni dngos po med pa/_gang rten pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa/_gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal ba bdag med pa/_zhi ba/_gang rten pa de la ni bdag med/_sems can med/_srog med/_gso ba med/_skyes bu med/_gang zag med/_
[\[270b.6\]]shed las skyes med/_shed bu med/_gang rten pa de la ni yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/_gang rten pa de la ni ci yang med pa/_rtsol ba med pa/_stong pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_dben pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_ma spros pa/_spros pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir skye ba ni chos kho na skye/_'gag 
[\[270b.7\]]pa ni chos kho na 'gag ste/_'di la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gso ba'am/_skyes bu'am/_gang zag gam/_shed las skyes sam/_shed bu med ces bya'o/_/chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de dag la ni skye ba ci yang med cing bdag po med de/_de'i 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_lam dang /_mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/_ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba na skyed par byed pa med/_'gag pa na yang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du nang gi chos rnams skye ba na yang skyed par byed pa 
[\[271a.2\]]med/_'gag pa na yang 'gog par byed pa med de/_gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi rkyen ma tshang na 'gog go snyam du sems te/_de ltar na shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/_mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/_gang de 
[\[271a.3\]]mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa ni chad pa dang rtag pa dang bral ba ste/_de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/_mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral 
[\[271a.4\]]ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/_de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa de ni phyag rgya 
[\[271a.5\]]ste/_phye ba med pa/_'jug pa med pa/_mngon par zhen pa med pa/_mi bskyod pa/_bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[271a.6\]]ni phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/_shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/_shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/_shin tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/_shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/_shin tu 'dod chags 
[\[271a.7\]]dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/_shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/_shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/_shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/_dper na nam mkha' phyag rgya mi snang ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de yang spyan lnga la mi snang ste rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]rgyas btab pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ji snyed du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa de bzhin du tha snyad 'dogs so/_/de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do/_/gang dag rnam 
[\[271b.2\]]par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par mi byed/_chos tha dad du mi byed do/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do/_/de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/_gang dag tha ma dang 'bring dang rab kyi chos 
[\[271b.3\]]rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o/_/gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dad mi byed do/_/gang ji snyed mang por brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/_dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' la 
[\[271b.4\]]rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams ni 'brel par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do/_/gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag 
[\[271b.5\]]rgyas btab pa yin te/_de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad las yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rdul thams 
[\[271b.6\]]cad dang bral ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so/_/yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings so/_/ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i dbyings so/_/'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so/_/rgal ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i 
[\[271b.7\]]dbyings so/_/'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyings so/_/dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so/_/gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings so/_/don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so/_/gnas med 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so/_/'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so/_/nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyings so/_/rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so/_/gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya 
[\[272a.2\]]ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/_'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang brjod pa dang /_ston pa de thams cad ni chos 
[\[272a.3\]]kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/zhe sdang gi 
[\[272a.4\]]khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhe sdang ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/gti mug gi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gti mug ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/nyon 
[\[272a.5\]]mongs pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/'dod pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings 
[\[272a.6\]]kyi rang bzhin can no/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[272a.7\]]gzugs med pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/mig gi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/yid kyi 
[\[272b.2\]]bar gyi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid kyi rnam 
[\[272b.3\]]par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/phung po'i khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_
[\[272b.4\]]rlung gi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chos thams cad kyi bar dang /_chos kyi 
[\[272b.5\]]dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir chos thams cad rab 
[\[272b.6\]]tu shes pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi 
[\[272b.7\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi phyed pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba mi phyed pa 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]dang /_sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab mi phyed pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang /_sems can yongs 
[\[273a.2\]]su smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi phyed pa dang /_'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba mi phyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa 
[\[273a.3\]]dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor bar mi phyed pa dang /_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang 
[\[273a.4\]]chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni mi phigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa 
[\[273a.5\]]rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang /_nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las mi phyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar 
[\[273a.6\]]sra zhing mi phyed de/_theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul ma 
[\[273a.7\]]yin pa/_yul med pa yul thams cad las yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas rang gi yul yongs su sbyong ste/_de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/_dben pa'i yul la ni mig gi yul gang yang med do/_/rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring 
[\[273b.2\]]ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/_dben pa'i yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang med do/_/sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[273b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/_dben pa'i yul la ni sna'i yul gang yang med do/_/lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 
[\[273b.4\]]dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/_dben pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul gang yang med do/_/lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul 
[\[273b.5\]]yin pa'i phyir te/_dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang med do/_/yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te dben 
[\[273b.6\]]pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang med do/_/phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis la yang de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid 
[\[273b.7\]]kyi yul thams cad dben par 'jug go/_/rang gi zhing yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben par 'jug go/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i de bzhin du de yul thams cad la yang mi chags mi thogs te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji 
[\[274a.2\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par gyur te/_de la gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[274a.3\]]po 'di dag ni gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa ste/_sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa dang /_chos la gzhol ba dang /_chos la bab pa dang /_mang du thos pa rnams la sten 
[\[274a.4\]]cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang /_chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /_rjes su bsten pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa dang /_chos smra ba'i gang zag 
[\[274a.5\]]rnams la ston pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /_kun 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa la le lo med pa dang /_chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cing zang zing med par chos sbyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang tshul 
[\[274a.6\]]bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir mang du thos pa mu med par byas pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par byas pa dang /_rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang /_rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[274a.7\]]yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug mi 'dor ba dang /_gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang /_bya ba 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]la 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang /_'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yong mi 'chad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang /_sems can la lta bas 
[\[274b.2\]]snying rje che ba dang /_chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor ba dang /_ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/_'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang 
[\[274b.3\]]zhe na/_gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang /_dran pa rjes su dran pa dang /_rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /_blo gros 'dod pa dang /_yi ge mi zad pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_
[\[274b.4\]]spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang /_don dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan 
[\[274b.5\]]pa shes pa dang /_bden pa la 'jug pa nges pa shes pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'god pa shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang /_dbang po'i rim pa shes 
[\[274b.6\]]pa dang /_stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang /_'thun pa shes pa dang /_lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang /_zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang /_lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa 
[\[274b.7\]]dang /_rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]par shes pa dang /_sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang /_don dbyer med par shes pa dang /_tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang /_so so ci rigs 
[\[275a.2\]]par chos ston pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang /_tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyor ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs 
[\[275a.3\]]pa shes pa dang /_rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/_'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o/_/lus dang ngag dang sems sa dang 'dra ba'i chos kun du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/_chos kyi char 'bebs pa 
[\[275a.4\]]dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/_gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod par shes par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na 
[\[275a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 
[\[275a.6\]]'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/_nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa myur ba dang /_spobs pa mgyogs pa dang /_spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang /_
[\[275a.7\]]zab mo la spobs pa dang /_sna tshogs la spobs pa dang /_legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang /_zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang /_mdo dang rtogs pa 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]brjod pa dang /_sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang /_mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang /_spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang /_tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang /_chos ston pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i 
[\[275b.2\]]spobs pa dang /_lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang /_the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_'khor la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang 
[\[275b.3\]]snyoms kyi spobs pa dang /_skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no/_/de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba 
[\[275b.4\]]nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/_nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla ma'i ngag mi gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/tshur shog ces bya ba dang song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags pa med 
[\[275b.5\]]pas spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[275b.6\]]sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/chung ma legs par brgyan te rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi 
[\[275b.7\]]phung po legs par kun du bsrungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa dang ldan 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa dang /_rim gro byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang sngon byung ba la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal ba dang dbul ba dang mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/gter 
[\[276a.2\]]mi zad pa sbyin pa dang /_pha rol chos la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/tshig bden pa dang /_tha ba med pa dang /_ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/bla ma'i 
[\[276a.3\]]tshig khyad du mi gsod pa dang gzhan gyi tshig mi gcog pas tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bstan pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/bdag la mi stod pa dang /_gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_phangs 
[\[276a.4\]]pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs par 'gyur ro/_/chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang /_chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/bstan bcos thams cad shes pa dang /_gzhan la 
[\[276a.5\]]mi gnod pa dang /_nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang /_sman rab tu sbyin pas 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang /_gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang /_'khrul 
[\[276a.6\]]pa la mi rtog pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par spyod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa thams 
[\[276a.7\]]cad don du mi gnyer bas 'khor la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro/_/bka' blo bde ba dang /_des pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /_sems dga' ba dang /_gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par mi byed pas skye ba 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang /_theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang /_sems can la snying rje che ba dang /_thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par 
[\[276b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can gzhan gyi 
[\[276b.3\]]sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la/_rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/
[\[276b.4\]]rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang 'chi 'pho dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_
[\[276b.5\]]'di lta ste/_sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa dang /_
[\[276b.6\]]shes rab dang thabs zung du 'brel ba dang /_mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang ma byung bar so sor rtog pa dang /_bsams bzhin du skye ba dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sems can lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang /_snying rje chen po la nges par 
[\[276b.7\]]sems pa dang /_chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang /_'chi 'pho med par 'pho zhing skye ba dang /_chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos la 'jug pa dang /_phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]pa nas skye ste/_'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang /_'pho ba dang /_'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni 
[\[277a.2\]]rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang /_'chi 'pho dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na 
[\[277a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/_/
[\[277a.4\]]ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/_/yang 
[\[277a.5\]]des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/_des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/_gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/_theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang /_sems can tha 
[\[277a.6\]]dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang /_skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_de la chags shing ro myong ba'i bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi chos ngan pa 
[\[277a.7\]]la smod pa bdud kyi las dang /_'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mi sngo ba bdud kyi las dang /_nyon mongs pa la mi smod pa bdud kyi las dang /_ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang /_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang /_byams pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /_chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang /_
[\[277b.2\]]zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang /_thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan 
[\[277b.3\]]pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang /_nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang /_dus ma yin par bsgrub pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /_snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud 
[\[277b.4\]]kyi las dang /_'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /_'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang /_sems sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang /_nga rgyal la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang /_lce gnyis smra ba dang /_g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang /_bcos ma la dga' ba 
[\[277b.5\]]dang /_mi drang ba dang /_rtsub cing brlang ba dang /_sdig pa la mi smod pa dang /_chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang /_thos pa cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang /_chos ma yin pa don du gnyer ba dang /_chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_chod pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba rnam par mi 
[\[277b.6\]]gnon pa bdud kyi las dang /_sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang /_dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/_rigs kyi bu ji tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang /_dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so/_/chos bzhis ni bdud kyi las 'di 
[\[277b.7\]]dag las shin tu 'da' ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang /_dad pa dang brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]te dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[278a.2\]]bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/_'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/_bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chags 
[\[278a.3\]]par gnas pa yin/_slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/_bsod nams dag gis longs spyod mi zad pa yin/_bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/_mthon dman gyi yid med pas sems sa dang mtshungs pa yin/_tshul khrims yongs su dag 
[\[278a.4\]]pas bsam pa 'byor ba yin/_mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgrib pa med pa yin/_chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa 
[\[278a.5\]]yin no/_/ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_chos shes pa la mkhas pa 
[\[278a.6\]]gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[278a.7\]]de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]phyin pa yin/_/zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pas 
[\[278b.2\]]spyan lnga yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/_bsod 
[\[278b.3\]]nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas 
[\[278b.4\]]kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya 
[\[278b.5\]]mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed par de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod de/_
[\[278b.6\]]de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba'am/_gzugs su snang ba'am/_sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/_de'i 
[\[278b.7\]]phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol ba yin no/_/de 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor rtog pas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[279a.2\]]cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu thams cad zad pas bri ba'am gang ba med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba'am gang 
[\[279a.3\]]bar mi byed do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshon tshad med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan 
[\[279a.4\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/_/'di ni rgya mtsho'i 
[\[279a.5\]]phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin 
[\[279a.6\]]zhe na/_chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni nam mkha'i dkyil na mi chags 
[\[279a.7\]]so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa yang sems can thams cad la mi chags so/_/yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni spyod pa dang /_cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/_de la cho ga ni dran pa'o/_/spyod pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o/_/de dag ni mun pa dang 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bral zhing snang ba thob pa yang yin te de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o/_/snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis 
[\[279b.2\]]ye shes thob pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob 
[\[279b.3\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing /_/mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la/_/mtshan ma ldang ba yongs su spangs 
[\[279b.4\]]nas su/_/byang chub phyir bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur/_/nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas/_/de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed/_/mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/_/kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed/_/rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa/_/gzugs 
[\[279b.5\]]dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te/_/gang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyu ba/_/de ni 'thun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran/_/chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben/_/zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med/_/gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur pa/_/de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa 
[\[279b.6\]]yin/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/_/stong pa mtshan med smon lam rnam par grol/_/de la sems med dran dang 'jug pa med/_/de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin/_/phung po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong /_/nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par 
[\[279b.7\]]'dor/_/snyems pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag_/'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran/_/tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med/_/'byung ba med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa/_/de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin/_/lha gang 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dag cing dri med nyon mongs med/_/dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur pa/_/sems can dag pa de dag 'di dran zhing /_/bdag kyang myur du de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni/_/nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi 
[\[280a.2\]]byed/_/chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol/_/de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/_/rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang brnyes pa/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing /_/gang gis rdul med mtha' 'dir rab shes pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin 
[\[280a.3\]]yin/_/bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag_/chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtogs pa/_/de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te/_/sems can gtang phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed/_/sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing /_/de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong 
[\[280a.4\]]ba med/_/lta ba nor ba rab tu spang bar ston/_/de 'dra de ni sems can mang po sbyong /_/'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu ston/_/sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/_/de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes/_/sgra skad 
[\[280a.5\]]dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni/_/brag ca 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing /_/de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par/_/de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs thob bo/_/kun du 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_/chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam pa rab bshad kyis/_/bdag dang sems 
[\[280a.6\]]can chos su rlom sems med/_/de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin/_/rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing /_/legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa/_/dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur/_/gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/_/chos ni 
[\[280a.7\]]rnam pa kun du bsags med pas/_/chos la mi 'phro 'phros pa med pa'ang min/_/dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar/_/de ltar de yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs/_/yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni/_/thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chad mi 'gyur bar/_/mdo 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]sde stong phrag bye ba rab du 'chad/_/sems can dbang por sems can 'du shes med/_/sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du/_/rgyun mi 'chad par chos ni rab ston cing /_/bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed/_/spobs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/_/chos 'di 
[\[280b.2\]]thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes/_/gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la/_/sems can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin/_/sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das/_/de dag de ltar kun du skye ba med/_/su yi bzod pa 'di 'dra'i 'od 
[\[280b.3\]]gsal ba/_/de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin/_/phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong /_/chos dbyings ji 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes/_/dbang po drug ni grong stong 'dra mthong ba/_/de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'da'/_/sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams/_/bag 
[\[280b.4\]]yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing /_/chos la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa/_/de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'/_/gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye med shes/_/'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med/_/chos rnams 'ong med song ba med shes pa/_/de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro/_/
[\[280b.5\]]gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing /_/byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med/_/bdag dang sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug_/de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul lo/_/rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong /_/'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la 
[\[280b.6\]]min/_/'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba/_/de ni sems dpa'i rdzi ba med pa yin/_/pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la/_/chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing /_/sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med/_/mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de/_/srid pa gsum 
[\[280b.7\]]po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang /_/stong par 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing /_/lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems can sgrol/_/de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa/_mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul min mkhas/_/chos rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes/_/tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya/_/sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur/_/sems ni sems la nams kyang mtshams mi sbyor/_/'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya/_/nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar/_/chos 
[\[281a.2\]]rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces/_/nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa/_/sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa/_/gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang /_/gsog dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang rtag pa med par shes/_/de ni byang chub snying por 
[\[281a.3\]]myur du 'gro/_/chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni 
[\[281a.4\]]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to/_/lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag 
[\[281a.5\]]kyang dkrol nas/_'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dong ba yin no/_/gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis 
[\[281a.6\]]rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[281a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas/_mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/_bstan pa 'di ni rgyun mi 'chad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[281b.2\]]la mkhas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshims par gyur to/_/theg pa chen po 'di yang rgyas par rjod pa mdzad par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la 
[\[281b.3\]]yang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o//_//'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus 
[\[281b.4\]]pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 
[\[281b.5\]]de/_ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/_nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do/_/myur bar spobs pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu nam mkha' mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 
[\[281b.6\]]la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha' las 
[\[281b.7\]]char dbab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/_'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad ma rgya ni rgyang grags kyi tshad/_'dab ma bye ba stong phrag 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/_gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/_dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/_kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/_mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/_pad ma de mthong ba dang dri bsnams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 
[\[282a.2\]]'gyur ba de bdag gis mthong ste/_'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad ma'i char phob shig snyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag tu/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad ma'i char mngon par 
[\[282a.3\]]phab ste/_de nas 'khor de dag thams cad pad ma de dag gi dri mthong zhing tshor bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/
[\[282a.4\]]skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ye shes kyi stobs legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 
[\[282a.5\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob shig_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/_de'i mod la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par phab bo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas 
[\[282a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob shig_/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu nas ri rab kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che grangs med dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa kha dog tha dad pa 
[\[282a.7\]]yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_spug dang /_dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang /_dri med dang /_rin chen byi ru dang /_zla ba'i 'od dang /_me shel dang /_snang byed dang /_'od mchog dang /_'dzam gling 'od dang /_me 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'od dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_an da rnyil dang /_yon tan 'byung gnas dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang /_chu 'od dang /_chu mdog dang /_chu dang bar byed dang /_sa'i 'od dang /_mi phyed pa'i gnas dang /_mig mi bzod pa dang /_brgya byin thogs pa dang /_rgyal ba dang /_cher rgyal ba dang /_gzi brjid 'bar 
[\[282b.2\]]ba dang /_dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang /_rdo rje'i ze ba can dang /_'jig rten snang ba dang /_skar ma dga' dang /_'od 'dzin dang /_zla gam dang /_'dzam bu'i chu 'od dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi 'od dang /_'od stong ldan dang /_skar mda'i sgo dang /_me'i 'od dang /_rgyal bas brgyan pa dang /_tsha ba zhi byed dang /_gdung ba 
[\[282b.3\]]med dang /_nad sel dang /_mig sbyong dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid sbyong dang /_yan lag rnam par snang ba dang /_rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang /_'od sngon po dang /_'od ser po dang /_dkar po dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_rin po che'i dra ba dang /_rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa 
[\[282b.4\]]dang /_ming de lta bu dang /_ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/_nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming ni bskal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[282b.5\]]rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba/_zas dang skom med pa/_gcer bu gos med pa/_gos ral po gyon pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/_gcer bu rang gi skras yog pa/_mchil ma dang 
[\[282b.6\]]ngar snabs dang /_khrag dang /_rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir zas dang /_skom dang /_gos kyi char khyod kyis phob shig_/de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_bldag 
[\[282b.7\]]pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang /_btung ba thams cad kyi char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/gos kha dog du ma dang /_kha dog tha dad pa dang /_kha dog brgya stong du ma dang /_phra zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]char rab tu phab ste/_de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang /_dbul po thams cad dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad kun tshim par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' 
[\[283a.2\]]mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med pa nad du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du sman chen po'i char gang gis na ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba phob shig_/de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi 
[\[283a.3\]]char mngon par rab tu phab ste/_des nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig_/de nas 
[\[283a.4\]]de ma thag tu bar snang las 'od rab tu btang ste/_sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/_ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi 
[\[283a.5\]]bar gyur te/_'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pa dang /_rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang /_glu'i dbyangs dang /_bran pho 
[\[283a.6\]]dang /_bran mo dang /_chung ma dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_slas dang /_rta dang /_bal glang dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung dang /_bzhon pa dang /_khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_yang 
[\[283a.7\]]tog dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_zla ba kham pa lta bu dang /_khri dang /_khyogs dang /_glang bzhi pa dang /_glang bcu drug pa nas rta cang shes stong gis drangs pa dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu bab bo/_/de nas 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag long la byin cig_/yongs su gtang bar bgyis te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[283b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni phab na/_da yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i char phob shig_/des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs 
[\[283b.3\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed brjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo /_/de bzhin du bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang 
[\[283b.4\]]ci tsam phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las ma lus par yongs su rdzogs par byung ngo /_/chos kyi sgra des stong 
[\[283b.5\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so/_/de nas tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam 
[\[283b.6\]]mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' zhig na'am/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba'i sems kyi kun du rtog pa sems kyis shes so/_/shes nas kyang 
[\[283b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang bas lha'i mig gis phyogs 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/_des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa dang /_chos kyi sgra thams cad grag pa dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[284a.2\]]zhing de dag na yang ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung ba mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs grub pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_
[\[284a.3\]]ga lar yang cig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[284a.4\]]'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang /_chos kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis rin po che'i char dang /_chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu 
[\[284a.5\]]sems skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs sa mo lnga brgya byung nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams 
[\[284a.6\]]cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na bdag cag la'ang khyo stsol cig_/de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_bud med de dag gi sngon gyi khyo'i kha dog dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes bu lnga brgya nam mkha' las babs 
[\[284a.7\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/[(]srid [,]sring [)]mo dag bdag bdag gi khyo ji lta ba bzhin du khrid cig_/de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo /_/de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar 
[\[284b.2\]]smin par byas so/_/de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal/_/de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i 
[\[284b.3\]]khyo stsal te/_/bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis/_/chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste/_/g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas stong /_/zag med ye shes bdag gis rab rtogs te/_/slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o/_/byang 
[\[284b.4\]]chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi/_/sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin/_/bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab/_/'dren mchog thub pas de dag lung bstan pa/_/khyed 
[\[284b.5\]]cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni/_/spyad pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag_/shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur/_/yang de'i tshe na mi lnga brgya gsad par chad de gsad du khrid pa las de dag gis bar snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems 
[\[284b.6\]]dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis de la khyed cag phyag 'tshol cig dang gsad pa 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra zhig thos so/_/de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs 
[\[284b.7\]]skrag pas sgra skad gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes tshig de skad ces smras so/_/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs te/_der lhags 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]nas gshed ma'i mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag gsad de ci rung /_nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la nged cag gi srog chod de mi 'di dag khye shig_/de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir gsad par chad pa'i mi lnga brgya 
[\[285a.2\]]po de dag btang ste/_sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag bsad do/_/de nas mi bsad pa las btang ba de dag gsod pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[285a.3\]]yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la yang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag cag gi srog dang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na/_bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas bdag 
[\[285a.4\]]la sman pa dang /_gzhan la sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la stsal du gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang /_'di ltar khyed rnams 
[\[285a.5\]]bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/_
[\[285a.6\]]grogs po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig_/de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/_de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[285a.7\]]chos tshul yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]mi dengs pa'i nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon/_nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ji nam mkha' skam pa'am zad pa yod dam dengs par 'gyur ram/_smras pa rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub de ni nam 
[\[285b.2\]]mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas de bas na nam mkha' la mdzod mi skam mi zad mi dengs so/_/yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba ni kho bos byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do/_/smras pa rigs 
[\[285b.3\]]kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon/_smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pas mkhyen to/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 
[\[285b.4\]]ji srid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag 
[\[285b.5\]]mchis kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur te/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji 
[\[285b.6\]]snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo cig bzhag la de lta bur bgrang ba dang mtshan ma bzhag pa de snyed kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[285b.7\]]pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi thad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan 
[\[286a.2\]]pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin tu byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[286a.3\]]yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[286a.4\]]dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi 
[\[286a.5\]]gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa dgu khri drug stong yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo/_/de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas bar gyi 
[\[286a.6\]]bskal pa bzhi bcur/_bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang rim gror byas te nyin gcig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong snyed kyi rin po che'i phung po zad par 'gyur ba de lta bus bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas so/_/de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang /_
[\[286a.7\]]grong gi mi rnams dang /_'khor rnams dang bcas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma byang chub sems 
[\[286b.2\]]dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/_bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[286b.3\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang bsti stang byas te byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag pas bsam pa 
[\[286b.4\]]yongs su sbyangs te/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin 
[\[286b.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[286b.6\]]sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i 
[\[286b.7\]]klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]phyin pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /_thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /_thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag 
[\[287a.2\]]pas byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so/_/de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems 
[\[287a.3\]]yongs su dag pa ste/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pas dge ba'i 
[\[287a.4\]]rtsa ba'i bar du des/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' 
[\[287a.5\]]las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/_shA ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la yang zad pa med do/_/des na 'di nam mkha' mdzod ces bya'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang 
[\[287a.6\]]chub sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang /_lag na rin po che dang /_nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[287a.7\]]rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrags pa'i mdzod mnyan to/_/nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par 'dug la/_nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang /_chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i 
[\[287b.2\]]yid rnams kyi/_/thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin/_/de la 'jug pa'i rab bstan gyis/_/khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis/_/nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med/_/dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/_/gang gi chos nyid mtho dma' med/_/de la 'dud pa ga la yod/_/nam mkha' 
[\[287b.3\]]la ni skye ba med/_/'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/_/de la rnam par rtog pa med/_/nam mkha' la ni bri ba med/_/gang ba dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/chos rnams gang med bri med de/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo/_/nam mkha' la ni 
[\[287b.4\]]mun pa med/_/de ni de yis snyon mi smongs/_/sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/de bas nams kyang snyon smongs med/_/nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis/_/nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang /_/gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba 
[\[287b.5\]]med/_/mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang /_/nam mkha' la ni nyon mongs med/_/de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis/_/rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs/_/bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis/_/nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med/_/rnyed dang bsti stang thams cad kyis/_/
[\[287b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed/_/bstod pa dang ni smad pa la/_/nam mkha' yongs su mi rtog ste/_/de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo/_/sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni/_/nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba min/_/'jig 
[\[287b.7\]]rten 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med/_/bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na/_/ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa/_/de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi gdung /_/skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med/_/
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ji ltar nam mkha' gnas pa bzhin/_/chos rnams 'gro med 'ong ba'ang med/_/chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas/_/gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa/_/nam mkha' las ni thams cad 'byung /_/chos su snang ba ji snyed pa/_/de dag chos kyi dbyings las 'byung /_/mtshan 
[\[288a.2\]]ma med cing gzugs med pa/_/nam mkha' bltar yod ma yin te/_/de ltar sems rnams rab shes na/_/nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs mnyam mo/_/ming tsam pa ni nam mkha' ste/_/de la kha dog dbyibs kyang med/_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes kyang /_/ming gis yongs su 
[\[288a.3\]]bstan pa'o/_/ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med cing /_/thams cad du yang gzung du med/_/de bzhin ye shes mthu chen yang /_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs/_/sems can nam mkhar 'gro mod kyi/_/de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med/_/sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang /_/
[\[288a.4\]]de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma min/_/ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yi lus/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba/_/de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid/_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs/_/khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang /_/mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs/_/'di ltar sreg pa'i 
[\[288a.5\]]bskal pa la'ang /_/nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs/_/ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis/_/nams kyang yongs su gang mi nus/_/de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang /_/sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang ngo /_/tshig chen seng ge'i sgra dag gis/_/'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs 
[\[288a.6\]]pa ni/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab gang /_/de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas/_/tha ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang /_/mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[288a.7\]]gang gis yang dag nyid shes na/_/de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing /_/dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing /_/yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa/_/dngos po dang ni dngos med pa/_/lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to/_/stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags/_/
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]sgra la stong pa nyid med de/_/de ni sgra med brjod pa med/_/de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni/_/stong pa nyid ni brjod du med/_/gang de stong zhes bya ba yang /_/de yi don ni brjod du med/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang /_/mig yor dang ni brag ca 
[\[288b.2\]]rnams/_/de la sogs pa bshad pa yis/_/'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to/_/sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/_/dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te/_/rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la/_/gnyen po rnams ni mi dmigs so/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang /_/mtshan nyid du 
[\[288b.3\]]ni rab tu bstan/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan gzhi med pa dag_/chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs so/_/mtshan gzhi nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/nam mkha'ang mtshan nyid med pa yin/_/gang gis tshul 'di rab rtogs pa/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/chags pa med 
[\[288b.4\]]cing bcings pa med/_/shin tu cung zad med pa ste/_/spros med spros dang bral ba de/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/sems can las ni ma grol ba/_/sems can la yang mi gnas shing /_/sems can rang bzhin ye shes kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya/_/
[\[288b.5\]]sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das/_/thos nas dngang bar mi byed de/_/gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa/_/dpa' bo dag gi go cha 'di/_/sgyu ma byed pa'i sems can dag_/mang du sprul nas der bsad kyang /_/de la bsad pa gang yang med/_/sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no/_/
[\[288b.6\]]sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun/_/rnam pa kun du rang bzhin gcig_/rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs/_/nam mkha' las ni nam mkha'i mdzod/_/mi zad pa yi mdzod grub ste/_/sems can thams cad mgu byed cing /_/mdzod de zad par mi 
[\[288b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni/_/mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste/_/chos rnams la yang 'pho med par/_/chos rnams chos nyid blta bar bya/_/rgyu la rten te 'byung ba yi/_/chos rnams thams cad rab shes na/_/de yi mdzod ni mi zad de/_/chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]khyab/_/chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad par/_/'jig rten mgon pos rab gsungs te/_/sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so/_/de ste de dag rdzas yin na/_/de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi/_/de dag med pas mi zad ces/_/de bas 
[\[289a.2\]]de ni mi zad gsungs/_/chos ni rab tu skad cig pa/_/zad pa chos ni mi zad de/_/mi zad de la zad pa med/_/de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis/_/chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na/_/des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/byang chub phyir la yang dag zhugs/_/tshigs 
[\[289a.3\]]su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/lha'i bu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhes 
[\[289a.4\]]bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la dris shig dang /_'dis 
[\[289a.5\]]khyod la lan ldon no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par gyur to/_/nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[289a.6\]]brag ca'i sgra ga las byung /_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las brag ca'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu brag ca la lus sam/_sems sam/_gzugs sam/_kha dog gam/_dbyibs gang yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni 
[\[289a.7\]]med do/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji ltar brag ca yongs su ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin du/_nam mkha' yongs su ma grub ste/_sgra skad go bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa su/_gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung /_smras pa/_
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsams pa de bar snang 'di las 'byung yang sems der 'gro ba yang med/_de 'dir 'ong ba yang med mod kyi/_sgra'i sgra brnyan kyang 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 
[\[289b.2\]]'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa la ltos/_/gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang rgyu 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'pho la/_/rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_/rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par grub pa'i chos 'di gnyi ga la yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do/_/gang de lta bu'i 
[\[289b.3\]]'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa/_shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa bsal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/_/gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[289b.4\]]de ni rnam par byang ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyi ga yang brda'i tshig go/_/don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dmigs su med do/_/don dam pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma yin te/_gang 'di mtha' 
[\[289b.5\]]ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/_/gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o/_/gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha'o/_/gang bdag gi mtha' de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/chos thams cad ni de'i mtha'/_stong pa nyid kyi mtha'/_
[\[289b.6\]]nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/_gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ltad mo can zhes ming sus btags/_
[\[289b.7\]]smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang brtson pa de dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du ltad mo dang ldan te/_de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad 
[\[290a.2\]]mor gyur te/_de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/_/gang la kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/_'jug pa de gang yang med pas de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/_/gang du kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bdud kyi las thams cad kyi 
[\[290a.3\]]skabs med de de'i phyir na kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su brjod de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang 
[\[290a.4\]]gang la 'ang mi chags te/_/chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras
