[\[310a.1\]]pa'i sgo ste/_gang du gnas re rer sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'o/_/tshangs pa 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por ni 'bab chu thams cad 'bab pa de bzhin du/_chos kyi sgo'i gnas gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'du'o/_/tshangs 
[\[310a.2\]]pa 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la gzugs su snang ba thams cad yang dag par 'du ba de bzhin du/_chos kyi sgo'i gnas gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ste/_de'i phyir gnas 'di ni mi zad pa'i gnas te/_'bum bzhag pa'i gnas so/_/tshangs pa 'di lta 
[\[310a.3\]]ste dper na/_'bum bzhag pa'i gnas gcig tu 'bum thams cad yang dag par 'du ste/_de dag lo stong du bzhag nas phyung yang 'bum de snyed kyang gnas de la mi 'byar la gnas kyang 'bum la mi 'byar ba de bzhin du/_tshangs pa bskal pa brgya stong du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bgrangs 
[\[310a.4\]]shing bzhag la gzhal kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lus la song ba'am sems la song bar mi 'gyur te/_bshad kyang rung ma bshad kyang rung ba de snyed do/_/de snyed pa de yang de snyed ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te de snyed dam/_de snyed ma yin pa zhig rnyed na ni de rnyed pa nyid du 
[\[310a.5\]]'gyur na/_gang gi phyir de dag ni de snyed kyang ma yin te/_de snyed ma yin pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir de dag ni de snyed dam/_de snyed ma yin pa zhes mi brjod do/_/tshangs pa gang sangs rgyas kyi chos bgrang ba de ni chos thams cad bgrang ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni sangs 
[\[310a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'du shes kyis kun brtags pa ma yin te/_'du shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[310a.7\]]rab tu bstan te/_gang 'du shes kyang med 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'i kun rtog pa de ni chos kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni mtshan nyid de lta bu ste/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis dag pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis dben 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste mtshan nyid med pa ni nam mkha'o/_/nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis gtam shin tu brjod pa 'di bstan pa na/_tshangs pa'i 'khor de nas tshangs pa khri nyis stong ni bla na med 
[\[310b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa'i tshangs pa lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//_//'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas byang 
[\[310b.3\]]chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi sems de chos gang dag gis bsdus na phyir mi ldog par kun du gnas/_nam 
[\[310b.4\]]mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni chos rnam pa gnyis kyis bsdus pas phyir mi ldog par gnas so/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa gang gis bsdus/_
[\[310b.5\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bsam pa ni g.yo med pa dang sgyu med pas bsdus pa'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni de la ma chags pa dang /_khyad par du 'gro bas bsdus so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po 'di dag gang gis bsdus/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po 'di dag ni/_chos 
[\[310b.6\]]brgyad kyis bsdus te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_g.yo med pa ni drang po dang gsal bas bsdus so/_/sgyu med pa ni bcos ma ma yin pa dang /_bsam pa dag pas bsdus so/_/de la ma chags pa ni sems ma god pa dang /_brtson 'grus ma god pas bsdus so/_/khyad par du 'gro 
[\[310b.7\]]ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos brgyad po 'di dag gang gis bsdus te/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos brgyad po 'di dag ni chos bcu drug gis bsdus te/_bcu drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drang po ni zhi ba dang des pas bsdus 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]so/_gsal ba ni nga rgyal med pa dang /_thibs po med pas bsdus so/_/bcos ma ma yin pa ni byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen pos bsdus so/_/bsam pa dag pa ni lus dang sems yongs su dag pas bsdus so/_/sems ma god pa ni brtan pa dang stobs kyis bsdus 
[\[311a.2\]]so/_/brtson 'grus ma god pa ni de nyid byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bsdus so/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sbyor ba dang sbyor ba mthar 'byin pas bsdus so/_/ye shes kyi tshogs ni thos pa dang thos pa bsgrubs pas bsdus so/_/rigs kyi bu chos brgyad po de dag ni chos 
[\[311a.3\]]bcu drug po 'di dag gis bsdus so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu drug po 'di dag gang gis bsdus/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu drug po 'di dag ni chos sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsdus te/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zhi ba ni ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pas 
[\[311a.4\]]bsdus so/_/des pa ni bka' blo bde ba dang /_'grogs na bde bas bsdus so/_/nga rgyal med pa ni khyad du mi gsod pa dang /_'dus pas bsdus so/_/thibs po med pa ni dri ma med pa dang /_mi rtsub pas bsdus so/_/byams pa chen po ni khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams 
[\[311a.5\]]cad la sems mnyam pas bsdus so/_/snying rje chen po ni yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya bas bsdus so/_/lus yongs su dag pa ni mi 'tshe ba dang /_rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pas bsdus so/_/sems yongs su dag pa ni dul ba dang zhi 
[\[311a.6\]]bas bsdus so/_/brtan pa ni yi dam mi zhig pa dang /_dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas bsdus so/_/stobs ni blo rab tu gnas pa dang /_blo mi g.yo bas bsdus so/_/de nyid byed pa ni ji skad smras pa dang /_de bzhin du byed pas bsdus so/_/yang dag pa'i nan tan ni yang 
[\[311a.7\]]dag pa'i sbyor ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol bas bsdus so/_/sbyor ba ni sgrol ba dang /_mi ldog pas bsdus so/_/sbyor ba mthar 'byin pa ni pha rol gyi sgra dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus so/_/thos pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'thun par 'dzin pas bsdus so/_/thos pa 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bsgrubs pa ni rab tu sems pa dang /_des par sems pas bsdus so/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu drug po de dag ni chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis bsdus so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag chos du zhig gis bsdus/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos sum cu 
[\[311b.2\]]rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni chos drug cu rtsa bzhis bsdus te/_drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngo tsha shes pa ni nang du so sor rtog pa dang /_dbang po yang dag par sdom pas bsdus so/_/khrel yod pa ni phyi rol gyi yul srung ba dang /_mkhas shing rtogs pa la 'dzem pas bsdus 
[\[311b.3\]]so/_/bka' blo bde ba ni chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod pas bsdus so/_/'grogs na bde ba ni lus yid du 'ong ba dang /_sems yid du 'ong bas bsdus so/_khyad du mi gsod pa ni ma khengs pa dang /_chos spyod pas bsdus so/_/'dud pa ni lus gya gyu med pa dang /_sems 
[\[311b.4\]]gya gyu med pas bsdus so/_/dri ma med pa ni dri ma gsum bsal ba dang /_rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pas bsdus so/_/mi rtsub pa ni mi brlang ba dang /_phra ma med pas bsdus so/_/khong khro ba med pa'i sems ni bdag bsrung ba dang /_gzhan srung bas bsdus so/_/sems can 
[\[311b.5\]]thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni tha dad pa med pa dang /_ro gcig pas bsdus so/_/yongs su mi skyo ba ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin dang /_sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis bsdus so/_/sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba ni mngon par shes pa dang /_thabs kyis bsdus so/_/mi 'tshe 
[\[311b.6\]]ba ni 'dod pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas bsdus so/_/rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa ni 'dod pa nyung ba dang /_chog shes pas bsdus so/_/dul ba ni mi 'khrug pa dang /_mi rtsod pas bsdus so/_/zhi ba ni ngar 'dzin pa 'dor ba dang /_nga yir 'dzin 
[\[311b.7\]]pa spong bas bsdus so/_/yi dam ma zhig pa ni byang chub kyi sems la lta ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la rton pas bsdus so/_/dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pa ni bdud kyi las rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bsdus so/_/blo shin tu gnas pa ni mi 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]'gyur ba'i blo dang /_mi rgod pas bsdus so/_/mi g.yo ba'i blo ni ri lta bu dang /_mi bskyod pas bsdus so/_/ji skad smra ba ni legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang /_mi gdung bas bsdus so/_/de ltar byed pa de ni bden pa dang /_yang dag par smra bas 
[\[312a.2\]]bsdus so/_/yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'thun pa dang /_rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spong bas bsdus so/_/yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni rigs pa dang /_tshul gyis bsdus so/_/sgrol ba ni yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_brtson 'grus mi 'dor 
[\[312a.3\]]bas bsdus so/_/phyir mi ldog pa ni rtul ba dang /_rtsol bas bsdus so/_/pha rol gyi sgra ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_chos don du gnyer bas bsdus so/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang /_lhag mthong gi tshogs kyis bsdus so/_/
[\[312a.4\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni nyan 'dod pa dang /_ri mo byed pas bsdus so/_/'thun par 'dzin pa ni lus yang ba dang /_sems yang bas bsdus so/_/rab tu sems pa ni skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bas bsdus so/_/des par sems pa ni rgyur gyur pa dang /_'bras bu chud 
[\[312a.5\]]mi za bas bsdus so/_/rigs kyi bu chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni chos drug cu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag gis bsdus so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos drug cu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag chos du zhig gis bsdus/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni chos brgya nyi shu rtsa 
[\[312a.6\]]brgyad kyis bsdus te/_chos brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang du so sor rtog pa ni stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa dang rang bzhin la so sor rtog pas bsdus so/_/dbang po yang dag par sdom pa ni dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis bsdus so/_/phyi rol gyi yul srung ba ni 
[\[312a.7\]]dbang po sbas pa dang /_mi rgyug pas bsdus so/_/mkhas shing rtogs pa la 'dzem pa ni bdag gi 'khrul pa la nyes par so sor rtog pa dang /_gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la nyes par lta bas bsdus so/_/chos don du gnyer ba ni bdag gi dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang /_pha rol 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]gyi 'gyod pa sel bas bsdus so/_/chos 'dod pa ni chos la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pas bsdus so/_/lus yid du 'ong ba ni gnyid med pa dang /_gti mug med pas bsdus so/_/sems yid du 'ong ba ni cang shes pa dang /_glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa bsal bas bsdus so/_/
[\[312b.2\]]ma khengs pa ni pho theg spangs pa dang /_brjid spangs pas bsdus so/_/chos spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i chos spangs pa dang /_dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bsdus so/_/lus gya gyu med pa ni mi brlang ba dang /_mi rtsub pas bsdus so/_/sems gya gyu med pa ni yang dag 
[\[312b.3\]]pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus so/_/dri ma gsum bsal ba ni mi sdug pa bsgom pa dang /_byams pa sgom pas bsdus so/_/rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pa ni gang zag med pa dang /_don dam pas bsdus so/_/mi brlang pa ni phan pa dang bde bas bsdus so/_/
[\[312b.4\]]phra ma med pa ni dbyen mi byed pa dang /_bye ba'i sdums byed pas bsdus so/_/bdag srung ba ni sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang /_bsod nams thams cad bsogs pas bsdus so/_/gzhan srung ba ni bzod pa dang /_des pas bsdus so/_/tha dad pa med pa ni sems nam mkha' 
[\[312b.5\]]dang mtshungs pa dang /_sems rlung dang mtshungs pas bsdus so/_/ro gcig pa ni de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyis bsdus so/_/rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni mthong zhing thos la dran zhing shes pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis bsdus so/_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 
[\[312b.6\]]ni rnam par sgrub pa dang /_yongs su rtog pas bsdus so/_/mngon par shes pa ni don la rton pa dang /_ye shes la rton pas bsdus so/_/thabs ni shes rab kyis lta ba dang /_sems can la lta bas bsdus so/_/'dog pa ni ltung ba med pa dang /_ltung ba mi 'chab pas bsdus so/_/
[\[312b.7\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa ni tshe 'di la bag yod pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta bas bsdus so/_/'dod pa nyung ba ni rung ba'i drod zin pa dang /_shes rab kyis mi ngoms pas bsdus so/_/chog shes pa ni dgang sla ba dang /_gso sla bas 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]bsdus so/_/mi 'khrug pa ni shin tu mur thug pa dang /_shin tu mthar phyin pas bsdus so/_/mi rtsod pa ni bden pa dang /_chos la dga' bas bsdus so/_/ngar 'dzin pa 'dor ba ni rgyu yongs su shes pa dang /_lta ba yang dag par bcom pas bsdus so/_/nga yir 'dzin pa 
[\[313a.2\]]spong ba ni nga yi ba med pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pas bsdus so/_/byang chub kyi sems la lta ba ni theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje bas bsdus so/_/byang chub kyi snying po la rton pa ni bdud thams cad bcom pa dang /_chos thams cad mngon par 
[\[313a.3\]]rdzogs par byang chub pas bsdus so/_/bdud kyi las rig pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pas bsdus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas 
[\[313a.4\]]bsdus so/_/blo mi 'gyur ba ni sa dang 'dra ba'i sems dang /_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pas bsdus so/_/mi rgod pa ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pa spangs pa dang /_mi rtag par so sor rtog pas bsdus so/_/ri lta bu ni mi mtho ba dang /_mi dma' bas bsdus so/_/mi bskyod pa ni 
[\[313a.5\]]dam bcas pa mi nyams pa dang /_dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas bsdus so/_/legs par bya ba'i las byed pa ni gdung ba med pa dang /_'gyod pa med pas bsdus so/_/gdung ba med pa ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas bsdus 
[\[313a.6\]]so/_/bden pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pas bsdus so/_/yang dag pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid dang /_de kho na nyid kyis bsdus so/_/brten pa'i rjes su 'thun pa ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis bsdus so/_/rtag pa dang chad pa rnam par spong ba ni skye ba med pa dang /_'gag 
[\[313a.7\]]pa med pas bsdus so/_/rigs pa ni las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_las dang mi 'gal bas bsdus so/_/tshul ni dben pa'i tshul dang /_mi skye ba'i tshul gyis bsdus so/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba ni mi dge ba'i chos spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos chud mi gson pas 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]bsdus so/_/brtson pa mi 'dor ba ni lus kyi stobs dang /_sems kyi stobs kyis bsdus so/_/rtul ba ni spro ba dang /_gzhan gnon pas bsdus so/_/rtsol ba ni de la ma zhen pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pas bsdus so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ldang ba dang /_rim gro byed 
[\[313b.2\]]pas bsdus so/_/chos don du gnyer ba ni ye shes 'dod pa dang /_rnam par grol bar 'dod pas bsdus so/_/zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni lus dben pa dang /_sems dben pas bsdus so/_/lhag mthong gi tshogs ni thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang /_tshul bzhin yid 
[\[313b.3\]]la byed pas bsdus so/_/nyan par 'dod pa ni thal mo sbyor ba'i las dang /_lus rab tu 'dud pas bsdus so/_/ri mo byed pa ni bden pa dang /_mi slu bas bsdus so/_/lus yang ba ni kha zas kyi tshod shes pa dang /_nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba 
[\[313b.4\]]la rjes su sbyor bas bsdus so/_/sems yang ba ni 'dun pa dang /_dpyod pas bsdus so/_/skyo ba ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis bsdus so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba ni nga yi ba med pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pas bsdus so/_/rgyu ni chud mi za ba dang /_de'i 
[\[313b.5\]]rgyu las ldog pas bsdus so/_/'bras bu ni ci rigs par mi slu ba dang /_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la 'dzin pas bsdus te/_rigs kyi bu chos drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni chos brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gis bsdus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad 
[\[313b.6\]]mdor bstan pa ste/_gal te kho bos tshig gcig las lhag pa dang /_tshig gnyis las lhag par bstan pas/_bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan pa bshad kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid zad par yang mi 'gyur la/_kho bo'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 
[\[313b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/chos bsdu ba'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i lag pa g.yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs par byas so/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_
[\[314a.2\]]rol mo dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra ci yod pa de dag rin po che'i lag pa g.yas pa de las rab tu bab bo/_/me tog gi char des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad pus nub tsam du yog par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad kyang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[314a.3\]]dang /_ba dan dang /_gos kyis legs par brgyan par gyur to/_/sil snyan gyi sgra de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang byung ste/_yon tan bdog pa yon tan rgyas pa yon tan brgyas gang ba/_/bdud kyi 'gro ba rnam sel dran dang blo gros rtogs dang ldan/_/skyes bu dam 
[\[314a.4\]]pa dge sbyong mchog gi skad ni mdzes par 'byung /_/phyogs bcu rnams su rgyu bas srid pa rnam par sel bar byed/_shin tu rab tu mos par phul gyis rab tu rgyas pa po/_/srid pa brgya ni rnam par sel cing rdul dang mun pa bral/_/lha dang mi rnams 'jig pa med pa'i grong khyer 
[\[314a.5\]]'gro ba sgrol/_/srid pa med cing stobs bcu ldan pa nam mkha' mnyam pa'i yid/_/sgra 'byin mdzes shing shin tu snyan la rab tu zhi ba'i bzhin/_/tha ba med cing mi khyud dri med dri ma rab tu sel/_/srid pa gsum po dag na mtshungs med lha dang mi yis mchod/_/srid pa med cing 
[\[314a.6\]]'gro ba dag la bde sbyin phan pa byed/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs dang mos pas spyad pa legs par spyad/_/stobs bcu rnams dang rab kyi stobs kyis gzhan gyi stobs kyang 'joms/_/pha rol dpung rnams rnam par 'thor ba 'chi med go 'phang 'thob/_/srid pa med cing skyes bu dam 
[\[314a.7\]]pa mkhas pa'i sgra yang 'byin/_/'khor 'di las ni gang dag tu yang ma song ma g.yos par/_/phyogs bcu rnams su lha mi mang po dag kyang rnam par btul/_/gang du'ang mi gnas blo gros ci 'dra de ltar rab tu gnas/_/chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo bar yang sa ni g.yo bar byed/_/
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa rnam par sel cing rdul spong ltar/_/de bzhin skyes bu dam pa 'di yang rdul dang mun pa sel/_/shes rab 'od kyis rab tu lhan pa 'od kyi dpal gyis rgyas/_/thub pa'i 'od kyis khyab nas bdud kyi gnas kun mog mog gyur/_/mkha' la rlung mar bzhin du sems 
[\[314b.2\]]can spyod pa'i rjes su zhugs/_/gnas pa ma yin rtog pa med cing rtog pa kun dang bral/_/'gro ba kun gyi rjes su song ba yid ni mkha' dang mnyam/_/'di 'dra'i rgyal sras de dag la ni lha mis phyag byas so/_/stong gsum dag gi rgya mtsho'i chu ni gzhal bar nus kyang srid/_/
[\[314b.3\]]phyogs bcu dag gi nam mkha'i bya rjes brjod par nus kyang srid/_/mi 'ga' zhig gis sems can kun sems gcig tu byed srid kyi/_/thub pa'i sras kyi yon tan chen po zad par mi nus so/_/tshigs su bcad pa sgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_bdud sdig can gyis yan 
[\[314b.4\]]lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'khor gyi khyams kyi phyi rol na 'dug ste/_bdag nyid khyim bdag gi gzugs su sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[314b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang /_lag na rin po che dang /_skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni yon tan gyi chos tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan te/_de bzhin du 
[\[314b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang /_cho 'phrul 'jig rten du ston to/_/yang bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul 'di dag la yid ches pa'i sems can la la 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[314b.7\]]rgya mtsho chen po las skra'i rtse mo'i thog mas chu blangs pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can rnams ni skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi cho 'phrul la yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho'i chu'i phung po ji tsam pa de bas kyang mang du ni mi mos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can tshig 'di thos nas 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bro brdungs te 'khor de nas song ngo /_/de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar 
[\[315a.2\]]dga' ste/_'khor 'di nas mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni bdud yin te/_khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'ongs te/_des gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos 
[\[315a.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i sems can nyung zad cig 'byung bar thos nas dge sbyong gau ta ma'i phyogs ni nyung /_bdag gi phyogs ni mang ngo zhes de de ltar dga' nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de 'khor 'di nas song ngo /_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bdud sdig can la 
[\[315a.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can ngo bstan nas ci'i phyir slar 'gro/_de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kyang tshor na/_de bzhin gshegs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos 
[\[315a.5\]]te/_bdag da rang gi gnas su 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bdud sdig can g.yog dang bcas te/_nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug nas rang gi gnas su 'gro mi nus par de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[315a.6\]]nam mkha' mdzod kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can nam mkha' ni sgrib pa med pa yin na ci'i phyir rang gi gnas su mi 'gro/_bdud kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed la ni nam mkha' mi sgrib mod kyi bdag cag gis ni mun par mthong ste/_gang dang gang gi 
[\[315a.7\]]tshe ngo gyan du bltas pa de dang de'i tshe na ni mun pa mun nag tu mthong ngo /_/nam bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas pa de'i tshe ni thams cad du snang bar mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_sdig can de de lta'o/_/gang chos dkar po la sems pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa ni 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]bdud kyi las yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa deng phyin cad bdud kyi las mi bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_'di lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi nang na dam bcas pa la brten pa rnyed par dkas sdig can g.yog dang bcas te bobs la de bzhin gshegs pas bstan 
[\[315b.2\]]pa'i chos 'dul ba nyon cig_/de nas bdud sdig can mi 'dod bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil de nas g.yog dang bcas te babs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams kyis bdud kyi las 
[\[315b.3\]]kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos kyi sgo rnams la spobs par gyis shig_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi ri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang yul yongs su 'dor ba de dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa'o/_/gang yul thams cad 
[\[315b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par rig pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul rig pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yul de yang mi mthong na rang gi yul lta ga la mthong ste/_de ltar yul las shin tu 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das te/_'di ni bdud 
[\[315b.5\]]kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis smras pa/_sems kyi dmigs pa ni bdud kyi yul te/_gang chos gang la yang mi dmigs pa de la bdud kyis ci zhig byar yod/_de gzhi med pas rnyed de/_brten pas 
[\[315b.6\]]rnyed pa ni ma yin la dus las yang rtog par 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches smras pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa la ni bdud kyis glags rnyed kyi 
[\[315b.7\]]chos gang yang yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni su dang yang mi rtsod de/_de gcig pu gnyis su med pas bdag gi sems dang gnas pa dang yang lhan cig mi gnas na bdud dang lhan cig gnas pa lta ci smos te/_mi gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'phags kyis smras pa/_gang ltung ba de ni 'bod pa ste/_gang 'bod pa de la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur gyi/_gang mi ltung ba de ni mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa mi 'jug ste/_mtshan ma med pa'i 
[\[316a.2\]]mtha' la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyon mongs pa ni gzugs brnyan dang mig yor lta bu'o zhes gsungs te/_gang gzugs 
[\[316a.3\]]brnyan dang /_mig yor lta bu de la 'pho ba yang med/_mi 'pho ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med/_song ba yang med/_nang na yang ma yin/_phyi rol na'ang ma yin te/_yul la mi gnas shing phyogs na mi gnas par shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas te/_
[\[316a.4\]]de rnam par mi rtog pas nyon mongs pa mi slong ngo /_/rnam par mi rtog pas nyon mongs pa mi 'gog go/_/de ltar rnam par mi rtog cing kun du rtog pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung 
[\[316a.5\]]gnas kyis smras pa/_gang dga' ba de ni bag la nyal lo/_/gang mi dga' ba de ni khong khro ba'o/_/gang dga' ba'ang med/_mi dga' ba'ang med pa de ni rjes su chags par mi 'gyur/_zhe 'gras par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rjes su chags pa med cing zhe 'gras pa med pa ni 
[\[316a.6\]]mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa de ni chos gang yang tha dad du mi byed do/_/tha dad pa med pa la gnas pa ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par mi sems te/_bsam du med pa'i chos thob pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[316a.7\]]dpa' rin chen 'dor gyis smras pa/_bdag kun nas ldang ba las bdud kyi las rnams ldang ste/_bdag rnam par dag par gnas pa la bdud kyis ci zhig byar yod/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag go/_/nyon mongs pa rnam par 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]dag pas chos thams cad rnam par dag go/_/gang chos thams cad rnam par dag pa de ni nam mkha' rnam par dag pa ste/_nam mkha' rnam par dag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal pos smras 
[\[316b.2\]]pa/_ji ltar rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i stobs dang 'khor mang po dang ldan pa su la'ang mi 'jigs pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa chos rin po che'i 'khor dang ldan pa yang bdud thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/de la dbang bskur ba de ni sangs rgyas 
[\[316b.3\]]kyi chos mthar phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/chos rin po che'i 'khor ni gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos rnams 'dzin pa'o/_/de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ste/_'di 
[\[316b.4\]]ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri rdob rgyal pos smras pa/_de 'di lta ste dper na/_bu gar rlung 'jug pa de bzhin du gang nas gang du sems kyi bu ga yod pa de dang der bdud kyis glags rnyed do/_/de lta bas na byang 
[\[316b.5\]]chub sems dpas rtag tu sems bu ga med par bya'o/_/de la bu ga med pa'i sems ni 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i 
[\[316b.6\]]sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dgas smras pa/_gang ji snyed [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]mthong ba'i nang na sangs rgyas dang chos mthong ba ni de dag gi mchog ces bya'o/_/de la sangs rgyas mthong ba de ni gang gzugs su mi mthong ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[316b.7\]]rnam par shes par mi mthong ba ste/_gang chos thams cad mi mthong ba de ni yang dag pa'i mthong ba'o/_/yang dag pa'i mthong ba ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/_/de la chos mthong ba de ni gang yid la byed pa thams cad mi spyod pa'o/_/gang mi 'gyur bar mthong ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]ba'o/_/gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni chos mthong ba zhes bya ste/_gang byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos mthong ba dang ldan par gyur pa de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ste/_de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes 
[\[317a.2\]]bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mig 'phrul can gyis smras pa/_bdud kyi las ni g.yo ba dang snyems pa dang bskyod pa las langs te/_de la gang gi gzhi las g.yo ba dang snyems pa dang bskyod pa'i gzhi de byang chub sems dpas mi bya'o/_/de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid 
[\[317a.3\]]la byed pa'o/_/de tshul bzhin rab tu sbyar bas mi g.yo mi snyems mi bskyod do/_/de mi g.yo mi snyems mi bskyod pas bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po snang gis smras pa/_gnyen po ji snyed par bdud kyi las kyang de snyed do/_/gnyen po 
[\[317a.4\]]med pa ni chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'dus te/_de bas na gang gis chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa des chos thams cad rtogs so/_/chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang bdud kyi las mi dmigs so/_/gang chos kyi dbyings ji lta bur 
[\[317a.5\]]bdud kyi las kyang de bzhin te/_chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid las tha mi dad do/_/de ltar tshul gcig la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i bal glang gis smras pa/_nyam chung 
[\[317a.6\]]ba la ni bdud kyis glags rnyed de/_/stobs dang ldan pa la ni bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/de la nyam chung ba de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa'o/_/de la stobs dang ldan pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis mi skrag pa ste/_mngon sum pas na mi skrag go_/shin 
[\[317a.7\]]tu rtogs pas na mi skrag go/_/rab tu bsgoms pas na mi skrag ste/_de skrag pa med pas bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/_'di lta ste 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ro gcig pa bzhin du chos kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'dir chos thams cad kyang ro gcig go/_/gang bdud kyi las rnams dang gang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las de dag thams cad ni stong pa nyid du mtshungs/_mtshan ma med par mtshungs/_smon pa med par 
[\[317b.2\]]mtshungs/_skye ba med par mtshungs/_'byung ba med par mtshungs te/_ro gcig pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag nam mkha' ni yul thams cad las 
[\[317b.3\]]yang dag par 'das te/_nam mkha' ni mig gi yul ma yin/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi yul ma yin no/_/chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi yul te/_lus dang ngag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes snang ba'o/_/ye shes 
[\[317b.4\]]snang ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ste/_de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis ji snyed bshad pa de thams cad kyang 
[\[317b.5\]]bdud kyi las dang bdud kyi yul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yi ger byas pa rnams ni rnam par rig pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni yi ge med pa'o/_/tshig ji snyed par bdud kyi las kyang de snyed de/_tshig med pa la bdud kyis ci zhig byar yod/_gang tshig med pa ni rnam par 
[\[317b.6\]]rig pa med pa ste/_bdag dang pha rol yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag med cing pha rol med pas chos gang la yang phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod pa byed par gnas pa ma yin no/_/de ltar rjes su rtogs pa ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[317b.7\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyis bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di thos sam/_
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]smras pa/_thos so/_/smras pa/_sdig can khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed nus sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gis bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di thos sam/_nyan 
[\[318a.2\]]pa de dag la yang bdag gis bdud kyi las byed mi nus na/_ye shes kyis mngon sum du rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lta ci smos/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog byed pa tshogs bral ldan dang /_dga' tshogs ldan dang /_spos can dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[318a.3\]]can dang lha bzhi po de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can gyi mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por sngon stobs dang /_drag shul dang /_bkod pa dang /_g.yog ji lta bu dang lhags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang /_snying 
[\[318a.4\]]rje dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_des pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_brtson 'grus brtan cing 'bar ba dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyag rin po che sa 
[\[318a.5\]]la brdabs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par rab tu g.yos te/_khyod stobs dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas par shin tu pham par byas pa de de ltar khyod la mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi 
[\[318a.6\]]las byed du 'ong ngam/_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mchod pa'i las byos shig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis rin po che'i gdugs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/lha'i me tog dang /_
[\[318a.7\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnam pa tha dad pa mang po thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor nas g.yog dang bcas pas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis nam mkha'i mdzod 'di bdag cag la stsal 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]na bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_sdig can khyod kyis nam mkha'i mdzod 'di mthong ngam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu mthong ngo /_/'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi 
[\[318b.2\]]bkod pa ji snyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa ji snyed pa dang /_bdag gi gnas kyi bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag pas ches lhag pa 'dir mthong ste/_de la ni lha'i 'am mi'i rin po che'i longs spyod de gang yang med pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_sdig can khyod nam 
[\[318b.3\]]mkha'i mdzod 'di dag thams cad sbyin gyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de'i tshe bzhin mi 
[\[318b.4\]]sdug pa la sogs pa bdud kyi bu lnga brgya ma dad cing chos ma yin pa 'dod pas de dag tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gi phas byang chub tu sems bskyed du zin kyang /_bdag cag ni 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs nub par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o zhes 'dzer to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[318b.5\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig gang gis bdud gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byang chub la bkod pa bdud tshar gcod pa'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig la khyod spobs par gyis shig_/
[\[318b.6\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de'i tshe rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/'di lta ste/_a bat+te/_bi bat+te/_saM bat+te/_sa hi tA nu san+d+hi/_du rut+ta ra No/_nir+g+ha ta ni/_mait+ya yuk+te/_kA ru Na niSh+ya n+te/_sat+ya ba ti/_b+hU rak+She/_d+harma ni 
[\[318b.7\]]brit+te/_d+harma rak+She/_ak+khu le/_ni khi li ni/_hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu/_tat+ka re/_ta thA ba di te/_shI la a nu brti/_ak+Sha ya ni rde she/_kle sha pa ri She/_bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thite d+harma dz+wa li ni/_saM g+ha a nu ga me/_a nud+d+ha re/_an+ti kra ma Ni ye/_ni gra ha Ni mA ra pa k+Sha s+ya yuk+ti 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]kr-i te/_a dan+te/_a sha ste/_swa bi kha ya a nu ga me/_Ar+ya gu Na ka re/_sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ba te/_mo k+Sha a nu ku le/_ni gra ha ni ba ra pra ti nAM/_dA r+Sha Ni ma ra par+Sha ta/_a ba shan+tA tsatwA ro ma hA rA dzA na/_sha kro de bA nAM in+d+ra bra h+ma sa ha pa ti/_bud+ha pra san+nA nAM/_de ba nA ga_/
[\[319a.2\]]yak+Sha kr-I taM pa ri trA NAM/_s+thA pi tAn swa s+t+ya yA nAM/_d+harma b+ha na ka nAM/_a rak+Sha ye/_sad+d+ha rma s+ya tsa pa ri gra ha ye/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu/_skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[319a.3\]]khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/bdud kyi bu lnga brgya ma dad cing chos ma yin pa 'dod pa de dag gis bar snang las sgra 'di skad ces bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi bu'am/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag thos nas byang chub tu sems mi skyed cing /_bdud kyi las rnams 
[\[319a.4\]]mi 'dor ba de la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas spyi bo 'gems so zhes thos nas/_bdud kyi bu de dag gis bar snang la bltas pa dang /_de dag gis lag na rdo rje lnga brgya bdag bdag gi spyi bo na rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje thogs shing 'dug pa mthong nas de 
[\[319a.5\]]dag 'jigs shing skrag ste byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i dus na 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /_'dzum pa de'i don tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bdud kyi 
[\[319a.6\]]bu lnga brgya po 'di dag 'jigs shing skrag ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nam bdud sdig can de byang chub thob par 'gyur 
[\[319a.7\]]ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/_de dag thams cad kyang ming tha dad pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji srid na bdud sdig can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_de byang chub thob nas ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/_de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bdud sdig can 'di da dung yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[319b.2\]]rnams su bdud kyi bya ba byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang rdo rje'i snying po nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cho ga gsang ba dang /_spyod lam dang /_yon tan dang /_
[\[319b.3\]]tshul khrims kyi gnas dang /_spyad pa dang /_cho ga dang /_sbyor ba mthong bar 'gyur te/_ci tsam gyis byang chub kyi sems de brtan par gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la bdud sdig can 'di yang tha mar bdud kyi 
[\[319b.4\]]las byed de/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin nas sems med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos kyi snang ba thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rjes su song zhing byang chub kyi sems bskyed do/_/de'i 'og tu grangs med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes 
[\[319b.5\]]par byed de/_bsti stang byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed cing mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu byung nas kyang dam pa'i chos dus gsum du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_sems can tshad med pa yang 
[\[319b.6\]]byang chub la yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de de'i 'og tu bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_rnam par sbyong ba'i bskal pa la yongs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[319b.7\]]gyi khams su shin tu gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o/_/yang kun dga' bo yongs su dag par 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_lha dang mis gang bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_kun dga' bo dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa ci 'dra bar sems can de dag gi 
[\[320a.2\]]longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob ces bya ba de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu thub par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa 
[\[320a.3\]]chen por 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang bdud dang /_bdud kyi bu dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha da ltar na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang yongs su dag 
[\[320a.4\]]par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[320a.5\]]lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/bdud sdig can lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di rab tu bstan pa na/_gang 'khor der 'dus pa'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_'di ltar bdud kyi las de snyed bgyid kyang de 
[\[320a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 
[\[320a.7\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo su zhig gang zag la gang zag gis tshod gzung /_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma lags so zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]de de bzhin no/_/grogs po dag ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/'on kyang grogs po dag sems ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/_ngas sems can 'di dag chags pas gom pa 'deg cing chags pa dang bral bas 'jog pa dang /_kun nas nyon 
[\[320b.2\]]mongs pas chos gos 'dzin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyon pa dang /_len pa dang bcas pas zan kham gyis gcod pa dang /_len pa med par mthong ste/_kye grogs po dag sems can gyi spyod pa ni sna tshogs so/_/mgo smos pas go ba dang /_spros te bshad pas go ba 
[\[320b.3\]]dang /_tshig lhur len pa'i sems can dag yod de/_de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa so so ci rigs par chos la gzud par bstan pa'i gtam rnams gsung ngo /_/kye grogs po dag nyon mongs pa ni yul la yang mi gnas shing phyogs la'ang mi gnas te/_nyon mongs pa ni bsags 
[\[320b.4\]]pa'ang med/_phung po'i dngos po yang med do/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa byung bas nyon mongs pa byung ngo /_/tshul bzhin byung bas rnam par dag pa byung ngo /_/de la de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba de tshul bzhin brtags na rnam par dag pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngas 'di las 
[\[320b.5\]]dgongs te log par lta ba la log par lta ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes na de de'i yang dag par lta ba yin no zhes tshig 'di smras so/_/nam yang log par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta bar ma gyur/_mi 'gyur/_'gyur ba med do/_/'on kyang ji ltar log par lta ba la log par lta bar 
[\[320b.6\]]rig nas de la mi gnas/_rab tu mi gnas/_spyod pa med/_rab tu spyod pa med pa de ni yang dag par lta ba'i lam la 'jug pa ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/_/kye grogs po dag nyon mongs pa ni sgrib par byed pa'o/_/rnam par dag pa ni snang ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa ni nyam 
[\[320b.7\]]chung ba'o/_/lhag mthong ni stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa ni glo bur ro/_/rang bzhin ni rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa ni kun du rtog pa'o/_/rang bzhin ni kun du rtog pa med pa'o/_/kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po 'di ni chu la rten to/_/chu ni rlung 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]la rten to/_/rlung ni nam mkha' la rten to/_/nam mkha' ni rten pa med do/_/de bzhin du sa yi khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_khams bzhi po 'di dag pas ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi nang na stobs che zhing sra ste 
[\[321a.2\]]sogs pa med pa'o/_/sogs pa med pa ni ma skyes ma 'gag pa ste/_rang gi ngang gi tshul gyis gnas pa'o/_/de la gang khams gsum po de dag ni skye ba dang 'jig par ldan pa mi gnas pa ring du mi gnas pa ste/_'di dag ni 'gyur bar snang gi nam mkha'i khams la ni 'gyur ba 
[\[321a.3\]]gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched ni las dang nyon mongs pa la gnas so/_/las dang nyon mongs pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas so/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rang bzhin yongs su dag pa la gnas te/_
[\[321a.4\]]de'i phyir sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs zhes bya'o/_/de la gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang /_gang las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_gang phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched thams cad kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis yang 
[\[321a.5\]]dag par zin na ni skye/_rgyu dang rkyen ma tshogs na ni 'gag ste/_gang de'i rang bzhin de la ni rgyu yang med/_rkyen yang med/_tshogs pa yang med/_skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med do/_/de la nam mkha'i khams ji lta bar rang bzhin yang de bzhin no/_/tshul bzhin 
[\[321a.6\]]ma yin pa yid la byed pa ji lta bar rlung yang de bzhin no/_/las dang nyon mongs pa ji lta bar chu yang de bzhin no/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams ji lta bar sa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/_de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa zhes bya ste/_snying po med 
[\[321a.7\]]pa'i rtsa ba/_mi gnas pa'i rtsa ba/_dag pa'i rtsa ba/_rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba'o/_/kye grogs po dag de ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo ste sgo gang la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgo la mi gnas shing /_rnam par 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]dag pa'i sgo thams cad kyang mi snyems pa'o/_/de dag thams cad snyems pa yang dag par bcom pas tshul dang 'dra bar 'gro ba'i lam khong du chud de bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi yul la 
[\[321b.2\]]rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi yul la zhugs pas/_chos kyi dbyings kyi yul 'khrug par mi byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos 
[\[321b.3\]]kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/_mnyam pa bye brag med pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_
[\[321b.4\]]'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral te/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//_//'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/_bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma/_de nas dge bsnyen dpal sbas zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[321b.5\]]gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par grol ba'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi slad du bshad do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom 
[\[321b.6\]]ldan 'das bsad pa'i slad du shul zhugs kyis gtams par bgyis te bshos kyang dug dang bsres pa sbyar ba des/_bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis chos mang du thos kyang 'gyod pa rab tu bsal bar ma nus kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[321b.7\]]thos nas 'gyod pa de thams cad ma mchis par gyur te/_chos thams cad la snang ba'ang skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'gyod pa ma mchis the tshom ma mchis te snang ba thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]dper na bdud sdig can ltar bdag kyang khyad par du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag legs so legs so/_/ngas bshad pa'i don khyod kyis khong du chud de/_ngas khyim bdag khyod la lung bstan gyis sems dang lhag 
[\[322a.2\]]pa'i bsam pa 'dis bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas te mchod nas/_de dag gi thad nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/_de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og 
[\[322a.3\]]tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa snyed cig mnyes par byas te/_bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgya na shin tu dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rig pa 
[\[322a.4\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge bsnyen dpal sbas kyis/_bcom ldan 'das las bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_
[\[322a.5\]]rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_rgyan ji snyed thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim na gter chen po bzhi mchis te/_rin po che mang po dang /_gser gyis yongs su gang ba'o/_/
[\[322a.6\]]de dag las gter chen po gcig ni khyim gyi bu smad dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa rnams la stsal to/_/gter chen po gcig ni dbul po slong ba thams cad la stsal to/_/gter chen po gcig ni dge slong phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi 
[\[322a.7\]]dge 'dun rnams la 'bul lo/_/gter chen po gcig ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang bar gyur te nga yi ba ma mchis/_yongs su 'dzin pa yang ma mchis na bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi tshul thob par bgyir gsol/_dge bsnyen dpal sbas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi tshul thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' 
[\[322b.2\]]mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa bye bar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di su 'dzin par 'gyur/_de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu langs 
[\[322b.3\]]nas de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das slad bdag cag rnams/_/lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste/_/dam pa'i chos 
[\[322b.4\]]ni gzung bar spro/_/rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su/_/sten pa kun kyang rab spangs te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bstan pa yi/_/chos 'di rjes su mi gtang ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung slad du/_/gshe dang mi snyan mchi ba dang /_/ngan du smra ba'i tshig rnams kyang /_/bzod pa de dag 
[\[322b.5\]]dang du blangs/_/tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su/_/co 'dri ba dang sdigs pa dang /_/mi bsngags pa dang mi snyan pa/_/de dag thams cad bzod par bgyid/_/dmigs pa dag la rab gnas pa/_/bdud kyi pho nya bdud kyi phyogs/_/dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i/_/dge 
[\[322b.6\]]slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig chos can/_/khyim pa dang ni bsten cing gnas/_/bkur sti dag dang rnyed la brkam/_/chos 'di tshol ba mi bgyid do/_/'jig rten rgyang phan rnams dang 'dre/_/bdag la rab tu stod bgyid cing /_/rab tu des pa rnams 
[\[322b.7\]]la smod/_/mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag 'byung /_/dgon pa'i gnas ni spangs nas su/_/rtag tu 'du 'dzi rnams la dga'/_/'jig rten gsang tshig rnams la brtson/_/'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas/_/mi mkhas pa dag dge 'dun las/_/zhal ta byed la rtag tu brtson/_/
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]bsam gtan bsam gtan byed spangs te/_/dkon mchog gsum dang 'dre mi bgyid/_/thos dang khrims kyis ma lags kyis/_/tshogs kyi nang na rnyed pa tshol/_/sbyin pa dag la phyir phyir brtson/_/rtog pa bcas shing mya ngan bcas/_/nga yir 'du shes bzung 
[\[323a.2\]]nas su/_/mdza' dang slong ster khyim la dga'/_/de dag der ni rab 'jug cing /_/'jig rten pa yi gtam rnams bgyid/_/zhing gi don dang khyim gyi don/_/de dag nyo tshong bgyid la gnas/_/thong gshol shal ba rnams ldan yang /_/bdag cag dge sbyong yin zhes 'dzer/_/
[\[323a.3\]]dmigs pa yis ni rab tu bgyid/_/lta ba tha dad kun du gnas/_/stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas/_/de dag g.yang sa bzhin du 'gyur/_/'jig rten pha rol mi spyod cing /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dor/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra dang rab tu ldan/_/chos ma lags la chos su 'dzin/_/dge 
[\[323a.4\]]sbyong rgyal po rab 'khrug cing /_/de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa/_/rnam par 'jig tshe sems can phyir/_/bdag cag dam chos gzung bar bgyi/_/mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du/_/'thun par spyod par mi byed de/_/rang rang gi ni smra rnams la/_/de dag rtag tu mos par bgyid/_/
[\[323a.5\]]mdo sde gang dag rab zab cing /_/rnam grol 'bras bur ldan pa rnams/_/rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de/_/de dag sna tshogs gtam rnams bgyid/_/'di 'dra ba yi dus 'di na/_/don bcas tshig 'brur ldan pa yi/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni/_/rab tu rnam par 
[\[323a.6\]]'jig par 'gyur/_/de yi tshe na sems can yang /_/rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i las kyis bsdigs pa na/_/'jigs shing skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur/_/'jig dus rab tu mi zad pa/_/sdig pa'i dus ni 'di 'dra tshe/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni 
[\[323a.7\]]gang bshad pa/_/chos 'di bdag cag gzung bar bgyi/_/tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su/_/gang dag chos la mi gnas pa'i/_/sems can rnams la byams par bgyi/_/de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi/_/sems can rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa/_/tshul khrims 'chal 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]pa mthong nas su/_/de yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur zhes/_/mchi ma'ang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi/_/dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa/_/de dag 'phral du mthong na yang /_/de dag gshe bar mi 'gyur bar/_/ring nas byams pa btsal bar bgyi/_/rab tu bsdams nas ngag gi las/_/nyams 
[\[323b.2\]]kyis ci nus bsrung bar bgyi/_/sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa/_/de la glo bur gtam mi bgyi/_/nor sbyin de bzhin bsti stang gis/_/mi rnams yongs su smin bgyis nas/_/yang dag sdig med spyod yul gyis/_/slad kyis de dag bskul bar bgyi/_/khyim dang sten pa kun spangs 
[\[323b.3\]]te/_/don nyung ba dang bgyid nyung ba/_/bas mtha' dgon pa'i spyod yul ba/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du 'gyur bar bgyi/_/'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang /_/sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims gnas pa dang /_/mnyam bzhag shes rab ldan pa dang /_/g.yel ba ma mchis 'gyur bar bgyi/_/
[\[323b.4\]]dul ba dang ni zhi ba dang /_/grol bas grong du zhugs nas kyang /_/sems can gang dag chos tshol ba/_/de la bdag cag chos bstan to/_/chos 'dod par ni rtogs nas su/_/shin tu ring du'ang mchi bar bgyi/_/chos la dga' zhing mos rnyed nas/_/sems can rnams 
[\[323b.5\]]kyi don yang bgyi/_/sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po/_/de dag mngon par mthong nas kyang /_/chos dang nges par rab gnas nas/_/bdag la rab tu brtag par bgyi/_/bsti stang bgyis dang ma bgyis la/_/ri rab lta bur gyur nas su/_/'jig rten gyis ni mi gos 
[\[323b.6\]]pa/_/'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar bgyid/_/dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyi/_/mi snyan pa dag rtogs nas kyang /_/las ni bdag gir bya bar bgyi/_/de dag las ni smin ma 'gyur/_/chos rnams la ni gnas pa la/_/nged la de 'dra'i chos rnams ni/_/ji lta 
[\[323b.7\]]bur yang yod med ces/_/gshed ma dag kyang 'gyod par 'gyur/_/bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste/_/dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes/_/yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang /_/mdo sde 'di ni spong bar 'gyur/_/sna dang rna chad de dag ni/_/me long dga' bar mi 'gyur ltar/_/yang 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]dag bskul ba thos pa dag_/de dag dam chos spong bar 'gyur/_/dge slong gang dag dam pa'i chos/_/rab tu 'dzin par 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag bzhin du tshul 'chos kyang /_/gang yang chos 'di mi nyan to/_/rgyal po rnams kyang slu bar bgyid/_/skye bo chen 
[\[324a.2\]]po 'byed 'gyur yang /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byin rlabs kyis/_/sems can de rtag chos nyan 'gyur/_/dus ngan de tshe bdag cag rnams/_/sems can dag la sman slad du/_/lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/_/'jig pa chen po'i dus de 
[\[324a.3\]]na/_/tshig tsam du ni ma lags kyi/_/sgrub pa snying por bgyid par yang /_/mgon pos bdag cag bsam pa mkhyen/_/dam chos 'di ni yongs bzung na/_/bsod nams tshogs ni ji tsam mchis/_/chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/_/'jig rten snang bar mdzad la zhu/_/
[\[324a.4\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shar phyogs kyi stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang rdul phra rab kyi char rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig la/_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_
[\[324a.5\]]byang dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs bcu kun du stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig ste/_de nas rdul phra rab de dag thams cad ji snyed par shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed 'das shing rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag la/_
[\[324a.6\]]tshul de lta bur shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad zad zad du bzhag kyang /_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar thug pa gang yang med do/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji 
[\[324a.7\]]snyam du sems/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi rdul phra rab rnams tshul de lta bus phyogs bcur bzhag pa las tshad dam mtha' rtogs par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so/_/gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag las gang du rdul phra rab de dag bzhag par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur te 
[\[324b.2\]]brtsig pas bskor nas 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi grong khyer de dag yungs 'bru mi rtsub pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang bar gyur na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_yungs 'bru de dag mang ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[324b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar dpe 'di btsal ba ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dpe 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[324b.4\]]pa ni yungs 'bru de dag brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/_stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/_brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/_dkrigs pa dang /_gtams pa dang /_khyad phyin dang /_mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snyed cig ce 
[\[324b.5\]]'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do/_/zhes rab tu mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 'dod pa la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed 
[\[324b.6\]]rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/_sbyin pa byin pa bas ji ltar skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa gang yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu la gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na 'di de bas bsod nams ches 
[\[324b.7\]]mang du skyed do/_/yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gang la la zhig gis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas te mchod pa byas gang zab mo'i chos la bzod pa de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/yungs 'bru ji snyed pa 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]de snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byin pa bas/_gang gzhan zhig sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la rab tu dga' zhing bzod pas gom pa bdun bor na de bas de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed 
[\[325a.2\]]pa de snyed du brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' snyed pa bas gzhan gang gis 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar rig cing chos thams cad la bdag med par rig la/_mya ngan las 'das 
[\[325a.3\]]pa zhi bar rig nas/_sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[325a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod cing rgyas par yang 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab 
[\[325a.5\]]tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/_dgug pa'i tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /_rgya cher 
[\[325a.6\]]rnam par dbye zhing rab tu bstan pa'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di dag ni dgug pa'i tshig go/_/'di lta ste/_d+hu d+hu re/_d+hi d+hi re/_d+h+wa dza ba ti/_d+h+wa dza a laM ka ra/_a ba dwa ni/_sha me sha ma ba ti/_shA na ti mu khe/_ni gra ha pa ra pa k+Sha/_a no d+ha ra/_ut+t+wari bi 
[\[325a.7\]]ga ma/_sa ma pA tha/_pA tha shud+d+hi/_pA tha a nu ga ma/_pA tha san+d+hi/_pradz+nyA mu khe/_Ar+ya ku le/_b+hU ta rak+She a me sa tsa/_me ne sa tsa/_ta ma sa tsa/_ta ta ma sa tsa/_bud+d+ha pA da/_d+harma a nu san+d+hi/_Ar+ya ga na mu kha ma/_Ar+ya nir+g+ha ta ni/_ru sh+ta pra sA da ni/_I shwa ra pa da lo ka 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]tsit+ti kr-i ta/_a nu rA ga yan+tu/_i man+d+harma san+d+hi/_bi b+ha tsan+tu ni ruk+ta/_nirde she pra ti rak+Shan+tu/_d+har+m+ma d+ha ra Ni/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jigs shing skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[325b.2\]]lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par bgyi 
[\[325b.3\]]ba dang /_rjes su gzung ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/_/gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci gang dag chos ma lags pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag shin tu 
[\[325b.4\]]tshar gcad par bgyi'o/_/gang dag chos 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sems rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang yongs su legs par gzhag par bgyi'o/_/tshig gi mtshams su tshig gi mtshams sbyor bar bgyi'o/_/spobs 
[\[325b.5\]]pa yang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_dga' ba yang 'phel bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po de bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_khyed ni 
[\[325b.6\]]nga'i bu chos las skyes pa chos kyis byung ba ste/_khyed rnams nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir spro ba ston pa ni legs so legs so/_/khyed rnams chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa 'dis 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur te/_'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 
[\[325b.7\]]'das nas 'phags pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig bshad 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]par bya ste/_rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de la tshig ni 'di rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_shu b+he/_shu b+ha ma ti/_shu b+ha byU he 
[\[326a.2\]]du da re/_da ri da du ra ni/_da me sha me/_u pa sha me/_khu be/_u ga sha me/_kha be/_u ga kha ra/_a so mu khe/_d+hA ra Ni/_a rad+di/_shu shru She/_sa hi te/_a b+he de b+he da san+d+hi sau me sa ma ba te sa ma rasmi/_a she/_hu hu/_he he/_khu ru khu re/_an ti kra me/_
[\[326a.3\]]deb rlak+Sha sa he he ma hA b+ha ba b+ha sa bra me/_A gats+tsha du sha kro de ba nAM man+t+ra/_da sha sha ta na ya na/_bar ma ku ta d+ha ra/_i shwa ra u ma rut+pa b+ha na ni ba si/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste/_dgug pa'i tshig gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin bkug 
[\[326a.4\]]nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi shugs kyis dga' ba skyes nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas te/_g.yog lha brgya stong mang po dang /_
[\[326a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha la dbang bgyid de/_
[\[326a.6\]]g.yog lha'i tshogs dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de dag dang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag la ji ltar mi gnod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_mos pa rnyed cing chos kyi 
[\[326a.7\]]rgyan gyis brgyan te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]cag chos mnyan pa'i slad du chos smra ba de dag gi gan du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/khro zhing gshe yang dang du blang bar bgyi'o/_/bdud bar chad bgyid pa'i gnod pa thams cad las kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka ji 
[\[326b.2\]]lta bur khyod lha'i dbang po thob pas chos kyi dbang por zhugs nas/_nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa legs so legs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[326b.3\]]bzung na 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_de la rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi bdag 
[\[326b.4\]]po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig bshad kyis/_/dgug pa'i tshig gang dag gis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba nyon cig_/de la dgug pa'i tshig ni 'di rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_mai tre/_shu b+ha mai tre/_d+harma mai tre/_
[\[326b.5\]]mai t+r+ya/_nu sa hi te sa mai tre/_san+d+hi mai tre/_a nu ga ma mai tre/_a nu ga k+Sha mai tre/_a nut+t+wa ra mai tre/_sa tra mai tre/_d+harma mai tre/_a nu gra ha mai tre/_a pra ti sA ri mai tre/_u la lo kan mai tre/_bi lo ka na mai tre/_bi lo ka na mai tre/_be b+h+yaHa nu ga ma na mai tre/_bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+ThA na mai tre/_
[\[326b.6\]]a nu rA ga k+Sha mai tre/_a nu rA ga kha sha mai tre/_d+harma pra ti sA ra Na mai tre/_mo kha sha mai tre/_o no o no nu roM d+he/_bi ro d+ha mai tre/_o to mo mai tre/_bra h+ma ba tha mai tre/_d+h+ya na a lang+kar mai tre/_ta s+ya a nu san+d+hi kA ru Na mai tre/_ta s+ya a nu san+d+hi mu ti ta mai tre/_ta s+ya sa nu san+d+hi/_u pe k+Sha mai tre/_bra h+ma ba 
[\[326b.7\]]tha a nu ga ma na mai tre/_tsit+ta U ts+tsi la l+ya mai tre/_a nu sA ra Na mai tre/_ni sti ra Na mai tre/_sarba ta a nu ga na ma na mai tre/_A gats+tsha tu brah+ma/_ud pri dz+ya/_dA na su khe na/_byut+tiSh+Tha swa ma d+he/_ni tra ma ma hA bi ma nA da/_bya ba lo kA ya/_dzam+bu dwI pa na ku ru ShA d+har+m+ma ra k+ShA na/_mA ti kra ma bud+d+ha 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]d+hi Sh+Tha nA+oM/_nam mkha' mdzod 'di dag ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig go/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa'i gsang sngags byams pa'i tshig 'di dag sangs 
[\[327a.2\]]rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos te/_thos nas kyang tshangs pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[327a.3\]]'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas bdag byams pa dang snying rjer ldan te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i slad du nan tan du 
[\[327a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/gang chos smra ba de dag 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud cing mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba de dag dgon par mchis sam/_lam gol bar mchis sam/_grong dang /_grong khyer 
[\[327a.5\]]ram/_grong rdal du mchis sam/_yul 'khor ram/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mchis kyang rung /_chos kyi gtam bgyid kyang rung ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher 'chad na bsam par bgyi'o/_/bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/de dag la spro ba stsal 
[\[327a.6\]]bar bgyi'o/_/stobs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/dran pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/blo gros yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o/_/spobs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi'o/_/dad pa rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o/_/bcom 
[\[327a.7\]]ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste rgya cher 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/tshangs 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]pa dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/ji ltar ngas da ltar bskor ba bzhin du tshangs pa khyod kyis kyang ring por mi thogs par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba de bzhin 
[\[327b.2\]]du tshangs pa gzhan dag kyang khyod kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa ji tsam du gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 
[\[327b.3\]]rab tu bstan par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes pa bskyed pa dang /_bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thob par 
[\[327b.4\]]bya ba dang /_bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa dang /_mu stegs can thams cad gzhom pa dang /_don dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[327b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du bla na med pa'i 
[\[327b.6\]]chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag dga' ldan gyi gnas na 
[\[327b.7\]]mchis te/_'di lta bu'i mdo sde dag kun du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'di lta bu'i mdo sde dam pa su'i rna bar grag par 'gyur ba dang /_thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cing bdag nyid kyang sbyor bar bgyid pa de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdud kyi phyogs kyang g.yos par gyur 
[\[328a.2\]]te/_'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis bdag gi spu'i khung bu re re grub pa de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur kyang /_de dag bdag gi spu'i bu ga gcig gis yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i brgya'i char 
[\[328a.3\]]yang nye bar mi mchi ba nas dpe'i bar du yang nye bar mi mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu pham par bgyis la/_de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par 
[\[328a.4\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa legs so legs so/_/byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste bdud dang /_nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[328a.5\]]cad tshar gcad pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas zil gyis mnan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba ste/_byams pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las so/_/las bzhi po de dag 
[\[328a.6\]]las gcig gis yongs su bsdus so/_/gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung dang kun dga' bo ji tsam du 
[\[328a.7\]]gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gtad do/_/'od srung chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthu dang /_stobs 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]dang nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis gzung lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis yangs shing rgyas par 
[\[328b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa zab mo zab mor snang ba rgyu ba 
[\[328b.3\]]chad pa/_nges pa'i don mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges par rtogs pa dang /_yid rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_shes rab kyi 'od snang bar byed pa/_rnam par 
[\[328b.4\]]grol ba nges par ston pa/_zhi ba/_ma gos pa/_mkhas shing rtogs pa rnams kyis rig par bya ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/_gzungs dang /_mdo sde'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'dzin pa dang /_dran pa dang blo gros dang /_
[\[328b.5\]]rtogs pa dang /_mos pa rnam par 'phel ba/_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi non pa/_tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams spa 'gong ba/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyung ba dang /_sdom pa tshar phyin pa dang /_gtong ba'i yon tan gyi chos la rab tu gnas pa/_yon 
[\[328b.6\]]tan gyi chos mtha' yas pa las nges par byung ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang ye shes 'di 'dzin tam/_len tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/_yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug 
[\[328b.7\]]gam/_tshig tu 'don tam/_sems sam/_rtog gam/_tshul bzhin nges par sems sam/_nan tan la gnas pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]dag gsungs so/_/phyogs bcu rgya cher dpag tu med pa yi/_/zhing rnams sangs rgyas spyan gyis gang gzigs pa/_/de dag thams cad rin chen rab bkang ste/_/byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin pa bas/_/gang gis sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa yi/_/
[\[329a.2\]]mdo 'di 'dra ba rab bzang ma gos pa/_/'chang ngam klog gam gzhan la ston byed pa/_/de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/_/me tog dri zhim byug pa gdugs rnams dang /_/ba dan rgyal mtshan lda ldi gos rnams kyis/_/zhing de thams cad yongs su gang byas nas/_/byang chub 
[\[329a.3\]]sems dpas sangs rgyas mchod pa bas/_/bde gshegs bstan pa dam chos rab 'jig cing /_/'gag pa'i tshe na gang zhig bag yod pa/_/dam pa'i chos ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/_/de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/_/phyogs bcu dag na rgya mtsho gang yod pa/_/de dag 
[\[329a.4\]]'bru mar dri zhim rab bkang ste/_/snying po ri rab tshad tsam byas nas su/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten me mar bus pa bas/_/gang gis chos sgron 'di ni rab 'jig tshe/_/'jig rten 'di dag mun pas bsgribs shes nas/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos 'di 'dzin byed na/_/de yi bsod nams 
[\[329a.5\]]de ni ches mchog go/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub mchog tshol zhing /_/zhing rnams bye bar 'dren pa gang mthong ba/_/de dag la ni bskal pa bye mang du/_/lha rdzas 'du byed yid 'ong mchod pa bas/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas byas pa gzo ba dang /_/dkon mchog gsum ni rjes su gzung ba 
[\[329a.6\]]dang /_/chos 'di la ni sems can gzud pa'i phyir/_/dam chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mchog go/_/ji ltar mgon po rnams kyi chos 'dzin ltar/_/sems can gang ngas sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs/_/de dag gang gis brgya byin tshangs par bkod/_/de yi bsod nams de snyed 
[\[329a.7\]]mi 'phel lo/_/sems can de kun dgra bcom bkod pa dang /_/rang rgyal theg par rab tu bkod pa bas/_/gang zhig byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/_/dam chos 'dzin pa de ni khyad par 'phags/_/gal te bsod nams de la gzugs yod na/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]cad gang bar 'gyur/_/skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtogs par/_/bsod nams de yi snod ni yod ma yin/_/ji ltar bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa yi/_/bsod nams de yang tshad 
[\[329b.2\]]yod ma yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan 'das las dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsod nams bshad pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[329b.3\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson par mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[329b.4\]]gzhan thams cad ni bdag la yungs 'bru tsam du gda'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du bdag 'du shes gnas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'tshal ba'i slad 
[\[329b.5\]]du lus dang srog kyang bor te/_bde ba thams cad mi 'tshal bar dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i slad du go cha bgo bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[329b.6\]]zhing dpag tu med pa nas/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang blo mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/bar snang las kyang sgra 'di skad ces byang chub sems 
[\[329b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'di brgyan te yongs su gzung ba'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so/_/byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba'i sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du dam pa'i chos rgyan 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od rab tu btang bas 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med 
[\[330a.2\]]grangs med pa ni byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/sems can la la dag ni sems rnam par grol lo/_/la la dag ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/la la dag ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rnyed do/_/la la dag ni lha dang mi'i phun 
[\[330a.3\]]sum tshogs pa yongs su bzung bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas gzhan dag la yang lta ba'i phyir rgyu bsags par yang gyur to/_/de dag thams cad la yang bcom ldan 'das rjes su thugs rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
