[\[330a.4\]]mkha' mdzod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[330a.5\]]bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_
[\[330a.6\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'dus pa chen po'i le'u las 'phags 
[\[330a.7\]]pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shI la dang /_shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]{D149}]@#//rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai tri pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[330b.2\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa 
[\[330b.3\]]gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la chos sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[330b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa sus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[330b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/_gang gis snying rje bas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzhan gyi rgyud la bzhag na byams pa bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye 
[\[330b.6\]]ba'i cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed 
[\[330b.7\]]'jig rten khams/_/de dag rin chen byur bur bkang byas te/_/dga' rab sems kyis rgyal la phul ba bas/_/gang gis tshigs bcad gcig cig sems can byin/_/rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen de/_/snying rje bskyed nas tshigs bcad sbyin pa la/_/gang gA'i cha dang grangs su'ang mi phod 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]na/_/lan gnyis lan gsum sems la ga la zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[331a.2\]]dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D150}]@#//rgya gar skad du/_
[\[331a.3\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra pa ri pr-its+tsha sap+ta d+har+m+ma ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[331a.4\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[331a.5\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i lte ba la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[331a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos du zhig la bslab par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[331a.7\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos bdun la bslab par bya ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par rtog pas kyang 'dod pa la sten par mi byed na dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba lta smos kyang ci 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]dgos/_tha na rmi lam gyi nang du yang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten par mi byed pa dang /_bya dang 'dra ba'i sems kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med par bya ba dang /_thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pas nga rgyal dang /_ngar 'dzin pa med par bya ba dang /_dngos po dang dngos po med pa spangs nas 
[\[331b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa brtan po dang ldan par bya ba dang /_yang dag par bden pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa'i shes pas sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang 'dra bar 'khor ba las mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa gdab par mi bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[331b.3\]]tu sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos bdun po de dag la bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te 
[\[331b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i 
[\[331b.5\]]blo gros kyis bsgyur ba//[ {D151}]@#//rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra ti b+hA na ma ti ba ri pr-I ts+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[331b.6\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri dang 
[\[331b.7\]]thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de'i tshe tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]ba dang lhan cig tu mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[332a.2\]]'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[332a.3\]]la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bla ma'i mchog_/khams gsum pa'i dam pa/_byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi lhag pa'i gzhi/_sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad pa/_kun du khyab pa'i 
[\[332a.4\]]thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs thug pa ma mchis pa nges par thob par mdzad pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus snyigs ma'i rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa la dug gsum 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/_gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang na gang 
[\[332a.5\]]nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na gtso bo ma mchis shing de gang gi yang ma lags pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis non te phan tshun mi 'thun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_de dag gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa na gzhan 
[\[332a.6\]]dag gi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang /_de las gzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul 'thob pa dang /_
[\[332a.7\]]de dag kyang phyi rol gyi gos ngur smrig tsam dang /_khong pa'i nang gi 'dun pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi 'thun la gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs par bgyid pa dang /_skyon sgrogs par bgyid pa dang /_yon tan nges par sbed par bgyid pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]rgyags pa dang /_dregs pas non cing ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /_de dag shi 'phos na yang ngan song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal ba dang /_tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa/_
[\[332b.2\]]rtsub pa/_tsha ba/_yid du mi mchi ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_ngan 'gro'i lam las rnam par bzlog nas bsod nams kyis gzhal med khang thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams 
[\[332b.3\]]gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spobs pa'i blo gros de ltar khyod seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing /_de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin 
[\[332b.4\]]gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs so legs so/_/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob nas legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing /_don thams cad 
[\[332b.5\]]'grub par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag khyod zhus shig zhus nas kyang the tshom med par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/_gang dag 
[\[332b.6\]]gis ni mi rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/_gang dag gis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_gang dag gis ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_gang dag gis ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_gang dag gis ni rigs mthon po rnams su skye 
[\[332b.7\]]bar 'gyur/_gang dag gis ni bran dang bran mo rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang /_kha dri bda' ba dang /_kha dog dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]mthong na dga' ba dang /_gnod pa ma mchis pa dang /_lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang /_skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur/_las gang dag gis ni sems can rnams mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[333a.2\]]skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /_mdog mi sdug pa dang /_kha dri mi bda' ba dang /_gnod pa mang ba dang /_sems mi dga' ba dang /_lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma lags pa dang /_nyes byas kyi las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni legs par gsungs pa'i 
[\[333a.3\]]chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba dge sbyong dang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du rgyun du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[333a.4\]]rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin du don yang grub par 'gyur/_bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa/_
[\[333a.5\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_dbang dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la lkog tu ma gyur pa'i spyan dang ldan pas rnam par phye ste rgyas par lan stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ji lta bu zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam 
[\[333a.6\]]par phye ste bshad kyis nyon cig_/tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni 
[\[333a.7\]]lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dang po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar byed cing bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_gzhan gyis nor 'phrog par mi byed cing bkren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar byed pa yin/_
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa ma yin te/_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin/_gso sbyong la brtson zhing bden par smra ba yin rang bzhin du 'dug cing rang gi skyon tshad med pa spong bar byed la myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin te/_las lnga po de dag 
[\[333b.2\]]dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/srog chags gsod las ldog pa byas pas lha dang mi dang lha min rnams/_/'jig rten du ni mi thub lus can tshe ring nad med 'gyur ba yin/_/'od kyi dkyil 
[\[333b.3\]]'khor dag pa'i lus can shes ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus/_lha nang rab mchog de yi longs spyod sna tshogs dpal can rtag tu 'byung /_/bor ma thag tu lha nang rtag tu lha yi dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur/_/bsam med bsal ba 'phro ba rnam log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan/_/
[\[333b.4\]]rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing /_/rtse zhing dga' ba'i dpag bsam shing gi yul na me tog gtor lus ldan/_/mkhas shing 'dod pa mi phan yongs spangs dri mchog dag pa'i lus dang ldan/_/tshe rabs kun du dpe med gser mchog lus dang 
[\[333b.5\]]ldan zhing rab tu mdzes/_/rtag tu lha yi nang du skal ba bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung 'gyur/_/lha mo sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal la spyod par byed/_/sngon chad cho ga bzhin du ngag skyon bzhi spangs kha ni dri zhim ldan/_/gsal zhing thogs med mi 'jigs tshig 
[\[333b.6\]]mchog lha rnams 'dir ni nges par 'byung /_/yang dag lan 'debs rnam bsgrags snyan cing skye bos shin tu tshig gzung 'os/_/pi bang rol mo sgra 'byor sprin sgra skad snyan pho brang 'khor skad ldan/_/ma rmongs sems kyis myos 'gyur ma legs rjod byed spangs pas lhar 'gyur zhing /_/grangs 
[\[333b.7\]]med dge ba'i lha yis mchod pa lha yi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/_/blo dang ldan zhing lus brtan yid bzang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa rjod par byed/_/gal te tshe zad lha yi yul nas lhung ba'i lha rnams de tshe smad/_/sdig med 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]lo brgya nyi shu lon na lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus 'od can/_/lha rnams lam sel byed cing lha rnams bye bas mchod de brtan par 'gro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' 
[\[334a.2\]]stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dang po byas pa gzo bas sbyin pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_dbul po dang /_sdug bsngal ba la kun bged pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ma nyams par 
[\[334a.3\]]sten pa dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos la spro bar byed cing nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang bcas la 'thun par 'dzin pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang 
[\[334a.4\]]ldan pa rnams mi nyid 'thob par 'gyur zhing longs spyod kyang chen por 'gyur ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_'jig rten gyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sbyin pa byin 
[\[334a.5\]]pas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur/_/rtag tu longs spyod 'byor dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur/_/lus ngan po dang mtshungs par sbyin dang spyod par byed/_/rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ma nyams de ni dkon mchog mchod par byed/_/nyes byas yongs 
[\[334a.6\]]su spangs pas shin tu nges pa ste/_/tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho med pa yin/_/bde ba thob pas skyon med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/des pa'i mi ni pha rol sems 'khrugs ma byas shing /_/gzhan dag rnams kyis gnod byas phyir ni gnod mi byed/_/de bzhin tshig ngan brjod 
[\[334a.7\]]kyang gshe bar mi byed pas/_/dge ba mchog gi tshul thob nas ni mdzes par 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus bzang la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing /_/stobs dang gzi brjid chen po dge ba rnams dang ldan/_/dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pa thob par gyur pas na/_/longs 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]spyod 'byor pa'i spyod yul ldan pas lha der 'gyur/_/mi 'phrog sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu 'thun pa ste/_/byas pa gzo zhing las la 'dod par rab tu byed/_/dkon mchog gsum dang ma la sogs la mchod mdzangs pa/_nam yang kun la the tsom byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi gang khyad par 
[\[334b.2\]]'phags pa dge ba lnga po rnams/_/byed pa de ni sa yi bdag por rab tu 'gyur/_/stobs la sogs dang gzugs dang longs spyod mi zad ldan/_/grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rnams kyis rim gro byas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros 
[\[334b.3\]]sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas kyang de dag tu bskal pa bye ba mang por gnas par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog la dad par mi byed la kun du bsngags pa ma yin 
[\[334b.4\]]brjod pas skur pa 'debs par byed cing 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang /_bar gyi dus na yang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang zag bzhi po mang por mi gus pa 'thun par mi 'dzin pa/_
[\[334b.5\]]'jig rten gyi smra ba lhur len pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa dang /_gcig la gcig nyes rtsom gyis/_gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gis rgyal po dang /_rje dpon dang /_blon po dang /_pha dang /_bu rnams gcig la gcig mi 'thun pas mi gus pa rnams 
[\[334b.6\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la brten nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_bdag nyid dge slong yin par khas 'che zhing dge ba'i chos 
[\[334b.7\]]yang dag par sgrub pa la mi gnas la/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon rnams mgu bar mi byed cing bka' blo mi bde la 'thun par mi 'dzin cing yang dag par rjes su bstan kyang rjes su bstan pa la sgrub par mi byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed la bdag la stod par byed/_gzhan 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]la smod par byed cing nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa'i shas che la bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing skur pa 'debs par byed pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni sems can 
[\[335a.2\]]dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes nas kyang ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig pa ma byung ba de srid du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 
[\[335a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe der yang 'jig pa byung bar gyur na/_de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kun du 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag 
[\[335a.4\]]tu 'khyam zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong la 'byung ba'i mtha' med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rmongs pas thog ma med nas 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal bying gyur pa'i/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho khas len mi 
[\[335a.5\]]byed de/_/de ni kun rig ma yin rnal 'byor rgyal po ma yin zhes/_/bdag nyid chud gzan skye bo gzhan rnams la yang slu bar byed/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'byor pa sdug pa'i mchog byas na/_/de ni dge ba chung 'gyur 'jig par byed pa'i char 'gyur zhes/_/mi dge 'di ni mngon 
[\[335a.6\]]sum dge ba mdun na yod bzhin du/_/'on kyang sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod par byed/_bar ma rtsod pa'i dus 'dir bzhi po bkres pas nyam thag pa/_/phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin pas dkrugs shing bla ma smod par byed/_/'khor du 'dus pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di ni rnam bshig pas/_/
[\[335a.7\]]mi bzad ro med log par ltung ba'i sar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po pha dang sring mo spun dang gzhon nu bu mo rnams/_/byams pa'i yid ni log gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te/_/byis pa bu ltar thams cad gcig la gcig ni bzhad gad byed/_/log ltung dam pa rnam par 'bying bar 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs dus 'dir gang dag shin tu sdig can sems can rnams/_/'thun par mi 'dzin dge sbyong kha dog 'dzin pa gzugs mi sdug/_/ngan pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa sdig pa khrag khrig byed 'gyur ba/_/de dag shi 'phos nas ni sdig pa rtsod pa'i mchog gis 
[\[335b.2\]]gnon/_/mi yis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sdig pa lnga po dag_/bsgrubs shing byas pa dag ni bshags par nus pa ma yin te/_/gang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig gis kyang bskyab par mi spyod pa'i/_/me ri drag po mnar med pa yi mer ni sreg par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom 
[\[335b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dang po 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_chom rkun dang /_gzhan gyi bu lon blangs nas gnod 
[\[335b.4\]]sems su byed pa dang /_srog gcod pa dang /_ma dad pas dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan par dga' zhing dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa la dga' bas log pas 'tsho ba thams cad la dga' ba ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 
[\[335b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la dga' ba'i mi rnams ni/_/bu lon byin pa rnam par blangs nas mi gzhan gsod par byed/_/srog gcod pa la dga' ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chi bdag rgyal po rnams/_/
[\[335b.6\]]rgya la sogs pas bzung nas sems can rnams la gsod par byed/_/dad pa la sogs dman pa'i blo gros dkar po'i 'du shes can/_/nag po dpag tu med pa bdag cag spyod par mi shes pa/_/rmongs pa rnams ni dam chos dkon mchog gtam la dga' mi byed/_/'jig rten zhugs pa'i 
[\[335b.7\]]chos la 'dir ni rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar gangs ri las 'dir kha ba bab dang rab bab pa/_chu ni chu yi shugs kyis 'phral du sa 'og 'gro ba bzhin/_/lha mi'i grong du sdig pa'i phung po mang du byas pas na/_/rmongs pa rnams ni de bzhin dud 'gro rnams su myur du 'gro/_/rta dre'u rnga 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]bong glang chen ba lang ma he seng ge dang /_/wa dang sbrul dang phag dang khyi la sogs par gyur nas su/_/rtswa za ba dang sha dang bdud rtsi lo ma'i zas za zhing /_/de dag rtag tu gzhan gyi khur khyer byed cing dub par 'gyur/_/bkres pas zil gyis non pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa/_/
[\[336a.2\]]bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su'ang nam yang thar bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig na ru sbal mig ni gcig yod pas/_/gnya' shing bu gar mgrin pa btad par nus pa ma yin pa/_/de bzhin lha dang mi dang dbang phyug che nyid bde blag tu/_/log par lhung ba brgya yis thob par nus pa ma yin te/_/
[\[336a.3\]]sangs rgyas 'od zer dam pa'i tshogs can dpag tu med pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'od kyis de dag 'byin par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig 
[\[336a.4\]]rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dang po bkren zhing chags pa dang /_mun pa mun nag chen po'i bshes gnyen dang /_sogs pa lhur byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang longs spyod par mi byed pa dang /_chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir phrag dog dang /_ser sna lhur byed pas spun dang /_sring 
[\[336a.5\]]mo dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_'brel pa dang /_sbyin gnas dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa thams cad la rab tu sbyin par mi byed cing pha ma dag la yang rab tu sbyin par 
[\[336a.6\]]mi byed pa dang /_nges par bskyang bar 'os pa dag mi skyong la bsnyen bkur mi byed cing bla ma la mi gus la gces par mi byed pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[336a.7\]]bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bkren pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi phod pa/_/de dag gzhan dag las ni blang bar 'dod par byed/_/mdzod rnams kyi ni sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa rnams/_/'dir ni bskyang 'os rtsa lag mchog rnams gso mi byed/_/gzhan nor chud gzon pa yis 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]rtag tu skrag pa rnams/_/bla ma la yang de dag rab rtsub byams can min/_/de dag bdag gi chung ma la sogs g.yog tshogs la/_/dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying brtse shes med cing /_/dkar po dag las log pa de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug 
[\[336b.2\]]bsngal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'gyur/_/de dag lo brgya rnams su rmi lam rmis par yang /_/gos dang zas dang btung ba'ang nam yang rmi mi 'gyur/_/khab 'dra'i kha dang ri chen lta bu'i lto can rnams/_/nyam thag shar dang nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par byed/_/kha nas me 'bar lus ngan phyogs dang lho 
[\[336b.3\]]phyogs gzhan/_/skams par mthong nas rin chen me nang lhung bar 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i pho nya dpung mgo las grub rab stug cing /_/sra ldan rnams kyis mnan nas zangs zhun bzod dka' rab/_/mi 'dra ro bro med pa de dag rnams la ldud/_/rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad ldan 
[\[336b.4\]]chu bzhin 'thung bar byed/_/nang grol lus kyi khog pa bsregs pa bsal ba'i rlung gis su/_/skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la stobs chen yang ldud byed/_/de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams/_/rigs dang longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyis dman par 'gyur/_/
[\[336b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis 'jig rten thams cad la 
[\[336b.6\]]gnod sems med par gyur pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum dang /_pha ma la gus pa dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i bzod pa dang /_des pa dang /_shin tu gya nom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba la brtson pa ste/_spobs 
[\[336b.7\]]pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/_rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bsam byas gang dag bsod nams tshogs pa skal bzang sbyin pa'i cho 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]ga bzhin/_/kun du sems can mang la kun bged de dag rtag tu nad med 'gyur/_/tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus can 'jig rten mchog tu 'gyur/_/mtshungs dang rgya chen khyad par can gyis mdzes mdzod rin chen ri dbang bzhin/_/'dul ba nyams dga'i dkon mchog 
[\[337a.2\]]mtshungs med pha ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bas/_/shin tu rgya chen gtso mchog khyim du skyes pa grangs med skye bos mchod/_/shin tu nus kyang yid 'khrug rnam spangs kun du gzugs kyis 'phags pa rnams/_/'jig rten rnams kyi mig tu sdug pa skal bzang rigs ni mthon por 'gyur/_/
[\[337a.3\]]gang zag brtan zhing kun bzod shin tu yid bzang dkar dang 'thun rnams dang /_/mi rnams gang dag shes rab dag mchog sangs rgyas gsung la kha ton brtson/_/de dag 'byor pa thob nas rigs mchog skyes pa kun du kun mchog mdzes/_/de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus chen rgya mtsho chen 
[\[337a.4\]]po bzhin du spa/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha ma rnams la mi gus pa dang /_gya nom pa'i sems 
[\[337a.5\]]ma yin pa dang /_zlog pa med cing ci dgar sdig pa spyod pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang /_bu lon phrogs nas bdag sbed pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 
[\[337a.6\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bsod nams rgya chen 'byor pa gangs 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas/_/blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs shing gus par mi byed la/_pha ma rnams la rmad byung sbyin gnas 'dra bar 'du shes mi byed pa/_/de dag nyes 
[\[337a.7\]]pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang gyur dman zhing g.yon can 'gyur/_/dkon mchog mtshungs med rnams la ma gus lhur byed ma rungs brlang tshig 'gyur/_/gang dag byams dang de bzhin snying rje ma lus dge ba chud gzan pa/_/de dag grangs med skye bar 'dzin med gzhan 'joms ngo tsha mi shes 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]shing /_/mi yi yul du bran nyid spangs nas skad cig gis ni dma' bar 'gyur/_/gzugs dang dbang phyug rigs mchog blo bral dman la mos pa'i glen par 'gyur/_/dkon mchog rnams ma mchod pas nga rgyal med cing zhan la mdangs ngan 'gyur/_/dpal kun med cing ting 'dzin bral ba las 
[\[337b.2\]]rnams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur/_/de dag 'jig rten kun dga' dga' ston che sogs med cing tshegs kyis 'tsho/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni skal ba bzang por 'gyur 
[\[337b.3\]]zhing /_khyim khol dang /_kha dri zhim pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_lus dang /_sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_blta na sdug pa dang /_skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang /_ma tshang ba med pa dang /_sgro 
[\[337b.4\]]btags pa med pa'i tshig dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_theg pa chen po dang /_theg pa rnam pa gsum po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhin la mi bzod pa med cing mi smod la/_mi spong zhing de thams cad gzung ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton la sogs 
[\[337b.5\]]pa byed pa dang /_ngag gi skyon bzhi po tshad med pa rnam par spang zhing 'phags pa'i las la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /_sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtse zhing yongs su bskyang pa dang /_skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang /_gzhan gyi skyon mthong ba'i 
[\[337b.6\]]brjod pa yal bar 'jog pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/_skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang /_kha dri zhim pa dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_'thun ba dang /_skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /_
[\[337b.7\]]mya ngan med pa dang /_sems tha mal du gnas pa dang /_khro ba med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_kha dog dang ldan pa dang /_grags pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas sogs la shin 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]tu shas cher gus 'bad pha ma rnams mchod pas/_/rtag tu ngag skyon kun bral 'jig rten dag tu rmad du byung bar 'gyur/_/tshig gi yon tan gzung 'os rnga sgrar bcas shing tshe rabs kun du phan/_/ud pal dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan kha yis phyogs su snyan pa grags/_/gang 
[\[338a.2\]]dag bdag byams gzhan mtshungs mi phan skyon brjod sdig pa ngan pa las/_/phral nas dge ba kun la sems can rnams ni sbyor du 'jug byed pa/_/de dag 'jig rten thob nas skal ba bzang po kun du thams cad dga'/_/shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig las log par 
[\[338a.3\]]'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung dang bstan brtson de sems byed cing des par 'gyur/_/'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyi rtsa lag tshogs gyur ces/_/de lta zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la 
[\[338a.4\]]ni phan par byed/_/'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sun 'byin pa'i/_/sdig pa yongs su spangs nas dag pa'i yid can skyon rnams kun sbas nas/_/sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs phan tshun rjod par byed/_/myur du lha yi 
[\[338a.5\]]dbang phyug mtshungs med thob nas sangs rgyas dge bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo 
[\[338a.6\]]mang po mi dga' ba dang /_kha dri mi zhim pa dang /_sems mi dga' ba dang /_gnod pa mang ba dang /_lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas rtag tu gzhan slu ba'i sems lhur len pa dang /_chos kyi 'bel 
[\[338a.7\]]ba'i gtam chen po la 'dus pa na chos kyi gtam de la rnam par smod pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang /_dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /_mdog mi sdug pa dang /_kha dri mi zhim pa dang /_sems mi dga' ba dang /_gnod pa mang ba dang /_lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[338b.2\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sems yid rnams kyis gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas/_/log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnams sems dang /_/lus kyis sdug bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams su myong bar 
[\[338b.3\]]'gyur/_/lcags kyi lcags kyu chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i dbang phyug gnas su'ang mi rnams shin tu zangs bskol ldud par 'gyur/_/dmyal bar mi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yong mi 'gyur/_/gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar 
[\[338b.4\]]kha dri mi zhim zhing /_/'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta na sdug pa ma yin rnams su 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan skur 'debs rtsod pa'i skyon mang zhing /_/de dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi ni sa ya mang pos gleng bar 'gyur/_/sems can [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra rnams kyis tha mal sems dang 
[\[338b.5\]]lus bde ma yin phyir/_/sngar bshad nyes 'gro de yi 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur/_/mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun la slu byed pa'i/_/sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nas ni/_/'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 
[\[338b.6\]]rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye/_/de ltar lus can 'khyam pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba med/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba 
[\[338b.7\]]gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/_ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas gzhan dag kyang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba 
[\[339a.2\]]sgrub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_bka' blo bde ba dang 'thun par 'dzin 
[\[339a.3\]]par sgrub pa dang /_kun du thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang /_ji ltar brtsams pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_lung mnod pa dang /_bshad pa rnams 
[\[339a.4\]]yid la byed pa yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis bar chad med par bsgom pa la mngon par zhen cing sgrub par byed pa ste/_spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni 
[\[339a.5\]]gang dang gang du skyes pa'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang /_de dag las chos kyang thos nas/_yid dga' zhing ci 
[\[339a.6\]]bsams pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/_ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi chos la gnas/_/
[\[339a.7\]]de dag nyid kyis sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzugs legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed/_/gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten ma lus la/_/bdag dang bu gcig byis pa 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]rnams dang 'drar mthong ba/_/de dag srid pa kun du mya ngan med nges 'gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong /_/gang dag shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad rnams/_/nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun du spyod par byed/_/'dir ni rmad du byung ba'i 'od dang 
[\[339b.2\]]ldan pa rnams/_/'jig rten mun pa che la snang ba mchog byed 'gyur/_/kun du chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas/_/sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni gzhan med par/_/nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi/_/mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes 
[\[339b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/_yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang /_so so'i 
[\[339b.4\]]g.yog 'khor lnga brgya tsam po de dag ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[339b.5\]]'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis ni ci bsams pa bzhin gyi theg pa rnams la sems bskyed do/_/ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa yang thob cing /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_gos dang /_
[\[339b.6\]]rgyan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[339b.7\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i bla mas chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa legs so legs so/_/chos lnga po de dag thos nas 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par don grub par gyur 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]lags so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thos nas nag po'i phyogs spangs te/_dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par spyan 
[\[340a.2\]]'dren na bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing 
[\[340a.3\]]mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de rang gi khyim 
[\[340a.4\]]du song nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag byas te thal mo sbug sbug por sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon mchog gshegs pa bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 
[\[340a.5\]]dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/_des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang lags kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yid dga' ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu legs so/_/khyod kyis legs 
[\[340a.6\]]par byas so zhes mngon par bstod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyur to/_/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis rang gi chung ma pad ma g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la bsgo ba/_bzang mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[340a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du bza' ba dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa mang ba dang bsod par sbyor cig_/sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang /_phyag dar bya ba dang /_bla re bre ba dang /_dar gyi lda ldi gdags pa dang /_me tog chal par dgram 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]pa dang /_bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug par byed du bcug la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa'i gdan ci 'os su thing ste/_mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan sngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces bsgo ste/_spobs pa'i 
[\[340b.2\]]blo gros mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_rgan rabs la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'grogs shing ji skad smras pa thams cad byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal skyed mos tshal chen po 
[\[340b.3\]]nas byung nas/_sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas cho 'phrul dang bcas pas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por gshegs so/_/gshegs nas kyang rim gyis spobs pa'i blo gros 
[\[340b.4\]]kyi khyim ga la ba de logs su bzhud do/_/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsu nas mchod yon dang zhabs la 'bul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par khyim gyi 
[\[340b.5\]]nang du gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das ni ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs so/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun ni ci 'os pa la 'khod do/_/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang /_slas dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_rgan rabs rnams ni yid 
[\[340b.6\]]dga' zhing 'dud la/_bla ma la gus pa dang /_gces par byed pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa la 'drim par rtsom mo/_/spobs pa'i blo gros ni me tog dang /_spos chur bcas pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par 
[\[340b.7\]]gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par gyur nas/_de gnyis las gcig ni dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang /_btung ba 'byor tshogs zhes ma smras la/_bcom ldan 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas/_de gang gis kyang ci yang ma byin nas/_de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci yang ma byin pa ni/_dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/_sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin 
[\[341a.2\]]zhing /_snying rje med la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag go/_/gang de dag la byin yang 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag blun po ste/_gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los gcad do snyam du sems par 
[\[341a.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dag 'byor tshogs zhes byas shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang bar mdzad pa dang /_cig shos 'ongs par gyur to/_/des ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang ba dang /_bsod pa 
[\[341a.4\]]thob nas de yi rangs te/_phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba/_bdag la gang dag gis bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang ba dang /_bsod pa byin pa ni dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po rnams te/_snying brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing /_byams pa'i bdag nyid can 
[\[341a.5\]]dag go/_/'dis ni bdag zhag bdun du tshim par 'gyur bar byas so/_/gang 'di dag la byin na 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste/_legs so/_/gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na sangs rgyas la sogs pa 
[\[341a.6\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis rim gro byed par gyur cig snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas/_bstsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[341a.7\]]dga' bo deng phyin chad bza' ba dang /_btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du rjes su yi rang brjod cig_/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]gzengs bstod pa dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa sngon du mdzad pa'i chos kyi gtam sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed par mdzad de/_gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud de/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas de na bzhugs so/_/de nas sdug 
[\[341b.2\]]bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor 'khyam 'khyam ste/_yul gzhan zhig tu song nas pha zad tshu zad tsam gyi phyogs su nyal bar gyur to/_/der bsod nams kyi las can de la steng gi nam mkha' la grib ma'i don du sprin gyi bla re glog dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas 
[\[341b.3\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe yul de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang gzhan med do/_/de na tshong dpon dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang /_blon po chen po dang /_blon po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor na 
[\[341b.4\]]'khod pa rnams ni/_mtshan mkhan dang /_ltas mkhan dang /_skar ma dang /_gza' spyod pa la mkhas pa la rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brtson par gyur cing 'dri'o/_/des smras pa/_skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod do/_/de ni rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[341b.5\]]de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rgyal po la 'os pa rin thang che ba'i khri stan bzang po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang /_yu ba nor bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang /_yu ba gser las byas shing nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga ma'i bsil yab dang /_spos chus 
[\[341b.6\]]bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang /_me tog dang /_rgyan phreng dang /_gos dang /_dbu rgyan dang /_thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /_spos kyi phur ma dang /_slo ma dag thogs te/_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdog pa dang /_glu dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang /_rgyal po'i 
[\[341b.7\]]pho brang 'khor nas byung ste/_kun nas de kun tu btsal to/_/ltas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bkab pa'i phyogs de mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dga' zhing gsal ba'i phyogs de mthong 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]ngam/_de dag gis smras pa/_grogs po mthong ngo /_/des smras pa/_de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'dug ste/_de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don tu sprin de dag 'dus so/_/de nas de dag der dong nas/_sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgras 
[\[342a.2\]]sbran te btud nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dbang bskur ba bzhes la rgyal por gyur cig_/des smras pa/_kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_bsod nams kyi las can khyod/_de skad ma zer bar gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dgos so/_/smras 
[\[342a.3\]]pa/_de bzhin du gyur cig_/de nas de dag gis mal gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de stan bzang po la 'dug tu bcug nas/_bkra shis thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing dbang bskur te/_dbu rgyan dar thod can la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/_shing rta'i 
[\[342a.4\]]mgo logs su gdugs chen po bsgreng ste/_btsugs shing yu ba gser las byas pa/_nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsil yab dag gis g.yob cing /_lha rgyal bar gyur cig_/rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas mngon par bstod de/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du khrid do/_/
[\[342a.5\]]de nas rgyal po'i shing rta de bsgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa cig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo chad do/_/de nas bsod nams kyi las can de yang rgyal srid la gnas par gyur to/_/de'i rgyal srid de yang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_
[\[342a.6\]]bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang bar gyur to/_/rgyal po'i ming gis yon tan thams cad 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/_dga' dgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du 'di gang gi mthu yin/_bdag gi rgyal srid skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa 'di gang gis byung 
[\[342a.7\]]bar gyur snyam pa dang /_de sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi las mngon par 'du byas pa de thams cad rjes su dran no/_/yang dag par dran nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_tshur gshegs 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]su gsol zhes pho nya zhig btang ngo /_/pho nya btang nas kyang /_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang /_rang gi khyim gyi bar du bar der bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag btab cing /_phyag dar byas te/_me tog chal par bkram nas/_gdugs dang /_
[\[342b.2\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rta babs btsugs shing pog phor dag gis bdugs nas mngon par brgyan te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po de grong khyer gyi mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas shing /_blon po chen po dang /_
[\[342b.3\]]blon po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas bsu'o/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye mas bsgos pa'i slo ma dpag tu med pas mchod de/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la 
[\[342b.4\]]lus thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas/_'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang /_gces par byed pa chen po mchog gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rang gi khyim gyi nang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_skyed mos tshal 
[\[342b.5\]]chen pos yongs su bskor bar gshegs su gsol nas/_zhag bdun du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas so/_/de nas rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas/_bstsang sder gyu ste/_phyag bcabs par rig nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir g.yog 
[\[342b.6\]]'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dma' ba dang /_dbul ba lags na/_bdag gi rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa 'di ga las mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[342b.7\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na/_sbyin bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des dus gzhan zhig na rang gi khyim du/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol to/_/de nas der sdug bsngal 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]ba gnyis shig lhags zhes bya ba nas rgyas par snga ma bzhin te/_gcig gi mgo khyed kyis shing rta'i 'khor los chod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de yang shi 'phos nas/_sems can dmyal bar skyes te/_der skyes pa de'i mgo skad cig skad cig la skyes 
[\[343a.2\]]so cog na/_lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar bas bcad do/_/de yang de nas bskal pa bye bas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis ni rgyal po'i dpal thob ste/_bdag de lta bur gyur nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du gdugs tshod gsol 
[\[343a.3\]]bar gyur cig ces khyod kyis smon lam btab ste khyod kyi bsam pa de yang rdzogs so/_/de phyin cad ni tshe rabs dpag tu med pa thams cad du phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' 
[\[343a.4\]]stsal to/_/'jig rten nag po 'byung ba'i phyir/_/yid ni dug gi rtsa ba yin/_/nyes par smra rnams 'byung ba'i phyir/_/kha ni sdig pa'i sgo nyid do/_/sems kyis sna tshogs sems par byed/_/de nas tshig tu smra bar 'gyur/_/ngag yid dag gis sdig byas pa/_/lus skyes 
[\[343a.5\]]sdug bsngal sbyin par byed/_/phan dang mi phan ma bsams par/_/blo gros med pas sdig byed pa/_/des na sdug bsngal snod 'gyur te/_/nyon mongs pa dag de ltar 'gyur/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi mgo bo dag_/yid kyis gcod par 'dod pa de/_/blo gros ngan pa mi shes pa'i/_/
[\[343a.6\]]mgo ni 'khor los yang dag chod/_/dpal ldan yid 'di kho nas ni/_/chos dkar bdud rtsi rten pa yi/_/sems can bsod nams byas dge rnams/_/lha yi 'jig rten rnams su khrid/_/'dir ni snying gis kun bsams nas/_/tshig tu rjod pas legs smras pa/_/de phyir 
[\[343a.7\]]de ni lus kyis su/_/bsod nams mdzod ni len par 'gyur/_/mi yis blo ni sngon btang ste/_/las dge mi dge rnams phye nas/_/gal te bsod nams che byed na/_/rtag tu rab tu lha der 'gyur/_/sems kyis mi dge ba yi las/_/rtag tu yongs su spangs nas ni/_/
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]rab tu dga' bas bsod nams nyid/_/mi yis bya ste sdig pa min/_/tshe rabs bye ba grangs med par/_/'khor los sgyur sogs go 'phang gi/_/lha mi'i nang du rgyal po'i dpal/_/thams cad thob nas khyod bzhin no/_/mi yi dbang phyug dus kun du/_/srid 
[\[343b.2\]]rnams snying po med shes nas/_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas chos rnams la/_/mngon par brtson pa mtha' yas bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po des yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/_mchog tu yid byung ste/_'khor dang bcas pas rgyun du zhugs 
[\[343b.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu thob po/_/gzhan stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang /_chos mnyan pas lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang /_thar pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[343b.4\]]'das kyis der gang sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa de thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te/_gtsug lag khang gi skyabs shig tu/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang du/_sangs rgyas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/_tshe 
[\[343b.5\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/gzhan dag la yang /_rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[343b.6\]]mo/_/gang su dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byed pa/_de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa las/_ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i theg pa rnams la lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[343b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir/_
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/_las rnam par 'byed pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[344a.2\]]dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs 
[\[344a.3\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war ma dang /_zhu chen 
[\[344a.4\]]gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
